[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D4266}#]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_tat+t+wa saM gra ha kA ri kA/_bod skad du/_de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/_
[\[1b.2\]]rang bzhin dbang ldan gnyis ka dang /_/bdag sogs byed dang bral g.yo ba/_/las dang de 'bras 'brel pa dag_/rnam par gzhag [#]la sogs pa'i rten/_/yon tan rdzas dang bya ba dang /_/rigs
[\[1b.3\]]dang 'du sogs khyad par gyis/_/stong dang sgro btags rnam can ni/_/sgra dang shes pa'i spyod yul can/_/mtshan nyid gsal dang ldan pa yi/_/tshad ma gnyis kyis gtan la dbab/_/cha shas shin
[\[1b.4\]]tu phra bas kyang /_/'dres pa gzhan gyi bdag nyid min/_/mi 'pho thog mtha' med pa can/_/gzugs brnyan la sogs dag dang 'dra/_/spros pa kun gyi tshogs dang bral/_/gzhan gyis [#]rtogs pa ma
[\[1b.5\]]yin dang /_/rang dbang thob [#]la mi brten pa/_/'gro la phan pa mdzad bzhed pas[#]/_/bskal pa grangs med mi nyung bas/_/thugs rje chen po'i bdag gyur pa/_/rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni/_/gang gis
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]gsungs pa smra ba'i mchog_/kun mkhyen de la phyag 'tshal nas/_/de nyid rnams ni bsdu bar bya/_/nus pa ma lus dang ldan pa'i/_/gtso bo nyid ni 'ba' zhig las/_/'bras bu'i khyad par rab skye ste/_/_
[\[2a.2\]]de dngos can nyid yang dag par/_/gal te rgyu yi bdag nyid la/_/nus pa 'bras bu don yod min/_/de ni bya bar mi nus te/_/ngo bo med phyir mkha' pad bzhin/_/med par mtshungs na ci yi phyir/_/sA lu'i [#]sa bon la
[\[2a.3\]]sogs pa'i/_/bye brag phyir na nges pa yi/_/nyer [#]len len byed gzhan ma yin/_/skye ba'i chos can thams cad kyang /_/dngos po kun la skye 'gyur te/_/'di kun la ni de bdag [#]nyid/_/khyad par khyad par med phyir ro/_/'di
[\[2a.4\]]yi nus pa nges pa'i phyir/_/de lta min zhes lan mi rung /_/gang phyir nus pa'i rgyu dag gis/_/nus par 'os pa'i 'bras nyid byed/_/khyad par byar med gang yin pa/_/dngos po med dang 'gyur ba med/_/gyur na bdag nyid nyams
[\[2a.5\]]gyur phyir/_/de dag gis de ji ltar byed/_/de ltar 'bras nyid mi rung phyir/_/ci zhig byed pas rgyu ru 'gyur/_/de [#]phyir sa bon la sogs pa/_/rgyu yi dngos por yang mi 'gyur/_/gsal ba 'di ni bde sogs kyi/_/rdzas
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]'gro'i bar ni gsal bar snang /_/rab tu gdung dang btang snyoms sogs/_/'bras bu 'di la dmigs phyir ro/_/de phyir de bdag can las byung /_/de rigs rjes 'gro mthong phyir te/_/bum sogs bye brag bzhin gtso bo/_/de yang yin zhes ser skya smra/_/'di la blo bzang
[\[2b.2\]]rnams 'chad [#]pa/_/yod pa la yang klan ka mtshungs/_/de la khyed kyi lan gang yin/_/blo bzang rnams kyi 'ang de dang 'dra/_/gal te zho sogs 'o ma sogs/_/bdag nyid la ni rnam kun yod/_/rgyu la sogs dang 'dra bdag nyid/_/yod pa de dag ci zhig skye/_/'bras bu de
[\[2b.3\]]rgyus bskyed bya min/_/yod phyir rgyu dang rig pa bzhin/_/de phyir mngon 'dod rgyu min te/_/bsgrub bya med phyir bdag mchog bzhin/_/gal te gsal sogs mtshan nyid can/_/khyad par gyur pa 'ga' zhig la/_/'di ni rgyu rnams kyis byed na/_/tha snyad du ni 'gyur ba min/_/gal
[\[2b.4\]]te snga na de yod na/_/de ltar ci yang lan ma thebs/_/'on te de med de dag las/_/med par ji ltar skye bar 'gyur/_/de phyir bsgrub bya med pas na/_/nyer len yongs su 'dzin pa med/_/nges pa las kyang skye ba med/_/nus pa med cing bya ba'ang med/_/bdag nyid thams cad rdzogs
[\[2b.5\]]pa'i phyir/_/'di ni 'bras bu ci yang med/_/de phyir rgyu yi tha snyad kyang /_/'thad pa nyid ni ma yin no/_/sgrub byed zhugs pa thams cad ni/_/phyin ci log ni bzlog pa dang /_/nges pa skyed byed de lta bur/_/'di ni rigs pas 'thad ma yin/_/the tshom dang ni phyin ci log_/rtag tu
[\[2b.6\]]gnas phyir bzlog [#]tu med/_/nges pa skye ba'ang yod ma yin/_/de nyid phyir na kun don med/_/yang na nges pa med pa ni/_/sgrub byed las ni skye 'gyur na/_/yang dag ma yin skye zhe na/_/de nyid kyis na 'di dag kun/_/'khrul pa can gyur [#]ma yin nam/_/gal te mi gsal de dag
[\[2b.7\]]las/_/gsal rten zhe na de gsal gang /_/ngo bo khyad par skye min te/_/dbyer med phyir dang ma 'brel phyir/_/yul de rigs ba 'ang ma yin la/_/dmigs pa'i sgrib pa zad pa'ang min/_/rtag pa'i phyir dang dmigs pa ni/_/gnyis pa yang ni mi srid phyir/_/yon tan gsum ldan
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]dbyer med kyang /_/thams cad kun gyi [#]byed po min/_/gang 'dra med pa'ang de dang 'dra/_/thams cad byed po kun min na/_/ltos sam [#]ma grub pa yi phyir/_/khyod ni nus pa nges pa med/_/yod na de yi nges pa ni/_/ltos [#]bcas rigs [#]pa ma yin nam/_/de min de dag
[\[3a.2\]]ma skyes na/_/de lta'i sgra ni med du zad/_/khyad par kun gyis dben pa yi/_/dngos po'i ngo bo nyams pa med/_/ming [#]ni dngos po'i ngo bo min/_/gang phyir brjod dang rnam rtog ni/_/rnam pa sna tshogs dbyer med la/_/ji ltar goms pa bzhin du 'jug_/skye ba'i dngos po'i dngos de ni/_/med dang
[\[3a.3\]]de bzhin yod pa dang /_/'brel pa med de rnam rtog blos/_/med dang sprel ba kho nar zad/_/gal te dngos po'i ngo bo 'di[#]/_/gcig gi rjes la mthong ba dang /_/sngar med zhes pa de sa bon/_/sngar yod pa la 'di med do/_/'o ma sogs la zho la sogs/_/nus pa'i ngo bo [#]'dod pa gang /_/de la
[\[3a.4\]]nus gang gal te zho/_/'o ma bzhin du snang bar 'gyur/_/gal te gzhan yin gzhan yod na/_/ji ltar dngos kun gzhan zhes bya/_/snying stobs yod pa sdug bsngal dang /_/gti mug yod pa ma yin no/_/gsal ba snying stobs sogs rjes 'gro/_/nges la ji ltar yang ma grub/_/bde
[\[3a.5\]]sogs nang gi yin pa'i phyir/_/de ni rang rig gsal phyir ro/_/sgra sogs gcig pu kho na yang /_/gom [#]dang rig pa'i bye brag las/_/chags pa la sogs nges pa ni/_/skye ba dag tu gsal bar snang /_/dngos gcig rjes su 'brangs nas ni/_/rig [#]pa sna tshogs thal bar 'gyur/_/_
[\[3a.6\]]gal te ma mthong sogs dbang gis/_/dngos po'i rjes su 'brang mi 'gyur/_/dngos po ngo bo rnam gsum pa/_/de yi rig pa rnam gcig can/_/de dang mi mthun de dag ni/_/de la yang dag ji ltar rigs/_/skyes bu gcig la rnal 'byor pa'i/_/bde dang skyo dang btang snyoms skye'i/_/pha
[\[3a.7\]]rol rnams kyi skyes bu ni/_/de yi ngo bor 'dod ma yin/_/gsal ba yon tan gsum can du/_/grub kyang gtso bo rab ma grub/_/de rgyu gcig dang rtag nyid min/_/de ni rigs gcig dang ldan min/_/gsal ba thams cad lcags kyi ni/_/thur ma dang 'dra rim pa dang /_/'brel pa'i lus
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]can dag tu snang /_/rtog dang 'dres pa'i bdag nyid can/_/de bzhin 'jim pa'i [#]'gyur la sogs/_/khyad par rigs gcig ldan min dang /_/rgyu gcig min par yang 'grub ste/_/'jim gong la sogs tha dad phyir/_/skyes bu rnams la sems yod sogs/_/rjes 'gro na yang rgyu
[\[3b.2\]]gcig ni/_/sngon 'gror mi 'dod dngos min zhes/_/gal te dngos su min zhe [#]na/_/'di la ni yang cis mi mtshungs/_/de phyir gtso bo'i rgyu med na/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa/_/sna tshogs thams cad nus pa yi/_/khyad par las ni rung bar 'gyur/_/de kho na nyid bsdus
[\[3b.3\]]pa'i rab tu byed pa las rang bzhin brtag [#]pa ste dang po'o//_//gzhan dag skye ldan kun gyi ni/_/rgyu ni dbang phyug yin zhes zer/_/shes pa med pa'i bdag nyid ni/_/rang gi 'bras bu rtsom mi byed/_/rab rtsom byed pa'i yan lag gi/_/dbyibs [#]kyi khyad par dang ldan gang /_/de ni blo ldan rgyus bskyed bya/_/bum pa sogs bzhin
[\[3b.4\]]dbang po ni/_/gnyis kyis bzung [#]dang bzung ba min/_/rtsod pa'i gzhi dang 'di 'dra bar/_/des na blo ldan sngon 'gro bar/_/chos mi mthun ba rdul du 'dod/_/de bzhin lus sogs [#]pa yi rgyu/_/shes pa yod pas byin brlabs te/_/gzugs sogs ldan phyir rgyu spun sogs/_/rang gi 'bras bu byed mthong bzhin/_/chos dang chos min rdul
[\[3b.5\]]phran kun[#]/_/sems dang ldan pas byin brlabs te/_/rang gi 'bras bu byed sdod de/_/'jug phyir tshig pa rgyu spun bzhin/_/skyes bu skye ba'i dang po yi[#]/_/tha snyad gzhan gyis bstan las 'byung [#]/_/rab sad rnams kyi [#]nges pa'i phyir/_/byis pa yi ni tha snyad bzhin/_/'byung
[\[3b.6\]]ba che [#]sogs gsal ba ni/_/sems dang ldan pas byin brlabs na/_/'jig rten kun gyi bde ba dang /_/sdug bsngal rgyu mtshan nyid du 'gyur/_/shes pa med [#]nyid 'bras nyid dang /_/'jigs nyid la [#]sogs rgyu yi phyir/_/ste'u sogs bzhin de yi phyir/_/de ni yod par gsal bar shes/_/_
[\[3b.7\]]kun gyi byed po nyid grub pa[#]/_/de ni sgrib med kun shes nyid/_/grub ste 'di ltar byed pos ni/_/'bras bu'i ngo bo sogs rig [#]byed/_/rtsod pa'i rten gyi [#]dngos po ni/_/'ga' la [#]mngon sum du ni gsal/_/dngos po yod sogs gtan tshigs phyir/_/bde sogs ngo bo [#]bye brag gi/_/sgrub pa dang po de
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]la ni/_/gtan tshigs ma grub gang gi phyir/_/bkod pa sbyor [#]ba zhes bya dang /_/de bzhin yan lag can ma grub/_/bltar rung nyid du khas blangs pa/_/gnyis ka mi dmigs pa yi phyir/_/de yi phyir ni dpe 'di yang /_/sgrub pa [#]dang ldan [#]ma yin no/_/mig dang reg pa'i rnam
[\[4a.2\]]shes ni/_/tha dad snang ba nye bar skye/_/de dag dmigs pa gcig nyid med/_/dri la sogs pa'i sa bon bzhin[#]/_/de dag gis ni mthu byung ba[#]/_/rtog dang 'brel pa'i bdag nyid can/_/nying mtshams sbyor ba'i shes pa yis[#]/_/bsdus la zhen par byed pa yin/_/de phyir chu dang me
[\[4a.3\]]sogs 'di/_/dbang po gnyis kyis [#]gzung bya med/_/ji skad bshad pa'i chos can ni/_/ma grub phyir na gzhi ma grub/_/lha khang la sogs la bkod pa/_/khyad par can nyid ci 'dra ba/_/byed pa po ni mi dmigs na/_/gang mthong ba [#]ni blo ldan rtogs/_/lus dang ri sogs chos can la/_/_
[\[4a.4\]]gal te de 'dra nyid snang na/_/sgrub pa 'di las ji lta bur/_/'dod pa grub [#]pa de rigs so/_/rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa yis/_/gang gi [#]'bras bur gang nges pa/_/de mthong ba na de nges pa/_/zhes byar rigs [#]pas gnas pa yin/_/dbyibs kyi khyad par de lta bu/_/lus dang shing la sogs
[\[4a.5\]]ba'i dbyibs/_/khyad par 'di dag la med de/_/de 'dra ba ni rab brjod pa'i/_/sgra tsam 'ba' zhig kho na yis/_/ldog na the tshom za bar ni/_/sgrub par 'grub ste grog [#]mkhar dag_/rdza mkhan gyis ni byas pa bzhin/_/chos kyi khyad par rnam rtog phyir/_/'di ni ltag chod [#]ma yin nam/_/'bras bu
[\[4a.6\]]la sogs spyi nyid ni/_/sgrub pa yin pa'i [#]bstan ce na/_/de dngos po min [#]las log pa'i/_/'bras bu tsam zhig mi rtag nyid/_/sgrub par byed de bdag phyir ro/_/sgrub byed de la de tshul med/_/me la 'khrul pa med par ni/_/du ba'i bdag nyid skya bo mthong /_/skya bor brjod pa tsam nyid kyis/_/_
[\[4a.7\]]kha ba las kyang de rtogs [#]med/_/spyir 'brel pa la [#]gang gi tshe/_/khyad par dag la brten pa yi/_/klan ka de la tshol byed na/_/ltag chod yin par yang dag brjod/_/gal te tshul 'dir mi brten par/_/gzhan du go sgra'i brjod pa tsam/_/nyid kyis rdo rje la sogs la/_/rwa can nyid ni
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]'grub par 'gyur/_/gal te 'di la 'brel pa ni/_/tshad ma yis ni sgrub byed na/_/de phyir rig pas grub 'di la[#]/_/rtsod pa 'ga' yang yod ma yin/_/'on kyang rtag gcig kun shes pa'i/_/blo rtag pa yi rten yin par/_/'grub par mi 'gyur khyab med phyir/_/bsgrub bya med pa nyid
[\[4b.2\]]phyir ro/_/'di ltar khang [#]skya them skas dang /_/khang bzangs [#]tshong dus la sogs pa/_/rnam shes du ma mi rtag pas/_/sngon du 'gro ba can du nges/_/de nyid phyir na 'dod pa la/_/gnod par byed par yang 'dod de[#]/_/rnam shes du ma mi rtag pa/_/sngon 'gro can nyid sgrub phyir ro/_/rgyu ni blo
[\[4b.3\]]dang ldan tsam la/_/khyod kyis 'brel pa brjod pas na/_/gnyis pa la ni kho bo yis/_/rnam pa gsal ba brjod pa yin/_/rtag rnams rim dang rim min pa/_/'gal phyir bya ba byed ma yin/_/yul rnams rim can nyid kyi phyir/_/de shes rnams la'ang rim pa yod/_/shes bya rim can
[\[4b.4\]]dang 'brel phyir/_/dbang phyug shes pa rim pas 'byung /_/lha sbyin sogs kyi rnam par shes/_/'bar sogs spyod yul can bzhin no/_/kho bos bum pa la sogs pa/_/rdul phran tshogs can yin par 'dod/_/de yi byed po rdza mkhan sogs/_/rdul phran kho na'i byed por 'dod/_/_
[\[4b.5\]]de phyir chos mi mthun pa'i dpe/_/rdul phran rab tu bstan 'di las/_/bsgrub bya nyid du mngon 'dod pa'i/_/chos 'di log pa ma yin no/_/gal te spyir na blo ldan zhig_/sngon du 'gro ba can 'dod na/_/de la rtsod [#]pa yong med do/_/ngo bo sna tshogs las skyes pa/_/rtag blo [#]gcig can sngon 'gro
[\[4b.6\]]bar/_/bsgrub na bsgrub byas stong pa nyid/_/mang po rnams kyis khang skya sogs/_/byas par mthong phyir 'khrul pa yin/_/skyon 'di nyid ni ci rigs par/_/gtan tshigs lhag ma dag la yang /_/sbyar bar bya ste gzhan yang ni/_/cung zad tsam zhig rab bstan te/_/skad cig 'jig phyir
[\[4b.7\]]rdul phran sogs/_/gdod nas 'jug par ma grub po/_/de yang rim dang ldan 'jug phyir/_/de nyid kyis na 'khrul ba'ang yin/_/kho bo 'jig tshe skyes bu rnams/_/rnam shes dran pa 'jig mi 'dod/_/'od gsal lha sogs skye phyir dang /_/de nyid nas ni 'dir [#]skye phyir/_/kha med lung 'bogs [#]byed
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]pa bo/_/gal te dang bas rtogs 'gyur gyi[#]/_/lus 'bras nyid phyir kha med de/_/chos dang chos min med phyir ro/_/sgrub byed kun la khyab pa ni/_/rjes su dpag dang 'gal ba'ang yin/_/'gal ba'i chos kyi gtan tshigs ni/_/khyab par rung ba ma yin no/_/skye
[\[5a.2\]]ba med phyir dbang phyug ni/_/skye ba can gyi rgyu ma yin/_/nam mkha' yi ni pad+ma bzhin/_/gzhan du thams cad cig car 'byung /_/gang dag rim gyis 'byung ba [#]yang /_/de dag dbang phyug rgyu can min/_/ji skad bshad pa'i sgrub pa las/_/blun po yid ches bskyed [#]pa bzhin/_/de dag kyang
[\[5a.3\]]de las byung na/_/sgrub pa brjod pa don med do/_/rtag phyir gso byed min pa la/_/de ni lhan cig byed ma yin/_/gang dag yod na 'byung mthong la/_/med na nam yang ma yin pa/_/de yi rgyu gzhan nyid rtog na/_/khyed la ji ltar thug med min/_/byed pa po nyid bkag pa'i phyir/_/kun
[\[5a.4\]]shes nyid kyang gsal [#]bar ni/_/rtogs bya de yi stobs nyid kyis/_/kun shes nyid du 'thad phyir ro/_/ji skad bshad pa'i nyes pa yis[#]/_/sgrub rnams sun phyung ma gyur kyang /_/'on kyang 'khrul pa mthong ba'i phyir/_/byed pa po gcig ma grub na/_/thams cad shes nyid ci la [#]brten/_/_
[\[5a.5\]]de sgrub phyir ni sgrub smras pa/_/rgyal dpog pa rnams la mdzes so/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las dbang phyug brtag pa ste gnyis pa'o//_//de ltar rang bzhin dbang phyug dag_/so sor rgyu nyid bkag pa'i phyir/_/gnyis ka lhan cig pa 'di yang /_/skye ba can
[\[5a.6\]]gyi byed po min/_/de dag lhan cig byed nyid du/_/brtags pa gang yin pa de yang /_/khyad par skyed par byed phyir ram/_/don gcig byed pa'i phyir yin grang /_/rtog pa dang po rigs min te/_/de dag 'gyur ba med phyir ro/_/gnyis pa'ang ma yin 'bras bu rnams/_/cig car thal
[\[5a.7\]]bar 'gyur phyir ro/_/ci ste gtso bo'i ngo bo ni/_/tshul gsum nyid du rnam par gnas/_/de la dbang phyug 'di rdul dang /_/ldan na 'byin pa'i rgyu yin no/_/snying stobs shas [#]cher 'jug pa la/_/gang tshe rten par byed pa na/_/de tshe 'jig rten thams cad kyi/_/gnas pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid du
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]'gyur/_/gang tshe mun pa'i nus pa ni/_/shas chen po dang sbyor ba na/_/de tshe 'di ni 'gro ba kun/_/'jigs [#]par byed pa yin zhes grag[# ]/de ltar rdul dang snying stobs sogs/_/dngos [#]rnams 'di yi lhan cig byed/_/rim pa kho nar 'byung 'gyur te/_/de phyir 'bras bu rim med
[\[5b.2\]]yin/_/'dir brjod bya ste 'di dag ni/_/gcig byed tshe na srid dam gcig_/sgrub pa'i mthu ste yod dam med/_/gal te yod na 'byin tshe gzhan/_/gnyis pa yang ni yod par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gzhan zhig yod na yang /_/gnyis pa gzhan du thal bar 'gyur/_/de yi ngo bo gzhan
[\[5b.3\]]gyis ni/_/gzhan gyi [#]byed bo ma yin pas/_/'di yi rang bzhin 'di nyid ni/_/de yi bye brag ga la yod/_/de yi nus ba dang bral na/_/gzhan tshe de yi skyed pa por/_/mi 'gyur nus pas stong pa'i phyir/_/nam mkha' yi ni me tog bzhin/_/nus pa shas chen ngo bo yang /_/gal
[\[5b.4\]]te de tsam kyi rgyu na/_/rgyu yi ngo bo rtag nyi'i [#]phyir/_/dus kun du ni de yod 'gyur/_/gzhan dag gis gzhan mi 'dod pa/_/de phyir gzhan las kyang de min/_/res 'ga' 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir/_/de ni rang dbang can yang yin/_/rang las byung na rgyu nyid min/_/rang la byed pa 'gal phyir ro/_/_
[\[5b.5\]]dngos po rnams ni ltos pa yis/_/res 'ga' ba nyid srid pa yin/_/'di ltar rang gi bdag nyid la/_/rang dngos bya ba 'jug mi 'dod/_/bdag nyid grub par gyur pa yang /_/gnas skabs 'di la grub phyir ro/_/bdag gi de nyid ma grub pa/_/'ga' la byed pa 'gal nyid med[#]/_/_
[\[5b.6\]]nus pa kun dang bral ba'i phyir/_/nam mkha'i pad+ma la sogs bzhin/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las gnyis ka brtag pa ste gsum pa'o//_//rang bzhin smra ba rnams kyis ni/_/dngos po rnams kyi skye ba 'di/_/rgyu kun la ni ltos med smra/_/de dag rang yang
[\[5b.7\]]rgyur mi smra/_/pad+ma'i ge sar la sogs pa'i/_/sna tshogs gang gis byed 'gyur ba'am/_/rma bya'i mdongs la sogs pa yis/_/sna tshogs pa ni [#]gang gis sprul/_/dper na tsher ma la sogs pa'i/_/rno sogs [#]rgyu med can nyid de/_/res 'ga' 'byung phyir de bzhin du/_/sdug bsngal
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]la sogs rgyu med nyid/_/rjes su 'gro ldog ldan pa yi/_/mtsho skyes ge sar la sogs pa/_/gnas skabs khyad par ldan pa yi/_/sa bon 'dam dang chu sogs can/_/mngon sum mi dmigs pa dag gi_/rgyu ni nges pa nyid yin na/_/gang tshe 'di dag gi rgyun
[\[6a.2\]]ni/_/gzhan gang yin zhes 'dri bar byed/_/yul dang dus kyi nges pa dag_/ji ltar dngos po rnams la yod/_/gal te 'di yi de rgyu min/_/de dag kun du kun 'byung tshe/_/gang du gang tshe 'ga' zhig la/_/de las gzhan pa spangs nas ni/_/nges pa nyid du 'byung 'gyur ba/_/de dag
[\[6a.3\]]de la ltos pa yin/_/de ltos de ltar 'byung ba yin/_/ltos pa 'bras bu nyid du brjod/_/mngon sum gyis kyang de ltar 'byung /_/des na [#]'di la rgyu dag 'grub/_/yang na de la zhes byar sbyar/_/de phyir rang bzhin smra ba 'di/_/mngon sum gyis ni rab gnod 'gyur/_/mngon sum dang ni mi
[\[6a.4\]]dmigs pas/_/rgyu yi ngo bo nges phyir ro/_/rgyu yod par ni sgrub don du[#]/_/tshad ma yod nyid ma gyur mod/_/de lta na yang tshad med pas/_/don med nyid du nges pa min[#]/_/gang phyir don ni yod pa yi/_/tshad ma khyab byed dang rgyu min/_/tha dad par ni yod phyir dang /_/'khrul phyir de las
[\[6a.5\]]byung phyir ro/_/dngos gang de lta'i rnam pa min/_/de nyid dang ni ldog pa las/_/gzhan ldog par ni nges pa ru/_/mi rtogs [#]'brel ba med phyir ro/_/kun gyis ma mthong the tshom dang /_/rang gis [#]ma mthong 'khrul pa ste/_/'bigs byed ri phug dur pa sogs/_/ma mthong bar yang
[\[6a.6\]]yod phyir ro/_/gal te rgyu med can nyid du/_/bsgrub phyir gtan tshigs mi sbyor na/_/tshad ma med par mi 'grub ste/_/de yi phyir na phyogs mi 'grub/_/gal te de grub phyir gtan tshigs/_/rab tu sbyor ba de lta na'ang /_/grub pa de rgyus bskyed nyid phyir/_/khyed kyi phyogs kyi 'grub mi
[\[6a.7\]]'gyur/_/de ltar shes byed gtan tshigs dang /_/de gsal byed pa'i yang de ni/_/grub pa'i rgyu mtshan nyid gyur pa/_/bsgrub bya'i shes byed yin par bshad/_/de phyir byed po [#]'di nyid ni/_/shes par byed pa'i [#]rgyur 'dod do/_/bsgrub [#]bya'i skyed byed ma yin phyir/_/byed pa por ni mi brjod
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]do/_/de phyir dngos po gzhan dag kyang /_/rgyu bcas nges las skyed phyir ro/_/khyed kyi bsgrub bya'i don yul can/_/shes pa bzhin du sgrub [#]'byung phyir/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las 'gro ba rang bzhin du smra ba brtag pa ste bzhi pa'o//_//skye 'jig med par yang
[\[6b.2\]]dag ldan/_/sgra yi rang bzhin tshangs pa mchog_/gang de yongs su gyur pa ni/_/dngos po'i grong nyid rab shes bya/_/de ltar gang dag brjod pa la'ang /_/de la brjod bya ba 'di ni/_/rang gi sgra yi ngo bo ni/_/btang nas sngo sogs nyid thob bam/_/de lta min na gang gi tshe/_/dang po'i phyogs
[\[6b.3\]]rten de yi tshe/_/yi ge nyid dang bral 'gyur te/_/sngar yod dag ni 'jig phyir ro/_/ji ltar de ma thag pa'i phyogs/_/de la snga [#]sogs myong ba'i tshe/_/'on pa la yang gsal por ni/_/sgra yi bdag nyid myong bar 'gyur/_/gang gis gtso bor 'jug pa yis/_/thams cad sgra yi ngo
[\[6b.4\]]bor gnas/_/sgra yi ngo bo ma btang na/_/yongs su 'gyur bar brjod phyir ro/_/sngon po la sogs gcig nyid du/_/phal pa min par rnam gnas na/_/de rig [#]pa yi dus su ni/_/ji ltar 'di rig yod ma yin/_/'di reg med na sngo sogs kyang /_/rab tu myong bar mi 'gyur te/_/_
[\[6b.5\]]gcig bdag nyid phyir tha dad chos/_/shin tu tha dad thal bar 'gyur/_/'gal ba'i chos dang 'brel pa yi/_/dngos rnams tha dad mtshan nyid yin/_/gzhan du gsal ba'i tha dad la'ang /_/rtog pa 'di ni med par 'gyur/_/gal te dngos po so so yang /_/sgra gcig bdag nyid dbyer
[\[6b.6\]]med 'dod/_/thams cad yul gcig nyid dang ni/_/rnam pa gcig tu rig par 'gyur/_/'di gsal so so tha dad na/_/tshangs pa du mar thal 'gyur [#]te/_/tha dad du ma dngos po'i bdag_/ngo bo nyid phyir gsal byed [#]bzhin/_/sgra yi rang bzhin rtag nyid na[#]/_/dngos rnams kyang ni rtag nyid
[\[6b.7\]]de/_/de dag cig car grub pa'i phyir/_/yongs su grub na [#]mi rigs so/_/ngo bo gcig ni mi gsal zhing [#]/_/ngo bo gzhan ni 'byung 'gyur na/_/'ji sogs bzhin du 'grub 'gyur ba/_/rim med la ni yongs gyur med/_/gzhan yang 'bras bu'i ngo bor ni/_/'gro ba'i sgra tshangs rang
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]bzhin na/_/de lta na yang 'gyur med phyir/_/de las rim par [#]'byung ba med/_/rang bzhin gcig po de nyid las/_/gzhan gzhan ngo bor 'byung min na/_/don gyi ngo bor yongs gyur par/_/de la ji ltar brjod par bya/_/de yi ngo bo min las ldog_/'ji ba'i ngo bo nyid
[\[7a.2\]]dmigs phyir/_/kham bum la sogs khyad par la/_/'ji ba'i bdag nyid gcig tu rtog_/sngo dang ser sogs khyad par la/_/sgra bdag min las ldog pa ni/_/de nyid la ni mi dmigs te/_/de phyir rtog pa'ang sa bon med/_/ci ste tshangs pa'i de nyid 'di/_/rtag tu cha med nyid
[\[7a.3\]]gnas pa/_/ma rig gis bslad 'jig rten gyis[#]/_/sna tshogs nyid du mngon par sems/_/de la'ang ma rig pas 'khrul ba'i/_/skye bo rnams kyis gzugs rtogs 'gyur/_/gang zhig sngo sogs rnam [#]pa ru/_/blang dang dor ba'i rgyu mtshan ni/_/de yi ngo bo las ldog [#]pa'i/_/tshangs
[\[7a.4\]]pa'i ngo bor shes pa med/_/ji ltar sdang [#]ba'i sems rnams kyis/_/yod pa nyid du shes mi 'gyur/_/de ni mngon sum gyis 'grub min/_/cha med snang ba med phyir ro/_/rtag las skye ba rigs min pas/_/de las 'bras bu'i rtags kyang med/_/chos can yod nyid ma grub phyir/_/rang
[\[7a.5\]]bzhin sgrub [#]byed ma yin no/_/de dag las ni ma rtogs [#]pa'i/_/yod par sgrub [#]pa'i rtags med do/_/shes bya yi [#]ni go rims las/_/shes kun go rims can du grub/_/gzhan du cig car nyid du ni/_/de 'bras rnam shes thal bar 'gyur/_/'di ni shes pa tsam la yang /_/nus pa'i dngos
[\[7a.6\]]med de las [#]gzhan/_/yin na 'di na mo gsham gyi/_/bu dang mtshungs par thal bar 'gyur/_/rnam dag ye shes rgyu can gyi/_/rnal 'byor pas kyang tshangs pa'i dngos/_/de mi shes te de yi phyir/_/shes la bya ba 'brel med phyir/_/gtso bo yongs su 'gyur ba [#]dang /_/tshangs pa'i lta ba mtshungs pa'ang
[\[7a.7\]]min/_/tshangs pa'i mthong ba gtso bo yi/_/yongs su 'gyur ba dang yang mtshungs/_/de yi sun 'byin rjes 'brangs nas/_/'di la sun 'byin rtogs par bya/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las sgra'i tshangs pa brtag pa ste lnga pa'o//_//nyes par bshad pa'i grub mtha'
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]yi/_/rjes 'jug blo can gzhan dag [#]ni/_/dbang phyug chos mtshungs skyes bus [#]ni/_/'jig rten rgyur ni rtogs [#]par byed/_/dngos po ma lus 'jig na yang /_/shes pa nus ldan 'jig pa med/_/brgya rnams kyis [#]ba bzhin du/_/de ni skye ldan rgyu ru grag[# ]/dbang phyug bzhin du 'di la yang /_/_
[\[7b.2\]]sun 'byin thams cad brjod par bya[#]/_/'di yi bya ba 'di 'dra 'di/_/ci yi phyir na byed pa yin/_/gal te gzhan gyis rab sbyar phyir/_/'di ni rang dbang nyid 'gyur min/_/'on te brtse bas byed 'gyur na/_/'gro ba gcig tu bde bar 'gyur/_/nad dang dbul dang mya ngan sogs/_/sdug bsngal du
[\[7b.3\]]mas gzir ba yi/_/skye ba 'byin par byed pa de'i/_/rjes su brtse ba ji ltar shes/_/'byin pa'i snga na snying rje'i yul/_/med na rjes brtse 'thad ma yin/_/gang dang 'brel par gyur pa las/_/'di ni 'byin pa por rtog byed/_/rtag tu bde dang ldan rnams kyi[#]/_/'jig pa 'di yis byed mi 'gyur/_/_
[\[7b.4\]]de yis ma mthong la ltos na/_/rang dbang nyid ni nyams par 'gyur/_/ma mthong sdug bsngal gyis rgyu la/_/ci phyir de ni ltos par byed/_/'di ni brtse dang ldan yin na/_/de la btang snyoms bya bar rigs/_/gal te de 'jug rtsed mo'i don/_/rtsed mo la ni gtso bo min/_/rtsed mo'i thabs ni sna
[\[7b.5\]]tshogs pa[#]/_/ltos pa'i phyir na gzhon nu bzhin/_/rtsed mo bsgrub bya'i dga' gang dang /_/de yi sgrub [#]byed gang yin des[#]/_/gal te de byed nus ldan na/_/de kun cig car byed par 'gyur/_/dang por de nus ldan min na/_/rim [#]gzhan du yang nus med 'gyur/_/dngos po dbye ba med pa la/_/_
[\[7b.6\]]nus dang mi nus mi rigs so/_/'on te rang bzhin nyid las 'di/_/'jug pa la sogs la brjod de/_/dper na me sogs rang bzhin gyis/_/sreg pa la sogs las la bzhin/_/gal te de ltar [#]yin de las/_/dngos po ma lus cig car 'byung /_/de dag skyed pa'i nus pa dang /_/ldan
[\[7b.7\]]pa'i rgyu ni nye phyir ro/_/me la sogs pa'i dngos rnams la/_/nges pa nyid kyi [#]nus pa dag_/dus kun du ni 'byung min te/_/rang gi rgyu stobs las byung [#]phyir/_/gzhan du gal te ngag gi 'am/_/nges 'di khas mi len na ni/_/'bras bu thams cad cig car ni/_/yang dag 'byung ba nyid du
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]'gyur/_/ba rgya ba lang [#]rang bzhin gyi/_/snal ma'i rgyur ni [#]mi 'dod de/_/gang phyir srog chags za 'dod las/_/kha chu yi ni dra ba byed/_/gal te ci [#]zhig ltar 'jug na/_/'di yi 'byung ldan ci 'dra zhig_/gang gi phyir na nya ba yang /_/ma dpyad las la 'jug mi 'gyur/_/_
[\[8a.2\]]dpa' bo'i bu dang bdag skyes sogs[#]/_/rnam pa de dag nyid kyis ni/_/byed pa por yongs brtags pa yang /_/yongs su'ang de dag sun phyung 'gyur/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las skyes bu brtag pa ste drug pa'o//_//gzhan dag kyang ni 'dir bdag nyid/_/'dod
[\[8a.3\]]la sogs pa'i rten gyur pa/_/de bzhin rtag dang kun 'jug can/_/rang nyid sems med ngo bor 'dod/_/dge dang mi dge'i las rnams kyi/_/byed pa po dang de 'bras kyi/_/za ba po yin sems 'brel phyir/_/sems yin rang bzhin [#]ngo bos min/_/shes dang rtsom sogs dang 'brel ba/_/_
[\[8a.4\]]de la byed pa po nyid brjod/_/bde dang sdug bsngal sogs rig pa'i/_/'du [#]ba las ni za ba po/_/de yi [#]ris mthun khyad par dang /_/blo rnams dang ni tshor ba ni/_/sngar med rnams dang 'brel pa yis/_/de la skye bar [#]mngon par brjod/_/sngar blangs pa dang bral ba ni/_/'chi ba yin te 'tsho ba yang /_/_
[\[8a.5\]]chos dang chos min 'dus byas pa'i/_/lus babs yid dang 'brel pa'o[#]/_/lus dang mig sogs gnod pa'i phyir/_/'di la 'tshe bar rnam par brtag_/'di ltar skyes bu rtag pa la'ang /_/tha snyad [#]'di ni dri med 'dod/_/nga shes bya ba'i nus pa dang /_/lus la sogs ni tha dad pa'i/_/rig
[\[8a.6\]]par byed pas [#]rig yin te/_/shes phyir de las gzhan pa bzhin/_/'dod pa la sogs thams cad kyang /_/de dag 'ga' zhig la brten nyid/_/dngos nyid yin pas 'bras nyid phyir/_/gzugs bzhin nyid kyi skyes bu de/_/dngos nyid smos pa'i [#]phyir na 'di/_/'jig la [#]'khrul ldan ma
[\[8a.7\]]yin te/_/'jig pa rgyu can nyid na yang /_/gang phyir dngos nyid ma yin no/_/gzugs sogs shes pa thams cad kyang /_/gcig dang du ma'i mtshan nyid can/_/nga shes [#]bya ba'i shes pa dang /_/de dag mtshams ni sbyor nyid phyir/_/gar mkhan smin khyugs [#]g.yo ba la/_/mang po dag
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]gis shes pa bzhin/_/rnam pa gzhan du [#]mtshams sbyor ba/_/rgyu med par ni skye mi 'gyur/_/bdag ces bya ba'i tshig 'di ni/_/blo dang dbang sogs tshogs pa las/_/tha dad par ni rjod byed yin[#]/_/rab grags mi las tha dad na/_/gang phyir tshig gcig nyid 'dod phyir/_/gang yang
[\[8b.2\]]de ltar nges gyur pa/_/ji skad bshad pa'i chos dang ni/_/dar 'brel bum pa'i sgra bzhin no/_/gson pa yi ni lus 'di ni/_/srog sogs dang yang bral 'gyur te/_/bdag nyid phyir na bum pa bzhin/_/de phyir 'di la bdag med med/_/rnam shes phyi ma thams cad ni/_/skyes ma thag pa'i
[\[8b.3\]]thog ma yi/_/shes pa'i rig byed kyis rig ste/_/shes phyir de yi rang so bzhin/_/thag ring yul na gnas gyur pa'i/_/bdag dang ldan pa nyid yin te/_/lus can sogs phyir bdag lus bzhin[#]/_/de ltar bdag ni yod dang rtag_/khyab byed dag tu nges yin na/_/chos rnams thams
[\[8b.4\]]cad bdag med pa/_/zhes byar gnas pa ma yin no/_/de lta [#]bu 'dir re zhig ni/_/sgrub byed dang po grub pa sgrub/_/gang phyir khyod kyi shes pa ni/_/kun mkhyen sogs kyi shes byar 'dod/_/gsal byed la ni ltos med par/_/rang rig ngo bor skye 'gyur ba/_/de ltar gzhan gyi rnam shes kyang /_/_
[\[8b.5\]]dpe ni bsgrub byas stong pa yin/_/de yi rnam par nyer bsgyur ba'i/_/gzhan gyis rab tu shes par 'gyur/_/de dpe nyid du brjod na yang /_/gzhan gyi sgo nas the tshom 'gyur/_/gal te 'dod pa la sogs kyi/_/'ga' zhig rten du rab bsgrub [#]na/_/gal te de la rgyu tsam nyid/_/rten du
[\[8b.6\]]yongs su rtog na ni/_/'dod pa sgrub [#]yin gal te yang /_/de bzhin [#]rten du khyod 'dod na/_/de tshe 'ang rgyu bas stong pa yi[#]/_/rten du rtog pa don med yin/_/rgya shug [#]'bras bu sogs kyi gzhi/_/mkhar gzhong la sogs bcad pa yin[#]/_/ltung ba'i bgegs dag [#]byed phyir ram/_/_
[\[8b.7\]]khyad par dag ni skyed phyir ro/_/'jig [#]pa dngos po med pa yang /_/'bras bu nyid du rigs ldan min/_/de phyir gzhan gyi gtan tshigs 'dir/_/khyad par smras pa'i don med do/_/ma rig pa yis bslad pa las/_/nga yis zhes dang mtshams sbyar [#]'di/_/dngos po skad cig ma dag
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]la 'ang /_/byed po gcig tu zhen par 'jug_/log pa'i rnam par rtog 'di las/_/de nyid gnas pa'i rigs [#]ma yin/_/nus lhag [#]khyad par las [#]dad kyang /_/gcig gi rgyu mtshan byed par 'gyur/_/gzugs dang sgra sogs sems dag ni/_/rjes 'khor
[\[9a.2\]]gcig gi [#]'bras nyid na/_/snga phyi dag ni 'gal 'gyur te/_/nus pa'i rgyu ni nye phyir ro/_/rnam shes de ma thag gcig las/_/rnam shes drug po 'byung ba ni/_/gsal bar cig car rig 'gyur te/_/de phyir 'dod pa'i sgrub byed yin/_/rim pa can la rgyu gcig nyid/_/med ces de
[\[9a.3\]]ma thag tu bstan/_/de phyir 'di yi khyab pa [#]la/_/rjes dpag gis gnon [#]gsal por mthong /_/gar mkhan smin khyugs g.yo ba ni/_/don dam par ni gcig nyid min/_/rdul phran du ma'i tshogs nyid phyir/_/de la gcig tu rtogs [#]pa'i phyir/_/'bras bu gcig la nye sbyor phyir/_/_
[\[9a.4\]]sgra gcig gi ni spyod yul yin/_/bsgrub bya'ang [#]rnam pa de lta bur/_/gal te 'dod na grub pa sgrub/_/blo dang sems la sogs pa'i sgra/_/kho bo cag gi rnam grangs dag_/tshig gcig yin yang tha dad pa'i/_/rjod par byed pa nyid ma yin/_/de phyir gtan tshigs ma nges pa'o/_/_
[\[9a.5\]]de yi khyad par smras min [#]nam/_/de nyid ma grub par smras na/_/sems rnams [#]grangs su gnas shes bya/_/nga rgyal gyi [#]ni rten nyid kyis/_/sems la bdag ces brjod pa ni/_/kun rdzob tu yin don dam par/_/'di yi yul ni yod ma yin/_/mkha' dkyil pad+ma sogs pad+ma/_/byed pa po
[\[9a.6\]]la sogs pa'i tshig_/gcig gi [#]rnam par sbyor byed na/_/des ni 'khrul pa dag kyang mthong /_/brda tsam las ni byung ba yi/_/tshig dag gang du 'ang [#]'brel pa med/_/bdag la sogs pa'i tshig dag la'ang /_/rang bzhin gyis [#]don gsal byed med/_/gang tshe bdag dang lhan cig tu/_/_
[\[9a.7\]]srog sogs 'brel pa 'grub 'gyur ba/_/de tshe thal ba 'di rigs kyi/_/rnam pa gzhan du mi rigs so/_/mo gsham bu yis [#]stong nyid ni/_/gson lus srog sogs dang bral bar[#]/_/thal bar mi 'gyur de bzhin du/_/khyod kyi thal 'gyur 'di nyid yin/_/re zhig 'di la de bdag med/_/_
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]de dag tha dad khas len phyir/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyang min/_/cig car thal bar 'gyur phyir ro/_/de yi phyir na nyid ldog pa/_/de dang 'brel pa med pa yi/_/dbugs kyi 'byung rngub sogs 'di dag_/ci phyir lus las ldog par 'gyur/_/de ltar sgrub byed thams cad kyis/_/bdag
[\[9b.2\]]yod [#]ma grub pa yi phyir/_/rtag dang khyab pa nyid dag gi/_/dpe ni bsgrub [#]byas stong bar bstan/_/gzhan dag gis bdag mngon sum gyis/_/grub pa nyid du yongs su brtags/_/gang phyir 'ong zhes rang rig ste/_/yul ni bdag yin par 'dod do/_/de ni mi rigs nga zhes la/_/de
[\[9b.3\]]yi ngo bor mi snang phyir[#]/_/gang phyir de la rtag pa dang /_/khyab sogs snang ba shes pa med/_/'di ni kha dog dkar sogs su/_/snang ba gsal bar rig 'gyur na/_/de yi rang bzhin bdag mi 'dod/_/de phyir de yi yul can 'di[#]/_/gal te skyes bu yang dag par/_/mngon sum gyis ni shes
[\[9b.4\]]gyur na/_/de bas ci phyir rtsod pa 'di/_/de yod sogs la 'jug par 'gyur/_/'di ltar nges par bya ba 'di/_/nges pa'i bdag nyid du 'jug cing /_/nges pa dang ni sgro 'dogs blo/_/gnod bya gnod byed nyid du gnas/_/de phyir 'dod sogs thams cad ni/_/bdag dang 'du ba ma yin nyid/_/_
[\[9b.5\]]rim gyis [#]skye ba nyid kyi phyir/_/sa bon myu gu'i lcug [#]sogs bzhin/_/yang ni [#]nang gi bdag nyid kun/_/bdag med nyid kyis lus can te[#]/_/dngos dang yid sogs gtan tshigs phyir/_/dper na phyi rol bum sogs bzhin/_/bdag bcas nyid na [#]de rgyu bcas[#]/_/rtag pa nyid du thal bar
[\[9b.6\]]'gyur/_/rtag rnams kyang don byed nus min/_/de phyir yod nyid la sogs srid/_/bum sogs la mtshungs bdag med pa/_/gzhan dag gis ni gson lus la/_/bkag pa gang yin de yang ni[#]/_/kho bo cag gis 'dir bsgrub bya/_/de ltar bdag ni ma grub na'ang /_/de la rnam gzhag [#]byas
[\[9b.7\]]pa gang /_/de kun gnas med nyid yin te/_/mo gsham la ni rnam gzhag yin[#]/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las rigs pa can dang bye brag bas kun tu brtags pa'i skyes bu brtag pa ste bdun pa'o//_//gzhan dag bdag ni ldog pa dang /_/rjes 'gro bdag nyid
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]can gyi ni/_/sems pa'i ngo bo nyid du 'dod/_/sems pa'i blo yi mtshan nyid can/_/dper na sbrul 'khyil gnas skabs na/_/ldog cing de ma thag tu ni/_/drang po'i gnas skabs byung na yang /_/sbrul nyid du ni rjes 'jug 'gyur/_/de bzhin bdag ni rtag tu ni/_/_
[\[10a.2\]]sems pa'i rang bzhin can yin yang /_/ngo bo ma lus ldog pa dang /_/kun gyi rjes su 'jug pa'ang min/_/'on kyang 'di yi bde sdug sogs/_/mtshan nyid gnas skabs ldog 'gyur zhing /_/de dag ldog cing skye 'gyur yang /_/sems nyid rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/_/gtan du 'jig na byas
[\[10a.3\]]chud zos/_/ma byas phrad pa dag du [#]'gyur/_/dngos gcig can [#]la'ang sdug bsngal dang [#]/_/bde sogs longs spyod med par 'gyur/_/byed po nyid dang za bo dag_/skyes bu'i gnas la de mi brten/_/de phyir skal ldan nyid kyi [#]phyir/_/byed [#]po nyid kyis de [#]'bras thob/_/rnam pa de lta'i skyes bu 'di/_/_
[\[10a.4\]]ngo shes pa ni yod pa'i phyir/_/rtogs [#]par 'gyur te 'di nyid kyis/_/bdag med pa la rab tu gnod/_/bdag rigs [#]byed do zhes bdag blos/_/shes pa po ni rtogs byad na/_/gal te de ni 'ga' yin nam/_/gcig tu 'jig pa'i shes pa yin/_/gcig tu mi rtag nyid du 'gyur/_/gal
[\[10a.5\]]te de yul bdag yin na/_/de tshe ma lus 'tsham par 'gyur/_/skad cig ma yi shes phyogs la/_/thams cad shin tu 'brel par dka'/_/'di ltar sngon ni nga nyid kyis/_/shes gyur [#]dad ltar du yang ni[#]/_/nga nyid rig par byed ces pa'i/_/blo gang skye bar 'gyur ba ste/_/'on te de yi [#]yul
[\[10a.6\]]shes pa'i/_/skad cig ma ni gang yin brtag_/'das pa 'am ni da ltar ci/_/gnyis ka 'am ni 'on te rgyun/_/de la dang po'i shes pa'i yul/_/shes par gyur zhes bya bar rigs/_/shes par byed ces de mi rigs/_/gang phyir da ltar de rig [#]med/_/da ltar ba ni yul nyid na/_/rigs [# ]
[\[10a.7\]]pa 'thad par byed do zhes/_/shes gyur [#]zhes bya brdzun yin te/_/de nyid phyir na [#]de yi ni/_/gnyis ka bzung brtag de mi bya[#]/_/gang phyir gnyis ka shes gyur dang /_/da ltar gnyis ka shes byed min/_/rgyun yang de mtshungs bya min te/_/gnyis ka yang ni med phyir ro/_/'di ni shes par gyur min
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]zhing /_/da ltar kyang min dngos med phyir/_/de phyir bshad pa las gzhan pa'i/_/spyod yul gang la nga 'di snyam/_/'jug phyir rtag [#]pa'i dngos ldan phyir/_/bdag 'di 'grub par 'gyur ba yin/_/nga zhes pas bzung 'das pa yi/_/shes byed da ltar yang 'jug ste/_/nga yis [#]shes pas
[\[10b.2\]]rtogs [#]bya'i phyir/_/da ltar [#]rig par byed po bzhin/_/shes byed [#]de yang khar [#]rtsang yod/_/shes byed phyir dang de nyid phyir/_/khar [#]rtsang shes pa po bzhin no/_/shes pa de dag bsgrub bya nyid/_/rgyud gcig dang 'brel [#]shes pa po'i/_/nga shes shes pa nyid kyi phyir/_/khar [#]rtsang de ring yod pa
[\[10b.3\]]kun/_/don mtshungs can yin blo gcig bzhin/_/de lta bu 'dir dpyad bya ste/_/gal te sems ni rtag gcig pur/_/'dod pa de ltar yin blo yang /_/de yi rang bzhin nyid thob 'gyur/_/blo dag dang ni skyes bu ni/_/nged [#]kyi sems kyi rang bzhin phyir/_/rtag nyid dang ni gcig nyid 'dod/_/_
[\[10b.4\]]gal te tha dad yul rten can/_/dper na me ni rang bzhin gyis/_/rtag tu sreg par byed las can/_/bsreg bya[#]'i don nye gyur pa sreg_/gzhan du min gzhan gyi tshe na'ang /_/dper na gsal ba'i me long [#]dang /_/ji ltar shing gi rdo dang ni/_/gang zhig kho na nyer gyur pa/_/de yi rnam der thob
[\[10b.5\]]byed/_/de bzhin rtag pa'i sems nyid kyi/_/skyes bu lus la gnas pa rnams/_/dbang pos blangs pa'i gzugs [#]la sogs/_/'dzin byed 'di ni kho bo'i [#]blo/_/nye phyir nye bar 'thob byed pa'i/_/byed pa 'jig phyir blo 'jig can/_/ji ltar bsreg bya nye med phyir/_/me ni rtag tu sreg byed
[\[10b.6\]]min/_/de la rtogs [#]pa'i blo bdag nyid/_/blo ni ngo shes par byed de/_/bum pa glang po la sogs blo/_/de tha dad phyir 'jig rten 'dod/_/tha dad don rjes 'brang [#]rnams kyis/_/blo de nyid ces brjod mi bya/_/don tha dad la mi rten [#]na/_/ngo shes med pa ma yin no/_/'o na glang po sogs stong pa'i/_/_
[\[10b.7\]]sa la sgro 'dogs byed pa yi/_/shes pa gang dag rab 'jug pa/_/der ni tha dad ci la brten/_/gal te yul gzhan sogs yod pa'i/_/gsal ba rnams ni rgyu mtshan yin/_/gang phyir yul dus gzhan gyi bdag/_/thams cad du ni dmigs pa yin/_/'o na yul de dang 'brel ba/_/de ltar
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]de dag la med nyid/_/de phyir der yang rang bzhin des/_/ci phyir de ltar snang bar byed/_/khyod kyi gzhung gis [#]blo rnams ni/_/blo min phyi rol du rjod byed/_/brjod par 'dod pa'i yul der [#]yang /_/glang po rta [#]sogs gnas pa med/_/gal te don kun rig pa yin[#]/_/_
[\[11a.2\]]ngo bor blo ni rtag gnas na/_/thams cad tshe na kun rig par[#]/_/des na ci phyir rig ma yin/_/sgra yi khyad par can blo gang /_/de nyid ro gzugs sogs yul can/_/'dir [#]yin phyir ro gal te min/_/tha dad rang gi tshig gis bstan/_/bsreg bya'i dngos po ma lus pa/_/me yang rtag
[\[11a.3\]]tu sreg [#]byed pa'i/_/bdag nyid can min gzhan du na/_/ma lus thal bar byed par 'gyur/_/bsreg bya'i don nyid nye ba na/_/de ni de sreg [#]bdag nyid rigs/_/de lta na ni don rnams kun/_/cig car nyid sreg thal mi 'gyur/_/ut+pal sngo sogs 'brel pa las/_/me long dang ni
[\[11a.4\]]shel la sogs/_/de gzugs brnyan du 'khrul ba skyed pa'i/_/rgyu yin skad cig gis 'jig can/_/gzhan du khyad par bcas pa dang /_/cig shos gnas skabs gcig nyid phyir/_/rtag tu de yi rnam [#]pa'am/_/de dang bral bar snang bar 'gyur/_/brtan nyid [#]phyir dang gting med phyir/_/_
[\[11a.5\]]lus can lhan cig mi gnas phyir/_/me long dbus kyi gzugs brnyan ni/_/nam yang 'dzin par byed ma yin/_/logs [#]gnyis gnas pa dag gis kyang /_/shel rdo bzhin du dkar po ru/_/mthong 'gyur 'di yi phyir 'dis kyang /_/gzugs brnyan thob par 'gyur ba min/_/gal te de yi
[\[11a.6\]]gzugs brnyan thob/_/de la don dam par yod na/_/khyad par so sos shel [#]sogs ni/_/tha dad par ni thal bar 'gyur/_/de phyir sna tshogs bsam mi khyab/_/nus can de dag la 'di 'khrul/_/blo la 'khrul pa'i dngos po yang /_/mi rigs tha dad bral phyir ro/_/ma rtogs ngo bo las ldog
[\[11a.7\]]pa/_/blo kun dag la mtshungs pa yin/_/sgro 'dogs [#]pa yi gcig shes nyid/_/sna tshogs nyid la'ang 'jug par 'gyur/_/gnas skabs rnams kyi tha dad kyis[#]/_/tha dad pas stong des gnas pas[#]/_/brtan pa'i rang bzhin can bdag la/_/gang gzhan gyis ni kun brtags 'di[#]/_/kho bo'i
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]skyes bus sdug bsngal sogs/_/gnas skabs thob par byed na yang /_/shel dang rdzas yod nyid sogs kyis/_/ngo bo 'dod par [#]mi byed nyid/_/gnas skabs gzhan ni skye 'gyur tshe/_/snga ma shin tu 'jig mi 'gyur/_/phyi ma'i rjes mthun don du na/_/spyi bdag nyid la thim
[\[11b.2\]]par 'gyur/_/rang gi ngo bos gnas skabs dag_/phan tshun du ni 'gal ba nyid[#]/_/spyi yi bdag ni thams cad du/_/'gal med par ni shes par bya/_/de la gal te skyes bu las/_/gnas skabs gcig tu tha dad min/_/de dag skye 'jig yod pa na/_/'di la'ang de dag de bzhin
[\[11b.3\]]'gyur/_/'gal ba'i chos dang 'brel 'gyur na/_/gcig tu tha dad nyid 'gyur te/_/ji ltar khyed kyis [#]skyes bu rnams/_/rang bdag so sor nges pa bzhin/_/gal te khyed kyi gnas skabs rnams/_/rang gi ngo bos skyes bu la/_/zhi [#]thim 'gyur sogs 'byung ba'i tshe/_/sdug
[\[11b.4\]]bsngal sogs de'ang myong bar 'gyur/_/gzhan gyi ngo bo 'pho 'gyur na[#]/_/gzhan 'pho bar yang mi 'dod cing /_/de yi bdag nyid 'pho 'gyur na'ang /_/de phyir bdag ni skye ldan 'gyur/_/gal te byed po za bo dag_/gnas skabs la brten ma yin na/_/de phyir skabs ldan de nyid 'gyur[#]/_/_
[\[11b.5\]]byed po sogs nyid yod mi 'gyur/_/de phyir rtag sgras [#]brjod bya nyid/_/bdag la bzlog par bya ba min[#]/_/rang gi ngo bo'i 'gyur ldan phyir/_/de ni chad par 'gyur ba yin/_/sbrul yang skad cig 'jig nyid phyir/_/'khyog pa la sogs thob 'gyur gyi/_/rten dngos yin na skyes bu bzhin/_/_
[\[11b.6\]]gnas skabs gzhan [#]dang 'brel pa med/_/nga'o snyam pa'i shes pa 'di/_/dmigs pa med pa nyid du ni/_/thog med sems can du blta [#]ba'i/_/sa bon stobs las 'gar nyid 'jug_/gang phyir 'du byed 'ga' zhig nyid/_/de yi rang gi ngo bor zhen/_/bdag po nyid ni thob byed de[#]/_/de
[\[11b.7\]]phyir kun du 'jug mi 'gyur/_/gzhan du khyed kyi skyes bu la'ang /_/brgal zhing brtag pa mtshungs pa yin/_/de phyir tha dad nus yod pas/_/thams cad rtsod pa med par 'gyur/_/rtag pa dmigs pa'i phyogs la ni[#]/_/de bas nga'o snyam pa kun/_/cig car nyid du skye 'gyur te/_/nus
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]rgyu rnam par gnas phyir ro/_/mi rtag dmigs pa nyid la yang /_/gsal bar snang 'gyur de yi phyir/_/gzhan dag dmigs don yod pa ru/_/brgal zhing brtag [#]pa don med do/_/shes pa po la ngo shes ni/_/bag chags kyis ni byed rigs kyi/_/de ma yin la
[\[12a.2\]]de shes pa'i/_/shes min 'di ni 'khrul rgyu min/_/de phyir nga snyam shes 'khrul pa/_/mi 'dod gnod med phyir zhe na/_/ma yin bshad ma thag pa yi/_/rigs pas de la gnod mthong phyir/_/dbang phyug sogs la dad rnams kyi/_/de rgyu sogs su 'khrul pa ni/_/bag chags tsam gyi
[\[12a.3\]]ngo bo las/_/ji ltar sna tshogs skye bar 'gyur/_/de ltar gang tshe nga'o snyam/_/dmigs med nyid du gnas pa yin/_/de phyir nga shes kyis bzung [#]ba'i/_/shes byed 'ga' yang yod ma yin/_/de phyir tshad ma thams cad la/_/dpe ni 'ga' yang [#]yod ma yin/_/gtan tshigs rnams kyang
[\[12a.4\]]gzhi ma grub/_/bstan pa rnams la ci rigs [#]sbyar/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las dpyod [#]pa bas brtags pa'i bdag brtag pa ste brgyad pa'o//_//gzhan ni shes pa'i blo yi ni/_/rang dngos khyad par yin par sems/_/de dag sems la bdag nyid kyi/_/_
[\[12a.5\]]rang gi ngo bor rtogs [#]par byed/_/gtso bos bstabs pa'i 'bras bu la/_/de ni longs spyod 'ba' [#]zhig byed/_/de la byed pa nyid yod min/_/rang bzhin kho na der 'dod do/_/de la'ang gal te sems gcig 'dod/_/gzugs dang sgra sogs sems [#]dag gi/_/rang bzhin tha dad dang ldan
[\[12a.6\]]par/_/shin tu gsal bar [#]ji ltar rigs/_/sems ni rang bzhin gcig pa can/_/dus kun du ni gnas pa la/_/rnam pa sna tshogs don rnams kyi/_/longs spyod por ni ji ltar 'thad/_/lta 'dod la sogs tha dad rnams/_/de yi longs spyod rgyu mtshan du/_/'byung min de ltar 'byung
[\[12a.7\]]yin na/_/skyes bu skye ba dang ldan 'gyur/_/gang phyir sems las tha dad pa'i/_/lta 'dod la sogs de mi 'gyur/_/de la skye dang 'jig thob na/_/skyes bu la yang 'di bzlog ka[# ]/gal te dge dang mi dge ba'i/_/las ni bdag gis byas nyid min/_/de phyir 'di yi longs spyod kyi/_/tha
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]dad pa ni gang [#]las skye/_/gal te 'dod dang rjes mthun pa[#]/_/rang bzhin gyis rab ster byed de/_/de dag gi ni 'brel pa 'di/_/zha bo long ba bzhin du gnas/_/gal te de ltar 'dod pa la/_/sred pa yod kyang ci yi phyir/_/'grub par mi byed rang bzhin ni/_/gzhan la cung zad ltos mi 'gyur/_/_
[\[12b.2\]]don las [#]longs spyod dus su yang /_/gal te 'di la 'gyur med na/_/'di ni za po nyid min zhing /_/rang bzhin yang ni phan byed min/_/rnam par 'gyur ba yod gyur na/_/rtag pa nyid ni nyams par 'gyur[#]/_/rnam 'gyur rnam pa gzhan nyid na/_/gnas skabs na yang de ji ltar/_/yul
[\[12b.3\]]gyi rnam pa can blo ni/_/thog mar rab tu 'jug byed cing /_/de yis nges par byas pa'i don/_/skyes bu yis ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/de ltar 'di yi za po nyid/_/gzugs brnyan skye ba'i sgo can te/_/skyes [#]bu 'di yi rang ngo bo/_/nam yang 'dor med min snyam na/_/brjod par bya ste
[\[12b.4\]]gzugs brnyan ni/_/de yi bdag nyid du skye 'gyur/_/skye ldan du nyid du 'gyur zhing /_/tha dad yin [#]na za bo med/_/sems nyid bdag nyid can gtso bo/_/sna tshogs sgrub [#]pa'i khyad par la/_/lta 'dod sogs kyi rjes mthun par/_/ji ltar yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gtso bos tshad
[\[12b.5\]]ma la sogs pa/_/byed pa shes pa rnam shes dang /_/bza' bar mi shes zhes bya bar/_/'di las mi rigs [#]gzhan ci yod/_/gtso bor blo dang ldan nyid phyir/_/'di la kun 'gal [#]med ce na/_/'o na blo ldan nyid yin na/_/skyes bu bzhin du sems nyid thob/_/blo dang rnam zhen
[\[12b.6\]]pa [#]dang ni/_/de bzhin rig dang rig byed dang /_/sems dang nyams myong zhes bya ba/_/thams cad sems kyi rjod [#]byed yin/_/skye ldan 'jig pa'i rtag dag gi[#]/_/sgra dri ro sogs bzhin du ni/_/blo ni sems pa med pa yi/_/bdag nyid can du 'dod ce na/_/sgrub byed rang rgyud nyid 'dod
[\[12b.7\]]na/_/gtan tshigs 'di dag gnyis ka la/_/ma grub thal 'gyur brjod 'dod na/_/bzlog pa la ni gnod pa med/_/sems pa nyid la'ang bdag gi [#]sgrar/_/zhen na'ang nga la gnod pa med/_/gal te rtag nyid bsgrub dka' ste/_/mig sogs 'bras bcas nyid phyir ro/_/gal te
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]sems pa nyid rtag na/_/mig dang don sogs 'bras med 'gyur/_/gal te me ni rtag gyur na/_/bud shing don med 'gyur ba yin/_/mal cha dang ni stan [#]bzhin du/_/'dus pa'i gtan tshigs de nyid kyis/_/mig la sogs pa rnams la ni/_/gzhan don
[\[13a.2\]]nyid gang rab bstan nas/_/gal te khyad par byar rung gi/_/de nyid de dag la bsgrub [#]na/_/'dod sgrub [#]gang phyir de dag ni/_/'jig pa'i shes la [#]phan byed 'dod/_/'gyur med phan la phan byed nyid/_/sgrub na dpe ni bsgrub bya yi[#]/_/stong pa yin te de dag kyang /_/g.yo ba nyid la phan byed
[\[13a.3\]]rigs/_/gal te phyir ni gzhan don du/_/de dag la ni rab bsgrub pa[#]/_/de lta na yang sgrub don med/_/sems la phan byed sgrub [#]phyir ro/_/phan byed [#]du ma smos pa'i phyir/_/chogs [#]pa nyid 'dir brjod pa yin/_/bya ba yi ni yul nyid na/_/gzhan gyi don ni sgrub byed min/_/de kho na nyid
[\[13a.4\]]bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las ser skya pas kun du brtags pa'i bdag brtag pa ste dgu pa'o//_//rgyal dpog pa bzhin rgyal ba pa/_/rdzas dang rnam grangs ngo bo yis[#]/_/ldog dang rjes 'gro bdag nyid can/_/skyes bu shes pa'i mtshan nyid smra/_/de la'ang rdzas ni rnam grangs dang /_/gal te 'brel du gyur med na/_/de la khyad par
[\[13a.5\]]med pa'i phyir/_/de ni 'gyur ba can mi 'gyur/_/yul dang dus dang rang bzhin dag_/tha dad med phyir gcig tu brjod/_/grangs dang mtshan nyid ming dang don/_/tha dad phyir na tha dad brjod[#]/_/gzugs sogs rnams dang bum ba zhes/_/grangs dang ming gi rnam dbye dang /_/'bras bu dang ni rjes [#]'jug ldog_/mtshan nyid dang
[\[13a.6\]]ni don rnams [#]dbye/_/rdzas dang rnam grangs dag gi yin/_/de ltar gcig tu khyad med can/_/rdzas min rnam grangs tha dad kyis/_/bdag nyid khyad par 'gyur zhe na/_/nges par khyad par ldan pa yi/_/rang bzhin dbyer med gcig nyid de/_/de lta yin na tha dad nyid/_/ji [#]ltar yang ni bsgrub [#]dka' ste/_/_
[\[13a.7\]]rnam grangs sogs kyi dngos dag bzhin/_/de ltar rdzas dang rnam grangs dang /_/dngos kun gcig nyid du gnas na/_/rdzas ni ldog [#]dang ldan gyur te/_/rnam grangs dag gi [#]rang dngos bzhin/_/gal te rnam grangs de kun yang /_/rdzas bzhin rjes 'gro'i bdag nyid ni/_/thob 'gyur [#]de
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]dag rdzas dang ni/_/bdag nyid gcig tu gnas phyir ro/_/de yi phyir na rnam grangs las/_/tha dad med phyir bdag sogs rdzas/_/gnas pa cung zad yod min te/_/rnam grangs rang gi ngo bo bzhin/_/skye dang 'jig par gnas pa yi/_/rnam grangs rnams kyang cung zad med/_/rdzas las
[\[13b.2\]]tha dad med pa'i phyir/_/rdzas de nges pa'i bdag nyid bzhin/_/de phyir rjes 'gro med gcig [#]pa'am/_/thams cad rtag pa nyid 'dod kyis/_/gcig bdag nyid las ldog pa dang /_/rjes 'gro 'di dag med pa nyid/_/dmigs su rung ba'i rang bzhin can/_/rnam grangs la rjes 'gro bdag
[\[13b.3\]]nyid/_/rdzas ni so sor snang ba mos[#]/_/de phyir mkha' [#]pad bzhin du med/_/sna tshogs don byed rung ba dang /_/mtshungs [#]sogs shes pa'i rgyu 'gyur dag_/de [#]lta'i rnam pa'i don gyis [#]brda/_/sgra dang shes pa'i spyod yul dag_/skye dang 'jig pa'i chos can gyi/_/rnam grangs kho na 'ba' zhig
[\[13b.4\]]dag_/yang dag yod 'gyur de yi phyir/_/bdag med gsal snang dri ma med/_/'on te rdzas dang rnam grangs kyi/_/ngo bo yang dag 'dre bar [#]gnas/_/dngos nyid can de dbyer med pa/_/'dod de mi yi seng ge bzhin/_/dngos nyid can zhes bstan [#]pa 'di/_/sna tshogs don gyi rgyu mtshan can/_/_
[\[13b.5\]]yin te dngos po'i sgra yang ni/_/rang bzhin rjod par byed phyir ro/_/mi yi seng ge'ang gcig pu ni/_/gnyis bdag can du 'thad min te/_/gang phyir rdul phran du ma yi[#]/_/'dus bdag can de de ltar shes/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las nam mkha'i gos can gyis kun tu
[\[13b.6\]]brtags pa'i bdag brtag pa ste bcu pa'o//_//sa dang me chu la sogs par/_/de shes rtag [#]pa'i 'jug pa 'di/_/de bdag can nyid bdag yin zhes/_/gzhan dag kyang ni rjod par byed/_/gzung ba'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i/_/'di ni cung zad yod min te/_/de phyir 'di dag
[\[13b.7\]]thams cad ni/_/rnam shes 'gyur bar yang dag gnas/_/de dag gi ni lta ba dang /_/de gzhung rtag nyid brjod pa'i phyir/_/nyes pa chung ldan rtag brjod phyir/_/de dag nyes pa chung ldan te/_/gzugs sgra la sogs shes pa rnams/_/tha dad nyer mtshon gsal ba yin/_/shes pa'i bdag nyid
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]gcig nyid ni/_/gzugs dang sgra dang ro sogs rnams/_/cig car rtog par thal bar 'gyur/_/rtag la'ang gnas skabs gzhan med do/_/gzugs sogs rnams kyi rig pa las/_/tha dad shes pa dmigs pa med/_/de ni skad cig tha dad na/_/tha mi dad du gnas pa
[\[14a.2\]]ci/_/phyin ci log dang [#]ma log pa'i/_/shes pa tha dad yod min na/_/skyes bu shes nyid bdag nyid la[#]/_/de phyir 'ching grol [#]ji ltar yin/_/rnal 'byor goms pas rnal 'byor pa/_/ci zhig bzlog cing ci zhig sgrub/_/gang phyir de bdag [#]phyin ci log_/spang bar nus pa ma yin no/_/de bdag [# ]
[\[14a.3\]]nyid du rtag gnas phyir/_/de nyid shes pa'ang bskyed [#]bya min/_/de phyir khyed kyi rnal 'byor ni/_/goms pa 'di kun 'bras med 'gyur/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las u pa ni sha [#]kas brtags pa'i bdag brtag pa ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//bde gshegs par
[\[14a.4\]]sems 'ga' zhig kyang /_/gang zag tha snyad sgo nas ni/_/de nyid gzhan yin sogs bral ba/_/bdag tu rab tu rjod [#]par byed/_/mu stegs lta bar thal 'gyur phyir/_/gang zag phung po las [#]gzhan min/_/du ma sogs 'gyur phyir de nyid/_/ma yin de phyir brjod med legs/_/de dag
[\[14a.5\]]la smra gang zag ni/_/don dam par med de nyid dang /_/gzhan nyid sogs par brjod med phyir/_/nam mkha'i pad+ma la sogs bzhin/_/dngos po dngos po las gzhan nam/_/gzhan min par yang mi 'da' nyid/_/de phyir brjod du med pa gang /_/dngos po med par rtogs [#]pa la/_/tha dad
[\[14a.6\]]tha dad med rnams rtogs/_/dngos la brten pa yin pa'i phyir/_/de nyid gzhan sogs brjod med pa/_/rang bzhin med rnams la rigs [#]kyi/_/dngos po la ni yod min zhes/_/de lta bu yis bkag pa gang /_/de ni dngos po gzhan bzhin du/_/de las gzhan du gsal bar brjod/_/de nyid
[\[14a.7\]]min pa bkag pas kyang /_/de nyid du ni rjod par byed/_/de phyir dngos de dngos po ni/_/de nyid gzhan 'ga' mi byed na/_/gang zag phung po las gzhan min[#]/_/zhes pas 'di ni gzhan min brjod/_/phung po gang zag min zhes pas/_/de ni gzhan 'di yin par gsal/_/'gal ba'i
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]chos dang 'brel pa ni/_/dngos po tha dad par brjod do/_/phung po gang zag dag la yang /_/de bzhin ci phyir tha dad med/_/'di ltar tshor ba la sogs las/_/gang zag brjod du med par brjod/_/de las gzugs dang 'du shes sogs/_/de nyid gzhan nyid du brjod [#]bya/_/gzugs la
[\[14b.2\]]sogs pa'i phung po dag[# ]/mi rtag nyid du brjod byar 'dod/_/de ltar gang zag min phyir yang_/de las gzhan du gsal nyid yin/_/don byed par ni nus pa yang /_/yod pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid de/_/skad cig ma nyid la [#]nges yin/_/de ldan brjod med dngos nyid yin/_/lung dang 'gal
[\[14b.3\]]ba dag la ni/_/bdag nyid chen pos brtson par byas/_/med pa pa ni dgag pa'i phyir/_/brtse ldan gsung ni sna tshogs yin/_/tshogs pa la sogs thugs kyis [#]ni/_/khur khyer la sogs ston mdzad pa/_/khyad par sgo nas bkag pa ni/_/lta ba de yod rnams la mdzes/_/de kho na
[\[14b.4\]]nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las gnas ma'i bus brtags pa'i [#]bdag brtag [#]pa ste bcu gnyis pa'o//_//yang na gang phyir skad cig ma/_/'jig pa rab tu grub nyid kyis[#]/_/rang bzhin la sogs sun phyung bas/_/gnas med nyid la 'bad 'di byed/_/bshad dang 'chad
[\[14b.5\]]par 'gyur ba yi[#]/_/rigs sogs khyad par med pa ni/_/dgag [#]pa'i don du de yi phyir/_/skad cig 'jig [#]pa gsal bsgrub bya/_/byas dang ma byas nyid sgo nas/_/'ga' zhig phung po gnyis su 'dod/_/skad cig skad cig ma yin pas/_/gzhan gyis [#]dngos rnams la 'dod
[\[14b.6\]]'di/_/de la byas pa'i dngos po gang /_/de kun skad cig mar 'jig can/_/thams cad dag ni 'jig pa la/_/ltos med nyid du gnas phyir ro/_/gang zhig dngos gang yin pa la/_/rgyu gzhan la ltos med nyid de/_/de ltar rang rgyud las skye phyir/_/de ni de las nges zhes bya/_/dper na
[\[14b.7\]]rang 'bras skye ba la/_/gegs byed med pa'i tshogs pa bzhin/_/skye ba can ni thams cad kyang /_/'jig pa la ni ltos pa med/_/gal te 'di ltos med yin na'ang /_/yul dang dus gzhan la 'gyur na/_/de dag la ni ltos nyid phyir/_/ltos med thal ba nyid 'gyur na/_/skye ba
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]can kun 'jig pa la/_/thams cad du ni ltos pa med/_/'jig pa'i rgyu rnams rnam kun du/_/da la cung zad byed med phyir/_/'di ltar 'jig par byed pa'i rgyu/_/dngos la tha dad med pa yi/_/'jig pa'i byed por mi rigs te[#]/_/dngos po rang rgyu las skye phyir/_
[\[15a.2\]]'di la sgrib [#]sogs kyang mi rig_/'jig pa [#]zhes bya'i [#]dngos po yi/_/dngos po'i 'jig byed ces bya [#]brdzun/_/gzhan nyid la sogs rnam rtog dag_/don de la yang 'jug phyir ro/_/dngos po'i ngo bo med bdag nyid/_/'jig pa zhes bya'i med [#]gzhan can/_/'jig byed ce na de la yang /_/_
[\[15a.3\]]byed pa rig pa [#]ldan ma yin/_/med pa yang ni 'bras nyid na/_/myu gu sogs bzhin dngos nyid du/_/thal 'gyur bskyed bya'i ngo bo ni/_/rgyu yi [#]nus pas skyed [#]phyir ro/_/de ltar dngos med sgrub sgo nas/_/byas yin ma yin dgag rten phyir/_/gang yin de la tha dad sogs/_/slar yang
[\[15a.4\]]rnam rtog 'jug par 'gyur/_/'on te bya ba bkag pa [#]'di/_/dngos nyid byed pa ma yin nyid/_/de lta na yang rgyu med grub/_/byed po min na rgyu nyams phyir/_/'o na dngos po yod dus su/_/'jig pa 'di yod ma yin nyid/_/sngon min yun ring phyis [#]kyang min/_/dngos po'i de ma thag tu 'di/_/_
[\[15a.5\]]de lta na yang dus nges phyir/_/'di ni rgyu ldan regs [#]pa yin/_/ltos med pa la res 'ga' dang /_/'brel pa sun [#]ni phyung ba yin/_/dngos po'i de ma thag tu ni/_/'byung ba'i phyir dang ma byung las/_/'byung phyir 'di ni rgyu ldan rigs/_/dper na skad cig gzhan bzhin 'dod/_/mo gsham gyi ni bu
[\[15a.6\]]bzhin du/_/rgyu med phyir 'di cung zad med/_/yang na mkha' bzhin rtag gyur [#]te/_/gang phyir rnam pa gzhan med do/_/med pa yin na 'jig med phyir/_/dngos po thams cad rtag par 'gyur/_/'dus byas thams cad 'jig pa yi/_/shes pa'ang rgyu mtshan med pa can/_/rtag pa nyid
[\[15a.7\]]na'ang 'jig pa med/_/lhan cig gnas 'gyur 'gal med phyir/_/skye ba med la'ang 'jig bshad pa/_/rigs [#]pa'i rjes 'brangs nyid ma yin/_/de lta bu la gzhan dag gis/_/ji lta bu zhig 'jig par rtog_/skad cig mar gnas chos rnams kyi/_/dngos nyid min nam 'on te na/_/_
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]dngos po'i ngo bo ldog gyur pa[#]/_/zhig myong can la de ltar brjod/_/de 'dir 'jig pa'i rang bzhin gang /_/chos rnams skad cig mar gnas pa'i/_/dngos med de ltar brjod dam ci/_/gzhan la brgal zhing brtag [#]pa mtshungs/_/'on te dngos po'i rang ngo bo/_/ldog pa 'jig pa'i ming
[\[15b.2\]]yin na/_/snga ma la ni rtag byed pa[#]/_/'gal ba cung zad med pa nyid/_/skad cig mar gnas dngos gang la/_/'jig pa zhes ni rjod byed na/_/de ni rgyu dang rnam par 'dod/_/gzhan dngos med phyir rgyu med can/_/dngos po'i de ma thag 'byung nyid/_/de 'dra de la yod min te/_/g.yo
[\[15b.3\]]ba dngos po'i rang ngo bo/_/dngos dang lhan cig skye phyir ro/_/de phyir 'jig pa yod pa'i phyir/_/'dus byas thams cad rtag pa min/_/'jig pa zhes pa'i blo dag kyang /_/rgyu mtshan med par thal mi 'gyur/_/zhig pa nyid ni bdag med phyir/_/de ma thag 'byung yod pa min/_/ma byung byung ba
[\[15b.4\]]ldan pa yang /_/nam mkha'i pad+ma la sogs bzhin/_/zhig 'gyur zhes bya de ltar 'dir/_/dngos por ma gyur zhes bya yi/_/don 'di rtogs par byed yin gyi/_/bsgrub pa 'ga' yang mi 'dod do/_/mi 'ga' zhig la bong bu zhes/_/de ltar ming tsam byas pa na/_/bong bu'i chos rnams
[\[15b.5\]]thams cad ni/_/'di las thob [#]'gyur ma yin no/_/zhig pa zhes bya'i dngos po ni/_/dngos po bcom pa zhes bya ba/_/sgrub pa na yang dngos 'di la/_/cung zad kyang ni skye med phyir/_/'di ni ji ltar ldog par 'gyur/_/'jig pa dngos po zhig bdag nyid/_/ji ltar dngos po'i ngo bo dang /_/_
[\[15b.6\]]bral phyir med pa nyid 'dod kyi/_/dngos po ngo bo min phyir min/_/'di la ldog pa'i dngos nyid kyang /_/sgrub pa'i sgo nas rjod mi byed/_/dngos po yi ni rjes 'jug pa/_/skad cig las phyis [#]'gegs par byed/_/de phyir 'di yi rnam gzhag gi/_/ngo bo sgrub pa cung zad med/_/de phyir 'di la
[\[15b.7\]]rtag [#]pa yi/_/rnam rtog byed pa gnas med do/_/nam mkha' la sogs dngos gang dang [#]/_/ma byas par ni yang dag 'dod/_/dngos po 'jug pa yod min te/_/de dag yod nus bral phyir ro/_/skad cig skad cig min sogs rtog[# ]/de tshe de la gnas med do/_/gang gis dngos nyid skad
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]cig ma'am/_/gal te rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur/_/skad cig gnas pa'i rang bzhin gang /_/dngos po skad cig ma ru brjod/_/brten pa'i ngo bor gnas pa yi/_/dngos nyid skad cig pa ma yin/_/skyes ma thag tu mi gnas pa'i/_/dngos po'i ngo bo gang yin pa[#]/_/_
[\[16a.2\]]skad cig tu brjod de gang la/_/yod pa skad cig mar 'dod do/_/don la tha dad med na yang /_/de 'di la 'di zhes [#]gnod med/_/'dod pas sbyar ba'i brda tsam gyi/_/dngos po rjod [#]par byed pa yin/_/byung ma thag tu mi gnas pa'i/_/dngos la de ltar brjod 'dod pa/_/de la sgra ni rkyen bcas
[\[16a.3\]]pa 'am/_/rkyan med rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur/_/gal te nam mkha' dus la sogs/_/de dag yod 'gyur de ltar na/_/de dag kyang ni [#]byas bzhin du/_/skad cig 'jig 'di las mi 'da'/_/'di ltar gang zag [#]yod ces pas/_/de kun skad cig 'jig can de/_/dper na 'dus byas dngos po
[\[16a.4\]]dag_/de ltar de ma thag grub bzhin/_/nam mkha' dus dang dbang phyug sogs/_/'di yang khyod kyi yod par 'dod/_/de dag skad cig ma nyid dang /_/bral na med par thal bar 'gyur/_/gang phyir brtan pa'i dngos po rnams/_/rim gyis sam ni cig car du'ang /_/don gyi bya ba byed
[\[16a.5\]]min pa/_/de phyir de dag med par 'dod/_/rgyu ni nye ba med pa'i phyir/_/'bras bu rnams ni sdod par byed[#]/_/nus pa'i rgyu ni yod gyur na/_/de dag sdod par [#]gang gis byas/_/'on te'ang rtag la [#]rim can gyi/_/lhan cig byed rnams yod gyur [#]na/_/'di ni gang dag la ni ltos/_/'bras bu'i
[\[16a.6\]]tshogs rim rten par byed/_/'di legs 'on kyang de la ni/_/lhan cig byed de rnams [#]yod pa/_/rung ba'i ngo bo'i rgyu nyid phyir/_/don gcig byed pas yin nam ci/_/rung ba'i ngo bo'i rgyu nyid na/_/dngos de dag gi [#]byas 'gyur na/_/de yang bya bar mi nus phyir/_/de rang bzhin du rtag gnas
[\[16a.7\]]pa/_/'di yi rang bzhin byas na yang /_/'di yi rtag pa nyams par 'gyur/_/de las khyad par tha dad ni[#]/_/'di ni byed por ji ltar 'gyur/_/de yod na ni 'bras bu dag_/skyed pa'i phyir dang de med na/_/mi skyed phyir te de ltar na/_/de nyid rgyu nyid rnam par gnas/_/'on te de dang 'brel
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]pa'i phyir/_/de la'ang rgyu nyid yod pa na/_/de dag las [#]'brel gang yin 'dod/_/tha dad phyir na de bdag min/_/de ni de las 'byung ba'ang min/_/cig car bar du thal phyir ro/_/de las kyang ni 'bras bu rnams/_/cig car nyid du skyed par 'gyur/_/de la'ang gzhan la ltos pa na[#]/_/_
[\[16b.2\]]thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur/_/de las 'bras bu dus gcig na'ang /_/'brel pa med phyir brtag mi bya/_/gal te 'brel pa 'du ba yin/_/de la'ang 'dir ni dpyad bya ste/_/de ni de la 'gyur ba'am/_/de lta ma yin zhes bya ba/_/'du ba can du 'dod dam ci/_/gal te rtog pa dang
[\[16b.3\]]po 'dzin/_/de las byung ba de nyid thob/_/de yang de ma thag gsal [#]zin/_/gal te na ni de la 'di/_/phan mi byed par 'dod gyur na/_/dngos gzhan kun kyang de bzhin du/_/'du ba can 'gyur khyad par med/_/tha dad tha dad med rnam rtog_/so so dag tu bkag pa'i phyir/_/ngo bo gnyis [#]can
[\[16b.4\]]khyad par ni/_/dngos po de la bsal ba yin/_/gang zag la sogs rtags [#]rnams su/_/phung po gnyis ni bstan pa'i phyir/_/ngo bo gnyis can khyad par med/_/gnyis med bdag nyid can yang med/_/'on te lhan cig byed pa yi/_/rkyen las [#]'jug pa mi ltos pa[#]/_/de lta na yang de bral
[\[16b.5\]]'di/_/byed pa ma yin mtha' rgyu bzhin/_/de yi bdag gi rang bzhin 'di/_/de dag nyid ni nye ba na/_/byed po nyid yin de phyir de/_/yod na'ang kun tshe 'bras bu min/_/de lta yin na 'on kyang ni/_/tshogs pa na de [#]rang bzhin 'dod/_/gang de mtshogs na 'dod na/_/der 'brel rang bzhin
[\[16b.6\]]yod na ni/_/de dag kyang ni 'di gnas phyir/_/bral ba'i ngo bo'i gzhan yin na/_/gcig pa nyid ni nyams par 'gyur/_/de phyir de ltar ltos pas kyang /_/'bras bu rnams ni rim skye'am [#]min/_/cig car mi 'dod nyid dang ni/_/de 'bras rim gyis mthong phyir ro/_/gal te 'bras
[\[16b.7\]]bu ma lus rnams/_/cig car byas nas nus pa yi/_/bdag nyid don de ldog 'gyur na/_/'di ni skad cig 'jig can grub/_/de dngos can ni rjes 'jug na/_/slar yang 'bras bu skye bar 'gyur/_/cung zad mi byed ngo bo ni/_/ji ltar yang ni nyid du 'dod/_/nus pa kun gyis stong
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]nyid phyir/_/rgyu skar lam gyi pad+ma bzhin/_/skad cig yin par thams cad med/_/gang phyir nus pa [#]dngos mtshan nyid/_/nus pa'i mtshan nyid dngos nyid 'di/_/ci [#]ste khas len mi byed na/_/gal te de ltar gzhan dag gis/_/dngos po'i mtshan nyid
[\[17a.2\]]gzhan ston gyis[#]/_/gal te dngos po'i mtshan nyid ni/_/yod nyid dang 'brel 'dod de min/_/'du sogs ma grub phyir dang ni/_/ji ltar gzhan ni [#]gzhan mtshan nyid/_/don byed don du gnyer byed pa/_/g.yeng ba med pa'i blo can gyi/_/don la dpyod sogs bya ba kun[#]/_/rigs kyi
[\[17a.3\]]smyon pa nyid kyis min/_/myos par gyur pas kyang ma yin/_/de la gang dag 'ga' zhig la[#]/_/la lar dus 'gar ji ltar yang /_/nye bar mkho [#]gyur de nyid la/_/yod nyid rnam [#]gzhag rig [#]pa yin/_/de yi dngos can don nyid la/_/skad cig ma nyid rab sgrub byed/_/thams cad sdud
[\[17a.4\]]phyir khyad par ni/_/de nyid la ni brjod par bya/_/mo gsham gyi ni bu lta bu'i[#]/_/nus pa ma lus stong pa gang [#]/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs kyi yang /_/nam yang rgyu nyid ma yin pa/_/de la mkhas pas yod nyid kyi[#]/_/rnam gzhag 'di ni yod mi bya/_/rgyu med phyir ro 'bras bu dang /_/ngo bo 'bras
[\[17a.5\]]sogs ma mthong phyir/_/de la skad cig ma nyid du/_/bsgrubs [#]pas don ni cung zad med/_/de la brgal zhing brtag [#]pa yang /_/byed pa'ang 'bras bu med pa yin[#]/_/'on te nam mkha'i pad+ma sogs/_/rang gis shes pa'i rgyur gyur phyir/_/don gyi bya ba byed nus kyang /_/de dag dngos por
[\[17a.6\]]yod ma yin/_/nam mkha'i chu skyes pad sogs la/_/der rtogs bag chags tsam las ni/_/'byung ba dmigs pa med nyid ni/_/shes pa 'di ni rab tu [#]byed/_/med pa rgyu nyid yin na ni/_/rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rtag tu khyad par med nyid phyir/_/dngos med ltos pa ci
[\[17a.7\]]yang med/_/skad cig pa yi dngos rnams kyang /_/ji ltar don byed pa nyid yod/_/thog ma'i lhan cig byed rnams ni/_/phan tshun khyad par byed min te/_/skyes na bdag kun grub phyir dang /_/ma skyes rang bzhin med phyir ro/_/khyad par med las khyad par ni/_/'byung na [#]'bras bu cis
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]mi 'byung /_/gzhan la [#]khyad par can de min/_/brgal zhing brtag [#]pa mtshungs phyir ro/_/khyed la lhan cig byed pa'i tshogs/_/thug pa med par yang 'gyur ro/_/de ltar gang phyir de dag ni/_/rim dang cig car don bya med/_/mi 'gyur de phyir de dag ni/_/skad cig ma nyid rten don med/_/_
[\[17b.2\]]de ltar lhan cig byed byas pas[#]/_/gang tshe la lar khyad med na/_/de tshe de phyir dus kun du/_/rgyun yang [#]khyad par med pa nyid/_/de tshe de phyir rgyun la yang /_/gal te 'jig pa rgyu med ni/_/'di ni thog ma nyid du 'gyur/_/gal te thog ma 'di med na/_/mtha' yang de ni ji ltar 'gyur/_/gal
[\[17b.3\]]te dngos po 'jig pa la/_/rang gi rgyu las rgyu gzhan ni/_/mi 'dod na ni de dag la/_/'ga' zhig tu ni ji ltar lags/_/smras pa thog ma'i gnas skabs rnams/_/phan tshun phan pa byed nyid na/_/de dag don cig byed nyid kyis/_/lhan cig byed rnams su 'gyur te/_/phan tshun phan byed
[\[17b.4\]]min na yang /_/'di dag khyad par yod gang phyir/_/rang gi nyer len stobs las byung /_/skye [#]byed tshogs pa'i tha dad yin/_/de [#]las brtsams nas gang skyes pa'i/_/khyad par de dag des byas pa'o[#]/_/de la dgongs pa de dag ni/_/dngos de'i rang bzhin can yin phyir/_/dngos rnams skad cig
[\[17b.5\]]so sor ni/_/nus pa nges pa [#]bsam mi khyab/_/'byung ba brtag par bya min te/_/me [#]la sreg par byed nyid bzhin/_/rgyun chad ngo bo gang yin pa'i/_/'jig pa rgyu dang ldan pa min/_/de [#]ni mthar yang 'byung yod min/_/de ltar skye ba bkag pa yin/_/gyo mo la sogs mi 'dra ba'i/_/skye ba rgyu dang
[\[17b.6\]]bcas pa ste[#]/_/de yang thog mar skyes min nyid/_/de tshe rgyu ni med phyir ro/_/dngos po skad cig ma rnams ni/_/rnam gnyis kha cig 'grib pa'i rgyu/_/grang ba sogs kyis [#]me sogs bzhin/_/gzhan dag de lta min pa yi/_/thog mar smras pa rgyu 'bras bu/_/yin na'ang [#]de nyid ma mthong ba'i/_/_
[\[17b.7\]]'jig rten pa yis 'gal ba ni/_/rnam pa du mar mngon par zhen/_/dngos po rnams la gnod bya dang /_/gnod byed dngos po [#]don dam par/_/yod min de nyid phyir na yang /_/'gal ba rtogs [#]pa zhes bshad do/_/'o na dbang po bya ba ni/_/yod na mi g.yo gnod med can/_/de nyid 'di yin
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]zhes bya ba'i/_/ngo shes pa ni nye bar skye/_/de phyir skad cig gis 'jig par[#]/_/bsgrub phyir bkod pa'i gtan tshigs ni/_/kun la mngon sum gyis gnod 'di/_/bzlog dka' bar ni thal bar 'gyur/_/ngo shes par ni [#]gyur na ni/_/mngon sum yin par mi 'thad de/_/_
[\[18a.2\]]gang phyir de ni rnam rtog bcas/_/dngos po'i ngo bo bstan bya min/_/ngo shes pa ni 'khrul pa ste/_/mngon sum mtshan nyid de las gzhan/_/tha dad min pa'i zhen pa yis/_/tha dad dngos la'ang 'jug phyir ro/_/mngon sum de las gzhan pa yin/_/gal te 'di ni sngar rtogs pa'i/_/rnam
[\[18a.3\]]pa'i spyod yul can 'gyur na/_/'di ni sngar nyid skye 'gyur te/_/de don can phyir sngon blo bzhin/_/de ltar ma yin des na 'di/_/don de 'dzin byed 'dod min te/_/de shes dus su mi skye [#]phyir/_/yul gzhan gyi ni [#]blo bzhin no/_/tha dad min pa'i zhen pa yis/_/tha dad dngos la 'ang 'jug phyir
[\[18a.4\]]ro/_/sgong gi 'khrul pa'i shes pa bzhin/_/'di ni 'khrul par [#]gnas pa yin/_/bya ba bsgrub pa'i don la yang /_/'jug pa'i phyir dran sogs bzhin te/_/byed pa'i don ni rnam nyams phyir/_/'di ni tshad mar rigs [#]ma yin/_/da ltar dus su yod pa nyid/_/snga ma'i blo yis shes pa nyid/_/_
[\[18a.5\]]de phyir dran pa la med gang /_/khyad par 'di la yod min te/_/gang phyir sngar ni shes tsam la/_/de yin zhes [#]byas dran pa skye/_/de nyid 'di zhes bya ba yi[#]/_/ngo shes par ni khyad par can/_/the tshom phyin ci log gang dang /_/de dag spangs nas ngo shes pa/_/tshad ma nyid ni thob par byed/_/_
[\[18a.6\]]shes par gyur la med phyir ro/_/cig shos kyis ni rtogs don yod[#]/_/mngon sum gyis [#]ni bcad pa la/_/cig shos skye ba srid pa min/_/tshad ma gtso bo brtan pa yis[#]/_/nges par bzung ba'i [#]don nyid la/_/cig shos stobs chung dag gis phyir[#]/_/bzlog par su zhig zhen par byed/_/'o
[\[18a.7\]]na da lta yod de nyid/_/gang tshe khyod kyis tha dad 'dod/_/de tshe sngar yod dngos po las[#]/_/tha dad khyod nyid kyis [#]bstan to/_/yod pa gzhan nyid ma yin na'ang /_/ji ltar sngar [#]blos shes pa min[#]/_/de shes min na dngos po nyid/_/ma dmigs par [#]ni thal bar 'gyur/_/rjes dpag [#]la sogs
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]kyi spyod yul/_/mngon sum gyis ni gnod pa na/_/rjes dpag la sogs tshad ma med[#]/_/gnod phyir rab rib can sogs bzhin/_/don la mi slu [#]ba nyid du/_/mtshungs na 'di cis [#]gtso bo yin/_/de yod min na rjes dpag sogs/_/tshad mar 'gyur pa [#]ma yin nyid/_/'o na gtan
[\[18b.2\]]tshigs thams cad kyi/_/thams cad nye bsus khyab pa la/_/rjes su dpag pa 'dis gnod [#]cing /_/dam bca'i don la gnod pa yang /_/brjod 'dod nyi zla sogs pa yi/_/yul can shes pa gang yin gzhan/_/de dus dang 'brel nyi [#]sogs kyi/_/yul can du ni 'jug byed de/_/sa las
[\[18b.3\]]byung yul can min pa/_/de shes nyid du brjod pa'i phyir/_/dper na dang po'i shes pa ni/_/rang dus nyi [#]sogs yul can bzhin/_/gzugs nyid sogs pa rten kun dang /_/de dag gi [#]ni rten gang [#]dang /_/de rnams gang la yang dag rten[#]/_/'ga' zhig de yi yul gang yin/_/'ga' zhig de ltar
[\[18b.4\]]skye 'gyur ba/_/de dag skyes ma thag tu ni/_/'jig la rten pa nyid min te/_/gzhal bya nyid dang brjod bya nyid/_/gtan tshigs phyir ni mkha' pad bzhin/_/rnam par rtsod [#]pa'i yul gyur pa'i/_/shes pa rim gyis 'byung gang dag_/de rnams thams cad yul gcig can/_/yin no zhes ni brjod
[\[18b.5\]]bya ste/_/gnod med rten gcig can nyid na[#]/_/brjod pa mthun [#]par sbyor ba'i phyir/_/dper na da lta'i skad cig ma[#]/_/gcig la du ma'i blo rnams bzhin/_/re zhig gtan tshigs dang po la/_/dper na bsgrub [#]byas stong pa ste/_/yul nyid rgyud [#]nyid yin pa'i phyir/_/shes pa'i rang gi dus can min/_/_
[\[18b.6\]]gang tshe nyi ma sogs pa'i sgra[#]/_/'dod pa tsam gyis 'byung dag rnams/_/mar me sogs la sbyar bya ba/_/de shel dag gis 'khrul pa nyid/_/rigs sogs rang bzhin med pa'i phyir[#]/_/skad cig gis 'dod can 'dod min/_/de med par ni bsgrub [#]pa'i phyir/_/sgrub byed bstan [#]pa don med yin/_/_
[\[18b.7\]]sgra mtshungs pa yis brjod bya nyid/_/mar me la sogs shes pa la'ang /_/'jug pa de phyir de yis [#]ni/_/gtan tshigs 'di ni 'khrul bar 'gyur/_/de dag la ni gzhi mthun nyid/_/gnod 'gyur du ni rtog ce [#]na/_/brjod par 'dod pa'ang gnod pa 'di/_/gsal bar ci yi phyir ma mthong /_/rtsod
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]pa'i gnas su gyur pa yi/_/blo rnams don zhig yul can min/_/rim gyis 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir/_/glog dang mar me sogs blo bzhin/_/don gcig las byung [#]shes rnams la/_/rim gyis [#]'byung ba 'gal ba yin/_/gzhan gyis tha dad bya min pa/_/_
[\[19a.2\]]de la ltos pa 'gal phyir ro/_/gtan tshigs de rnams thams cad la/_/ldog pa the tshom za nyid de/_/mi mthun phyogs la zhugs [#]pa la/_/gnod byed bstan pa med phyir ro/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed [#]ba las brtan [#]pa'i dngos po brtag pa ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//_
[\[19a.3\]]dngos po thams cad skad cig ma'i/_/mi rtag nyid dang 'brel de'i phyir/_/las dang de yi 'brel pa dang /_/rgyu dang [#]'bras sogs ji ltar 'grub[#]/_/dge rnams dag la skad cig gang /_/byed po nyid du brtag byed pa/_/'di ni 'bras bu byung dus su/_/_
[\[19a.4\]]rjes su 'jug pa nyid ma yin/_/'bras bu 'byung tshe skad cig gang /_/longs spyod por ni brjod bya ba/_/de ni las byas nyid min te/_/de ni sngar mi srid phyir ro/_/las dang de yi 'bras bu dag_/byed po gcig gis ma bzung phyir/_/byas pa chud
[\[19a.5\]]zos ma phrad gang /_/thal bar 'gyur ba shin tu 'gal/_/bdag med sgra yi phyogs la yang /_/bdag med phyir ni 'bras med pa'am/_/bdag las gzhan gyir bya bar [#]ni/_/sngar nyid du ni rtogs byed pa/_/de phyir rtog ldan 'brel 'dod pa/_/dge ba dang ni mi dge ba'i/_/bya ba rtsom
[\[19a.6\]]la mi 'jug nyid/_/'bras bu ring du gnas pa yin/_/dngos po 'bras bu byed nus pa/_/ma 'ongs ma yin 'das pa'ang min[#]/_/da ltar ba yang de snyed kyi/_/dus su gnas pa ma yin no/_/dngos po bdag nyid ma thob pa/_/gzhan gyi yan lag phyir nus min/_/'gags pa ma yin
[\[19a.7\]]de yi ni/_/'bras bu med nus gnas pa'ang min/_/skad cig snga ma gzhan zhig pa'ang [#]/_/rjes 'gro med par rten [#]byed na/_/phyis byung [#]skye bar 'thad min te/_/rgyu mtshan med pa nyid phyir ro/_/'jig dang skye ba dus mtshungs na'ang /_/rgyu 'bras dag ni yod pa min/_/phan tshun ltos pa med
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]phyir te/_/de yi bya ba ma bzung phyir/_/bum pa'i gzugs ni zhig pa na/_/dri la sogs pa'ang skyes pa ni/_/ji ltar da 'bras mi 'dod ltar/_/gzugs gzhan rnams kyang de bzhin te/_/de phyir 'bras bu 'byung ba las[#]/_/sngon du gang gi bya ba mthong /_/de nyid de yi rgyu yin gyi/_/de ma
[\[19b.2\]]thag pa tsam ni min/_/gal te 'di ni mdor [#]bsdus na/_/rgyu zhig pa las 'bras 'byung na/_/zhig pa brjod du med pa'i phyir/_/'di ni rgyu med nyid du 'gyur/_/ma zhig pa las de 'byung na/_/skad cig du mar gnas pa'i phyir/_/de tshe dngos rnams skad cig nyid/_/ji ltar nyams par
[\[19b.3\]]'gyur ba min/_/skad cig gnas pa'i ngang tshul can/_/bum sogs mig gis [#]mthong min te/_/gang phyir zhig pa rtogs pa [#]yin/_/yun ring 'das pa'i dngos po bzhin/_/dngos rnams rang bzhin mi dmigs phyir/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu'i dngos por yang /_/mngon sum dang ni mi
[\[19b.4\]]dmigs pas/_/mgu bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/'di mthong ba las 'di mthong la/_/'di yang mthong na ma mthong bar/_/rim ldan 'gyur ba'i mtshams sbyor ba/_/byed por rnam par gnas pa gang /_/skad cig gis 'jig dngos rnams la/_/ngo shes pa yang 'brel par dka'/_/_
[\[19b.5\]]skyes bu gzhan gyis mthong ba'i don/_/gzhan gyis [#]ngo shes 'gyur ba min/_/sgra [#]la sogs pa tha dad la/_/shes pa po zhig yod pa'i phyir/_/'dra ba las ni ngo shes 'gyur/_/gnyis tha dad na rgyu med can/_/gal te mtshams sbyor byed pa'i rgyu/_/don zhig yod pa ma yin na/_/gzugs
[\[19b.6\]]mthong ba na ro sogs la/_/mngon 'dod sogs de ji ltar 'gyur/_/srid pa'i btson rar chags sogs kyis/_/'ching bas bcings pa'i skad cig gzhan/_/ma bcings gzhan ni grol 'gyur ba/_/zhes bya 'di yang rtogs ma yin/_/bcings pa grol ba nam yang ni/_/mi srid
[\[19b.7\]]gcig tu 'jug phyir ro/_/de phyir thar pa don gnyer rnams/_/ngal ba don ni med par 'gyur/_/'ching ba sogs kyis bcings gyur pa/_/grol ba thob par byed pa mthong /_/ma bcings grol ba thob byed pa/_/zhes bya 'di 'dra mthong bas gnod/_/bcings dang grol ba 'di dag ni/_/gzhi
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]gcig de bzhin gnas pa'i phyir/_/'jig rten pa yi de dag bzhin/_/de bzhin thams cad mdzes par gnas/_/rnam pa da dag nyid kyis ni/_/dngos rnams skad cig gis 'jig la/_/gzhi gcig pa ni med pa'i phyir/_/dran pa la sogs mi srid do/_/'di la mngon
[\[20a.2\]]par brjod par bya[#]/_/bdag med rnams la rgyu 'bras nyid/_/gnas pa yin na 'di dag kun/_/gnod pa med par grub pa nyid/_/ji ltar myu gu la sogs la/_/rjes 'gro can gyi bdag med la/_/sa bon sogs kyi nus nges pa/_/de bzhin nang gi bdag nyid gnas[#]/_/dngos su 'am ni brgyud
[\[20a.3\]]pa yis/_/'ga' la [#]kha cig nus bcas yin/_/de phyir las 'bras sogs rnams kyi/_/'brel pa nyid ni 'thad ma yin/_/byed po nyid sogs rnam gzhag ste/_/rgyu gcig nyid du brjod 'dod pas/_/rtog pas sgro btags nyid 'dod kyi/_/yang dag gnas pa'i yang dag min/_/rjes
[\[20a.4\]]'gro med na rgyu 'bras nyid/_/khyad par can de mi 'thad de/_/rgyud gzhan las ni byung [#]rnams dang /_/gang zhig rgyu 'bras mi 'thad bzhin/_/'o na sa bon myu gu sogs/_/rgyu 'bras nges pa nyid mthong ste/_/de la rjes 'gro'i bdag nyid can/_/cha shas phra mo yod ma yin/_/sa bon myu gu
[\[20a.5\]]sogs pa la/_/zhing sogs khyad par med yin na/_/tha dad mi rigs gcig bdag phyir/_/tha dad rjes 'gro med pa grub/_/de phyir las 'bras sogs rnams gyi[#]/_/yod dang med pa sgrub [#]don du/_/rgyu 'bras grub dang ma grub phyir/_/gzhan gyis rab tu 'bad par bya/_/de la brjod bya skad
[\[20a.6\]]cig ma/_/gnyis pa la ni 'bras skye zhing /_/dang por rgyu ni skyes gyur pa/_/de ni de tshe zhig pa'ang min/_/de ni skad cig pa nyid phyir/_/'bras bu'i skad cig dus gnas phyir/_/gnas na'ang don med gang gi phyir/_/de la 'bras bu de 'grub [#]yin/_/slar skyes slar yang de yis ni/_/bskyed [#]par nus
[\[20a.7\]]min skye ba [#]ni/_/ma byung ba las byung dngos phyir/_/gzhan du na ni gnas pa min/_/de phyir ma zhig pa yi rgyu/_/skad cig dang por byung ba las/_/de yis [#]skad cig ma nyid [#]phyir/_/cig car thal ba yod ma yin/_/skad cig gsum la sogs pa la/_/dper na rnam par smin pa'i rgyu/_/zhig las
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]'bras bu brjod pa bzhin[#]/_/gal te dang por de 'byung na/_/cig car du yang thal 'gyur te/_/lhan cig 'byung rgyu bzhin de yang /_/rigs pas 'thad min gang gi phyir/_/med pas sngar ni nus med phyir/_/nus pa'i tshe na 'bras 'byung phyir/_/rgyu 'bras dag ni cig car nyid/_/'gal bar
[\[20b.2\]]gsal ba nyid yin te/_/skam pas bzung ba bzhin du ni/_/rgyu 'dis rang gi 'bras bu 'dis/_/bzung nas skyed par byed pa min/_/gang phyir cig car ba ru 'gyur/_/'dod ldan bud med la bzhin du/_/'bras bu rang bzhin la brtan par/_/'khyud nas skye ba ma yin na/_/gang gis [#]de dag ci dgar
[\[20b.3\]]'gyur/_/cig car ba nyid 'gal ba yin/_/gang phyir rgyu de rang nyid kyis[#]/_/'bras bu sos bsdoms [#]bzhin bzung ba/_/skyes [#]pa yin na cig car bar/_/'gyur na de ni de ltar min[#]/_/'bras bu'ang rang bzhin de la ni/_/'dod ldan sdug bsngal 'khyud bzhin pas/_/skye ba yin na cig car bar[#]/_/'gyur na de yang de ltar min/_/rang gi rgyu las 'byung
[\[20b.4\]]ba ni/_/skad cig dang por gang byung ba/_/skad cig gnyis par [#]nye ba yi/_/de ma thag tu gang byung min[#]/_/bya ba med pa'i dngos la yang /_/de ni de yi skyed byed yin/_/'dod pa tsam las byung ba yi/_/brda ni rjes su sgrub byed yin/_/skye ba las ni dus gzhan pa'i/_/bya bas 'dir ni ci zhig dgos/_/gang phyir yod las 'bras byung bas[#]/_/yod pa nyid ni de'i
[\[20b.5\]]bya'o/_/de ma thag par gang nges pa/_/de nyid ltos pa yin zhes brjod/_/rtag tu 'bras bu 'byung ba dang /_/ldan pa'i rgyu yi bya ba'o/_/de yod pa na 'byung ba tsam/_/bya ba zhes kyang kun tu brtags[#]/_/de dang ldan pas rgyu nyid de/_/de phyir de ldan de nyid mchog_/gang phyir sa bon myu gu sogs/_/_
[\[20b.6\]]yod na yod par mthong nyid kyi[#]/_/bya ba dngos po yod pa las/_/cung zad kyang ni mthong ma yin/_/nus pa ma mthong bzhin du yang /_/rgyu nyid du ni rtog [#]byed na/_/'di dang bye brag ci yod na/_/gzhan yang ci phyir rgyur mi 'dod/_/ji ltar gzhan ni med na yang /_/bya ba 'bras bu rgyur 'dod bzhin/_/_
[\[20b.7\]]gzhan yang ci phyir rgyu ma yin/_/yang na dngos bcas mthong bar ni/_/'dod na'ang 'di ni kho bo cag_/mthong bar 'dod yin rgyu med na/_/de la dngos po yod pa yang /_/ci yi phyir na khas len byed/_/ji ltar skye ba can blo nyid/_/tshad ma nyid du nges smra ba/_/de bzhin dngos po thams cad la/_/_
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]de rgyu nyid du cis mi [#]'dod/_/ji ltar blo ni skad cig la/_/de bzhin skye ba can gzhan yang /_/bsgrubs pa de phyir 'gro ba 'di/_/de bzhin kho na bya bral ba'o/_/rgyun gyis 'jug pa'i dri la sogs/_/phan tshun rgyur 'dod kho na ste/_/de rgyu nyid du thal 'gyur te/_/'di la gnod pa can
[\[21a.2\]]min no/_/gang yang rung ba'i rgyu rnams kyi/_/gzhan gyi de ma thag 'byung ba'ang /_/de bzhin nges pa la 'dod pas/_/brtan par 'dod la skyon 'di yang /_/gang zhig gang la bya ba dang /_/bcas te de yi rgyur 'dod na'ang /_/gang la yang dag nges gang yin/_/de rgyu yin par 'dod pa ni[#]/_/mngon
[\[21a.3\]]sum dang ni mi dmigs pas/_/yod na yod par grub 'di dag_/gal te rnam bcas rnam shes kyis[#]/_/dngos rnams rig par khyod 'dod dam/_/'on te rnam med pas dngos rnams/_/rnam par rig par khyed 'dod pa/_/skad cig gis 'jig phyogs la'ang de/_/mtshungs par nye bar
[\[21a.4\]]mtshon par bya/_/snga ma'i rang gi rgyu rnams dang /_/gzugs sogs rig pa'i rang bzhin gyi/_/rnam par shes pa thams cad nyid/_/dus mnyam nyid du skye ba yin/_/gal te rnam shes rnam pa dang /_/bcas na sems ni sna tshogs 'gyur/_/rnam pas mtshan ma nyid min na'ang /_/nye ba
[\[21a.5\]]na gnas rgyu med pa'o/_/zhe na de'i lan 'dir cung zad/_/khyed kyis kyang ni smra bar gyis[#]/_/'di la khyed cag lan gang yin/_/de ni kho bo cag gir [#]'gyur/_/gal te rgyu ni 'bras bu dag_/skyed par mi 'dod de lta na/_/byas 'jig 'gyur na 'di min [#]te/_/rgyun gyis rgyu nyid 'gyur ba yin/_/_
[\[21a.6\]]gal te rgyu ni med par yang /_/la lar 'bras bu 'byung 'gyur na/_/ma byas pa thob par 'gyur na/_/de min nus pa des phyir ro/_/skad cig gis 'jig rnam rtog gis/_/byas pa 'jig tshogs phas rgol ba/_/des ni mi 'dod pa nyid du/_/gyur pa cung zad yod ma yin/_/mi 'jigs
[\[21a.7\]]yod par [#]lta ba rnams/_/rgyun la gcig par mngon sems pas/_/skad cig gis phye'i rnam rtog gis/_/ji ltar yang ni 'jug mi 'gyur/_/skad cig re re rnam 'jig pa'i/_/de kho na nyid rnam rtog [#]shing /_/rgyu yi nges par [#]rig nas ni/_/dge ba'i las ni rtsom par 'gyur/_/'bras bu
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]'bras bu can nyid dag_/nges pa'i khyad par can nyid kyi/_/sems gang yin pa'i dran pa sogs/_/kun la'ang gnod pa med pa yin/_/de la rgyu 'bras 'gyur ba [#]yi/_/ma rig [#]la sogs pas bcings 'dod/_/de dang bral zhing dri med pa'i/_/blo nyid thar [#]pa yin par 'dod/_/thams cad
[\[21b.2\]]skad cig pa nyid kyi/_/bcings dang grol ba rab grags pa/_/gzhi gcig pa nyid yin par ni/_/'jig rten pa la'ang [#]grub pa min/_/bdag la bye brag thams cad du/_/med phyir byed po zab pa [#]po/_/bcings sogs 'di 'dra la gnod kyi/_/gzhan du mi rtag pa nyid do/_/de kho na nyid
[\[21b.3\]]bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las las dang 'bras bu'i 'brel pa brtag pa ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//rdzas la sogs pa'i don drug [#]ni/_/dam pa'i don du yod pa'i phyir/_/rig [#]sogs dngos med nyid du ni/_/sngar bstan rigs pa ma yin zhes/_/rkang mig pa dang
[\[21b.4\]]gzegs zan pa/_/lung tsam pa ni smra byed pa'i/_/rdzas la sogs pa dgag pa 'di/_/mdor bsdus pa ni brjod par bya/_/sa la sogs pas phye ba yi/_/rdzas dgu tha dad par 'dod pa'i/_/sa la sogs pa grangs bzhi ni/_/rtag dang mi [#]rtag gis rnam gnyis/_/re zhig [#]sa sogs
[\[21b.5\]]bdag nyid kyis/_/gang 'dod pa yi rdul phran rnams/_/de rnams rtag pa'o de la sogs/_/rtsol ba gang yin de 'jig 'dod/_/de la rdul phran rnams rtag pa/_/yin par rig [#]pa ma yin te/_/dngos po ma lus pa yi yul/_/skad cig gis 'jig bsgrub [#]phyir ro/_/rtag tu gong bu
