[\[21b.6\]]ma lus pa/_/cig car skye ba kho nar 'gyur/_/de rnams phrad pa la sogs pa/_/ltos min bye brag med phyir ro/_/rdul phran skyed pa por 'dod pa/_/yod pa chos su rtogs [#]min te/_/don yod la dmigs tshad ma yi[#]/_/yul 'gyur [#]ma yin zhe na ni/_/gang gis thags mkhan
[\[21b.7\]]sogs mthong bas/_/rdul phran rgyu ni mi 'grub min/_/gang phyir snam bu sogs thams cad/_/rdul phran bdag nyid kho na'o/_/yod 'dzin tshad ma med tsam gyis/_/med pa grub pa [#]ma yin te/_/gang phyir tshad ma log pa ni/_/don med yin pa'i [#]nges pa med/_/de rnams
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]rtsom pa'i cha shas can/_/yon tan cha shas thams cad ldan/_/mthong ba min pa nyid kyis [#]na/_/des na tshad ma can grub min/_/shel gong nye bar bsgyur ba yi/_/bsgyur ba snang ba ma yin nam/_/chu skyar sogs pa'ang de gzugs su/_/'dzin pa nyid du'ang mthong min
[\[22a.2\]]nam/_/ral ga'i nang gi skyes bu la/_/de yi gzugs sogs mi shes kyang /_/skyes bur shes pa mthong ba dang /_/gos dmar blo yang yod ma yin/_/gzugs sogs ut+pal la sogs las/_/gcig tu tha dad pa yin te/_/des na de ni nag pa'i las/_/rta bzhin rnam par
[\[22a.3\]]gcod phyir ro/_/sa la sogs dang gzugs dri sogs/_/shin tu tha dad 'gyur ba ste/_/gcig dang snga ma'i tshig dbye bas/_/zla ba skar ma'i tha dad bzhin/_/byed pa [#]nus sogs tha dad par/_/snal ma snam bu tha dad bzhin/_/'gal ba'i chos dag sbyor bas na/_/ka ba
[\[22a.4\]]bum pa'i dngos bzhin no/_/gong bu'i don yod ma yin na/_/shing sogs mthong ba nyid mi 'gyur/_/de yi ngo bo las gzhan pa/_/gzhan gyi bdag nyid mthong min te/_/gzhan gyi rnam pa rig [#]pa'i blo/_/mi rigs shin tu thal 'gyur phyir/_/de bzhin dkar po la sogs par/_/_
[\[22a.5\]]rig pa yis [#]kyang srid par 'gyur/_/de phyir dung la ser sogs kyi/_/blo bzhin blo 'di 'khrul pa yin/_/ral ga [#]nang chud skyes pa [#]yi/_/shes pa de rjes dpag pa ste/_/de yi gtan tshigs su gyur la/_/ral ga [#]nyid ni mthong phyir ro/_/ska [#]dang gur kum sogs rnam [#]pas/_/gos kyi
[\[22a.6\]]gzugs ni gzhan thob cing /_/[#]gos rnams skad cig pa nyid pas/_/snga ma'i gzugs ni zhig pa yin/_/slar [#]yang chu sogs ltos bcas las/_/gzugs de nyid las dkar po yi/_/gzugs gzhan du yang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/lcags sogs sngon po sogs bzhin
[\[22a.7\]]du/_/gnas skabs de nyid kyi gzugs la/_/rang dngos rjes su 'jug phyir ro/_/drug pa'i tshig la sogs dbye ba/_/'dod pa tsam gyis 'byung ba ste/_/de phyir dngos rnams de nyid kyi/_/ngo bor rnam gnas rig ma yin/_/'di ltar drug po las gzhan pa'i/_/yod nyid tha dad
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]nyid mi 'dod/_/de rnams sde tshan gcig nyid do[#]/_gzhan yang khas blangs pa min no/_/yod pa shes pa'i tshad ma yin[#]/_/yul du de nyid 'dod pas na/_/drug po'i yod nyid yin zhe na/_/khyed la drug las gzhan thal 'gyur/_/de drug chos can du brjod de/_/chos ni de dag
[\[22b.2\]]las gzhan par/_/'dod pa nyid yin zhe na yang /_/de dang de yi 'brel 'dod gang /_/rdzas [#]sogs nges phyir phrad pa yang /_/mi rigs gzhan yang 'du ba yang /_/'brel pa gzhan ni khyod 'dod min/_/'brel pa mi 'thad de rnams kyi[#]/_/chos su ji ltar 'gyur ba yin/_/de las
[\[22b.3\]]byung tsam gyis she [#]na/_/gzhan yang de dang 'dra gyur la/_/de [#]yang yod pa nyid yin na/_/tha dad pa can gyis dbye ba/_/thob 'gyur de la'ang gzhan yin pas/_/mtha' med par ni thal bar 'gyur/_/chos gzhan la ni 'jug pa yis/_/der ni chos can nyid thob na/_/[#]de nyid kyi
[\[22b.4\]]phyir rdzas sogs nyid/_/chos can nyid du 'dod mi 'gyur/_/gal te snga rol snal ma las/_/snam bu tha dad sgrub byed na/_/sgrub par byed pa don med nyid/_/de bzhin bzlog par dka' ba yin/_/snal ma de rnams gnas skabs kyi/_/bye brag gzhan ni thob pa na/_/khyad par
[\[22b.5\]]can don byed nus pa/_/snga ma las gzhan mtshan nyid kyi/_/bya ba gcig nyid la mkho la/_/so sor shes pa po bstan na/_/mangs dang nus med 'bras med pa'i/_/skyon rnams bsal bar 'dod pa yi/_/tha snyad 'dogs pa po rnams kyis/_/gang dag ma lus pa rnams
[\[22b.6\]]la/_/tha snyad nyung ba'i bsam pa yi[#]/_/tshig gcig gis ni brjod pa yin/_/byed po nus pa tha dad la/_/yongs su gyur sogs chos ldan phyir/_/de rnams dus gcig nyid du ni/_/snam bu nyid du 'grub pa min[#]/_/rdul phran rnams ni phan tshun du/_/bstangs pas skye ba nyid
[\[22b.7\]]yin na/_/de rnams dbang po'i spyod yul nyid/_/min pas dbang po las 'das min/_/rdul phran sngo sogs rnam pa'i dngos/_/ngo bo nyid yin brtags pa min/_/sngon po sogs su snang ba yang /_/mig sogs shes pas rig pa yin/_/gal te 'ang de rnams shar nyid dang /_/_
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]gzhan nyid du 'byed mtshan nyid min/_/de lta'ang sbyar ba'i btung [#]ba bzhin/_/gnas la mngon sum gyis gnod min/_/dngos po 'di rnams thams cad nyid/_/kun las log pa'i rang bzhin du/_/mthong ba yin yang rang bzhin du/_/rnam pa thams cad nges pa min/_/brtags min dbang
[\[23a.2\]]rten rtogs bya ba [#]yang /_/cha shas don med rang mtshan nyid/_/gang las tha dad nges pa la/_/rgyu yod na ni de 'byung 'gyur/_/ji ltar mar me 'bar ba'i rgyun/_/'dra bar 'byung la gcig par 'khrul[#]/_/de bzhin phra ba du ma rnams/_/rgyun mi 'chad rnams blos gcig rtogs/_/dbye ba mi rtogs
[\[23a.3\]]de rnams la/_/mngon sum du 'dod min zhe na/_/mar me sogs de [#]ji ltar mthong /_/de bzhin cha shas can cis 'dod/_/'di rnams rdul du ma nges na/_/sngon po la sogs rnam [#]pa'o zhes/_/de lta bur yang rtogs bya bar/_/'di ni ji ltar 'gyur ba yin/_/gang phyir de la'ang
[\[23a.4\]]rgyu med de/_/shes pa de ni yul med min/_/gong bu yul gcig ma yin te/_/gcig dang gong bu nyid 'gal phyir/_/gong bu gcig dngos nyid yin na/_/sbrang ma'i rkang pa g.yogs tsam gyis/_/de dag thams cad g.yogs par ni/_/'gyur te dbye ba med phyir ro/_/cha gcig tu ni dmar ba yang /_/_
[\[23a.5\]]thams cad la 'gyur dmar po bzhin/_/'gal ba'i chos dag sbyor ba yang /_/sna tshogs nyid du thal bar 'gyur/_/gcig gi dngos nyid ma yin na/_/thams cad sgra 'dir ci zhig bya/_/de yang du ma'i yul yin na/_/yan lag can ni du ma yin/_/gos dang lus dang ri sogs
[\[23a.6\]]gang /_/'jig rten la grub ma yin nam/_/de nyid yan lag can nyid du/_/khyed cag gis ni smras pa yin/_/gos dmar kun du thams cad dang /_/lhag med de bzhin ma lus pa/_/de la thams cad rab sbyor [#]ba/_/'dod pa tsam gyis 'byung ba yin/_/de 'dra mngon par 'dod pa ni/_/_
[\[23a.7\]]kho bo cag kyang smra ba ste/_/gos kun dmar bor 'gyur sogs par[#]/_/smra la bar du gcod pa med/_/brtags nas de brjod yin zhe na/_/tshig gzhan du ni thal 'gyur zhing /_/gtso bo phal par 'dod dag gi_/tha dad blo yang yod ma yin/_/sbyor ba kun la khyab byed pa/_/'jug pa nyid
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]ni ma yin phyir/_/thams cad dmar por thal ba min/_/thams cad g.yogs par 'dod pa'ang min/_/rdzas ni cha shas med min nam/_/ci [#]phyir ma khyab par rnam gnas/_/rang dngos de ltar gnas na ni/_/de nyid kyi phyir tha dad grub/_/yul mang la gnas pa des na/_/gnas
[\[23b.2\]]gcig byed pa nyid ma yin/_/de phyir snam bu la sogs pa/_/du ma'i ngo bo nyid du grub/_/de nyid don ni mi shes pa'i/_/'jig rten gong bu gcig snyam sems/_/rnam rtog de la ltos nas ni/_/phra rab rdul zhes 'dir brjod pa'am/_/rgyu mtshan rnam rtog [#]min par yang /_/brda yi rjes
[\[23b.3\]]'gro ldan pa yi/_/dbul la'ang phyug po zhes brjod yin/_/'di ni [#]de 'dra'i ming du gnas/_/snal ma dang ni lag pa sogs/_/cha shas can gcig rjes 'jug min/_/dper na du ma nyid grub pa'i/_/re lde snam bu rtsig sogs bzhin/_/gal te'ang mngon par 'dod pa'i rdzas/_/gcig
[\[23b.4\]]phyir yan lag du ma la/_/rten min rdul bzhin 'jug par ni/_/mi rigs gnod can tshad ma'o/_/gcig 'jug gnas de'ang cha shas kyi/_/rten gzhan la ni 'jug pa ni[#]/_/dngos de nyid kyis sam gzhan gyis/_/rnam pa gzhan yod min pas so/_/de la 'di ni de nyid kyis/_/_
[\[23b.5\]]gzhan la 'jug par brtag min te/_/de dbang byas pa nyid kyis ni/_/gzhan du der 'jug yod ma yin/_/dper na khu 'jo ba'i ma ma/_/gzhan gyi dbang bya'i rten 'gyur min[#]/_/de bzhin gcig gis dbang byas pa'i/_/rdzas ni gzhan gyi rten byed min/_/gang phyir de 'brel rang
[\[23b.6\]]bzhin no/_/de min yul la'ang 'jug pas na/_/de ni yul gcig nyid thob bam/_/gcig bdag nyid 'gyur dbyer med phyir/_/gzhan nyid bdag nyid kyis 'jug na/_/rang bzhin tha dad pa yi dngos/_/tha dad bdag nyid nyid yin pas/_/gcig ni du mar gnas 'grub min/_/_
[\[23b.7\]]de de rnams [#]la 'du ba yi/_/bdag nyid kyis 'jug yin zhe na/_/skyo ba nyid kyis 'di 'gro ba[#]/_/de yang rnam par dpyad bya yin/_/gzhan yang bdag nyid thams cad kyis/_/'jug na du ma nyid thob 'gyur/_/phyogs gcig gis na tha [#]med 'gyur/_/de gcig min pa'am gang du [#]min/_/_
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]rang rgyud pa'ang thal 'gyur ba'i/_/bsgrub [#]pas gang zhig 'jug pa na/_/de ni rang nyid kyis mthong ba/_/yin na 'brel par 'gyur ba yin/_/ma lus pas sam phyogs gcig gis/_/'jug pa gang du'ang ma shes nyid/_/gang gi yod pa min phyir rdzas/_/med
[\[24a.2\]]pa'ang [#]gzhan du 'gyur ba'o/_/de ni la lar mthong ba na/_/rdzas la sogs pa gsal [#]ba bzhin/_/de bzhin der ni ma mthong na/_/tha dad par rgol mi rigs so/_/de dag tsam gyis 'jug pa nyid/_/med par brjod 'gyur zhe na'ang de/_/mi rigs 'di na 'di zhes pa'i/_/blo yis [#]mngon
[\[24a.3\]]sum gyis grub pa'i/_/de ni mngon sum 'dod min na/_/gnod pa can 'ga' brjod pa'i rigs/_/gzhan du gzugs sogs shes pa yang /_/mngon sum min pa nyid du 'gyur/_/'di la 'jug pa de med par/_/dbyer med tshul gyis sngar bstan zin/_/'di la zhes pa'i shes pa
[\[24a.4\]]med/_/de yi ngo bo mi snang phyir/_/ma lus pa dang phyogs gcig pa'i/_/sgra dang don 'di bshad mdzad pa'i/_/cha shas med 'di'i 'jug pa ci/_/de ni de las gzhan du'am/_/ji ltar snod [#]la sogs bzhag pa'i/_/dpal 'bras la sogs ji bzhin pa'am/_/stan ni du ma la
[\[24a.5\]]'jug pa'i/_/nag pa sogs mthong lta bu yin/_/bum pa mar me la sogs bzhin/_/'jig pa la sogs gtan tshigs kyis/_/sgra rnams 'ga' zhig la brten yin/_/de ni nam mkhar 'gyur ba yin/_/nyi sogs bya ba'i rdzas rnams las/_/tha dad pa yi rgyu mtshan ni/_/gzhan
[\[24a.6\]]na gzhan min sogs shes pa/_/ji ltar bum sogs shes bzhin no/_/skra dkar gnyer ma lus rtsub sogs/_/gyur la sogs pa'i shes phyir 'dir/_/gang las mtshan nyid mi 'dra rgyu/_/de ni dus zhes [#]bya bar 'dod/_/shar dang gzhan sogs blo rnams las/_/phyogs nyid
[\[24a.7\]]rjes su dpog pa yin/_/shes pa rim gyis skye ba las/_/yid kyang rjes su dpag par 'dod/_/gzugs la sogs pa'i shes pa ni/_/rim gyis skye phyir gzugs sogs las/_/gzhan pa'i rgyu la ltos pa ste/_/dpar na shing rta sogs bzhin no/_/zin sogs 'byung ba chen po rnams/_/_
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]rgyu nyid yin par khas len na/_/sgra rnams de rnams la brten par/_/'grub phyir snga ma sgrub byed min/_/kha cig [#]rtag par khyab byad pa/_/'du ba nyid du 'grub min te/_/'di rnams rjes 'gro ma tshang phyir/_/de bzhin rim [#]min sogs thob [#]'gyur/_/gzhan dang gzhan min sogs
[\[24b.2\]]shes pa'i/_/rgyu ni brda yi bye brag las/_/byung ba'i yid la byed pa [#]dag_/yin phyir dus dang phyogs de dag_/cha shas med gcig dngos yin phyir/_/gzhan dang gzhan sogs srid pa min/_/de dang 'brel ba can dbye bas/_/zhe na de dag 'bras med 'gyur/_/mig la sogs pa
[\[24b.3\]]la gzhan pa/_/drug po de ma thag 'byung ba'i/_/shes pa gang yin de yid du/_/kho bo cag kyang 'dod pa yin/_/yin nyid rtag na shes pa rnams/_/cig car ba nyid thob par 'gyur/_/des 'dir sngar smras gtan tshigs su/_/'dod pa rnam par
[\[24b.4\]]nyams byas [#]'gyur/_/sangs rgyas pa dang phyi rol pas/_/brtan [#]pa'i yid 'grub mi 'grub pa/_/gzhan gyis mdor smra A bcas dang /_/gzhan du yang ni bzlas nas so/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las rdzas kyi tshig gi don brtag pa ste bco lnga pa'o//_//_
[\[24b.5\]]rdzas rnams bkag pa de las ni/_/de bzhin rten [#]par 'dod pa yi/_/yon tan la sogs kun la nyid/_/med par 'gyur ba kho na'o/_/'brel pa can rnams [#]bkag pa na/_/'du ba'ang gang la gang zhig yin/_/de lta na yang bye brag tu/_/dgag pa 'di ni brjod par bya/_/sngon po la
[\[24b.6\]]sogs rags pa'i rdzas/_/gal te gcig pa nyid 'dod na/_/bu ga'i snang bas de gsal [#]bzhin/_/gsal ba ci phyir snang ba [#]min/_/yangs pa'i phyogs na gnas pa yi/_/sngon po la sogs mthong ba yang /_/gsal 'gyur min pa de yi tshe/_/de las de de tha dad 'gyur/_/de
[\[24b.7\]]min gzhan la blo log cing /_/glang po sogs las tha dad pa'i/_/grangs ni snang bar khyed 'dod de/_/shes las snang ba yod nyid min/_/'dod pas rab tu sbyar ba yi[#]/_/brda ni yid byed rjes 'gro ba/_/bum sogs gcig sogs rnam shes 'di/_/shes pa sogs bzhin
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]'jug pa ste/_/de rnams rdzas nyid min pa'i phyir/_/rnam 'byed rdzas ni gang zhig yid/_/ma 'khrul pa yi de nyid kyis/_/shes de brjod par [#]rigs min nyid/_/de ni rdzas dang 'brel pa las/_/gcig nyid yin dang don gcig la/_/'du phyir yon tan la sogs
[\[25a.2\]]la/_/rnam shes gcig tu 'dod ce [#]na/_/de ltar gcig pa'i shes pa nyid/_/yin yang gnyis sogs blo gang yin/_/tshig gi don drug sogs gang la/_/de rnams la ltos rgyu gang yin/_/don gcig la ni 'du sogs kyi/_/shes pa 'di ni med par 'gyur/_/des na 'di ni
[\[25a.3\]]'khrul 'gyur te/_/mi la me yi blo bzhin no/_/glang po la sogs shes de las/_/gzhan pa las byung dmag gi blo/_/mtshan nyid mi 'dra las sgrub [#]pa/_/snam bu sngo sogs blo bzhin no/_/'dod pas sbyar ba'i brda dang ni/_/yid la byed sogs thabs yin na/_/blo de 'dod yin
[\[25a.4\]]de nyid kyis[#]/_/blo la sogs pa'ang [#]grangs su 'gyur/_/gal te blo la ltos pa las/_/grangs 'grub par ni smra ba yang /_/brda la 'jug pa tsam gyis ni/_/blo de ci yi phyir mi 'dod/_/che dang ring sogs dbye ba yis[#]/_/bong tshod gang zhig rjod byed pa'i/_/don de'ang de bzhin min
[\[25a.5\]]dngos kyi/_/dbye ba nyid las cis [#]mi 'dod/_/khang bzangs [#]phreng ni ring po dang /_/chen por ji ltar snang ba yin/_/de la 'di 'dra'i [#]bong tshod kyi/_/ngo bor rtog pa ma yin no/_/don gcig la ni 'du ba yis/_/de ltar bstan pa yin zhe na/_/gang phyir phan tshun tha dad pa/_/so so bar brjod de'i
[\[25a.6\]]yan lag_/dang bral gzhan las gzhan de bzhin/_/gang dang phrad dang dbye ba yang /_/gzhan la rdzas [#]su nges pa dag[# ]/phrad sogs blo dag gi ni rgyud/_/brtag [#]pa de dag don med nyid/_/phrad pa yod pa ma yin na/_/sa bon chu dang zhing la sogs/_/rtag tu 'bras bu 'byin par ni/_/_
[\[25a.7\]]thal 'gyur bye brag med phyir ro/_/zhing dang sa bon chu sogs rnams/_/ltos dang bcas par shes byas te/_/rang 'bras rtag tu mi 'byin [#]phyir/_/'byin pa 'khor lo'i chu bzhin no/_/de rnams gang la ltos gyur pa'i/_/dngos po phrad pa yin par 'gyur/_/de ni bye brag dngos gyur phyir/_/_
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]tha dad nyid ces shes bya ste/_/phrad par [#]'dod pa gang dag dang /_/phrad la longs spyod pa zhes brjod/_/de las gzhan pa yongs spangs nas/_/de nyid longs spyod pa 'di'o/_/dngos 'di bar chad med pa'am/_/'di ni bar chad dang bcas zhes/_/'di 'dra'i blo yi dbye ba dag_/'di dag med gang
[\[25b.2\]]las 'dir rig_/gang 'dir bar chad bcas blo la/_/bar chad med pa'i blo nges dang /_/bar chad med la'ang gang gzhan pa/_/'di gnyis log pa'i shes pa ste/_/log pa'i shes pa thams cad nyid[#]/_/don gyi gtso bo'i rjes 'jug la/_/gtso bor 'dir ni brjod bya ba/_/brjod
[\[25b.3\]]pas de dag kyang 'grub 'gyur/_/gdub 'khor can zhes blo 'di yang /_/rgyu gang gis skye mi la ni/_/gdub 'khor yod pa'i phyir zhe na/_/de ni rtag tu thal bar 'gyur/_/gzhan du mthong ba yod pa la/_/gzhan du dgag pa nyid rigs kyi/_/phrad pa gang du'ang ma mthong ba/_/_
[\[25b.4\]]de go [#]ji ltar dgag tu rung /_/nag pa gdub 'khor med de bzhin/_/de phyir dngos rnams yod nyid yin/_/dgag dang sgrub sogs gang yin pa'i/_/rnam par dbye ba'i gnas yin zhes/_/smra la skad cig pa nyid kyis/_/chu sogs bye brag med pa ste/_/bar chad med pa sogs yod
[\[25b.5\]]kyang /_/gnas skabs gzhan la ltos bcas yin/_/gal te rgyu la sogs de rnams/_/phrad pa tsam la ltos bcas na/_/phrad pa thag nyid 'bras 'byung 'gyur/_/de min mthar yang 'byung mi 'gyur/_/bar chad med par 'byung ba las/_/gnas skabs bye brag thob pa la'ang /_
[\[25b.6\]]gang dag 'di longs spyod mthong ba'ang /_/dngos de dag kyang de bzhin 'grub/_/bar du chod kyang [#]gzhan nyid bar/_/skye ba'i rgyu las bar chad dang /_/bcas dang bar chad med shes pa/_/log pa'i shes pa thams cad kyang /_/chos mthun la ltos min par yang /_/'khrul rgyu nang [#]la
[\[25b.7\]]yod 'ga' zhig_/gzhan du 'gyur ba'i sems la ni/_/zla ba gnyis sogs blo bzhin no/_/bar chad med sogs las [#]byung ba/_/gtso bo [#]'dir ni yod na yang /_/gnas skabs bye brag las skyes pa/_/gdub 'khor can zhes pa blo 'di/_/nag pa dang ni gdub 'khor bzhin/_/phrad pa dang
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]ni 'dra ba yi/_/gnas skabs khyad par can las so/_/de 'drar mthong bzhin gzhan du min/_/phrad pa nyid du mthong min las/_/nag pa gdub 'khor med sogs pa'i/_/pha rol po yi 'dod pa las/_/phrad pa'i dngos po'i blo skye min/_/phrad pa'i blo
[\[26a.2\]]ni gang yin las/_/khang bzangs [#]sogs la phrad blo 'byung /_/yang na dngos po du ma nyid/_/yod la snal ma mang po la/_/sogs pa'i [#]yul can blo bzhin du/_/tha dad par [#]ni skye bar 'gyur/_/bya ba yang ni [#]ci rigs par/_/tshad ma gnyis kyi brjod bya ste/_/gcig ni du ma la [#]'jug
[\[26a.3\]]pa'ang /_/mi rigs gnod pa can yin no/_/pha rol pha rol min brjod sogs/_/rtog pa'i rgyu mtshan gang yin pa/_/pha rol nyid dang pha rol min/_/nyid yin phyogs dus de [#]rgyu min/_/dper na sngon po sogs dngos rnams/_/rim gyis 'byung dang gnas pa las/_/gzhan ma'i [# ]
[\[26a.4\]]rgyu mtshan gyis dben pa'ang /_/da ltar bstan cing gzhan de bzhin/_/grangs dang phrad pa la sogs kun/_/rdzas las tha dad min pa min/_/de ni rnam dpyod [#]byed nyid kyis/_/dbyig [#]pa sogs bzhin 'dod ce na/_/de rnams kun rdzob tu yod par/_/smra bas 'dod pa sgrub byed yin/_/gang
[\[26a.5\]]phyir kun rdzob tu yod par/_/de nyid gzhan nyid kyis brjod min/_/'on te brjod bya nyid min pa'i/_/tshogs la sogs pa 'gog byed pa/_/gang phyir nges pa'i chos nyid de/_/gzugs sgra dri ro sogs bzhin du[#]/_/de ni de kho na nyid du/_/dngos med nam mkha'i pad+ma bzhin/_/chos nges pa
[\[26a.6\]]nyid mi 'grub ste/_/de rnams rtog pas [#]sgro btags pa'o/_/gang phyir nam mkha'i pad sogs kyis/_/de skad smras nyid ma nges pa'o/_/tha dad min dang tha dad pa'ang /_/dngos po nyid la rnam par gnas/_/grangs sogs rdzas las tha dad pa/_/de ltar bsgrub bya yin zhe na/_/gzhi nyid
[\[26a.7\]]ma grub pa yi phyir/_/grangs sogs rnams ni mi 'grub po/_/bsdus pa sogs las tha dad pa'i/_/rdzas nyid de ltar brjod bya ba/_/rang dngos nyid las tha dad pa/_/rnam par nyams par sgrub par 'gyur/_/byas pa'i shugs ni rnam [#]gsum du/_/bstan te shugs su brjod pa dang /_
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]goms pa brjod dang gnas 'jig pa/_/'di dag ma lus mi 'thad de/_/dngos rnams skad cig pa yin phyir/_/byas pa gang yang yod min na[#]/_/byas pa'i shugs kyi bka' can la[#]/_/gang gi rgyu [#]ni rgyur 'gyur [#]yin/_/goms pa brjod par [#]byas pa'i shugs/_/sems kyi bag
[\[26b.2\]]chags bdag nyid rigs/_/bdag gi yon tan nyid de ni/_/mi rigs [#]de ni gsal [#]phyir ro/_/gnas su 'jog byed dngos nyid du/_/mi rigs skad cig gis [#]'jig phyir/_/gnas don 'byung ba nyid gyur las/_/de yi ngo bo nyid du gnas/_/rang gi rgyu [#]nyid las byung ba/_/skad cig gcig _
[\[26b.3\]]ni gnas pa rnams/_/snga ma snga ma'i nus mthu las/_/rgyun gyis rjes su 'jug pa yin/_/de ni gzhan du 'byung min pa/_/de phyir 'di yi 'jog byed gang /_/'di yi mthong ba'i rgyu nyid min/_/gzhan yang byas pa'i shugs su 'gyur/_/gos sogs skye ba 'di nyid la/_/'jog
[\[26b.4\]]byed yon tan du 'dod na/_/de bzhin byas shugs yon tan yang /_/thams cad du yang yod mi 'gyur/_/yid dang bdag tu sbyor ba dag_/gong du rgyas par bkag pa'i phyir/_/ma mthong ba la pha rol pos/_/smras pa mtshan nyid ldan mi rigs/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed
[\[26b.5\]]pa las yon tan gyi tshig gi don brtag pa ste bcu drug pa'o//_//dngos rnams skad cig gcig gi la/_/rdeg [#]pa la sogs las yod min/_/skye ba'i yul du zhen pa nyid/_/de las gzhan thob yod [#]ma yin/_/skye ba'i las ni gzhan pa'i dus/_/las kyi
[\[26b.6\]]dus shes pha rol smra/_/shin tu myur bar zhig 'dod pa/_/mar me la sogs dngos la yang /_/rgyab ma mdun pa'i [#]yul dag las/_/phral [#]dang phrad pa'i 'byung dag la/_/'gro ba can nam gzhan kun yang /_/las kyi gzhir ni rab brtags las/_/gar skyes nam du'ang skad
[\[26b.7\]]cig kyang /_/gnas min g.yo ba'i bdag nyid do/_/de ni rdul phran tsam gyis kyang /_/yul du 'pho ba yod ma yin/_/rtag pa'i dngos po thams cad ni/_/'gro la sogs par shin tu yang /_/bsgrub dka' gnas skabs thams cad du/_/'di la bye brag med nyid do/_/gal te
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]'gro bo sogs dngos de'i/_/dngos yin rtag tu 'gro sogs 'gyur/_/skad cig gcig kyang mi g.yo bar/_/gcig tu gnas pa ma yin no/_/gang du 'gro sogs med pa yang /_/'dis ni rtag tu thob 'gyur na/_/snga ma'i ngo bo mi 'dor [#]phyir/_/'gro sogs
[\[27a.2\]]rtsom pa'i dus bzhin no/_/'on te 'gro min sogs dngos po'i/_/dngos yin rtag tu 'gro mi 'gyur/_/skad cig gcig kyang 'gul bar ni/_/'gyur ba nyid ni ma yin no/_/gang phyir 'gro sogs yin na yang /_/mi g.yo'i bdag nyid phyir yin te/_/snga ma'i ngo bo mi 'dor phyir/_/g.yo
[\[27a.3\]]min ngo bo'i dus bzhin no/_/gal te 'gro min dus gcig tshe'ang /_/gzhan du yang ni 'gyur yin na/_/phan tshun 'gal ba'i bdag nyid dang /_/'dres pas tha dad nyid du 'gyur/_/de dag shin tu tha dad pa'i/_/bdag nyid du ni nges pa ste/_/'gal ba'i chos dag 'dre ba'i phyir/_/g.yo
[\[27a.4\]]dang mi g.yo'i dngos bzhin no/_/mthong ba nyid du mngon 'dod pa'i/_/las ni dngos po las gzhan min/_/'di ni mthong ba nyid kyang min/_/rigs pa'i rjes 'brangs yod ma yin/_/mi brtan [#]nyid dang brtan nyid dang [#]/_/de lta'i 'gro sogs rnams [#]yod min/_/thob dang gzhan
[\[27a.5\]]pa'i yul dag las/_/byed dang phrad pa'i rigs ma yin/_/rgyun mi 'chad par skye ba yin/_/'dra ba dang [#]gzhan dngos rnams kyi/_/yul gzhan nye bar thob pa la/_/'gro bar 'khrul yin sgron ma yin/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las las kyi tshig gi don brtag pa ste [# ]
[\[27a.6\]]bcu bdun pa'o//_//rdzas la sogs pa bkag pa ni/_/rigs rnams kyang ni gsal [#]ba yin/_/de dag thams cad tshig gi don/_/gsum la gnas par kun du brtags/_/de la rigs 'di rnam gnyis su/_/pha rol pos ni khas blangs pa/_/ma lus
[\[27a.7\]]pa la rjes 'jug pas[#]/_/yod par brjod pa spyi nyid dang /_/bye brag yod par mngon brjod pa'i/_/rdzas la sogs pa'i spyi nyid de/_/rang gnas rnams su rjes 'jug pa'i/_/sems kyi rgyur gyur dngos las so/_/rigs mi mthun pa thams cad dang /_/rang gi gnas kyi bye brag
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]las/_/log pa'i blo yi rgyu nyid de/_/de rnams de ltar gnas pa nyid/_/bye brag nyid ni kha cig gi_/log pa nyid kyi [#]rgyu rnams te/_/rtag pa'i rdzas su gang gnas rnams/_/bye brag ces ni brjod pa yin/_/gang gi stobs kyis [#]rdul phran las/_/sogs las [#]rnal 'byor pa'i [#]blo
[\[27b.2\]]'byung /_/'di ni de dang mtshan nyid ni/_/mi 'dra bar ni so sor gnas/_/yod nyid ba lang [#]nyid sogs rigs/_/mngon sum gyis kyang rab grub ste/_/dbang po'i bya ba yod pa la/_/yod sogs shes pa 'byung phyir ro/_/rjes su dpag pa'i stobs kyis kyang /_/'di dag yod par shes
[\[27b.3\]]bya ste/_/shes pa'i bye brag gang zhig [#]gis/_/rgyu mtshan gzhan las byung ba'o/_/ba lang glang po sogs rnams la/_/glang sogs sgra dang shes bye brag_/brda dang dbyibs dang ril po sogs/_/tha dad don gyi rgyu mtshan no/_/ba lang la sogs yul nyid la'ang /_/de yi sgra blo yod pa
[\[27b.4\]]las/_/gzhan phyir dper na de nyid la'ang /_/lcags kyu be'u bcas blo sgra bzhin/_/ri bong rwa sogs rnam shes kyis/_/bye brag la ni rnam 'phrul phyir/_/de yi ngo bo brjod rnams kyang /_/chos mi mthun par lta bar byed/_/ba lang sogs rjes 'jug shes pa'ang /_/ril po las
[\[27b.5\]]gzhan par skye ste/_/bye brag ldan phyir sngon po las/_/sogs pa'i shes pa lta bu'o/_/ba lang nyid ni ba lang las/_/don gzhan tha dad blo yul phyir/_/de bzhin gzugs dang reg sogs bzhin/_/brjod pa nag pa'i rta bzhin no/_/de kun snying po med pa ste/_/gzhung lugs
[\[27b.6\]]tsam du smra ba rnams/_/'di las shes byed tshad ma ni/_/cung zad tsam yang ma mthong ngo /_/dbang po'i [#]bya ba yod pa yi/_/rjes byung yod sogs shes pa ni/_/'grub pa min te de rnams ni/_/brdal 'jug pa nyid phyir ro/_/dper na sna tshogs pa yi nad[#]/_/bsal na skyu ru ra [#]shing
[\[27b.7\]]sogs/_/re re 'am ni sbyar ba'ang rung /_/nus pa sna tshogs nyid du'ang rigs/_/de rnams la ni spyi zhes pa'i/_/nus ldan cung zad yod ma yin/_/yun ring myur ba'i dbye ba yis/_/nad rnams zhi bar thar phyir ro/_/zhing sogs dbye bas 'ga' zhig la'ang /_/_
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]gcig gi ngo bo la rtag pa'i/_/khyad par can spyi yod spyi yi/_/skyu ru ra'i shing sogs de yod/_/de ltar shin tu tha dad kyang /_/kha cig nus pa nges pa yis/_/mtshungs par bsre ba la sogs pa'i/_/rgyu nyid thob kyi gzhan du
[\[28a.2\]]min/_/bya ba tsam la mkho ba yi/_/brjod par 'dod pa'i sgra de yang /_/brda ru byas pa de la'am/_/yang na ci 'dod gzhan yang ngo /_/dag la dang bzho sogs ngo bo yi/_/bya ba'i dbye ba la mkho ba/_/ba lang sogs sgra'i brda ru ni/_/tha snyad 'dogs pa po rnams byed/_/de brda yin
[\[28a.3\]]par [#]byed pa la/_/yod pa la sogs pa 'di ni/_/skye bar yang ni shes bya yi/_/dbang po'i bya ba'i rjes thogs min/_/rtog med rnam pa'i shes pa nyid/_/dang po nyid du skye 'gyur zhing /_/de nas brda rnams yid byed la/_/de las de dran de rnams las/_/gzhan du son ba'i sems
[\[28a.4\]]la ni/_/dang [#]po'i gtan tshigs kyang 'bras med/_/phyogs de phyi rol la min te/_/bsgrub byas stong par ston pa yin/_/dngos su de yi rgyu min te/_/phyi yi lcags kyu be'u sogs [#]bzhin/_/rang gi mtshan nyid 'di la ni/_/brjod [#]dang rnam rtog 'jug yod min/_/gang gis rang
[\[28a.5\]]gi mtshan nyid ni/_/ngag kun spyod yul las 'das dngos/_/nang tsam la ni brten nas 'di/_/kun rdzob nyid du dmigs byed de/_/lcags kyu la sogs phyi dngos por/_/nges pas 'jug par 'gyur ba yin/_/las dang yon tan tha snyad dag_/med pa rgyur ni gang smras
[\[28a.6\]]pa/_/med pa'i shes pas [#]bye brag ni/_/de yang mi rigs nus pa yis[#]/_/rgyu nyid las ni dngos po nyid/_/gzhan yang yod sogs bye brag dag_/med las med pa'i shes pa thob/_/ril las tha dad blo yin pas/_/shes pa de dag rnams dang ni/_/mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba mi
[\[28a.7\]]'grub/_/des ni gtan tshigs mi 'grub 'gyur/_/gang phyir rjes 'jug ldan shes pas/_/sgra dang gsal bar snang bcas la/_/mdog dbyibs yi ge'i rnam pa yis/_/stong pa rigs yin zhes smras [#]byed/_/spyi yang sngon po la sogs pa'i/_/dngos nyid yin na yon tan
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]dang /_/'di la dbye ba ci zhig yod/_/sngon po sogs la gcig nyid ni/_/rjes 'jug par yang snang ba yin/_/snang bzhin yin yang 'di yi ni/_/dbye ba shes 'gyur min zhe na/_/de yi stobs kyis de dag ni/_/sgra blo ji bzhin gsal 'jug 'gyur/_/spyi yi shes pa pha rol po/_/nges
[\[28b.2\]]pa'i bdag nyid nges [#]'dod pa/_/nges pa med par mi rigs te/_/mi 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur/_/rgyu mtshan gzhan nyid las 'grub [#]kyang /_/rjes 'jug gcig pu mi brten [#]las/_/tha dad spyi ni mi 'grub ste/_/rim gyis 'byung ba nyid phyir ro/_/tshig gi don sgra drug po yis/_/bdag
[\[28b.3\]]nyid rgyu gzhan la ltos pa/_/gang yang yod pa sogs rjes 'jug_/yod pa shes pa'i shes pa'o/_/chos can rgyu mtshan yin zhe na/_/de la'ang yod pa'i blo yod pas/_/chos gzhan de yi rgyu nyid de/_/thug med chos can nyid kyang thob[#]/_/de phyir 'di rnams kyis gtan tshigs/_/_
[\[28b.4\]]'di ni 'khrul par mthong ba ste/_/nye bar sbyor ba thams cad la/_/khyab par 'di ni sgrub pa min/_/de yi 'og tu nyer bstan pa/_/'di nyid kyis ni gsal [#]ba yin/_/thun mong du sgrub de la ni/_/'dod pa 'grub pa [#]sogs par mtshungs/_/'tshed pa po la sogs pa yang /_/rjes 'jug
[\[28b.5\]]can gcig [#]min na yang /_/shes pa bye brag can skye zhing /_/med la med pa'i blo yang ngo /_/'dod pas sbyar ba'i ngo bo dang /_/zhig dang ma skyes pa rnams la/_/ji skad bstan pa de kun gyis/_/gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid do/_/'tshed pa po sogs blo rnams kyis/_/rgyu mtshan cung zad
[\[28b.6\]]yod ma yin/_/las yod ce [#]na de bzhin du/_/gsal [#]ba so sos [#]phye min nam/_/phye la rjes 'jug can gyi [#]blo/_/rjes 'jug yod par rigs ma yin/_/de phyir gcig tu 'dod pa'i phyir/_/gsal ba kun rjes 'jug ldan 'gyur/_/rjes 'jug gis phongs las la ni/_/gal te rgyur
[\[28b.7\]]rtog de ltar [#]na/_/gsal ba rnams ni de nyid la/_/ci phyir rgyu nyid du ni 'dod/_/las rnams dang ni bral ba der/_/'tshed po sogs blo med gyur [#]te/_/rigs bzhi las ni dus kun du/_/gnas par pha rol po 'dod min/_/'das dang ma 'ongs las ni de'i/_/rgyu mtshan can du byas she
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]na/_/'tshed pa po sogs blo sgra yi/_/rgyu de ma yin med pas so/_/gal te las nyid kyi rigs dang /_/'brel pa'i las dang sbyor ba'i blo/_/de ni zhig pa'i las la yang /_/nges pa'i rgyu ni mtshon phyir ro/_/'das pa'i las ni de yi tshe/_/mtshon du zin
[\[29a.2\]]yang yod pa dang /_/gzung bya min te rigs kyi ni/_/rang rten ldog [#]pa nges pas so/_/dbyig pa gdub 'khor sogs rigs rnams/_/lan cig dmigs la de dang ni/_/bral yang dbyig pa la sogs blo/_/de rnams la ni 'jug pa min/_/'on te'ang 'tshed pa po la sogs/_/_
[\[29a.3\]]rigs gzhan du ni smra byed na/_/skyes ma thag la'ang [#]de sbyor bas/_/'tshed pa po [#]sogs blo ru 'gyur/_/de tshe yod sogs blo bzhin du/_/'du ba can rnams med ce na/_/phyis kyang de la de bzhin du/_/'gyur te bye brag med phyir ro/_/de dang 'brel [#]ba'i rang bzhin no/_/yon tan
[\[29a.4\]]ldan min de dag la/_/'du ba 'di ni de ltar [#]na/_/phyis de'i bdag nyid ji ltar 'gyur/_/gal te gsal ba mi rtag pas/_/khyad par can gyur de lta na'ang /_/rigs kyi yon tan mi ldan pa'i/_/ngo bo nam yang 'dod mi 'gyur/_/'tshed pa la sogs bya ba las[#]/_/gtso bo sgrub par 'dod
[\[29a.5\]]pa yis[#]/_/'tshed pa po sogs zhes pa de'i/_/gtso bo'i 'tshed po gzhan yod min/_/gtso bo zhes bya 'di ci zhig_/rjes 'jug min phyir nus pa min/_/rdzas dang las dang yon tan sogs/_/bdag nyid nyid du de rtag min/_/de dang rigs mi 'dra ba las/_/log pa'i ngo bor nges pa
[\[29a.6\]]tsam/_/brda yi bye brag la ltos pa/_/me la sogs pa'i blo yin no/_/brda nyid ji lta ba nyid de/_/de phyir gcig nyid rjes 'jug pa/_/med kyang sgra dang blo nyid kyi/_/dbye ba yis ni 'jug pa yin/_/de lta na yang med rnams la/_/med pa'i blo dang sgra dag kyang /_/rjes 'jug 'gal min
[\[29a.7\]]de dag gi_/don med brda rjes 'jug phyir ro/_/bum pa snga na med 'di'o zhes/_/de phyir dngos po'i bye brag can/_/nyid kyi mig blor shes bya ste/_/bye brag la brten spyi dbang gis/_/de ni kun du rjes 'jug nyid/_/ce na de lta min mtshan nyid/_/min 'dra de min la brten phyir/_/bum pa zhes
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]bya la sogs blo/_/de rnams rjes 'jug par rigs kyi/_/med pa'o med pa'o snyam blo 'di/_/mtshan nyid mi 'dra'i phyir yin no/_/yod pa'i dbang gis [#]ba lang dang /_/rta yi blo byar 'dod min gyi/_/thams cad spyi ni yin bsgrub phyir/_/gcig nyid gzhan du brtag pa'o/_/gang rnams
[\[29b.2\]]dmag sogs blo rnams kyi/_/rgyur ni grags la sogs 'dod pa'i/_/rjes mthun par 'dod min zhe na/_/gal te de ltar yin na ni/_/'dod pas sbyar ba'i brda dbye ba/_/yid la byed pas rjes 'jug pa'i/_/blo dbye ba ni cis mi 'dod/_/bye brag shes na brdar byed pa'i/_/'dod pa de
[\[29b.3\]]las byung ba yin/_/de byas pa las de thos pa'ang /_/yid byed de las de blo 'di/_/rjes su 'gro ldog dag gis ni/_/de nyid kyi ni blo 'di yi/_/rgyu yi nges pa'i nges pa grub/_/gzhan 'dod thug pa med par 'gyur/_/rjes su mthun pa dang 'dra bar[#]/_/'gyur na don gzhan du rtog na/_/_
[\[29b.4\]]mtshan nyid mi 'dra can blo rnams/_/'di nyid la brten pa ni mchog_/'di la nus pa nges par ni/_/ldog pa rjes su 'gro ldog gi_/nus pa shes pa rnams la ni/_/rtog na de yang mchog yin no/_/spyi rnams la yang rjes 'gro bar/_/byed pa dag ni yod min te/_/rtag rnams rtag tu yod
[\[29b.5\]]ba'i phyir/_/ldog pa nyid ni mi srid do/_/rdzas sogs min pa'i blo rnams ni/_/yon tan nyid sogs rigs pa min/_/du ma rnams ni 'du ba yang /_/grangs la sogs pa'ang yod 'gyur te/_/de rnams la yang [#]spyi bzhin du/_/spyi zhes bya ba'i blo ru 'gyur/_/bum pa nyid sogs
[\[29b.6\]]pa'i spyi yang /_/bum sogs nyid la 'jug gyur [#]gyi/_/med rnams la 'di 'jug min phyir/_/de rnams blo ni ji lta bur[#]/_/rten gzhan la brten phyir gzhan du/_/blo dang sgra dang rigs min te/_/glang po sogs bzhin rta sogs la'o/_/'dir ni don gcig la brten min/_/dro dang grang
[\[29b.7\]]dang lci ba yang /_/don gcig la brten blor 'gyur gyi/_/'di la 'di yang don med nyid/_/med pa gang du'ang gnas pa min/_/bye brag bye brag can nyid kyi/_/'brel pa 'di la yod ce na/_/'di la 'brel pa gzhan yod par/_/rtog par byed pa ma yin nam/_/de dag sbyor ba la brten nas/_/_
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]bye brag bye brag can rtog na/_/de med rgyu mtshan med pa nyid/_/de ni grub pa ma yin no/_/bum pa'i snga na med pa zhes/_/bya ba la sogs tshig [#]'di yang /_/rtog pa can gyis sprul pa ste/_/brtags pa'i dpa' bo nyid sogs bzhin/_/bye brag bye brag can nyid 'di/_/_
[\[30a.2\]]gang yin dngos po la brten te/_/'brel pa gzhan zhig yod par ni/_/de la [#]nges par brtag par bya/_/de la med pa med pa zhes/_/'dir ni shes pa tsam brjod pa/_/bye brag la gnas spyi yin te/_/rang gi rten rnams la gnas pa'o/_/de rnams rjes 'jug 'dod min gyi/_/gal te
[\[30a.3\]]gzhan yod 'dod min na/_/tshig gi don las tha dad pas/_/med pa'i blo ni skye ba yin/_/'dod pas sbyar ba'i gzugs sogs pa'i/_/don la rigs ni yod min te/_/gsal ba med pa nyid kyi phyir/_/de ni 'khrul pa nyid du bstan/_/'das pa dang ni ma byung ba'i/_/rtag pa'i spyi yi
[\[30a.4\]]yul can gyis[#]/_/shes yod ce na 'di ni byin/_/'ba' zhig mi 'dzin ma yin nam/_/'ba' zhig dmigs pa yin na ni/_/gsal ba rnams kyir 'dir mi 'gyur/_/spyi yi gsal byed de min te/_/gangs can 'bigs byed nyid bzhin no/_/'di ni de rnams bskyed pa la/_/gzhan
[\[30a.5\]]dbang yin pas 'brel pa med/_/rtag phyir gcig pu 'dzin pa'i phyir/_/shes pa gzhan dbang nyid kyang min/_/rang rten dbang [#]por sbyor ba las[#]/_/sogs la ltos pa med phyir ro/_/yod pa rtag tu dmigs nyid dam/_/yang na nam yang ma yin te/_/rang gi bdag nyid shes bskyed par/_/_
[\[30a.6\]]rung ba'am yang na mi rung nyid/_/gal te lan cig de lta'i dngos/_/yin na rtag tu de nyid 'gyur/_/de ni rung ba'am mi rung ba'i/_/ngo bor rang bzhin gyis gang gnas/_/de rnams [#]rtag phyir g.yo min te/_/'jug [#]par 'gyur ba gang zhig yin/_/ba lang nyid ni ba lang las/_/don gzhan
[\[30a.7\]]tha dang blo yul phyir/_/de ni gzugs dang reg sogs bzhin/_/brjod pa nag pa'i rta bzhin no/_/zhes 'dir 'khrul pa smra ba ste/_/'tshed pa po nyid sogs de bzhin/_/'di yi [#]tshul gyis gzhan la yang /_/dman pa'i gtan tshigs sun kun ston[#]/_/gzhan yang spyi ni du ma la/_/'jug
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]pa nyid du gang smras pa/_/de la 'jug par 'dod 'di ci/_/gnas pa'am 'on te gsal ba nyid/_/re zhig rang dngos mi nyams pa/_/'di gnas pa yi dngos yin na/_/rten ni de byed nus min na/_/gang gis 'jog [#]pa po nyid 'gyur/_/de ni ba d+hi rang sogs bzhin/_/'gro ba'i bgegs
[\[30b.2\]]kyang yod min te/_/bya ba med pa nyid kyis na/_/de phyir gzhir ni brtag pa min/_/de ni 'du bar gnas she na/_/de ltar rnam par dpyad min te/_/des na tha dad mi grub rnams/_/rten dang rten can bdag nyid 'dod/_/'bras sogs rnams kyi [#]'gro ba la/_/gegs byed pas ni gzhir gyur na/_/_
[\[30b.3\]]'gro ba smin pa'i spyi rnams la/_/rang gi shes pa skyed [#]rung nyid/_/yin na gsal ba'i rgyu ci yin/_/gal te nus med 'di nus dang /_/ldan par gsal byed kyis byed na/_/'byung ba mi brtan 'gyur nyid de/_/mar me gsal bya bum sogs bzhin/_/bum sogs rigs kyi bye brag kyang /_/_
[\[30b.4\]]rang gnas rnams nyid la yin na/_/thams cad la gnas rten du yang /_/'gyur te dam pa'i rigs bzhin no/_/de la yul gzhan nyid du yang /_/dngos po 'byung ba de la ni/_/de rnams ji ltar mthong ba 'am/_/gnas pa'i rten yin mi shes so/_/de dang lhan cig skye ba min/_/de rnams
[\[30b.5\]]rtag phyir de la sngar/_/gnas min khyab pa min pas so/_/gzhan nas 'ongs min byas med phyir/_/rang gnas dbang por sbyor la sogs/_/de ni gcig pa 'dzin pa na[#]/_/thams cad du yang dmigs 'gyur te/_/de yi rang dngos mi 'dor phyir/_/rtogs las tha dad min zhe na/_/de
[\[30b.6\]]yang 'dzin par byed 'gyur ba'am/_/de bzhin de nyid mi 'dzin par/_/'gyur ba'am tha dad nyid du 'gyur/_/pha rol pos btags [#]rigs dag la/_/shing sogs shes pa 'di mi 'byung /_/rim nyid dang rjes 'jug sogs phyir/_/dper na 'tshed po sogs blo bzhin/_/rtag pa skyed pa po min pa/_/_
[\[30b.7\]]gnod pa can du shes bya zhing /_/gong du phrad pa sun dbyung bar/_/brtan pa'ang gnod pa [#]can yin no/_/de ltar rigs 'di tha dad pa/_/gcig tu gsal ba byas pa yin/_/rgyal dpog sogs pas smras pa yang [#]/_/yod smra rtag par brtags par 'gyur[#]/_/gang yang bye brag ces bya ba/_/_
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]mthar dbyung bar brtags de dag ni/_/rtag pa'i rdzas ni bsal ba yi[#]/_/de yang mi srid mtshan nyid yin/_/rdul phran mkha' dang phyogs sogs rnams/_/gal te ma 'dres par gnas na/_/de phyir rang gi ngo bos te/_/mtshan nyid mi 'dra nye bar mtshon/_/_
[\[31a.2\]]gal te'ang de rnams bdag nyid gzhan/_/'dres par gyur pa yin na yang /_/gzhan yod na yang mi 'dra ba'i/_/mtshan nyid ma 'khrul mtshon min na/_/ji ltar bye brag 'di rnams kyi/_/mtshan nyid mi 'dra mtshon pa yin/_/rang nyid kho na [#]yin zhe na/_/rdul phran sogs la ci mi 'dod/_/_
[\[31a.3\]]ji ltar khyi sha la sogs pa/_/rang nyid kho nas mi gtsang gnas/_/de dang 'brel pas gzhan rnams kyang /_/de bzhin gal te 'dir 'dod na/_/ji ltar mar me bum [#]sogs 'di/_/gsal byed yin bzhin 'di yang ni[#]/_/de gsal byed pa'i bdag nyid du/_/nges par gnas bzhin
[\[31a.4\]]'di de bzhin/_/mi gtsang dngos 'di kun rdzob pa/_/yin gyi de nyid don min na/_/de nyid kyang ni gzhan du'ang ste/_/'di ni ji ltar 'gyur ba yin/_/'on te 'gyur ba nyid yin yang /_/rang gi sha sogs dbang gis 'di/_/rtag pa skye ba med pa'i phyir/_/mi gtsang dngos po 'thob pa
[\[31a.5\]]min/_/sgron ma la sogs pa yi mthus/_/skad cig pa yi don bum pa/_/rgyan la sogs pa'i shes pa rnams/_/skyed byed dngos po thob 'gyur gyi/_/rtsod pa'i gnas gyur bye brag gi_/stobs kyis [#]mtshan nyid mi 'dra'i blo/_/de rnams dag ni 'byung min te/_/rim gyis 'byung
[\[31a.6\]]phyir bde sogs bzhin/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las spyi dang bye brag gi tshig gi don brtag pa ste bco brgyad [#]pa'o//_//snal ma 'di rnams la snam bu/_/smyig tshal 'di rnams la re lde/_/zhes sogs 'di yi blo 'byung bas/_/'du ba rtogs [#]par bya ba yin/_/_
[\[31a.7\]]de med blo 'di'i rgyu mtshan du/_/'gyur ba yang ni ci zhig yin/_/rgyu mtshan gzhan ni med pa na/_/bye brag blo ni mthong ma yin/_/[#]bye brag 'di yi blo las kyang /_/sbyor ba bzhin du tha dad min/_/'byung ba bzhin du thams cad la/_/'di ni gcig pa nyid ces bya/_/rtag pa de nyid
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]'byung ba bzhin/_/rgyu mtshan mi dmigs pa yang ni/_/'di la rgyu ni cung zad kyang /_/tshad mas nye bar dmigs pa min/_/de ltar de yi shes pa yang /_/rang gi grub mtha'i rjes 'brangs nas/_/pha rol po rnams 'jug byed kyi/_/'jig rten pa la'ang [#]de ma mthong /_/rten dang brten par
[\[31b.2\]]gyur ba dag/_/sna tshogs pa nyid mtshan nyid 'gyur/_/kuN+Di [#]sogs gnas dpal 'bras bzhin/_'di la 'di zhes pa blo yi/_/de bzhin gang gi de rnams la/_/'di la de yi blo 'byung ba/_/snal ma snam bu sogs rnams la/_/sna tshogs nyid mtshon yod ma yin/_/dngos po rnams la
[\[31b.3\]]rang 'dod kyi/_/sbyor bas 'di 'o zhes rtogs pa/_/'di ni rgyu la [#]mngon sbyor ba/_/pha rol po smra de mi 'thad/_/shing las yal ga 'gro min la/_/brag ces 'jig rten pa blo 'byung /_/mi 'gror brjod las lhag yan lag_/bar mtshams med par mthong ba'i phyir/_/de dag la yang 'di
[\[31b.4\]]yi blo/_/'jig rten dang 'gal smras pa [#]yin/_/bum pa'i gzugs dang sgra la sogs/_/de yi bdag nyid du shes bya/_/gzugs dang bum sogs gnas skabs kun/_/sgra yi brjod pa [#]nyid yin te/_/de yi bye brag brjod pa'i phyir/_/de rnams de bzhin 'jug pa yin/_/de la brten
[\[31b.5\]]pa'i blo 'di rnams/_/de rnams rnam pas 'jug pa ste/_/'du bas ma yin tha dad pa/_/kun kyang mthong ba min phyir ro/_/gal te dngos po thams cad la/_/dngos po gcig gyur yod gyur na/_/'jim gong sogs la'ang snam bu [#]la/_/sogs pa'i shes pa'ang thal bar 'gyur/_/glang
[\[31b.6\]]po sogs la 'ang ba lang nyid/_/la sogs yod par thal 'gyur te/_/des na ba lang sogs gzugs nyid/_/'di 'gyur ba lang [#]khra bo bzhin/_/snal ma rnams la snam bu des/_/yod par 'du ba las shes na/_/'jim gong rnams la de bzhin du/_/de yod ces par cis mi shes/_/_
[\[31b.7\]]'jim gong la de brten pa min/_/zhe [#]na 'du bas snal ma yang /_/brten par [#]'dod pa ma yin nam/_/'jim gong la de ci phyir min/_/'du bas snal ma la snam bu/_/zhes byar sgrub par byed na de/_/'jim gong rnams la bum pa yi/_/blo de rgyu mtshan med par 'gyur/_/de ltar
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]glang po sogs gang la/_/'du bas glang po nyid sogs yin/_/de nyid rang gnas la rigs kyi/_/dbye bas ba lang nyid sogs 'gyur/_/de ni gcig nyid du yod kyi/_/rten dang brten par dbye ba yis/_/rdzas rnams la ni de rigs nyid/_/las rnams la yang
[\[32a.2\]]las nyid de/_/'du las byung 'di las [#]zhes pa'i/_/shes pa rjes 'gror bstan pa'i phyir/_/thams cad la yang 'du ba nyid[#]/_/gcig pu [#]kho na yin zhes bya/_/rdzas nyid la sogs rgyu mtshan rnams/_/tha dad par ni bstan pa'i phyir/_/rdzas sogs rigs kyi blo rnams kyi/_/nges pa nyid du
[\[32a.3\]]nges pa yin/_/rten dang brten pa'i nges pa yis/_/dper na snod dang zho dag kyang /_/'brel pa gcig tu'ang snang ba yin/_/de bzhin 'di la'ang nges par 'dod/_/'du ba gcig pu yin na yang /_/gsal bya gsal byed nus pa yang /_/dbye bas rdzas sogs rigs rnams la/_/de ni 'gal
[\[32a.4\]]ba min zhe na/_/gcig nyid rten dang brten par ni/_/nges par bsgrub dka' ma yin nam/_/'du ba las ni rdzas nyid du/_/rdzas rnams kho na 'dod pa yi[#]/_/'du ba de ni yon tan la/_/sogs la'ang yod par ji ltar 'gyur/_/yon tan rdzas sogs de dag gi/_/'brel pa [#]'di ni gcig nyid dam/_/_
[\[32a.5\]]gzhan du 'di ni yon tan dang /_/rigs sogs tha dad nyid du 'gyur/_/gsal ba so so'i [#]sbyor dbye bas/_/sbyor ba ji bzhin tha dad 'gyur/_/rdzas nyid la [#]sogs rgyu rnams dang /_/tha dad par ni mi rigs te/_/rgyu mtshan yod na blo yin la/_/de phyir de yi nges pa'ang min/_/der brten pa nyid sogs
[\[32a.6\]]pa nyid/_/'du ba las yin de nyid la[#]/_/nges pa can [#]du rigs ma yin/_/gsal bya gsal byed nus pa yi/_/dbye ba'i 'du ba las yin pa'ang [#]/_/gzhan min pa de rtag pa rnams/_/skyed par byed pa rigs pa min/_/mar me la sogs yod pa las/_/skyes pa'i bum sogs 'di rnams kyis[#]/_/_
[\[32a.7\]]shes pa ji ltar skyed rung ba/_/de bzhin rigs la sogs pa min/_/kuN+Di dang zho [#]phrad pa yi/_/gcig tu gong du bsal [#]ba yin/_/de yi phyir yang nges pa 'di/_/mi rigs shin tu thal 'gyur phyir/_/'di ni rtag pa nyid yin na/_/bum sogs kun kyang rtag 'gyur te/_/'du ba'i dbang gis
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]de rnams kyi[#]/_/rang rten la rtag gnas phyir ro/_/rang gi rtsom byed bye ba'am/_/yang na de zhig pa las sam/_/phrad pa sogs las bya ba yang /_/de rnams zhig pa yin zhe na/_/de lta min te de rnams kyang /_/rang rten la rtag 'dur 'dod ba'am/_/de rnams rnam par 'jig 'gyur na/_/_
[\[32b.2\]]'di la nges par 'jig par 'gyur/_/'brel pa can ni 'jug min na/_/'brel pa yod par bsgrub par 'dogs/_/phrad pa med na'ang sbyor ba ni/_/rnam par gnas pa ma yin te/_/dper na sbyor ba yod gyur na/_/phrad pa rnam par gnas pa bzhin/_/de bzhin 'du ba yod pa na/_/'du
[\[32b.3\]]ba can rnams gnas pa yin/_/'brel pa can gcig zhig na yang /_/'brel pa can gzhan yod pa las/_/'du ba rnam par gnas yin gyi/_/sbyor min tha dad phyir zhe na/_/gal te de ltar bum pa sogs/_/'du ba can rnams zhig na yang /_/de rnams gnas pa'i bdag nyid gang /_/_
[\[32b.4\]]de ni rtog pa de dang ni/_/de phyir 'brel pa can gzhan la/_/brten [#]pas rnam par gnas pa 'am/_/'on te phrad pa'am bye ba ni/_/'du ba bzhin du gzhan nyid yin/_/de la brten pa'i mtshan nyid kyi/_/'du [#]ba kun du gnas yin na/_/snga ma bzhin du bum pa sogs/_/de rnams gnas
[\[32b.5\]]pa nyid thob 'gyur/_/de rnams de ltar gnas pa min[#]/_/de rnams brten pa'i bdag nyid kyi/_/'du ba ji ltar gnas par 'gyur/_/ming tsam yin na'ang de bzhin no/_/de phyir snang [#]la yod na 'ang /_/de rnams gyen la gnas min te/_/phyis bzhin 'di ni de rnams la/_/de bzhin
[\[32b.6\]]dngos su gnas ma yin/_/'on te gzhan nyid phrad pa'am/_/bye ba du ma bzhin yin na/_/'brel pa can gzhan yod pa la/_/'du ba rnam par gnas 'gyur na/_/de ltar phrad pa la sogs [#]bzhin/_/'di ni mi 'gyur ma yin nam/_/de la sogs pa 'di yod pa/_/du ma'ang 'brel pa med pa [# ]
[\[32b.7\]]yin/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las 'du ba'i tshig gi don brtag pa ste bcu dgu [#]pa'o//_//gal te dam pa'i don du na/_/bye brag cung zad yod min na/_/dbyibs [#]bcas dkar g.yo yod bdag nyid/_/ba lang 'di la sogs blos sgra/_/'di dag rgyu med 'dod
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]min na/_/'di dag [#]yod pa'i yul gang yin/_/kun la bye brag med par ni/_/de dag 'jug mi srid phyir ro/_/smras pa blo sgra 'di dag la/_/yul ni gang yang yod min [#]te/_/nang tsam la ni nges gnas pa'i/_/sa bon 'di rnams rgyu mtshan yin/_/sgra
[\[33a.2\]]rnams gang dang gang dag gis/_/yul du gang dang gang brjod pa/_/de de kun du sbyor ba ni/_/dngos su med de chos nyid yin/_/gang phyir rang gi mtshan nyid dang /_/rigs dang de 'brel [#]rigs ldan dang /_/blo yi rnam pa'i sgra don du/_/de kho na nyid du mi 'thad/_/de la re zhig sgra rnams kyi[#]/_/_
[\[33a.3\]]rang gi mtshan nyid rjod byed min/_/brda dang tha snyad thob pa yi/_/dus su khyab dang bral phyir ro/_/yul dus bya ba nus pa dang /_/snang ba la sogs dbye ba las/_/gcig la gcig dngos de rnams kyi/_/gsal ba'i bdag nyid rjes 'jug min/_/de phyir brda la mthong ba'i don/_/tha snyad la
[\[33a.4\]]ni mthong ba [#]yin/_/brda yi dus su ma bzung ba/_/rtogs [#]pa ma yin sgra gzhan bzhin/_/gangs can la sogs gang yin pa/_/yul dus tshogs kyis mi dbye bar/_/'dod pa rdul phran dbye ba yis/_/skad cig pa nyid du bsgrubs zin/_/rang gi mtshan nyid 'di dag kun/_/brdar bya bar
[\[33a.5\]]ni nus min te/_/skye med dngos su brdar bya ba/_/mi rigs rta yi rwa bzhin no/_/skyes pa'i dus su bzung ba yang /_/gang tshe tshig de rjes dran nas/_/bya byed de la brda med de/_/'das nas yun ring lon phyir ro/_/gang yang skyes pa'i skad cig de'i/_/stobs kyis yin na phyi ma'i tshe/_/_
[\[33a.6\]]de la brda 'jug yod ma yin/_/'dra ba nyid kyang brtags pa yin/_/dro ba la sogs par snang blo[#]/_/de la dbang po'i [#]shes pa ni/_/rnam par gsal bar rig pa bzhin/_/dro ba sogs las byung rnams kyi/_/don gang yin pa des bskyed blo'i/_/don de snang ba min pa'i phyir/_/sgra de'i
[\[33a.7\]]yul du mi rigs te/_/gzugs kyi sgra yi ro bzhin no/_/rnam pa de dag nyid kyis ni/_/gsal ba dang ni rnam pa dag_/gang gis rang gi mtshan nyid du/_/pha rol pos btags [#]dag kyang gsal[#]/_/rdzas la sogs dang phrad pa dag_/dgag pa gong du bstan pa'i phyir/_/de dag sgra yi
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]don nyid du/_/de nyid don du gnas mi rigs/_/rigs dang de bzhin 'brel pa dag_/gong du rgyas par bkag pa'i phyir/_/de 'og sgra don rnam gsum po/_/gzhan yang brtag par bya ba min/_/de la gsal ba rnam pa dang /_/rigs kyi sgra don gang smras pa/_/gang de kun kyang dngos
[\[33b.2\]]med par/_/mtshungs phyir de rnams yod ma yin/_/blo ru gnas pa'i blo'i rnam pa/_/don dang blo gzhan la 'jug min/_/mngon 'dod don yang byed min te/_/de nyid don du brjod bya min/_/gzhan dag sgra yi don gzhan du/_/don yod can sogs par smra ba/_/de rnams kyang ni
[\[33b.3\]]gsal ba nyid/_/yin yang de lta'ang brjod bya ste/_/sgra rnams gzhan bcad don yod can/_/zhes byar brjod bya'i mtshan nyid do/_/ba lang sogs la'ang sngar ma mthong /_/lha dang mtho ris la mtshungs zer/_/sdud dang rnam grangs pa med pa'i/_/bsdus pa'ang brjod par bya ba
[\[33b.4\]]'am/_/yod pa min pa dang 'dra ba'ang /_/sgra yi don du 'ga' 'dod pa'am/_/yod min bye brag yod gang dag_/sgra [#]yi rgyu mtshan yin pa'am/_/brjod pa nyid las 'ongs pa'i sgra/_/brjod bya nyid ni thob pa ni/_/de 'di'i zhes byar mngon 'brel phyir/_/gang tshe sgra la don
[\[33b.5\]]gyis ni/_/gcig gi ngo bor byas gyur te/_/mngon par brjod pa sgra ru 'dod/_/gang yang rung don blo yi yul/_/phyi yi dngos po'i rgyu mtshan gyis/_/phyi yi dngos po zhes 'dzin te/_/sgra yi don du kha cig 'dod/_/dper na byis pa rnams dang ni/_/dud 'gro rnams kyang goms
[\[33b.6\]]pa las/_/so sor snang ba rgyu yin te/_/de la don yod ces brjod 'di/_/rang gi mtshan nyid 'dod dam ci/_/'on te rigs dang 'brel dang ldan/_/blo nyid kyi ni gzugs brnyan na/_/don gcig la yang sngar bstan pa'i/_/skyon de rnams dang ldan pa yi/_/rtogs par bya ba'i dbye ba
[\[33b.7\]]yis/_/tha snyad du ni rnam rtog byed/_/ba lang nyid sgra'i dbye bas don/_/yod tsam rtogs de [#]yin zhe na/_/rwa dang dbyibs dang sngo la sogs/_/bye brag mi rtogs de 'dod na/_/de dang ldan 'dod bye brag rnams/_/brjod par gyur pa [#]yin na ni/_/der 'byung skyon dag yod min nam/_/yod
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]don can gzhan mthong [#]min no/_/bsdus par brjod pa yin na yang /_/dka' thub bya ba rigs sogs rnams/_/ma lus mngon par brjod pa'i phyir/_/rigs kyi dbye bar gsal brjod yin/_/nges par ma bzung gzugs rnams kyi/_/rdzas sogs rnams
[\[34a.2\]]su gang 'dod dang /_/gang zhig 'brel pa yod pa yi/_/spyi dang slar yang gsal ba yin/_/bye brag rigs sogs ngo bo yi/_/sgra yi don ni mi 'thad phyir/_/don dang gcig par bya ba yi/_/ngo bo'i sgra 'di mi rigs te/_/blo gnas brjod pa 'di nyid ni/_/phyi rol dag las tha dad
[\[34a.3\]]phyir/_/de phyir blo la phyogs gzhan las/_/'di la bye brag ci zhig yod/_/blo yi rnam pa'i sgra don yang /_/gong du gsal ba nyid kyis [#]na/_/shes la [#]tha dad min pa yi/_/khyab byed nyid ni med pas so/_/so sor snang ba'i sgra don yang /_/gal te phyi don yul yin na/_/gang phyir
[\[34a.4\]]gcig bdag min phyi yi/_/ji ltar sna tshogs so sor [#]snang /_/'on te bag chags tsam dngos phyir/_/de ni yul med yin na yang /_/phyi don rnams la shes pa yang /_/ji ltar 'jug par 'gyur ba yin/_/gal te phyi don du nges pas/_/rang dngos la de rnams su 'dod/_/de
[\[34a.5\]]ltar 'khrul pas 'jug pa'i phyir/_/sgra don de kho na nyid min/_/thams cad nyid la thal 'gyur phyir/_/sa bon med pa'ang mi rigs so/_/'di rnams phan tshun tha dad pa/_/sa bon zhe na phyogs bdag nyid/_/gal te'ang 'di rnams thams cad nyid/_/skad cig pa na rjes 'gro med/_/gzhan
[\[34a.6\]]na shes pa rim gyis [#]min/_/'di nyid kyis [#]ni brjod 'dod pa'ang /_/sgra las rtogs pa bsal ba ste/_/'di ltar sgra med med 'di la/_/gang zhig brjod 'di [#]gang zhig thob/_/phyi yi don la sgra 'jug pa/_/ji ltar sgra min pas brjod 'gyur/_/ming sogs de rnams kyis brjod yin/_/_
[\[34a.7\]]brjod 'dod rjes dpog rnam dang /_/'dres pa [#]phyi yi dngos por ni/_/zhen pas 'di la 'jug ce na/_/de nyid kho bo 'dod pa'ang yin[#]/_/gzhan sel ba ni byed pa'i [#]sgra/_/khyed kyi phyogs brjod [#]ma yin nam/_/dgag pa tsam yin snang 'di la/_/go bar byed pa ma yin gyi[#]/_/'on
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]kyang ba lang ba men pa[#]/_/glang po shing sogs sgrub [#]pa yang /_/yang dag ngo bor nges pa yis/_/sgra can blo ni 'jug pa yin/_/gal te ba lang zhes bya'i sgra/_/gzhan gsal [#]don ni byed pa ste/_/ba lang gsal ba'i sgra phyi ma/_/skyed byed sgra ni btsal dgos so/_/shes pa sgra
[\[34b.2\]]'bras ma yin nam/_/gcig la 'bras bu gnyis nyid [#]de/_/dgag dang sgrub pa'i shes pa dag_/ji ltar gcig gi 'bras bu yin/_/ba lang sgra ni thos pa na/_/sngon du ba lang min zhes 'gyur/_/gang gis ba lang min dgag phyir/_/ba lang zhes bya'i sgra la 'jug_/ba lang min
[\[34b.3\]]las ldog pa'i spyi/_/gang phyir brjod byar yongs brtags [#]pas/_/de yis ba lang nyid dngos nyid/_/gzhan sel sgra yis gsal bar bstan/_/gang gis med pa thams cad ni/_/gzhan pa'i dngos po bdag nyid gnas/_/de las rta sogs [#]las ldog pa'i/_/bdag nyid
[\[34b.4\]]med pa gang yin pa/_/re zhig thun mong min bye brag_/rtog min yin phyir mi 'dod na/_/khra bo sogs la'ang spyi min par/_/thal bar 'gyur phyir de bzhin no/_/de phyir dngos kun gang yin pa/_/so sor yongs su rdzogs pa ni/_/ba lang blo de'i rgyur 'gyur te/_/ba lang nyid
[\[34b.5\]]las gzhan yod min/_/dgag pa tsam gyi [#]ngo bo yang /_/sgra yi don du rtog byed na/_/stong nyid gzhan gyi rnam pa can/_/med pa'i sgra yi brjod byar 'gyur/_/de la'ang rta sogs blo rnams kyi/_/bdag nyid cha shas 'dzin par 'gyur/_/der ni gzhan sel brjod bya nyid/_/brdzun pa
[\[34b.6\]]nyid du khas len pa'o/_ngo bo spyi ru 'gyur yin [#]na/_/sgra don dag la mi ltos par/_/sel bar brtag [#]pa brdzun pa min[#]/_/blo de'ang dngos po'i ngo bo ste/_/sgra'i don rnams la skye bas na/_/brjod bya dngos po nyid du brtag_/blo ni sel ba min pa can/_/yod pa min pa phyi don la/_/_
[\[34b.7\]]so sor snang ba'i tshig don bzhin/_/de bzhin tshig don yang 'gyur na/_/ci phyir sel bar rtog par byed/_/blo gzhan pa la rnam gcod pas/_/blor rtogs pa ni ma yin te/_/rang gi ngo bor grub tsam las/_/gzhan pa'i cha ni 'dzin de min/_/gal te gzhan sel brjod bya na/_/_
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]tha dad spyi yi tshig rnams kyang /_/thams cad rnam grangs pa ru gyur[#]/_/'dres dang gcig nyid sna tshogs nyid/_/rnam rtog dang bral bdag nyid can/_/dngos po min phyir sel rnams kyi/_/dbye ba yod na min pa nyid/_/gal te dbye ba med pa'i phyir/_/_
[\[35a.2\]]thun mong min dngos cha shas bzhin/_/dngos min sna tshogs min nyid phyir/_/rnam grangs pa las thar pa yin/_/gsal [#]bar bya ba'i bye brag gis/_/gal te tha dad par 'dod na/_/'di ni rang las bye brag min/_/gzhan las kyang ni brtags pa yin/_/'dres can rten tha dad
[\[35a.3\]]pa yi/_/ngo bos phyi rol gnas pa yi/_/gsal bya gang yin de 'byed pa/_/de ni cher yang rtog pa yin/_/de bzhin rten ni tha dad pas/_/'di yang tha dad rigs ma yin/_/'brel pa can ni tha dad pas/_/dngos po tha dad 'dod ma yin/_/'on kyang dngos dang ma 'dres pa/_/gang
[\[35a.4\]]yin gzhan las ldog pa min[#]/_/bye brag cha ni ma thob par/_/ci yi phyir na nges pa min/_/'dra ba nyid du ma grub pa/_/sel ba'i lus kyi bdag nyid du/_/shes par lus kyang nus min te/_/ba lang sogs su dbyer med phyir/_/rta sogs gsal bya med par yang /_/chos gcig rjes
[\[35a.5\]]'jug dang bral ba[#]/_/nges par bya bar mi nus pa/_/des na sel ba mi grub [#]po/_/rjes su 'jug pa dang bral na/_/sgra dang rtags dag 'jug [#]ma yin/_/de dag med na sel ba'ang min/_/thun mong min pa'ang rjes 'jug min/_/sel ba yang ni ma grub na/_/lhan cig spyod pa gang na
[\[35a.6\]]gsungs/_/de la ma mthong ba de dag_/tshad ma nyid du 'gyur ma yin/_/ma mthong ba tsam gyis de dag_/rtogs par byed par 'gyur ba min/_/thams cad nyid la ma mthong phyir/_/rtogs byar bye brag 'gyur ma yin/_/'on te 'dra ba nyid med kyang /_/sel bar rtog pa yin na ni/_/'di ni
[\[35a.7\]]ba lang rta dag la/_/sel bar ci phyir rtog mi byed/_/khra bo las ni gzhan nyid du/_/ser skya dang ni rta dag mtshungs/_/spyi ni gzhan min 'dod ce na/_/ba min gang la sel ba 'jug_/ba min sel ba'ang dbang po yis/_/dang por nges pa ma yin na/_/gzhan la sgra ni 'jug
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]min na/_/ci zhig mthong nas [#]de sbyor byed/_/sngar bstan pa yi rnam pa yis/_/'di la rjes dpag kyang yod min/_/'di dang de ni 'brel pa dag_/nyams myong bar yang rigs pa dag_/ba lang min sgra brjod bya ba/_/nyid du ji ltar go bar bya/_/gang la ba lang sgras 'brel ba/_/nyams
[\[35b.2\]]myong tshe na mthong ba min/_/ba lang ril [#]po gcig nyid las/_/gang gzhan yin pa de thams cad/_/de bzhin gsal ba zhes byar brjod/_/spyi yi brjod byar mi 'gyur ro/_/grub kyang gsal bya blang [#]min pa/_/ba lang dgag bdag nyid kyang de/_/dgag pa'i tshig gis gang 'gegs
[\[35b.3\]]pa'i/_/ba lang de nyid 'dir smra dgos/_/ba lang min las log bdag de/_/zhe na gcig la gcig brten 'gyur/_/ba lang grub pas [#]sel 'dod yin/_/zhe na sel bar rtog pa brdzun/_/ba lang ma grub ba lang min/_/de med ba lang ga la yod/_/rten dang brten par gnas la
[\[35b.4\]]sogs/_/'brel ba'ang med pa dag la min/_/thun mong min pa [#]dngos po ni/_/sel ba yis ni go bya min/_/dngos po dang ni dngos med la/_/'brel pa ji ltar brtag bya yin/_/rang gi ngo bo med tsam gyis/_/cung zad bye brag byed 'gyur min/_/rang blo gang gis bye brag tu/_/gsal
[\[35b.5\]]bar bya ste bye brag ste/_/rta [#]sogs sgra rnams las byung ba'i/_/sel ba rtog [#]byed ma yin no/_/'dir ni bye brag tu bya'i blo/_/bye brag ma gtogs la mi 'dod/_/gzhan gyi dngos las gzhan 'dra ba/_/byed min shes pa'i bye brag gi_/gzhan 'dra ba yi shes pa de/_/ji ltar bye brag tu
[\[35b.6\]]brjod pa/_/'on te bye brag tu bya ba'ang /_/gzhan la bye brag tu rtog na/_/de lta yin na gang cung zad/_/thams cad bye brag tu thal 'gyur/_/med pa go bya'i [#]ngo bo yis/_/dngos su bye brag bya ba med/_/de phyir sel bas bye brag tu/_/byas dngos khyed la brjod bya min/_/gal te sel ba ma
[\[35b.7\]]gtogs par/_/sgra dang rtags dag 'jug rigs na/_/de bzhin shes pa po'i blo yang /_/dngos po la ni dmigs par 'gyur/_/thun mong ma yin dngos po la/_/blo ni rnam gnas ma yin te/_/rnam rtog med pa nyid kyi phyir[#]/_/de ni go byar rigs ma yin/_/sgra yi go bya'ang bye brag tu/_/_
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]bya ba yin zhes bsgrub par dka'/_/des ni sgra dang blo dag ni[#]/_/yul ni spyi yin par 'dod bya/_/gang tshe bsal [#]ba rnams sgra yis/_/brjod bya min phyir bsal [#]bya min/_/de tshe spyi ni gsal [#]bya de/_/de na dngos nyid sel ba yang /_/med pa rnams ni bsal
[\[36a.2\]]bya min/_/med pa dor las med yin na/_/sel ba gzhan las sel ba ni/_/bsal phyir spyi ni dngos po yin/_/gal te [#]med pa gang yin pa/_/med pa [#]de dang mi 'dra na/_/dngos po nyid 'gyur min zhe na/_/ba lang ba lang min [#]thal 'gyur/_/gal te 'ang sgra gzhan rnams la
[\[36a.3\]]yang /_/dngos su gsal [#]bya nyid 'gyur na/_/yod sgra med par brjod pa las/_/tha dad bsal byar [#]'dod pa min/_/de la med pa dngos nyid du/_/'gyur phyir ngal ba chen por 'gyur/_/de ma grub na yod mi 'grub/_/grub na'ang rab tu 'grub [#]par 'gyur/_bag chags dbye bas phye ba yis/_/_
[\[36a.4\]]yod pa'i dngos dang sel rnams su/_/rtog pa'i rigs pa ma yin te/_/dngos med nyid la bag chags med/_/khyed kyi sgra yi dbye ba yang /_/de yi rgyu mtshan ma mthong ste/_/thun mong min sgra rjod [#]byed nyid/_/ma yin sngar ma mthong phyir ro/_/de la sgra gzhan sel ba la/_/spyir ni kun du
[\[36a.5\]]rtog byed na/_/de bzhin dngos med ngo bo'i phyir/_/sgra yi dbye ba brtag pa min/_/tshig rnams ji lta de bzhin du/_/brjod bya rjod byed dag kyang ngo /_/gsal [#]bya'i dbye ba tha dad pa/_/yod par ston pa 'ang ma yin zhing /_/sel ba go bya go byed du/_/khyed kyi phyogs la mi 'gyur te/_/dngos
[\[36a.6\]]po min phyir nam mkha' yi/_/me tog ri bong rwa bzhin no/_/gal te char dang sprin med par/_/mthong bas ma nges par [#]smra na/_/kho bo'i phyogs la dngos yod nyid/_/khyed phyogs gal te'ang ga la yod/_/'ga' zhig sgra yi don sgrub pa'i/_/ngo bor khas len mi byed pa/_/de la ldog
[\[36a.7\]]pa'ang grub min te/_/de ni de sngon 'gro phyir ro/_/gal te yang ni sel ba tsam/_/brjod bya nyid du khas len ni[#]/_/smra ba rnams la ut+pal sngo/_/sogs sgras sogs [#]pa'i don du 'gyur/_/bye brag byed dang bye brag dag_/gzhi mthun pa dag mi 'grub ste/_/sngon po nyid min zhig
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]pa na/_/ut+pal min pa zhig pa min/_/cig shos kyang min de yi phyir/_/brjod bya la ni ltos min pa'i/_/sgra dag bye brag bya ba dang /_/bye brag byed par 'gyur ba'ang min/_/sel ba dag ni gzhi mthun las/_/ma yin tha dad yin phyir ro/_/don de las 'dod min zhe na/_/brten pa de
[\[36b.2\]]dag ji lta bur/_/thun mong min pa'i dngos po ni/_/go bya min gzhan khyed la med/_/go bya min pa'i don gcig nyid/_/gang du sgra dag sbyor bar [#]byed/_/'on te'ang gzhan sel ldan dngos po/_/brjod bya yin par smra ba na/_/de la'ang gzhan dbang yin pa'i phyir/_/sgra yis khyab pa
[\[36b.3\]]rnyed par dka'/_/rtags dang grangs sogs 'brel pa ni/_/sel ba la ni yod ma yin/_/gsal ba'ang brdar [#]bya ma yin phyir/_/de'i sgo nas kyang de yod min/_/ak+Sha ta yang gzhan las ni/_/log par kun tu shes pa med/_/ma yin par ni dgag bya ba'i/_/ngo bo de la yod ma yin/_/_
[\[36b.4\]]min pa min zhes smra ba yang /_/dgag pa yang ni 'gegs pa ste/_/'tshod byed ces pa mi dgag pa'ang /_/rang dngos nyid kyis gnas pa yin/_/bsgrub bya nyid du shes pa dang /_/de bzhin byung gyur sogs mthong ba'ang /_/sel ba grub 'dir yin pa'i phyir/_/rgyu mtshan med par
[\[36b.5\]]thal bar 'gyur/_/sgrub pa la sogs don sogs kyang /_/gzhan sel ba la mthong [#]min pa/_/dgag [#]pa la yang dgag yod na/_/sel ba ci 'drar 'gyur ba yin/_/dang la sogs pa'ang dgag pa dang /_/sbyor ba med phyir sel ba yin[#]/_/ngag don las gzhan sel ba yang /_/smra bar
[\[36b.6\]]nus pa ma yin no/_/gzhan sel min ba sgra la sogs/_/brjod byar mthong ba ma yin no/_/gzhal bya shes bya sogs las [#]ni/_/bsal bya nyid ni gang la yin/_/bsal bar [#]bya 'di brtag 'di yang /_/dngos po nyid brtag [#]yin na bzang /_/shes pa'i rnam pa bkag pas kyang /_/_
[\[36b.7\]]nang gi don ni brjod bya min/_/sel ba'ang min phyir de rnams la/_/sel ba yang mi [#]grub pa min/_/de ltar sgra rnams la sogs ni/_/bsal bya la ni mthong min no/_/thams cad sgra ni don gang gis/_/rnam par gcad [#]byar rtog par byed/_/thams cad min par [#]cung zad kyang /_/_
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]med pas gang zhig bsal byar 'gyur/_/gcig sogs thams cad min zhe na/_/rang don sel bar thal bar 'gyur/_/cha shas rnams ni bkag phyir yang /_/logs su cha shas can min 'dod/_/de bzhin bsdus pa'i sgra de rnams/_/bsdus pa can ni rnam
[\[37a.2\]]bsal bas/_/gzhan rnams kun kyang mi 'dod pas/_/don med pa can thob par 'gyur/_/gnyis sogs sgra 'dir 'dod na yang /_/yang dag bsdus pa'i spyod yul can/_/gcig la sogs pa bkag pa na/_/de lta'i rnam pa der mi 'gyur/_/ba lang min min sel ba gang /_/_
[\[37a.3\]]ba lang sgra yi [#]don du brjod/_/de ci yod pa'am yang na med/_/yod na'ang ba'am ba yin min[#]/_/ba lang zhe na ming rtsod min[#]/_/don du bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid yin/_/go bya'i brjod bya'i a go nyid/_/yin na sgra'i [#]don shin tu mtshan[#]/_/med la 'di yang mi rigs te/_/don
[\[37a.4\]]la sbyor ba [#]sogs med phyir[#]/_/ba lang sgra las su zhig kyang [#]/_/med par go ba ma yin no/_/ba lang sgra don ba min pa/_/min na ci [#]phyir sel bar 'dod/_/gang gis ba lang ba min pa/_/bzhed cing gang gis gsal [#]byar byed/_/ba lang sgra ni ba min pa'i/_/gang 'di'i sel don du smra
[\[37a.5\]]na/_/de ci ba lang las gzhan pa'am/_/gzhan pa min par khas len byed/_/tha dad na'ang 'dir rten par [#]ni/_/'gyur ba'am yang na mi rten 'gyur/_/rten [#]pa yin na yon tan nyid/_/thob kyi rdzas kyi tshig [#]yin no/_/de phyir ba lang zhes bya'i sgras/_/yon tan tsam zhig rjod byed
[\[37a.6\]]pas/_/ba lang 'gro dang 'dug ces pa'i/_/gzhi mthun pa nyid du mi 'gyur/_/gang gis ba min dgag 'di la/_/ba lang zhes bya'i sgra rjod [#]byed/_/'on te 'di ni tha dad par/_/min las gzhan sel bar khyed 'dod/_/de phyir 'dis ni ba lang nyid/_/thob phyir lhag pa ci zhig smras/_/_
[\[37a.7\]]dngos po re re'i sel ba 'di/_/gcig pa'am yang na du mar 'gyur/_/gcig pa ba lang mang yod na/_/'di ni ba lang nyid du 'gyur/_/du ma nyid na'ang gong bu bzhin/_/mtha' yas par ni thal bar 'gyur/_/des na bye brag bzhin du 'di/_/brjod bya nyid du rigs pa min/_/gzhan sel
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]ba'am brjod bya'am ci/_/brjod bya min par 'dod pa yin/_/brjod bya'ang bsgrub [#]pa'i ngo bos sam/_/yang na gzhan ni 'gegs pa yin/_/sgrub pa'i bdag nyid brjod bya na/_/gcig tu lta ba btang ba yin/_/thams cad du yang gzhan sel 'di/_/sgra yi don ces smra ba na/_/gzhan
[\[37b.2\]]sel min pa 'jig pa yis/_/gal te gzhan sel brjod bya na/_/de la de bzhin du 'dod pas/_/thug pa med par khyed la 'gyur/_/'on te gzhan sel ba 'di nyid/_/brjod bya min par khyed 'dod na/_/des na khyed kyi gzhan sel byed/_/sgra yi tshig la gnod byed yin/_/gzhan yang gcig
[\[37b.3\]]nyid rtag pa nyid/_/so so la ni 'du ba nyid/_/dngos med par brjod sel rnams la/_/smra ba snal med snam bu bzhin/_/de phyir sgra gang kho na la/_/dgag sbyor de la gzhan las ni/_/ldog pa'i cha ni 'ba' zhig 'gyur/_/rang nyid gzhan du go byed yin/_/gzhan sel yongs su ma shes phyir/_/_
[\[37b.4\]]de dag de lta'i lta ngan 'chang /_/ngan pa'i bdag nyid rang nyid 'joms/_/gzhan rnams kyang ni 'jigs [#]par byed/_/'di ltar sel ba rnam gnyis te/_/ma yin dgag dang med pa'o/_/ma yin dgag pa'ang rnam gnyis te/_/blo dang don gyi dbye bas so/_/gcig tu sre [#]bar byed pa yin[#]/_/_
[\[37b.5\]]gtan tshigs sngar smras gang yin rnams/_/'jigs med la sogs don mtshungs pa/_/rang bzhin gyis [#]gzhan las tha dad/_/der rten shes pa'i snang ba gang /_/don gyi gzugs brnyan rtog pa can/_/don gyi bdag nyid min pa la/_/don zhes bya bar nges pa yin/_/snang ba gzhan
[\[37b.6\]]las tha dad phyir/_/gzhan las log pa'i dngos po ni/_/thob pa'i rgyu las ma 'dres pa/_/dngos po'i sgo nas 'ongs pa ste/_/rigs mi mthun pa las ldog pa/_/de 'bras gang yin rang mtshan nyid/_/de la de yi bdag nyid du/_/nges phyir 'di ni 'khrul pa yin[#]/_/de la 'di ni gzhan sel
[\[37b.7\]]zhes[#]/_/ming du bstan pa rgyur bcas pa'o/_/gzhan dang ma 'dres par yod [#]pas/_/rang gi mtshan nyid kyang de'i rgyu/_/ba lang 'di la ba min med/_/med par dgag pa nyid yin zhes/_/gzhan sel ba 'di rab gsal [#]ba/_/kho nar shes par bya ba yin/_/de la 'di ni dang po yin/_/sel
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]bar sgra las rtogs [#]pa ste/_/sgra las yang dag byung ba'i blo/_/phyi yi don du zhen pa'o/_/de yi ngo bo gzugs brnyan gyi/_/sgo [#]ni sgra las skyes pa [#]ste/_/brjod bya rjod byed dngos 'di ni/_/rgyu 'bras bdag nyid can grub pa'o/_/dngos kyi rnam pa gcig nyid la/_/de ltar rab tu
[\[38a.2\]]bsgrubs pa yi/_/shugs kyis med par dgag pa yang /_/rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ba yin[#]/_/de yi bdag nyid gzhan bdag nyid/_/min [#]zhing 'brel yod dngos rnams ni/_/ldog pa'i dngos po rtogs pa yang /_/don gyis go 'gyur de yi phyir/_/de nyid kyis na sgra 'di yang /_/rang gi don du
[\[38a.3\]]brtags pa yin/_/sgra 'di rnams kyis dngos su min/_/sel ba rnam pa gnyis brtan [#]na/_/don gzhan rnam par gcod par ni/_/byed pa sgrar ni brjod pa yin/_/rang don mngon par rjod byed pa/_/zhes bya de ni 'gal ba yin/_/phyi yi don du zhen pa yis/_/'jug pa gang las rnam rtog gi_/_
[\[38a.4\]]gzugs brnyan 'di ni skyed byed pa/_/de yis brjod ces bstan pa yin/_/rang gi mtshan nyid kyi bdag nyid/_/dbyer med pa la 'di reg min/_/de tsam cha la sogs [#]pa las/_/gzhan ni brjod par bya ba min/_/gzugs brnyan de ni rtogs pa yi/_/shugs kyis gzhan dang ma 'dres pa/_/_
[\[38a.5\]]'di ni rtogs 'gyur gang gi phyir/_/'di gzhan bdag ni min phyir ro/_/nyin mo'i bza' ba'i tshig sogs bzhin/_/'di yi 'bras bu'ang gnyis yin te/_/dngos su ba dang shugs kyis te/_/gang phyir rjes 'gro ldog par ldan/_/de phyir sgra ni dngos po rnams/_/rang don rjod par byed pa
[\[38a.6\]]dang /_/gzhan las kyang ni ldog pa yang /_/gnyis ka gtso bor byed ma yin/_/so sor snang ba'ang de 'dra ba/_/spyi de ba lang nyid du 'dod/_/ba lang khra bo sogs kun la/_/mtshungs pa nyid du nges phyir ro/_/dngos po'i snyam pa'i zhen pa las/_/de la dngos po zhes kyang brjod/_/shes pa
[\[38a.7\]]de ni glo bur du/_/rang sa bon las 'khrul pa skye/_/de yi rnam pa de nyid kyi/_/sgra yi don khas len par brjod/_/spyi yi dngos po ngo bor yang /_/de ltar 'khrul pas nges pa yin/_/spyi yi [#]dngos po dngos nyid du/_/dam pa'i don du rigs ma yin/_/blo las tha dad min ngo bo/_/ji ltar don
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]gzhan las 'ongs yin/_/gal te'ang tha dad min pa 'di/_/blo yi rnam pa'i ngo bo yin/_/de ltar phyi yi dngos nyid du/_/'khrul pas de ni nges ba yin/_/de ni don min mi ltos nyid/_/de ni brgyud pas 'ongs pa yin/_/des na bdag nyid dngos po nyid/_/yod nyid min par bstan
[\[38b.2\]]pa yin/_/gzugs brnyan bdag nyid can sel ba/_/tshig las kyang ni skyes pa ste/_/so sor snang brjod glo bur bzhin/_/kho bo cag la tshig don 'di/_/rang gi ngo bor grub tsam las/_/gzhan gyi cha ni de 'dzin yin/_/blo gzhan rnam par gcod byed pa/_/des na blo ni shes byas te/_/ji
[\[38b.3\]]ltar yod pa min pa nyid/_/dam pa'i don du tha dad min/_/tha dad min pa'ang de bzhin zhes/_/gang gis rnam grangs nyid du 'gyur/_/tha dad min pa'ang gcig dngos nyid/_/dngos med la de ga la yod/_/don gcig nyid du rjod byed pas/_/rnam grangs pa ni thob par 'gyur/_/med
[\[38b.4\]]pa'i ngo bo'ang gcig nyid du/_/rtog pas sprul [#]ba ji bzhin du/_/tha dad pa'ang de bzhin no/_/de las rnam grangs ga la yin/_/rjod byed la ni dngos su ba'i/_/rnam grangs gnyis min pa'ang med/_/brjod bya'ang de rnams la med par/_/rnam pa du mar bstan pa yin/_/'on kyang du ma'ang
[\[38b.5\]]bya ba gcig_/gal te byed par mthong ba na/_/de la chos gcig tu sgro btags/_/sna gcig kyang ni 'jug pa yin/_/dper na mig sogs 'ga' zhig tu/_/gzugs kyi rnam shes gcig 'bras byed/_/gcig pa'i dngos nyid med na yang /_/'ga' dag tsha sogs [#]sgra gcig byed/_/_
[\[38b.6\]]bum sogs chu sogs 'dzin la sogs/_/bya ba gang yin byed pa na/_/yul de'i shes pa gang yin pa/_/gal te'ang tha dad ba de gnyis/_/gcig tu sre bar byed pa yi/_/chu nyid yin phyir gcig ces brjod/_/shes pa bzhin du'ang de yi rgyu/_/yin phyir don la dbye ba med/_/de la spyi
[\[38b.7\]]yi tshig gis ni/_/bum pa la sogs brjod pa'i sgra/_/rigs mi 'dra ba rnams [#]gcod pa/_/gzugs brnyan gcig gi rgyu rnams so/_/de bzhin gcig nyid don du ma'i/_/byed phyir du ma zhes [#]brjod de/_/de 'bras min pa las ldog pas/_/mang po nyid du yongs brtag [#]pa'o/_/dper na thogs
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]pa dang bcas gzugs/_/bstan du yod pa yin na yang /_/dper na sgra ni brtsal ma thag_/'byung ba'i shes dang mnyan bya yin/_/de rgyu min pa'i dbye ba yis/_/kha cig la sgra 'jug pa yin/_/dper na brtsal las 'byung sgra dang /_/dper na sbrang ma'i sbrang rtsi yang /_/_
[\[39a.2\]]de 'bras rgyu dang bral ba las/_/kha cig la 'dir sgra zhes brjod/_/mnyan bya min dper gzugs bzhin dang /_/ma brtsal bar 'byung glog bzhin no/_/de lta bu sogs dbye ba yis/_/tha dad don gyi rgyu mtshan ni/_/ldog pa rnams las brtag bya ste/_/de bzhin de la brten pa'i sgra/_/de
[\[39a.3\]]bzhin brda nyid de yi phyir/_/ma 'dres don du brjod bya yin/_/sgra rnams tha dad par 'jug la/_/nga la rnam grangs 'gyur ma yin/_/mang dang nyung ba'i yul rnams kyi[#]/_/brda de yi ni rjes 'brangs nas/_/spyi dang bye brag gis brjod bya/_/de rnams la yang 'gal ba med/_/don de rnams kyi ldog
[\[39a.4\]]pa rnams/_/rnam rtog bzo yis sprul pa ste[#]/_/rten dang bsal bya'i dbye ba yis/_/phye ba don dam par yod min/_/phyi yi dngos nyid de rnams ni/_/brtags [#]pa yin gyi dngos su min/_/dbye dang dbye min dngos po la/_/de kho na nyid kyis gnas min/_/rang sa bon gyi du ma las/_/bral ba'i
[\[39a.5\]]dngos po'i brda rnams kyis/_/nus pa'i rnam rtog gis dbye ba/_/de yi ngo bor nges pa yin/_/rang gi mtshan nyid bdag nyid don/_/gcig gi bdag nyid du min zhing /_/dum bur byed pa'ang ma yin gyi/_/'di ni rnam rtog 'khrul pa'o/_/chos gcig rjes 'gro med par yang /_/bsal bya
[\[39a.6\]]dang ni sel ba'i yul/_/mtshan nyid mi 'drar rtogs min pa/_/dbye ba med par bsre bas so/_/gcig tu bsre ba shes pa ni/_/rang bzhin gyis kyang tha dad pa'ang /_/kha cig la ni sbyor ba yin/_/gzhan pa min zhes bsgrubs pa yin/_/de min ngo bo las bzlog pa'i/_/dngos
[\[39a.7\]]po tsam gyi rang mtshan nyid/_/gang yin des ni byas pa yi/_/rjes su 'gro ba 'gal ba med/_/gang na 'du [#]ba min pa las/_/ldog pa'i rang gi mtshan nyid yod/_/de na me med las ldog pa/_/rang gi mtshan nyid yod pa'o/_/dper na tshang bang bzhin 'di la/_/du ba min las log yod
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]pa/_/de phyir me min las ldog pa/_/'di ni yod par [#]rang mtshan nyid/_/mi yi rwa sogs med pa las/_/ldog pa gang yin rang mtshan nyid/_/de kun bstan pa las kyang ldog_/blo dang mar me lta bu'o/_/de bzhin sgra sogs rang mtshan nyid/_/med pa'i ngo bo 'di yang [#]min/_/de ltar
[\[39b.2\]]dbye bas ma bstan pa/_/de ltar rjes 'gror 'gyur gnyis [#]yin/_/dbye ba brjod 'dod min pa yang /_/de nyid ces ni yongs su bsgrags/_/spyi yi mtshan nyid nyid kyi [#]ni/_/gzhan min min 'dod phyir yang ngo /_/khra mo'i bu las tha dad par/_/ser skya'i bu dang rtar mtshungs na/_/myur [# ]
[\[39b.3\]]'gro yongs su dor nas ni/_/ba lang nyid la ci phyir 'jug_/de gsal byed par nus bdag nyid/_/gal te de nyid yin 'dod na/_/bse [#]bar mtshungs pa yin na yang /_/nus pa de ni rta yi min/_/de lta bu yi bsres pa [#]yang /_/dngos po gang la yod gyur pa[#]/_/de la ba lang rigs
[\[39b.4\]]med kyang /_/ba lang min pa sel ba 'jug_/ba lang min las ldog dngos gang /_/de ni dbang pos nges par byed/_/gzugs brnyan du ni nges pa ste/_/rang rig [#]pas ni rtogs pa'ang yin/_/'di mthong bas ni 'jig rten pa/_/de la sgra ni sbyor [#]bar byed/_/'brel pa nyams su myong bar [# ]
[\[39b.5\]]la'ang /_/des na 'di gsal byed par rigs/_/de lta bu yi bsre ba yang /_/dngos po gang la med gyur pas/_/ba lang man [#]sgra brjod bya nyid/_/de ni gsal bar rtogs byed yin/_/so so'i bsre ba shes pa yi[#]/_/ba lang ba lang min pa'ang 'grub/_/gcig pur grub pa'i sgra [#]nyid ni/_/_
[\[39b.6\]]ji ltar 'dod bzhin de sbyor byed/_/dngos po'i dbye ba rig pa ni/_/gzhan 'dzin pa la ltos min par/_/de phyir gcig la gcig bstan [#]pa'i/_/skyon ni 'di la gnas med do/_/phyi yi de nyid ma shes pa'ang /_/rang bzhin nyid la rmongs phyir 'di/_/rang rnam pa la phyi'i ngo bor/_/sgra dang blo ni
[\[39b.7\]]nges par byed/_/sgras ni de tsam du byed kyi/_/don la sgra ni reg pa'ang min/_/bye brag can gyi don ni 'ga'/_/sel bas brjod par bya ba min/_/don gzhan las ni ldog pa la/_/bye brag can ni yin zhes kyang /_/mtshan nyid mdzad pas gang gsungs pa/_/de la brjod 'dod don 'di yin/_/_
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]gzhan la [#]gzhan pa'i dngos gang yin/_/rgyu yis sam ni byed pa yis/_/bye brag can de tha dad pas/_/rigs dang ma 'dres par 'dres par/_/shing sogs sgra des brjod pa yis/_/shes [#]pa de ni skyes pa las/_/rigs la sogs pa de 'gog byed/_/gang zhig blo
[\[40a.2\]]la rnam gnas pa/_/de rnams 'dir brjod [#]skyed byed phyir/_/ldog pa yi ni bye brag can/_/de rnams 'das ma thag bstan pa'o/_/don [#]gzhan las ni [#]ldog pa yis/_/dngos po de yi cha 'ga' ni/_/rtog [#]pa yin zhes gang gsungs pa/_/de ni gzugs brnyan nyid
[\[40a.3\]]yin te/_/don gzhan las ni ldog pa yi/_/dngos po mthong ba la brten nas/_/'ongs pa de la sgro btags nas/_/de yi cha zhes bstan pa yin/_/rgyu yi don dang byed pa'i don/_/des na sngar bzhin bdag nyid kyang /_/gal te dngos rigs mi 'dra las/_/ldog dang de dang de bzhin du/_/ba lang min
[\[40a.4\]]las ldog gzhan nyid/_/de yang bdag nyid la yod de'o/_/ldog par brjod pa'ang med pa nyid/_/'ba' zhig las ni ldog min te/_/de ni bye brag dngos las kyang /_/yin phyir dngos po'i blo mi nyams/_/dbye bar bye brag byed 'di yang /_/rnam par rtog pas sprul pa ste/_/de phyir chos 'di nyer
[\[40a.5\]]'dzin pas/_/bye brag ldan zhing gzhag [#]pa yin/_/des na de ni dbyig sogs bzhin/_/bye brag byed par skye ba ste/_/so sor snang ba'i sgra yi don/_/de nyid sems pa pos bstan no[#]/_/mthong dang rnam rtog dbye mi shes/_/'jig rten phyi'o snyam du sems/_/de phyir 'di ni zhen pa las/_gsal
[\[40a.6\]]ba rnams ni brjod byar byed/_/de nyid don du sgra rnams kyi[#]/_/brjod bya min par bsgrubs zin to/_/'dis sgra'i brjod bya yin pa'i phyir/_/gsal ba rnams kyang bsal [#]bya nyid/_/spyi ni sel ba ma [#]yin te/_/sel ba nyid kyang dngos po min/_/med la med nyid bsal kyang zhes/_/de ltar byed min 'di
[\[40a.7\]]dngos phyir/_/dngos ni de bdag min pa'i phyir/_/de ni bsal bya nyid 'dod gang /_/gang zhig de yi bdag nyid min/_/de ni de yi bsal byar brjod/_/yod pa med pa'i dngos yin pas/_/de yi sel dngos [#]yod ma yin/_/rang bzhin dbang phyug sogs rnams kyi/_/dngos rnams bskyed bya min smra ba/_/_
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]rang bzhin dbang phyug sogs bskyed byar/_/dngos po grub pa ma yin no/_/de phyir med pa'ang dngos po nyid/_/min phyir ngal ba gal yin/_/de grub na yang yod pa yod/_/des kyang med pa grub pa yin/_/ba lang min las ldog pa yi[#]/_/ba lang mtshan nyid mi 'drar 'dod/_/de phyir dngos nyid ba lang
[\[40b.2\]]'di/_/nga la ba min thal 'gyur min/_/dngos med yul la'ang sems tsam gyis/_/sprul pa'i rnam rtog sna tshogs pa'i/_/dbye bas sbyar ba rnams la bzhin/_/bag chags yod pa nyid yin no/_/des na'ang bag chags dbye ba yis/_/phye ba'am yod pa'i dngos nyid du'ang /_/rtog par byed cing sel
[\[40b.3\]]ba rnams/_/rtogs [#]pas sbyar ba rnams bzhin no/_/don gzhan sel ba'i brjod bya 'di/_/ji 'dra ba ni bstan zin cing /_/sgra gzhan gyi ni sel ba yang /_/de 'dra nyid du rtog [#]bya min/_/dngos po nyid du nges pa'i phyir/_/sel ba dag ni dngos nyid min/_/kun rdzob lam du rab 'grub [#]phyir/_/de nyid
[\[40b.4\]]don du 'dod bsgrub yin/_/dam pa'i don du brjod bya dang /_/rjod byed cung zad kyang yod min/_/skad cig gis 'jig dngos rnams la/_/khyab par byed pa sbyor ba min/_/de la go bya go byed nyid/_/de nyid don la brten nas ni/_/sel ba dag gi dngos nyid min/_/kun rdzob pa ni 'gegs she na/_/_
[\[40b.5\]]de lta na yang 'khrul pa nyid/_/bzlog par dka' ba thal bar 'gyur/_/rtogs [#]pas sbyar ba'i don dang ni/_/de rjod byed pa'i sgra dag kyang /_/de rnams la spyi brjod bya [#]dang /_/de yi rjod byed yod ma yin/_/sgra yi rang gi mtshan nyid ni/_/skad cig gis 'jig rjod byed min/_/de phyir de gnyis gzugs
[\[40b.6\]]brnyan rdzogs/_/kun rdzob par ni 'dod par bya/_/gsal bar dga' ba gnas pa yin/_/bsgrub pa'i ngo bo [#]sgra yi don/_/gang gis khas len par mi byed/_/gang tshe sgra las shes pa ni/_/skyes pa'i don du zhen pa ste/_/sgra rnams rang brjod [#]byed pa yi[#]/_/shugs kyis gzhan las ldog pa
[\[40b.7\]]yin/_/de sngon 'gro ba can gyi ni/_/ldog pa 'di yang rigs pa yin/_/sgrub pa yod min gang gsungs pa/_/spyi la sogs pa med phyir te/_/sgra rnams dang ni rnam rtog rnams/_/dngos su yul med nyid phyir ro/_/ut+pal sngon po sogs sgra las/_/gcig nyid kun du snang ba ste/_/_
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]sngo [#]min ut+pal min sogs las/_/ldog pa yi ni gzugs brnyan no/_/gzhan sel ba dang ldan dngos po[#]/_/brjod byar kho bo cag 'dod de/_/gzhan las ldog pa'i dngos po las/_/gzhan pa'i ldog pa'i nga la med/_/de phyir rigs la [#]sogs bzhin pa'i/_/_
[\[41a.2\]]gzhan dbang skyon dang 'brel pa med/_/blo gros bzang pos gsungs pa ni/_/sgra don log [#]pa min pas ni/_/bye brag byed dang bye brag tu/_/bya ba bzhin mthun pa nyid de/_/de phyir sel ba sgra yi don/_/rnam par gnas pa 'gal ba med/_/sngon po'i sgra sogs 'ba' zhig kyang /_/gzugs
[\[41a.3\]]brnyan bye brag can yin te/_/khu byug ut+pal bung ba sogs/_/yid gnyis bcas bzhin 'jug pa ste/_/pi [#]ka stang zil sogs sel bas/_/bye brag can gyi yul la yang /_/de ni ut+pal yi sgras[#]/_/rnam par gzhag par nges pa dang /_/gnas gzhi mthun pa la sogs pa/_/de
[\[41a.4\]]ltar 'dir ni bsgrubs pas na/_/rnam gzhag de kun pha rol po'i/_/phyogs la bsgrub par dka' ba yin/_/'di ltar sgra gcig gis rang gis[#]/_/mtshan nyid thams cad du bstan la/_/de skad bstan pa de la yang /_/ci phyir bye brag gzhan blo med/_/gang gi don du phyi ma'i sgra/_/sbyor byed dngos
[\[41a.5\]]po de la ni/_/thams cad du brjod min zhe na/_/de ni du mar thal bar 'gyur/_/sngon po'i rigs sam yon tan nam/_/sngon po'i sgra yis rtogs she na/_/gzhan la ut+pa la yi rigs/_/ut+pal sgra yis [#]nges pa yin/_/de ltar de dag dbye ba yis/_/ba kul ut+pal sgra bzhin du/_/gzhi mthun
[\[41a.6\]]pa la sogs pa rnams/_/shin tu 'thad pa ma yin no/_/yon tan de rigs dang 'brel pa'i/_/rdzas ni sngon po'i sgra rtogs pa/_/yin no zhe na de lta na/_/ut+pa la'i sgra don med 'gyur/_/de dag gang kho na dang 'brel/_/de nyid ut+pal rigs ldan na/_/sngon po'i sgra nyid kyis de [#]bstan/_/ut+pa
[\[41a.7\]]la'i sgra don med 'gyur/_/yon tan de'i rigs 'brel las gzhan/_/ut+pal rigs ldan yin zhe na/_/ut+pal dang sngon po'i sgra/_/gnas [#]gzhi tha dad par 'gyur ro/_/'on te ut+pal nyid dang /_/'brel pa'i ngo bo nyid dang ni/_/yon tan de'i rigs dang 'brel rdzas/_/sngon po'i sgra yis mi
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]ston na'o/_/ut+pal dang 'brel ngo bo nyid/_/de bdag min par 'gyur na yang /_/gang zhig ut+pal nyid 'brel ba/_/de gnyis dang 'brel kho na ste/_/sngon po'i sgra yis de brjod pa'i/_/sgra yi shes pa'i yul du ni/_/bdag nyid kun de cha shas min/_/ut+pal sgra de don med yin/_/_
[\[41b.2\]]cha shas las ni grol ba la/_/zad dang cha shas rnam rtog med/_/ngag don yongs su ma shes phyir/_/'dir ni 'di dag brjod 'dod yin/_/dang po'i sgra nyid kho na yis/_/de ni thams cad du gsal [#]byas/_/bdag nyid ci yang ma dor bar/_/ji 'dra de 'drar de bstan te/_/rnam grangs de dag
[\[41b.3\]]nyid kyis ni/_/de la sgra gzhan dag gis yang /_/brjod pa [#]'bras bu yod min la/_/brjod na 'bras bu nyid du nges/_/kho bo cag ni sgra rnams kyis/_/phyi'i don rtogs byar mi 'dod de/_/sgra dang rnam [#]shes dag gi yang /_/yul ni phyi yi don min no/_/gang phyir de dag thams cad kyi/_/bdag
[\[41b.4\]]nyid yul byed las gzhan pa'i/_/sgra dang shes pa gzhan der ni/_/rnam grangs pa nyid thob par 'gyur/_/sgra las rnam rtog gzugs brnyan nyid/_/rim gyis skyed par byed pa yin/_/gcig nyid de ltar snang ba la/_/phyi yi nyid du'ang 'khrul phyir ro/_/gzugs brnyan la ni brten nas su/_/gzhi
[\[41b.5\]]mthun pa nyid sogs yin gyi/_/dam pa'i don du sgra 'di ni/_/yul dang bral bar 'dod pa yin/_/rtags dang grangs sogs sbyor ba 'di/_/gsal [#]ba rnams la'ang yod ma yin/_/'dod pas sbyar ba'i brda dag gis/_/sprul pa yin gyi dngos la min/_/mo dang pho dang ma ning gi_/rtags gsum
[\[41b.6\]]dngos po la yod min/_/de la sems de thams cad kyi/_/sna tshogs par snang nyid du 'gyur/_/brjod 'dod rjes 'jug nyid de rnams/_/de yi dbang gis gcig dngos ni/_/gcig dngos nyid du'ang dngos su min/_/gal te gnas pa dang skye dang /_/'jig la brten nas rtags rnams ni/_/_
[\[41b.7\]]gnas pa yin na rtags gsum nyid/_/dbyer [#]med par ni thal 'gyur zhing /_/yod pa min la'ang med pa dang /_/rang bzhin [#]med dang gsob nyid ces/_/gang smra de la gnas pa sogs/_/'brel par ci phyir rtog par byed/_/dngos 'di rnams kyi skye ba ni/_/rab tu 'byung yin 'jig pa ni/_/_
[\[42a\]]
[\[42a.1\]]nyams pa nyid de gnas pa ni/_/rang dngos grub par brjod bya ste[#]/_/de la skye ba 'jig min pa/_/de la ci yi byed par [#]brjod/_/gnas la 'dres pa [#]yod min na/_/de la skye bar [#]ji ltar brjod/_/'jigs [#]la gnyis yod brjod min na/_/'jigs [#]pa'i dngos dang nyams
[\[42a.2\]]pa dang /_/zhig pa'i ngo bo zhes bya ba/_/de la ji ltar ston par byed/_/gnas dang gnas la [#]rang bzhin du'ang /_/rgyu gang gis na smra bar byed/_/'on te 'di rnams dbyer med dngos/_/kho na yin na rtags gcig 'gyur/_/gal te de rnams ba lang nyid/_/sogs bzhin ma gtogs [#]sogs
