[\[42a.3\]]'dod na/_/spyi bsal bas ni de 'dra ba/_/de rnams bsal ba kho na yin/_/rigs dang yod dang phyi zhes pa'ang /_/de rnams la de ci phyir sbyor/_/spyi rnams la yang gzhan pa yi[#]/_/spyi ni rigs pa ma yin no/_/med dang rang bzhin med pa dang /_/gsob ces bya sogs ji ltar yin/_/_
[\[42a.4\]]des na de rnams rtags gnas pa'i/_/gnas pa'i brdar ni byas pa yin/_/grangs la sogs pa'i brda can nyid/_/brjod par 'dod pa brtags pa yin/_/tha dad tha dad min dben yang /_/btsun mo'i [#]rnams dang nags tshogs bzhin/_/bsal [#]ba dag ni rigs [#]dag la/_/btsun mo la
[\[42a.5\]]sogs sbyor zhe na/_/gsal ba'i cha shas rnams la yang /_/grangs blangs nas ni 'jug pa yin/_/gsal [#]ba mang po'i grangs nyid kyis/_/bye brag byas la nags sgras brjod/_/yang na rigs la gsal ba ni/_/mang po yod la brten nas so/_/rnam pa des ni thams cad kyi/_/gcig
[\[42a.6\]]gi tshig nyams 'gyur min nam/_/gzhan la brjod 'dod min zhe na/_/'di la de nyid rgyu mtshan yin/_/rigs la'ang grags yod ma yin la/_/yod na'ang ji ltar bye brag las/_/gal te 'brel pa [#]dang 'brel pa'am/_/yang na dngos su 'brel pa zhes/_/gal te de ltar smra ba na/_/rtsa thung
[\[42a.7\]]gcig kyang nags 'gyur te/_/mang po la ni smras pa yis/_/'brel pa 'di la'ang yod phyir ro/_/gsal ba du ma la brten gang /_/de nyid gcig la'ang gnas pa yin/_/de yi rgyu mtshan mtshungs pa'i phyir/_/de la'ang nags kyi blo 'byung 'gyur/_/gang gi phyir na de lta bu'i/_/rjes su 'gro
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]dang ldog pa dag_/brjod 'dod de las 'di nges kyi/_/don las min te de 'khrul phyir/_/las dang dus sogs dang 'brel pa'am/_/gong du gsal [#]ba kho na ste/_/de phyir de ni brda can yin/_/gsal ba 'byung ba ma yin no/_/gsal ba'i ngo bor zhen pa yis/_/gal te sel bar smra
[\[42b.2\]]byed na/_/de phyir rtags sogs dang 'brel pa'i/_/gsal ba'i sgo nas 'di yod de/_/mngon 'dod pa la blo 'jug phyir/_/sgra sbyor bar [#]ni byed pa yin/_/de yi shugs kyis mngon 'dod pa/_/min las ldog nyid grub pa yin/_/thams cad nyid kyang 'dod min te/_/sgra yi don ni nges med
[\[42b.3\]]'gyur/_/de phyir 'tshed pa sogs sgra rnams/_/mchog tu gsal bar ldog pa yin/_/'di ltar 'tshed sogs brjod pa rnams/_/byed pa med par 'dug pa min/_/za ba'am gsal bar byed ces pa'am/_/gzhan las ldog pa go ba ste/_/ma yin par dgag bdag nyid kyi/_/gsal
[\[42b.4\]]byar gang dang gang 'dod des/_/'tshed byed ces pa mi dgag pa'ang /_/rang dngos nyid kyis gnas pa yin/_/de lta bu yi ngag de dag_/phan tshun gnod pa byed pa yin/_/'di ni gzhan gyi dngos dgag pas/_/rang gi ngo bos gnas pa yin/_/de las gzhan du nges bzung ba[#]/_/smras la don
[\[42b.5\]]ni med par 'gyur/_/nam mkha'i [#]ut+pal sogs rnams kyi/_/grub pa gang na'ang yod min na/_/dngos med par brjod sel ba nyid/_/grub pa nyid ni ji lta bu/_/dngos bcas 'di nyid dngos po zhes/_/nges par snang ba yin zhe na/_/de las cir 'gyur dngos po dang /_/'di ni chos
[\[42b.6\]]mtshungs par rtogs 'gyur/_/de phyir bsgrub pa [#]nyid shes dang /_/de bzhin byung gyur sogs ngo bo/_/dngos po rnams su chos mtshungs phyir/_/de ni rgyu mtshan du thal 'gyur/_/sgrub pa la sogs don sogs [#]kyang /_/yod min min sogs dgag byed pa'o/_/sgra yi shugs kyis
[\[42b.7\]]mngon 'dod pa'i/_/min pa gang de nyid min nam/_/dgag pa la yang dgag ldan pa'i/_/sel ba de 'dra [#]'gyur ba yin/_/ci 'dra yang dag rtogs pa la/_/dgag pa bzhi pa yod pa yin/_/don gang yin pa 'ba' zhig la/_/dgag pa nyid sbyor sgrub pa yin/_/dgag pa gsum pas
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]de dang ni/_/bral ba ston par byed pa yin/_/de yang dgag phyir phyi ma ni[#]/_/phyi mas gang yin sbyar bya ste/_/de la brjod 'dod pa des ni[#]/_/rtogs byed gzhan ni sel ba yin/_/'di ni mi 'tshed mi smra na/_/'tshed byed nyid du go bar byed/_/gsum pas byed pa med
[\[43a.2\]]sogs par/_/sbyor ba go bar byed pa yin/_/bzhi pas de ni dben [#]pa yi/_/'tshed byed de ni nges byed de/_/des na 'dir ni sgrub pa yi/_/tshig gis sel bar mtshungs pa yin/_/bsdu ba la sogs don gang yin/_/'ga' la dro sogs sgrar 'dod na/_/de las gzhan pa'i rnam
[\[43a.3\]]grangs [#]pa/_/de yis sel bar 'gyur ba yin/_/gzhan sel ba yi dag don yang /_/rtogs bla [#]nyid de 'di ltar 'di/_/dngos po nyid dang lhan cig pa'i/_/ngag don 'ga' zhig brjod bya ste/_/de rnams rang rigs mi 'dra gang /_/de rnams bsal [#]byar shin tu gsal/_/de rnams nyid
[\[43a.4\]]kyi ngag don yang /_/[#]de rnams la gzhan la 'di med/_/nag pa ba lang [#]khyer shog sogs/_/ngag gi [#]don ni rtogs pa yis/_/byed pa po gzhan la sogs rnams/_/don gyis sel bar go bar byed/_/gzhan sel min pa'i sgra sogs kyis/_/sgrub pa nges pa ma yin te/_/pha rol
[\[43a.5\]]mngon 'dod rigs la sogs/_/gong du gsal ba yin phyir ro/_/'on kyang sgra ni gang zhig las/_/sgrub pa'i rnam rtog [#]nges skyes la/_/phyis ni sel ba'i sgra don gyi/_/dgag pa'i blo ni skye bar 'gyur/_/de 'dra de ni dngos po dang /_/'brel pa 'jig pa mi slu [#]ste/_/sgra dang shes pa thams
[\[43a.6\]]cad ni/_/yang dag don la nges pa min/_/gzhal bya shes pa'i sgra la sogs/_/gsal [#]bya ci phyir med pa yin/_/'di 'ba' zhig gi [#]skabs min par/_/rtogs [#]dang ldan rnams sbyor byed min/_/'on te ma nges phyin ci log_/yod pa srid pa 'ga' zhig la/_/kha cig la ni de bzlog
[\[43a.7\]]cing /_/the tshom phyin ci log med pa'i/_/shes pa bskyed par bya ba'i phyir/_/blo gros ldan rnams de sbyor byed/_/de nyid kyis na de rnams kyis/_/sbyar bas 'bras bcas nyams myong byed/_/de la bems po'i blo can rnams/_/gang yin yid gnyis gnas su 'dod/_/des na de nyid dor
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]bya ste/_/gzhan du smras pa don med yin/_/'di la yid gnyis cung zad kyang /_/med na ci phyir 'dri bar byed/_/de min 'du byed sgrar brjod nyid/_/tha mal gnas blos ji ltar 'gyur/_/gzugs dang mig la sogs pa yi/_/shes pa'i shes byar gang bstan pa/_/des [#]ni kha cig gis
[\[43b.2\]]sgro btags[#]/_/gang yin de ni dgag pa yin/_/sngo sogs gzugs rnams mig 'di [#]la/_/brten pa [#]kho nar rig min gyi/_/'on kyang rna [#]ba la brten pa/_/rtag pa gcig bu'i sems kyang ngo /_/chos rnams skad cig sogs ngo bor/_/shes bya'am ci zhes rnam [#]'phrul dang /_/chos de
[\[43b.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa yi/_/shes pa'i shes pa min [#]nam ci/_/med pa shes pa skyed byed min/_/med pa'ang shes bya yin nam ci/_/de la sogs pa 'khrul par 'gyur/_/shes bya de yi tshig brjod bya/_/de la de 'dra'i shes bya nyid/_/skad cig la sogs sgrub phyir yod/_/'di yis [# ]
[\[43b.4\]]shes bya'i dngos po yang /_/yang dag rig par 'jog phyir ro/_/de lta'i ngag gzhan rnams nyid la/_/gzhal bya shes bya'i tshig sogs kyis[#]/_/rtogs pa yi ni rgyu mtshan nyid/_/dus gzhan du yang mthong ba yin/_/'ba' zhig dag gi [#]dmigs pa la/_/rtog [#]pa'i ngo bo gang skyes pa/_/_
[\[43b.5\]]de ni ngag gi rjes 'jug pas/_/bye brag don la 'khrul pa yin/_/bum sogs la yang sgra rnams las/_/de lta'i rnam pa de yod na/_/de phyir bum sogs sgra rnams dang /_/shes bya'i sgra sogs mtshungs par 'gyur/_/gsal bar bya bar brtag 'di yang /_/dngos po nyid rtog
[\[43b.6\]]ces smras pa[#]/_/nges pa yi [#]ni gzhan 'dor phyir/_/de nyid nyams par 'gyur ba yin/_/brjod 'dod gang yin de nyid la/_/dngos po nyid du rtogs [#]'dod na/_/de phyir brjod 'dod mi 'dor 'gyur/_/kun ni brjod 'dod ma yin no/_/rang nyid rig phyir shes pa yin/_/rnam par dgag par nus
[\[43b.7\]]ma yin/_/dmigs pa med kyang sgro 'dogs pa'i/_/rnam pa du mar rig pa yin/_/shes pa'i bdag nyid rtog 'ga' yang /_/so so'i yul la nges pa yi[#]/_/rang bzhin gang yin de nyid kyang /_/khyed kyis nges par khas blangs [#]dgos/_/kho bo cag smra'i rnam pa dang /_/gzugs brnyan dang
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]de'i snang ba dang /_/gsal [#]dang so sor snang ba yang /_/rnam pa'i ming gi bye brag yin/_/nges gzung [#]la sogs sgra rnams la/_/nges min la sogs bsal bya ba/_/rnam pa gzhan gyi mtshan nyid ni/_/shin tu gsal bar yod pa yi[#]/_/thams cad kyi ni sgra la yang /_/_
[\[44a.2\]]tha snyad bzung ba yod pa ste/_/don de bsal [#]ba 'di la ni/_/gzhan sel ba brjod 'dod pa yin/_/thams cad chos rnams bdag med dang /_/thams cad min rnams 'gro ba dag_/ma lus par go byed de la/_/cha shas cung zad bsal [#]bya yin/_/phyi yi bum sogs las 'ba' [#]zhig_/kho na
[\[44a.3\]]bdag med 'dod pa dang /_/kha cig 'gro ba nyid du ni/_/'khrul pas de ni bzlog pa'i phyir/_/cha shas thams cad 'gag [#]pa ni/_/der ni brjod 'dod nyid min te/_/de phyir rang don sel bar ni/_/thal bar mi shes pas smras [#]yin/_/sel ba dngos su yod med min/_/rten pa ma yin mi rten
[\[44a.4\]]min/_/gcig min du ma ma yin te/_/de la ji ltar nges pa bzhin/_/de kho na nyid du mi 'dod/_/med pa de med pa yang min/_/dngos po nyid du zhen phyir ro/_/tha dad tha dad min sogs kun/_/dngos po la yod la brten pa/_/sgra don dngos po med pa ste/_/de phyir de dag gzhi med yin/_/sgra
[\[44a.5\]]ni dngos su don gzhan las/_/ldog par [#]byed pa ma yin te/_/rang don rjod [#]par byed pa yi/_/shugs kyis de nyid go ba yin/_/de bdag ma yin gzhan bdag min/_/zhes ni rgyas par bstan pa [#]yin/_/gzhan po'i phyogs kyis ma shes pa/_/de phyir de ltar smra ba yin/_/gang gis ba lang ma
[\[44a.6\]]yin par/_/zhen cing gang gis bsal [#]byar byed/_/de ltar sgra yis gtso bor ni/_/de ni bsal bya ma yin te/_/ji lta bu yi sgra yi ni/_/brjod bya nyid yin 'dri bar byed/_/sel ba de yis yin nam ci/_/'on te bum pa sogs kyi yin/_/sgra don sel ba yin nam ci/_/sgrub pa yin
[\[44a.7\]]zhes nges rtog [#] la/_/sel ba yin zhes brjod pa yin/_/gang yin de nyid rtogs par byed/_/sgra don gzugs brnyan yin par ni/_/dngos su byed pa'i blo yin la/_/rigs sogs sgrub pa nyams par ni/_/shugs kyis khong du chud pa yin/_/bum pa shing sogs sgra rnams kyang /_/_
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]brjod pa yis ni gzugs brnyan nyid/_/bskyed pa'i phyir na dngos su ste/_/shugs kyis gzhan ni 'dor ba yin/_/de phyir bsgrub pa las 'byung skyon[#]/_/mtha' med thal 'gyur 'di la min/_/brjod bya min phyogs kho bo cag_/khas mi len phyir skyon 'di med/_/gcig nyid rtags [# ]
[\[44b.2\]]nyid sogs rtag pa/_/yin gyi de kho na nyid min/_/'di la bzhad gad byed pa ni/_/mkhas pa chen por mtshon byed yin/_/nges par bzung ba'i shugs kyis ni/_/gzhan sel bar yang go ba yin/_/gzhan du rang bdag nyid rtogs par/_/gang la nges bzung don med yin/_/de
[\[44b.3\]]ltar gang yang phyi ma'i yang /_/gzhan las ldog pa yod min te/_/des na mo gsham bu sogs gang /_/gang la sel ba rjod par byed/_/med pa rnams ni dngos med phyir/_/sgra rnams rigs sogs rjod byed par/_/dogs par mi byed de rnams ni/_/cha med mtshon byed grub phyir ro/_/_
[\[44b.4\]]don gyis stong sogs rtog pa las/_/sad pa'i bag chags tsam gyis sprul/_/gzugs brnyan gang tshe snang ba ni[#]/_/sgra de rnams kyis ston pa yin/_/sgra de rnams ni de tsam du/_/dngos su gsal byed gang the tshom[#]/_/brda la ltos pa dang bcas phyir/_/brtags pa'i don rjod byed bzhin
[\[44b.5\]]no/_/sgra de rnams ni pha rol pos/_/khas blangs [#]bye brag sogs bsgrubs par[#]/_/ston par byed pa ma yin te/_/de phyir de bzhin zhes rtog [#]min/_/bye brag la sogs 'di la brda/_/med dang 'bras med nyid du'ang sngar/_/sgrub [#]pa'i phyir na gtan tshigs te/_/ldog la the tshom za ba min/_/_
[\[44b.6\]]'on te sel ba'i phyogs la yang /_/brda ni ji ltar yod ma yin/_/de yi 'bras bcas ji lta bur/_/smra ba po dang nyan pa po/_/gnyis la phan tshun shes pa de/_/rigs pas grub pa ma yin zhing /_/brda yi dus su gang mthong des/_/tha snyad dus su mthong phyir ro/_/rang rang gi ni snang
[\[44b.7\]]ba ni/_/rig pa la yang 'jug pa ste/_/gang phyir 'di ni phyi don du/_/zhen pa [#]gnyis ka'ang mtshungs pa yin/_/dper na rab rib kyis nyams pa'i/_/mig can zla ba gnyis zhes smra/_/rang dang mtshungs pa'ang de bzhin du/_/sgra kun las byung tha snyad 'dod/_/'di la de yi khyab
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]byed du/_/'dod pa zhen pa pa [#]yin te/_/rgyu yis sprul pa shes pa ni/_/de rnams 'khrul pa'i snang ba yin/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las sgra'i don brtag pa ste nyi shu [#]pa'o//_//mngon sum dang ni [#]rjes dpag la/_/bye brag can du sgrub [# ]
[\[45a.2\]]pa'i phyir/_/pha rol pos smras de mi 'grub/_/de ni mtshan nyid 'di dag ldan/_/mngon sum rtog pa dang bral zhing /_/ma 'khrul pa'o rtog pa ni/_/brjod pa dang ldan shes pa ste/_/tha snyad rgyu sogs bdag nyid ni/_/ma yin sgra don 'drer rung ba/_/shing [#]zhes bya sogs tshul gyis
[\[45a.3\]]ni/_/gang zhig sgra dang ma 'dres kyang /_/de ni brjod pa nyid du 'gyur/_/'das dus srid par [#]ming don la/_/goms pa'i bag chags rjes 'jug phyir/_/skyes ma thag pa gang 'brel pas/_/'di ltar bya zhes sgrin por 'gyur/_/sems kyis dpyod [#]sogs dus su yang /_/de ni rnam
[\[45a.4\]]par gsal bar rtogs/_/sgra yis rjes rtogs de nyid la/_/bsnyon par nus pa ma yin no/_/de yang nges pa med pa yi/_/des kyang mngon par zhen pa las/_/'khrul pa'i sgra dang don du gnas/_/de dang 'dra yang mi srid do/_/rigs la sogs dang 'byor 'os la/_/rtog pa yang na
[\[45a.5\]]gzhan gyis shes/_/rigs la sogs pa de gsal [#]phyir/_/mi snang bas ni mi 'thad do/_/rigs la sogs rnams mi snang bas/_/de dang 'brel pa mi snang phyir/_/chu dang 'o ma sogs 'dra na/_/don la sbyor ba ji ltar 'grub/_/blang dang dor ba'i yul dag ni/_/bstan pa'i phyir na gnyis
[\[45a.6\]]gsungs te/_/bdag dang gzhan la 'di 'grub pa'i/_/rtog [#]pa rnam gnyis gsungs pa yin/_/ming la sogs dang sbyor byed 'di'i/_/rang gi rgyu mtshan de ma thag_/gang gis 'phags par gnas gyur pa/_/des na gnas skabs min brjod min/_/ming dang rigs sogs rnams [#]kyi 'am/_/_
[\[45a.7\]]yang na 'di la de sbyor bas/_/brjod pa dang ldan shes pa de/_/rtog [#]par brjod ces gsungs pa yin/_/yang na brjod pa 'ba' zhig nyid/_/bstan pas rang gi 'dod pa grub/_/thams cad du yang ming dang don/_/sbyor bas sbyor ba zhes gsungs so/_/des ni byed pa'i byed tshig nyid/_/_
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]'bras bu dang bcas shes par bya/_/ming dang rigs la sogs rnams kyi[#]/_/de yi shes [#]bya'i don du gnas/_/'dod rgyal sgra yi brjod bya ba'i/_/'di yi ma khyab par shes bya/_/so so'i sgrar ni rab tu 'grub[#]/_/'o na brjod bya gzhan gsal phyir/_/rigs sgra 'ba' zhig yin pa 'am/_/_
[\[45b.2\]]brjod 'dod gzhan dbang gyur pa'i phyir/_/'dod rgyal sgra nyid ma yin nam/_/'jig rten rjes 'brang [#]'di yod par/_/rigs pa mkhyen pas gsungs pa yin/_/'di nyid tsam gyi [#]sgra yis ni/_/'dir ni tha snyad lam du zhugs/_/rigs sogs de yang 'jig rten bzhin/_/'dir ni tha
[\[45b.3\]]snyad yod ma yin/_/de dag 'di las rtogs bya'i phyir/_/gzhan du 'di skad gsungs pa yin/_/gang zhig rtogs [#]pa la brten nas/_/gang dag rigs sogs sbyor bas kyang /_/des kyang brjod pa dang ldan pa'i/_/rtog [#]pa nges par khas blangs 'gyur/_/gzhan du dngos po gnyis
[\[45b.4\]]dag gi_/sbyor ba yod par mi 'gyur te/_/rang dbang du ni yongs gcod pas/_/rtog pa nyid du brtags pa min/_/de ltar na yang sna tshogs pa/_/'di kun tha snyad med par 'gyur/_/rigs sogs tshul la brten nas ni/_/'di ni tha snyad nyid du 'dod/_/rigs la sogs dang sbyor
[\[45b.5\]]ba'i sgra/_/sbyor ba la ni ma 'khrul pa'o/_/de skad bstan pa'i tshig de rnams/_/'bras bu dang bcas tshig tu 'gyur/_/de phyir rgol ba pa rnams kyis/_/grub mtha' yang dag gnas kun gyis/_/rtsod pa med par rtogs 'di'o/_/kho bos dpyad de bsgrubs pa yin/_/ming dang rigs
[\[45b.6\]]sogs brjod pa yis/_/kun du brtags pa de dag kun/_/de ni de bzhin bdag gzhan gyis/_/'di ni 'di ltar khas blangs pa'o/_/de rnams dang ni bdag nyid kyi/_/khyad par 'di nyid kyi tsam [#]zhes/_/des gsungs gzhan du 'di la sogs/_/tshig ni de brjod [#]gsungs pa yin/_/_
[\[45b.7\]]de bzhin rigs pa'i sgo yi gzhung /_/lam 'di nyid kyis bshad bya ste/_/shes pa zhes byar 'brel pa'i [#]phyir/_/der ni rtogs pa zhes kyang gsungs/_/yang na gzhan sel byas pa'i sgra/_/ldog pas tha dad byas pa yin/_/'dir ni rigs la sogs pa rnams/_/rnam par bcad
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]pa 'di mdzad do/_/de lta'i shes pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/'di la gang tshe rtogs [#]par 'dod[#]/_/de yi bdag nyid dgag pa yi[#]/_/mngon sum nyid du nye bar brjod/_/de [#]tshe shing la sogs pa'i sgras/_/brjod bya shing sogs sgra [#]de yis/_/rtog [#]pa dang bral la gnod min/_/_
[\[46a.2\]]gzhan du gzugs sgra la sogs pa/_/rtog [#]pa dang bcas nyid du 'gyur/_/gal te mngon sum zhes bya'i sgra/_/mngon sum rtog pa dang bral bar/_/shin tu gsal bar shes bya ste/_/sems ni gzhan du kun zhen kyang /_/dbang rten sngon por rtogs phyir ro/_/rnam par rtog pa 'di nyid
[\[46a.3\]]ni/_/don de rtogs par byed pa yin/_/'das pa la sogs ming btang [#]nas/_/de yi ming gis sbyor byed 'thob/_/de tshe ming dang don 'dres pas/_/rnam rtog la yod gzhan du min/_/snang ba so sor ma dmigs pas/_/cig car gnyis snang bar mi 'dod/_/rtog [#]bcas yid kyi rnam shes
[\[46a.4\]]dang /_/lhan cig 'byung bar shes byas te/_/de phyir dbang po'i shes pa 'di/_/rtog pa med par gsal [#]ba yin/_/rnam rtog rim gyis skye ba [#]nyid/_/yin yang mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin/_/myur bar 'jug la cig car bar/_/mngon par sems pa yin zhe na/_/ma yin de tshe
[\[46a.5\]]mngon gyur pa'i/_/dngos po min dang rjes 'brel par/_/ldan pa'i rnam rtog snang ba zhes/_/'di ni cung zad bstan pa med/_/'khrul pa'i mngon pa'i nga rgyal de'ang /_/don gyi shes pa de nyid dang /_/rgyun mi 'chad par lhan cig pa[#]/_/de yi phyir na gsal ba yin/_/gar mkhan la lta'i
[\[46a.6\]]gnas skabs sogs/_/ma lus par ni cig car mthong /_/mang po rnams kyis bar bcad kyang /_/myur du 'jug pas de 'khrul pa'i/_/lcug ma'i sgra la sogs rnams kyis/_/blo ni shin tu myur 'byung ba'i/_/'di la'ang cig car 'byung ba yi/_/[#]nga rgyal ci phyir 'byung mi 'gyur/_/_
[\[46a.7\]]yid kyi rtog pa 'ba' zhig la'ang /_/rim du nges par [#]bas byed min/_/blo rnams kun kyang myur 'byung zhing /_/rim du gnas pa min par mtshungs/_/de phyir yul rnams thams cad la/_/rim gyis 'dzin par mi 'gyur gyi/_/sgra la sogs pa'i blo bzhin du/_/cig car 'dzin par
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]snang bar 'gyur/_/mgal me la yang 'khrul pa yis/_/cig car 'khor lor snang bar 'byung /_/gsal bar so sor snang ba'i phyir/_/mthong bas [#]mtshams sbyor ma yin no/_/'di ltar mtshams rnams sbyor ba ni/_/dran par byed pas sbyor yin gyi[#]/_/mthong bas min te 'das pa
[\[46b.2\]]yi[#]/_/yul dang 'dzin pa min phyir ro/_/'di yi yul du gang gyur pa/_/de ni zhig par [#]gsal ma yin/_/de phyir 'khor lor snang ba 'di/_/gsal ba min par 'gyur ba'i phyir/_/gzhan yang dngos po gang zhig gis/_/gang gi ngo bor gzhag pa'i rgyu/_/med phyir de ni de nyid du/_/_
[\[46b.3\]]blo ldan rnams kyis gzhag mi bya/_/dung dkar po la ba lang gi/_/rang bzhin lkog shal med sogs bzhin/_/bye brag can dang [#]bye brag gi_/don mdzad [#]pa yang med pa yin/_/'di la rtog pa dang bcas pa'i/_/dngos por gzhag pa'i rgyu mtshan med/_/ba khra bo sogs mi mthun phyogs/_/_
[\[46b.4\]]gzhan du ha cang thal chos [#]'gyur/_/rigs la sogs pa bkag pa yis/_/gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid yin/_/dbye bas yongs su ma bcad phyir/_/de bzhin bye brag rnams kyang med/_/sgra yi rang gi mtshan nyid gang /_/ming dang [#]rjod byed min pa nyid/_/brjod bya rang gi mtshan nyid dang /_/_
[\[46b.5\]]rjod [#]byed nyid kyang sun bton te/_/de phyir brjod bya rjod byed du/_/'dod pa de ni sgro btags yin/_/sgro btags dang bral don nyid du/_/mngon sum nyid ni shes par bya/_/rang gi mtshan nyid yod gyur la/_/mod la de ni med gyur na/_/de yang ldog par 'gyur ba ni/_/dngos po bar bcad
[\[46b.6\]]sogs phyir ro/_/sngon po la sogs bdag nyid la/_/brda sbyor mi nus gzhan rten min/_/des na de dag rang rig ni/_/brjod dang rjes 'brel can ma yin/_/de ni gzung bya'i bye brag las/_/ming sogs sbyor ba ma yin yang /_/'on kyang gtan tshigs ma grub pa/_/gang gis rjes su
[\[46b.7\]]'jug pa min/_/gal te don gzhan rnam bcad pa'i/_/tshul gyis 'dzin pa ma yin na/_/don tsam 'dzin par 'gyur ba 'am/_/'dzin par mi 'gyur bum pa bzhin/_/gal te bum gzhan rnam bcad pa'i/_/tshul gyis 'dzin pa ma yin na/_/bum pa tsam zhig 'dzin 'gyur ram/_/'dzin
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]par mi 'gyur bum nyid bzhin/_/gzung bya gzhan ni rnam bcad pa'i/_/tshul gyis 'dzin pa yin snyam na[#]/_/shing ngo zhes bya sogs blo bzhin/_/rtog [#]dang bcas pa'i rnam shes 'gyur/_/spyi dang 'brel pa ma yin na/_/bye brag gang na yang yod min te/_/'dzin
[\[47a.2\]]tshe de la ma reg pas/_/dngos po med phyir gzung bya min/_/de phyir nam mkha'i me tog bzhin/_/dngos med 'di na'ang gzung ba [#]min/_/bye brag dag dang ma 'brel pa'i/_/bye brag can ni mi srid pas/_/bye brag can gyi yul gyi blo/_/rtogs pa min [#]zhes gya tshom smra/_/mthun dngos mi
[\[47a.3\]]mthun dngos dag las[#]/_/ldog pa'i don ni 'dzin par 'dod/_/bye brag can gyi yul gyi blo/_/bye brag dag dang 'brel min na/_/tha dad de yang bye brag can/_/zhes brjod bye brag 'brel pas min/_/tha dad ces bya'ang de sgra dang /_/'brel pa med par shes bya ste/_/rang bzhin las gzhan
[\[47a.4\]]dngos dag ni/_/ma lus pa las ldog pa can/_/bzung [#]bar gyur pa de nyid la/_/de lta'i rnam rtog skye bar 'gyur/_/bye brag tu ni ma bzung la/_/spyi [#]zhes pha rol po [#]'dod pa/_/rtog pa dang bcas shes pa la/_/'dzin na der yang de dang mtshungs/_/bye brag dag las bye brag can/_/_
[\[47a.5\]]de la spyi ru shes bya na/_/de ni 'dzin pa yin pa'i phyir/_/rtog dang bcas pa'i rnam shes 'gyur/_/bye brag med pa 'dzin snyam na/_/ldog pa las ni spyi zhes brjod/_/des ni spyi ni bye brag las/_/bye brag can nyid du mi 'thad/_/mthun dang mi mthun ngo bo yis/_/'di dag shes bya yin
[\[47a.6\]]'dod la/_/spyi dang bye brag tu gnas par/_/bdag nyid kyis ni rab tu brtags[#]/_/gal te mthun dang mi mthun pa'i/_/dngos ni tha dad par 'dod na/_/bye brag dag las bye brag can/_/nyid ni spyi [#]dang 'dra bar 'gyur/_/'on te 'di ni mi 'byed [#]na/_/'di ltar ma 'dres par gnas na/_/_
[\[47a.7\]]phan tshun spangs te gnas pa yis/_/'gro ba gzhan ni yod ma yin/_/bye brag bdag nyid las ldog par/_/dbye bas mtshan nyid gzhan yod min/_/de yi ngo bo ma bzung [#]na/_/de la 'dzin par ji ltar brjod/_/de yi dngos la reg na'ang 'di/_/tha dad gzhan las ldog pa yi/_/'dzin
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]pa zhes bya'i rnam shes 'di/_/'di la rtogs [#]dang bcas par 'gyur/_/spyi ni dngos po med pas na/_/gang gis bye brag can rtogs 'gyur/_/de phyir khyod la de yang ni/_/rtogs [#]bcas shes pa'i gzung byar 'gyur/_/ming gis bye brag can yin na/_/de ci de yi bdag nyid dam/_/_
[\[47b.2\]]gal te min na'ang bye brag can/_/de phyir 'di la cis mi 'dod/_/de yi bdag nyid min pa 'di/_/dngos po'i bye brag can yang yin/_/dngos med spyi de khyod la ni/_/ji ltar bye brag can nyid min/_/de phyir rang gi mtshan nyid la/_/shes pa cung zad skye bar 'gyur/_/ldog pa'i dngos po'i
[\[47b.3\]]yul can ni/_/de kun rtag med yin par 'gyur/_/dmigs pa tsam gyis shes pa ni[#]/_/rtog pa med pa yod pa yin/_/byis pa lkugs sogs mtshungs shes pa/_/bye brag ma yin spyi yang min/_/dag pa'i dngos la dmigs dus su/_/skye bar nyams su myong bar 'gyur/_/_
[\[47b.4\]]de dag gi ni gzhir gyur pa'i/_/gsal ba nyid ni rtog [#]par 'gyur/_/de las gzhan du'ang rigs la sogs/_/dngos po'i chos ni ji lta bar/_/nges par byed pa'i blo gang yin/_/de yang mngon sum nyid du 'dod/_/yang dang yang du rnam rtog pa'ang /_/ji srid 'dzin par gyur pa
[\[47b.5\]]rnams/_/de dang 'brel pa'i rjes 'brangs nas/_/thams cad mngon sum nyid du 'dod/_/snang ba las ni khyim phugs su/_/zhugs pa'i mod la don mthong min/_/byas kyang dbang pos mi rtogs sam/_/ji ltar snang ba'i mod nyid la/_/dang por rang gi ngo bor shes/_/phyi nas
[\[47b.6\]]rigs la sogs chos kyis/_/de la nges par rtogs par byed/_/gal te dmigs nas mig btsums te/_/'ga' zhig rnam par rtog 'byung ba/_/'brel pa'i rjes 'brangs [#]de min pas/_/de ni mngon sum nyid du 'dod/_/zer ba mi rigs gal te yang /_/shes pa rang gi mtshan
[\[47b.7\]]nyid la/_/zhugs pa rigs sogs par 'dzin kyang /_/brjod pa de ni zhugs pa la/_/de lta'ang rang gi mtshan nyid 'di/_/brjod bya min par gong du bsgrubs/_/de la dmigs pa'i shes pa yang /_/rtog pa med pa nyid du nges/_/rigs tsam 'dzin par 'gyur na yang /_/bye brag
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]gcig tu tha dad pa/_/nyid du pha rol po de yang /_/'dod pa yin par ji skad smras/_/gang tshe bye brag can dag las[#]/_/bye brag gcig tu tha dad pa/_/rang dang rjes mthun rang bzhin blo/_/bye brag can las ji ltar skye[#]/_/rang dang spyi yi bdag nyid can/_/shes pa
[\[48a.2\]]gcig gis rigs mi 'thad/_/rtogs [#]bcas gzhan du gyur nas ni/_/snga ma rigs ni gzhan du 'gyur/_/gal te rigs sogs rtogs [#]pa can/_/gcig tu tha dad ma yin na/_/bcad pa'i don la 'dzin pa'i phyir/_/phyi ma dran pa'i blo dang mtshungs/_/spyi yi dngos po du ma yis/_/_
[\[48a.3\]]mi gsal ba ni rtogs she [#]na/_/de dang mtshungs min nges pa la/_/phyi ma phyi ma nges pa yin/_/sgro 'dogs rnam par gcod pa yi/_/ji ltar yul la rjes dpag la/_/de bzhin nges pa pa yis kyang /_/yul la sgro 'dogs rnams [#]gcod yin/_/sgro 'dogs rnam par bcad pa yi/_/_
[\[48a.4\]]yul can nyid kyis tshad ma yin/_/rjes su dpag pa tshad ma yin/_/yid la dran pa mngon sum gyi/_/rjes sogs sgro 'dogs sel bas yin/_/rtags las byung ba'i shes pa ni/_/tshad mar 'dod de khyed [#]la med/_/de nyid dang ni gzhan bdag nyid/_/rigs la sogs pa yod min
[\[48a.5\]]na/_/rtog pa dang bcas shes pa gang /_/mngon sum nyid du 'gyur ba min/_/rjes 'gro med pa'i tha dad las/_/tha dad par ni snang ba min/_/de nyid dang ni gzhan pa dag_/phan tshun spangs te gnas pa yang /_/rtog pa med pa'i shes pa yang /_/rtogs [#]bcas shes pa'i nus par
[\[48a.6\]]ldan/_/tha snyad ma lus yan lag ni[#]/_/de yi sgo nas 'byung ba yin/_/rtog med rtog bcas skyed nus min/_/yul tha dad phyir rtog med phyir/_/gzugs sogs rnam par shes pa bzhin/_/mig sogs rnam shes bzhin zhe na/_/[#]de dag dang yang rtog bcas dag[# ]/'dir ni
[\[48a.7\]]lhan cig 'gal ba min/_/don de nyid la nges 'byed phyir/_/yul ni tha dad pa yang min/_/dngos su na ni dmigs med la/_/rtog pa yang dag 'jug pa yin/_/de la yul nyid yod min na/_/gang gis tha dad yod pa yin[#]/_/gzugs sgra la sogs blo rnams kyi/_/rgyu ni
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]gzhan dang gzhan yod pas/_/de phyir gong du smras pa'i dpe/_/bsgrub byas stong pas 'di mi 'grub/_/me dang du ba sogs blo rnams/_/'bras bu rgyu yi ngo bo yis/_/'khrul pa kho na yin pas [#]yang /_/'di la gsal bar mtshon par bya/_/ma 'khrul pa zhes smos pas ni/_/_
[\[48b.2\]]skra shad 'dzings sogs [#]shes pa rnams/_/'khrul phyir tshad mar mi 'dod de/_/de rnams bsal phyir 'di byas so/_/kha cig yid kyi [#]'dod pa yang /_/de min dbang po yod na ni/_/yod la dbang po med min yang /_/nyams par gyur pa 'gyur ba yis/_/bsgyur ba yang ni
[\[48b.3\]]dmigs pa yin/_/sbrul la sogs pa 'khrul pa bzhin/_/yid kyi 'khrul pa ldog 'gyur zhing /_/gsal bar mi snang par yang 'gyur/_/de yod pa las yod pa ni/_/dngos su ma grub 'khrul pa yin/_/dran pa'i blo ni rjes 'jug pas/_/yid ni brgyud pa ma yin te/_/de
[\[48b.4\]]yi 'gyur bas bsgyur ba nyid/_/'di la'ang brgyud pas skye bar ni/_/mda' yi [#]shugs sogs las dag la[#]/_/'jig rten na yang gsal bar snang /_/yid kyis 'khrul pa thams cad ni/_/rnam par dpyad pas ldog 'gyur na/_/dngos po spyi yi blo rnams kyi[#]/_/'di la 'khrul pa
[\[48b.5\]]nyid yin no/_/dngos po'i rang gi mtshan nyid la/_/ngo bo nyid kyis de 'jug min/_/de bzhin de yi ldog pa yang /_/zla ba gnyis la sogs dang mtshungs/_/yod pa ldog pa ma yin te/_/spyi yi blo dang mtshungs she na/_/dbang phyug la sogs 'khrul pa rnams/_/de yi gzhung la [#]zhe na
[\[48b.6\]]rnams kyis/_/rigs pa bye ba snyed thos kyang /_/yod 'dod mi ldog slar la yang /_/de dag rigs pa ma yin zhes/_/skye ba [#]de dag rang nyid smra/_/de yod pa las yod pa nyid/_/dngos su ma grub [#]ces pa de/_/mi 'grub ma 'khrul rnams blo la/_/brgyud pa grub pa ma yin te/_/de ni shin tu med
[\[48b.7\]]ces bya/_/sems ni gzhan du zhe na gyur kyang /_/zla ba gnyis sogs snang ba yin/_/rgyun mi 'chad pa med pa'i phyir/_/brgyud pa las skye ma yin no/_/dngos po ma grub blo rnams ni/_/so sor sdud pa yod pa'i phyir/_/ldog bar gyur pa yod pa nyid/_/rang 'dod dbang phyug gzhung
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]yang ldog_/dung la ser sogs blo rnams kyang /_/don byed sogs la mi slu bas/_/gzhan dag tshad ma yin par 'dod/_/de yang don byed nus min te/_/gzhan du ha cang thal 'gyur phyir/_/skra shad 'dzings sogs par mi mthong /_/slu [#]ba'i shes pa'ang [#]mthong bar
[\[49a.2\]]'gyur/_/de phyir de yang tshad ma nyid/_/yin par bzlog par dka' bar 'gyur/_/kha dog las ni tha dad pa'i/_/dbyibs ni 'thad pa ma yin no/_/kha dog du ni snang ba can/_/mi slu bar ni mthong ba [#]yin/_/rnam pa la ni ma ltos par/_/gal te tshad mar rtog byed na/_/don byed pa la
[\[49a.3\]]mi slu bas/_/de yi ngo bo don la nges/_/de skad ces sogs smra ba kun/_/ji ltar 'gal bar 'gyur ma yin/_/bag chags smin pa'i rgyus bslang ba/_/de [#]phyir mi slu ma yin no/_/yid dang dbang po'i shes pa ni/_/rtog pa med par sgrub pa la/_/bde sogs rigs pa gang yin pa/_/rtog
[\[49a.4\]]pa med par sgrub byed yin/_/gzhan rig [#]byed pa'ang ma yin pa/_/rang rig ji ltar yin par dpyod/_/don gcig la rten [#]rnam shes ni/_/de dag rig par 'gyur zhe na/_/spyi yi dngos po la dmigs pa/_/rgyun mi 'chad par 'jug pa na/_/de tshe rgyun mi 'chad par yang /_/bde sogs
[\[49a.5\]]ci phyir rig pa yin/_/gal te yid kyis de rig pa/_/nyid du 'dod na'ang de min te/_/rim gyis skye bar byed smra bas/_/dus der de ni yod ma yin/_/cig car skye bar mi 'dod kyi/_/gnas pa de lta min zhe na/_/skad cig gis 'jig par bsgrubs pas/_/de la gnas pa zhes bya med/_/_
[\[49a.6\]]myur bar 'jug pa cig car bar/_/'khrul pa zhe na de la'ang bsal/_/dran pa'i shes pa'i spyod yul ni/_/gsal bar snang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/bde [#]dang bde min sogs ngo bo/_/de la'ang gal te 'khrul par ni/_/rtog na bde sogs de tsam du/_/yod pa'i mtshan nyid can du 'gyur/_
[\[49a.7\]]gang tshe rnal 'byor pas gzhan gyi/_/bde la sogs pa rig pa na/_/des kyang de bzhin mngon sum du/_/nyams su myong bar mtshungs par 'gyur/_/rang nyid kyis kyang sdug bsngal la'ang /_/yod nyid nyams myong khyed mi 'dod/_/'on kyang gzhan gyi rgyud de yi/_/yul la shes pa
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]de yang yod/_/gzhan gyis sdug bsngal rjes dpog pa'ang /_/de ni mtshungs te 'on kyang de/_/gzhan gyi sdug bsngal sogs yul zhes[#]/_/smra ba spyod yul ma yin no/_/bde dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa/_/bde ba nyid ces go 'gyur gyi/_/shes pa nyid ces go mi 'gyur/_/_
[\[49b.2\]]de ni shas min bum sogs bzhin/_/gal te 'di brda gzhan yin na/_/shes pa zhes bya'i blo de yang /_/sems la yod phyir de yi min/_/khyed la de yang shes mi 'gyur/_/gsal bar snang ba dngos yin phyir/_/de ni de ltar 'gyur ba min/_/bde [#]dang sdug bsngal bar mtshungs par/_/_
[\[49b.3\]]'di dag thams cad cis ma gyur/_/yang dag don bsgom las byung ba/_/rtog [#]dang 'khrul pa rnam spangs pa[#]/_/bshad pa rnal 'byor pas shes pa/_/dri med bsgrub par nus pa yi/_/yul rtogs pa'am rang rig pa/_/'di ni tshad ma'i 'bras bur 'dod/_/tshad ma nyid ni 'dra ba'am/_/reg
[\[49b.4\]]tu rung ba nyid kyang ngo /_/seng ldeng bcad par gyur pa yis[#]/_/pa la sha ni mi 'chad ltar/_/'jig rten na yang sta re [#]dang /_/gcad bya gcig 'dod min zhe na/_/de min rnam bzhag [#]la brten nas/_/bsgrub bya sgrub [#]byed yang dag gnas/_/rnam pa med pa'i shes pa la/_/rnam gzhag de ni mi
[\[49b.5\]]rigs so/_/de phyir tha dad par rtog na/_/gzhu la sogs bzhin yod pa yin/_/bskyed bya skyed byed nyid kyi ni/_/rnam par gzhag pa 'di mi 'dod/_/shing sogs sta gris bcad pa na/_/phye ba'i mtshams su zhugs pa la/_/chad pa zhes ni brjod pa yin/_/des na de nyid gcig
[\[49b.6\]]nyid ldog[# ]/rnam par bzhag par gyur pa nyid/_/bskyod bya skye [#]byed nyid du ni/_/gzhan du yang ni rnam brtags kyang /_/rnam bzhag [#]de ni 'gal ba min/_/byed pa zhugs pa'i de ma thag_/chad pa 'bras bu nyid min par/_/shes pa tshad ma ma yin te/_/'bras bu gzhan du 'dod pa
[\[49b.7\]]yin/_/rang rig 'bras bu nyid ce na/_/de ni bkag phyir mi rigs te/_/yul gyi rnam pa tshad ma ni/_/don ni tha dad 'gyur zhe na/_/thams cad ma rig [#]par 'gyur bas/_/dgag par nus pa ma yin no/_/tha dad don yang 'dir yod min/_/rang rig pa yang don rig 'dod/_/_
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]rang las tha dad bya ba byed/_/byed pa yin phyir tshad ma ste/_/ste'u la sogs bzhin zhe na/_/'bras bu med pa'ang [#]'bras gzhan phyir/_/smras pa'i rigs pas ste'u sogs la/_/'bras bu gzhan yang yod ma yin/_/byed pa po nyid kho bo la/_/ma grub brtags
[\[50a.2\]]pas skyed byed yin/_/'jog pa po nyid brtags [#]pa yin/_/'gal ba ci yang yod min pas/_/des na gtan tshigs [#]ma nges pa'o/_/'gal bar bstan pa ma yin phyir/_/rnam pa gzung ba dang mthun min/_/de phyir rigs gzhan nyid yin pas/_/gzugs dang ro sogs bzhin
[\[50a.3\]]shes pa/_/de nyid rigs pa min zhe na/_/gzung bar 'dzin pa rnams spangs shing /_/'di yang gzhan par rnams [#]bsal bar/_/thams cad rigs pa'i rjes 'brangs nas/_/kho bo cag kyang smra ba yin/_/bdag nyid thams cad kyi 'dra na/_/shes pa shes med nyid du 'gyur/_/cha
[\[50a.4\]]'gas 'dra ba yin na ni/_/kun kyang thams cad rig [#]byed 'gyur/_/'on kyang phyi [#]yi don yod par/_/smra la 'dra ba yod par ni/_/nges pa kho nar khas len par/_/bya phyir de ni bstan pa yin/_/shes pa rnams [#]bcas phyogs la yang /_/sems ni gzung ba las gzhan yang /_/de
[\[50a.5\]]yi gzugs brnyan ngo bo yis/_/phal pa yang ni rig tu rung /_/de yang rnam pa yod min pas/_/phyi rol rig pa'i snod ma yin/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid brtag pa ste nyi shu rtsa gcig [#]pa'o//_//rang dang gzhan don dbye ba
[\[50a.6\]]yis/_/rjes dpag rnam pa gnyis su 'dod/_/rang don tshul gsum pa'i rtags las/_/dpag bya'i don ni shes pa yis/_/tshul gsum pa yi rtags brjod pa/_/gzhan gyi [#]don du'ang bstan pa yin/_/tshul re'am [#]gnyis gnyis don ldan pa/_/de phyir rtags ltar snang
[\[50a.7\]]bar 'dod/_/gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid ni/_/gtan tshigs gsha' mar ma mthong min/_/yan lag gsum yang yod min pa/_/de phyir mtshan nyid gsum dman [#]pa'i/_/gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid ni/_/gang 'di gtan tshigs yin par 'dod/_/'di ni mtshan nyid gcig pa'i don/_/mtshan
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]nyid bzhi pa'ang ma yin no/_/dper na bu gsum yod pa la'ang /_/de yi bu gcig gces pa'i phyir/_/bu gcig pa zhes 'jig rten smra/_/de bzhin 'dir yang blta bar bya/_/med na mi 'byung 'brel ba'i phyir/_/nam yang tshul gsum la yod min/_/gzhan du mi srid pa yi char/_/gcig
[\[50b.2\]]ni gtan tshigs la yod dmigs/_/gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid ni/_/gang yin de nyid gtan tshigs te/_/dpe gnyis yod dam med kyang rung /_/de yi rgyu nyid ma yin no/_/gang na gzhan du mi 'thad yod/_/der ni gsum gyis ci zhig bya/_/sngo bsangs yin te pha de'i bu/_/yin phyir
[\[50b.3\]]cig shos snang ba bzhin/_/'dir ni tshul gsum pa yin yang /_/nges pa'i phyir ni 'jug pa min/_/de yi dpe gnyis ma gtogs pa/_/mtshan nyid gcig gi gtan tshigs so/_/dngos po'am dngos med yod bdag nyid/_/ji ltar yang ni dmigs phyir ro/_/zla ba nyid ces brjod
[\[50b.4\]]pa'i phyir/_/ri bong gis mtshan zla min min/_/'di ni mtshan nyid gnyis pa'o/_/gtan tshigs gzhan yang brjod bya ste/_/mchu sbrang babs pa'i reg pa las/_/byung ba dmigs par 'gyur ba ni/_/mchu sbrang bcas pas tshor ba 'di/_/byas pa yin zhes nges par shes/_/gzugs 'dzin pa yi bya ba la/_/_
[\[50b.5\]]mig ni nus dang shin tu ldan/_/de la bya ba byed phyir dang /_/de ni mthong ba'i phyir yang ngo /_/gzhan yang bdag dang bum pa sogs/_/ji ltar yang ni med bdag nyid/_/ji ltar yang ni ma dmigs phyir/_/bong bu dang 'brel rwa [#]bzhin no/_/ri bong rwa la sogs pa yang /_/ji ltar yang ni yod bdag nyid/_/ji ltar yang ni
[\[50b.6\]]dmigs phyir te/_/dper na bdag dang bu sogs bzhin/_/khyed kyi pha yang khyim 'di na/_/yod do zhes ni shes bya ste/_/khyed kyi pha yi skad nyid ni/_/khyim 'di na ni grag phyir ro/_/sgra dang mar me sogs dngos la/_/gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid do/_/phyogs kyi chos dngos med na yang /_/rtogs
[\[50b.7\]]par byed pa nyid du'ang mthong /_/des na mtshan nyid gcig pa yi/_/gtan tshigs rtogs byed gtso bo yin/_/don med phyogs chos sogs gzhan gyi/_/brtag pas khyed la ci zhig bya/_/mtshan nyid 'di ldan gtan tshigs de/_/de ci spyi yis rtogs bya'am/_/shes par 'dod
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]pa'i bye brag gi_/chos gzhan yin nam 'on te dpe/_/der ni spyi yis rtogs she na/_/bsgrub par bya ba'i chos can la/_/gtan tshigs yod par bstan pa na/_/brjod 'dod 'grub pa min pa ste[#]/_/dper na mig gis gzung bya ni/_/mi rtag pa la 'khrul pa nyid/_/_
[\[51a.2\]]spyi yis go bar byed de yang /_/sgra yang de ni sgrub byed min/_/de la chos can yod gyur par/_/shes bya zhe na de lta na/_/tshul gsum po ni khyed cag gi_/gzhung lugs la yang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid ni/_/log dang rjes 'gro dag tu rtogs/_/de ni chos can
[\[51a.3\]]la yod phyir/_/phyogs kyi chos la brten pa yi/_/gzung bya'i chos la de yi chos/_/khyab pa'i gtan tshigs 'di ltar na'o/_/'di 'dra'i mdor bsdus mtshan nyid ni/_/slob dpon gyis kyang rgyas par bstan/_/'on te gtan tshigs mtshan nyid 'di/_/chos can nyid la shes bya na/_/_
[\[51a.4\]]gang gis tshad mar de grub kyang /_/de las bsgrub bya'ang nges par grub/_/bsgrub bya rtogs par ma gyur na/_/gtan tshigs la yang nges pa med/_/gzhan las bsgrub bya grub na ni/_/des na gtan tshigs las nges pas/_/phan tshun rten [#]pa'i skyon yang ste/_/gnyis las cig shos
[\[51a.5\]]ma grub pas/_/gzhan pa'ang nges pa ma yin no/_/dpe yi yin na de grub kyang /_/bsgrub bya'i chos can blor mi 'gyur/_/de yis thams cad bsdus pa la/_/khyab par nges pa ma yin no/_/gang yang ji ltar yang dmigs phyir/_/zhes bya'i gtan tshigs 'dir smras pa/_/phyi la yul
[\[51a.6\]]nyid med pa ste/_/the tshom can phyir 'bras bu med/_/dngos po'i de yi bdag nyid nyid/_/thams cad la ni rnam nges nyid/_/ji ltar yang ni bsgrub byar de/_/gang gis 'di skad rjod par byed/_/'gyur ba'i bdag nyid sogs dbye bas/_/dngos kun gcig par smra ba yang /_/ci nas kyang
[\[51a.7\]]ni yod pa yi/_/bdag nyid nyid du ston par byed/_/gang zhig dngos por gnas pa kun/_/rang bzhin med nyid la brten pa/_/de yang de kho na nyid du/_/zhes [#]sogs bye brag la brtan [#]pa'o/_/gzhan du yang ni ji ltar yang /_/dmigs pa nyid ni mi 'grub bo/_/tha snyad nyid du bsgrub bya la/_/_
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]dpe [#]ni grub par gyur pa min/_/zla ba nyid ces brjod pa na/_/mthun pa'i phyogs la'ang rjes 'jug ste/_/la lar mi 'am gzhan yang ste/_/ga pur dngul skya sogs pa la'o/_/zla ba nyid sgrub gtan tshigs la/_/thun mong min pa nyid gsungs pa/_/grags pa las ni tha dad pa/_/dngos
[\[51b.2\]]po'i ngo bo la brten pa'o/_/mchu sbrang bcas pas byas pa nyid/_/khyad par mthong ba ma yin te/_/mchu sbrang bcas pa'i reg pa las/_/byung ba dmigs par gyur pa yang /_/de yi bcas pa zhes bya ba/_/gtan tshigs khyad par nges pa dgos/_/gzhan du 'khrul pa nyid yin pa/_/bzlog
[\[51b.3\]]par dka' bar thal bar 'gyur/_/'bras bu nyid kyi tha snyad ni/_/brjod pa yin pas bsgrub bya na/_/gal te gong du grub pa'i dpes/_/bsgrub pa yin na tshul gsum 'gyur/_/chos can mig gi ngo bo la/_/yod pa re zhig des mig [#]nyid/_/ma grub sogs par thal 'gyur bas/_/_
[\[51b.4\]]de ni bsgrub par mi rigs so/_/'on kyang gzugs ni yod gyur kyang /_/mig gi [#]rnam shes mi 'byung ba/_/de nyid tsam gyis nam du yang /_/de rnams [#]rtogs byed ma yin gyi/_/rang gi rgyu yis nges pa las/_/skye ba myu gu sogs pa'ang [#]yod/_/de ni dpe yang de bzhin du/_/mtshan nyid gsum
[\[51b.5\]]par shin tu gsal/_/bum pa la sogs ji ltar yang /_/med pa'i bdag nyid du bsgrub [#]pa/_/rang bzhin gtan tshigs 'bras med pa'am/_/shin tu ma grub par yang mthong /_/'di la'ang chos mi mthun pa'i dpe/_/gsal bar yod pa min na ni/_/de rnams nyid kyi ngo bo ni/_/mi
[\[51b.6\]]mthun phyogs nyid du 'gyur ro/_/me bdag nyid la ji ltar yang /_/med pa'i bdag nyid du bsgrub [#]pa'ang /_/'dod pa grub pa'am [#]ma grub pa'i/_/de bzhin mi mthun phyogs su'ang 'gyur/_/pha yi skad thos gang yin pa'ang /_/khyim na pha yod par grub la/_/pha dang 'brel pa nyid yin na/_/gtan
[\[51b.7\]]tshigs mtshan nyid gsum par gsal/_/la lar pha dang 'brel pa'i skad/_/sngar ni nye bar dmigs pa ni/_/sngan chad nyams su ma myong na/_/gtan tshigs ma grub par bzlog dka'/_/gang du sngan chad dmigs pa'am/_/gang du de na dmigs pa la/_/rjes su 'gro dang ldog
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]pa dag_/der ni rnams [#]pa gsal bar mthong /_/shes pa'i byed pa'i sgra yi don/_/ji ltar yang ni phyi rol min/_/gzhan yod ma yin dngos min phyir/_/brjod par 'dod pa 'di [#]nyid ni/_/go byed yin par de bsgrub na/_/mtshan nyid gsum par shin tu gsal/_/_
[\[52a.2\]]brjod 'dod mngon du ma gyur pa/_/yin na sgra ni sbyor mi byed/_/mar me nyid ni sngo sogs la/_/rtags nyid las ni shes byed min/_/shes pa skyed par rung ba ni/_/byung [#]ba yin phyir de skad brjod/_/shes byed rtags kyi dngos yin na/_/phyogs kyi chos la sogs pa soms/_/gzhan du mi
[\[52a.3\]]sogs de lta bur/_/ci yi phyir na rtsod mi byed/_/gzhan du mi 'thad [#]pa nyid du/_/mig gis bzung [#]ba cis mi bsgrub/_/phyogs kyi chos dang bral bas na/_/de phyir mtshan nyid gcig pa dman/_/tshul gcig pa gang smras pa ni/_/tshul gnyis pa nyid mtshon par byed/_/tshul gnyis pa
[\[52a.4\]]rnams smras pa yis/_/phyogs kyi chos las tshul gsum pa'o/_/gzhan du mi 'thad pa nyid kyis/_/'phangs phyir zhe [#]na de min te/_/gzhan du'ang sgra la sogs pa la/_/mig gis gzung bya 'di nyid 'dod/_/de'i bu yin phyir sogs gtan tshigs/_/mi mthun phyogs dang 'gal min
[\[52a.5\]]phyir/_/ldog pa the tshom za ba des[#]/_/tshul gsum po ni yod ma yin/_/de ni [#]bu yi bu yin yang /_/las dang kha zas sogs rnams kyi/_/rgyu yi dbye bas thams cad du'ang /_/dngos po gzhan du 'gyur ba yin/_/'di ni 'bras bu'am rang bzhin nam/_/snang ba mi dmigs nyid kyang
[\[52a.6\]]min/_/de las tha dad pa min na/_/'khrul pa med pa nyid du 'gyur/_/gal te ma 'khrul pa nyid ni/_/gzhan pa rnams la'ang mthong ba ste/_/dper na ku mu da la sogs/_/kha bye rgya mtsho 'phel ba la/_/zla ba 'char ba rtags yin zhing /_/gdung byed yod par mthong ba las/_/cha gzhan dag
[\[52a.7\]]na grib ma ni/_/yod par rab tu shes pa yin/_/mun par mgal dum tshig [#]mthong bas/_/ring nas du ba dpogs [#]par byed/_/smin drug shar ba las kyang na/_/snar ma nye ba [#]yin par rtog[# ]/'di la gtan tshigs chos de ni/_/de lta bur ni rtogs pa yin/_/gang las byung ba de rnams dang /_/_
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]dus gcig pa gzhan de kun rtogs/_/de lta bu yi dbye ba 'di/_/'bras bu las ni rgyu grub pa'o/_/'brel pa nyid ni mi 'thad na/_/thams cad kun kyang rtogs byed 'gyur/_/smin drug 'char ba'i rgyur gyur pa/_/rlung gi khyad par gang yin pa'i/_/tshogs pa yin pa de dag ni/_/snar
[\[52b.2\]]ma nye ba'i rgyu yin no/_/rgyu yi chos ni shes pa las/_/de phyir de ni shes par 'dod/_/rang dbang du ni de shes pa/_/'di gzhan su yang yod ma yin/_/gzugs brnyan du brjod rtags las ni/_/rjes su dpag pa 'jug pa yin/_/gang zhig lus kyi yul ldan min/_/gzhan
[\[52b.3\]]las 'bras bu'i rtags skye min/_/dngos med gzugs brnyan dang lhan cig_/gnyis ni gcig na yod min na/_/dam pa'i don du de nyid ni/_/ji ltar de 'brel ldan zhe na/_/gzhan du lus dang gzugs brnyan dag_/dngos por yod pa ma yin no/_/der snang ba yi rnam shes ni/_/_
[\[52b.4\]]gang gis dngos po med par 'gyur/_/de nyid 'dir ni rtags nyid de/_/de nyid 'bras bu yin par 'dod/_/de lta'i bdag po'i rkyen lus gang /_/dmigs pa med la 'jug pa yin/_/gzhan don la ni dam bcas sogs/_/tshogs gzhan dag kyang brjod pa ni/_/sgrub [#]pa'i yan
[\[52b.5\]]lag gyur min phyir/_/dam bcas pa [#]ni mkho ba min/_/'brel pa med pa'i [#]phyir dngos su[#]/_/don dang ldan par rtogs byed min/_/mtshon par byed nus ma yin phyir/_/brgyud pas kyang ni rigs ma yin/_/bsgrub bya sgrub byed chos dag gi_/yul la gtso bo ma yin phyir/_/de
[\[52b.6\]]ni dpe yi tshig bzhin du/_/gal te sgrub byed yan lag tu/_/'dod na khas len sogs tshig gis/_/gzhan du 'khrul pa ma yin no/_/yul ni nye bar ston byed na/_/'dir yang 'di ni 'bras bu med/_/phyogs la sbyor med ji ltar na/_/mthun pa'i phyogs su gzhag ce na/_/_
[\[52b.7\]]tshul gsum po ni med na yang /_/phyogs 'dren pa yi rgyu mtshan yin/_/phyogs la sogs pa brtags pa ste/_/phyogs brjod pa ni yod ma yin/_/bstan bcos kyi ni rab dbye bas/_/de ltar tha snyad 'dogs pa yin/_/yang na de yang gnas skabs kyi/_/don la brten nas 'gal
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]ba med/_/gzhan yang sgrub par byed pa na/_/tshig gi cha yis smra mi bya/_/shes par 'dod pa'i bye brag la/_/brten nas phyogs kyi chos nyid de/_/de ni mthun phyogs dang 'dra phyir/_/mi mthun phyogs la'ang de med pas/_/dam bcas brjod pa ma yin zhing /_/_
[\[53a.2\]]rgyu ni brjod pa ma yin pas/_/nye bar sbyar bar brjod par bya/_/yod par grub pa ma yin te/_/sngon du dngos po tsam brjod cing /_/phyi nas khyab pa bstan par bya/_/rjod 'dod don ni grub pas na/_/'dra ba la ni 'bras bu med/_/tshul gsum pa yi rtags bstan [#]pa'i/_/shugs nyid
[\[53a.3\]]kyis ni grub pas na/_/phyin ci log ni dgos med pas/_/mjug sdud bzhi don med pa'o/_/'brel med nyid kyi tshig gis ni/_/don gcig par ni rtog [#]byed par/_/'brel ba de grub bya ba'i phyir/_/mjug sdud logs su brjod bya min/_/rjes su dpag pa rnam gnyis pa[#]/_/kha cig
[\[53a.4\]]gzhan du smra bar byed/_/khyad par du ni mthong ba dang /_/spyir mthong ba yi dbye bas so/_/'brel pa mngon sum mthong ba ni/_/gang dag yin nyid khyad par te/_/ba lang lci bas de yi phyogs/_/khyad par la sogs blor byas pa'o/_/phyogs de na yod de nyid ni/_/sngon nas dus
[\[53a.5\]]gzhan tshe na yang /_/de sngon yang dang yang shes pas/_/me gang yin pa der [#]shes 'gyur/_/yod la the tshom zab la/_/yod par rtogs phyir tshad ma ste/_/de yang khyad par mthong ba zhes/_/ri bo 'bigs byed la gnas smra/_/me dang du ba gzhan nyid de/_/spyi nyid kyi ni glo bur 'dod/_/_
[\[53a.6\]]spyir mthong ba la gcig tu ni/_/'di'o zhes sogs smra ba ni/_/de 'dir skad cig gis 'jig pas/_/khyab pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir/_/de nyid kyis na sngar bstan nyid/_/rjes su dpag par 'gyur ma yin/_/gal te rgyun lag gcig nyid du/_/btags par 'dod pa yin zhe na/_/_
[\[53a.7\]]de ni gang na 'ang yod min te/_/dngos po nyid kyi dngos min phyir/_/yul med tshad ma ma yin par/_/khyed cag rjes su sems pa yin/_/rnam par brtags pa'i don nyid 'di/_/yul med par ni gsal bar 'gyur/_/gsal ba'i ngo bo zhig na yang /_/de dag rigs nyid du gnas
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]na/_/gal te skad cig gis 'jig pa/_/min na de yang rtag nyid 'byung /_/'brel pa mngon sum mthong bar 'gyur/_/gang yin pa nyid khyad par zhes/_/nges pa 'di yang khyed cag ni/_/rgyu gang gis ni smra bar byed/_/lan cig rjes dpag gis mthong ba/_/de nyid la ni rjes
[\[53b.2\]]dpog pa/_/gang phyir snga ma shes las khyod/_/med pas tshad mar mi 'dod do/_/rtogs pa'i don la rtogs byed phyir/_/gal te 'di ni dran pa bzhin/_/tshad ma yin na snga mas kyang /_/de dang mtshungs par cis ma mthong /_/bar du the tshom skyes pas ni/_/bzlog phyir de ni lhag
[\[53b.3\]]ba yin/_/zhe na de dag 'dir yang ni/_/ci zhig gis ni mtshungs ma yin/_/de phyir ci 'di yod dam med/_/ces byas the tshom bzlog byas pas/_/the tshom med pa nyid ni zhes/_/spyi ni de ltar mthong ba yin/_/kha cig rjes su dpag pa ni/_/tshad ma ma [#]yin zhes bya ba/_/brjod 'dod
[\[53b.4\]]tshig gis rig byed par/_/'dod pa'i log par lta ba'o/_/rang don rjes dpag mi rigs te/_/tshul gsum pa'i rtags sngon 'gro'i phyir/_/'dod pa la gnod skyed byed pa/_/log pa'i shes pa bzhin smra grag_/rjes su dpag pa'ang dngos por med/_/rjes su dpog pa'i
[\[53b.5\]]rgyu yang med/_/tshul gnyis pa yi rtags bzhin du/_/tshul gsum med pas rjes dpag med/_/rjes su dpag pa dang 'gal ba'i/_/'gal ba rnams ni bsgrub pa na/_/'on kyang 'gal ba mi 'khrul bas/_/thams cad la ni 'byung ba [#]yin/_/yul dang dus dang gnas skabs
[\[53b.6\]]kyi/_/dbye bas nus pa tha dad pa'i/_/dngos po rnams kyi rjes dpag gis/_/'grub pa shin tu rnyed par dka'/_/dngos po rnams ni de dang ni/_/don byed par ni nus pa la/_/khyad par can gyi rjes 'brel pas/_/de yi nus pa'i bar du gcod/_/rjes dpag la ni mkhas rnams
[\[53b.7\]]kyis[#]/_/'bad pas rjes dang gdon [#]la yang /_/shin tu 'bad pa gzhan dag gis/_/gzhan du yang ni sgrub par byed/_/gzhan don rjes dpag smra ba po/_/la ltos pas ni tshad ma min/_/rjes su brjod phyir des na 'di/_/rang nyid kyis don rtogs ma yin/_/thos pa po la ltos
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]pa'i phyir/_/de na rang don nyid du 'thad/_/thos dang mthong 'di rigs pa la/_/gang gtso 'di yi khyad par ci/_/gzhan don rjes su dpag pa nyid/_/tshig de thos pa ma ltos min/_/nyan pa'i rgyud kyi rnam shes kyi/_/rgyu nyid yin phyir shes byed phyir/_/dbang po ji lta
[\[54a.2\]]ba bzhin no/_/dngos su dpag bya gsal byed min/_/de phyir 'di [#]med mi 'byung ba'o/_/'brel pa can gyi shes pa bzhin/_/'on te gzhan don nyid gzhan las/_/log pa la brten phyir zhe na/_/rang don la yang de yod phyir/_/gzhan gyi don du thal bar 'gyur/_/tshul gsum par
[\[54a.3\]]brtags [#]sngon 'gro nyid/_/nges par mi slu'i [#]mtshan nyid can/_/mtshan nyid de ldan tshad ma nyid/_/de phyir de ni ci phyir bdag_/phyogs snga ma la ltos nas ni/_/'dod pa la gnod skyed byed pa/_/log pa'i shes pa dang mtshungs pa'i/_/shes par smras kyang dngos po min/_/mi slu bar ni
[\[54a.4\]]nges pa yi[#]/_/dngos po la yod shes pa de/_/smra ba po 'dod gzhan min pa/_/de phyir de nyid tshad mar 'dod/_/de phyir gtan tshigs 'gal ba nyid/_/dpe la'ang bsgrub bya nyid med pa'i/_/rnam pa de dag nyid kyis ni/_/gtan tshigs gnyis pa ma grub pa'o/_/gang de de yi bdag nyid dang /_/de
[\[54a.5\]]las byung ba'i 'brel par nges/_/de bzhin sgrub ba sgrub [#]byed pa/_/yin par rigs pa [#]gsungs pa bstan/_/'di ltar sgrub pa'i rjes dpag la/_/'gal ba la sogs yod ma yin/_/rang bzhin gtan tshigs dag med par/_/de ni gang na'ang srid ma yin/_/phan tshun 'gal ba'i chos
[\[54a.6\]]dag kyang /_/dngos po gcig pa mi rigs te/_/de ni 'gal ba mi 'khrul pa/_/can du gyur pa ma yin no/_/mtshan nyid la ni goms rnams kyi/_/rtags ni yang dag rnams [#]nges pa'i/_/rjes su dpag [#]pa la 'jug gi/_/gzhan ni rjes dpag yin par brjod/_/yul dang dus dang gnas
[\[54a.7\]]skabs kyis/_/dbye ba [#]pa tha dad pa [#]la/_/dngos po rnams ni rjes dpag gis/_/de sgrub shin tu rnyed dka' min/_/rjes dpag la ni mkhas rnams kyis/_/'bad pas rjes su dpag don la/_/shin tu 'bad pa gzhan gyis kyang /_/gzhan du bsgrub par nus ma yin/_/rang bzhin
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]dag [#]ni 'bras bu dag_/rang bzhin dang ni rgyu min las/_/rang bzhin dang ni 'bras yod min/_/tha dad pa dang rgyu min 'gyur/_/de dag med pa'i rjes dpag med/_/tshul gsum pa yi rtags kyi tshig_/nus pa'i [#]mtshon byed nyid yin pas/_/gzhan don rjes dpag gang yin nyid/_/_
[\[54b.2\]]nyan pa la ltos nas de gsungs/_/rjes dpag nyid la brten nas ni/_/brdar btags [#]can nyid pa la pa'o/_/nus pa mtshon byed nyid yin pa[#]/_/des na ha cang thal 'gyur min/_/rjes dpag tshad ma ma yin zhes/_/khyed kyis smras pa 'bras med de/_/tshig gang gis kyang brjod 'dod
[\[54b.3\]]pa/_/ston par nus pa ma yin no/_/'jig rten pa yi rtags 'dod kyi/_/gzhan ni brtag brtags nus min zhe na/_/'jig rten 'bras stsogs gtan tshigs la/_/stsogs pas rtogs pa ma yin pa/_/gzhan gyis de nyid bstan par ni/_/rigs pa gsung pas [#]kyang spyod min/_/'jig rten pa
[\[54b.4\]]de khas blangs pa/_/khyed la 'dor bar 'gyur ram ci/_/tshad ma min pa de yin no/_/gzhan gyis ci zhig rtogs par byed/_/tshad ma min la'ang [#]'dir byas pa/_/ci 'dra ba las yid ches 'gyur/_/rjes dpag tshad ma ma yin te/_/smra ba po yi [#]tshig nyid ni/_/ston byed bdag nyid ma yin
[\[54b.5\]]pa/_/des ni de bzhin 'gyur zhe na/_/mi shes don ston ma yin phyir/_/de ni tshad ma mi 'dod pa/_/de min nus pa mtshon byed pas/_/khyed kyi dang ni mtshungs ma yin/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las rjes su dpag pa brtag pa ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis [#]pa'o//_//_
[\[54b.6\]]sgra las byung dang nyer 'jal sogs/_/tshad ma gzhan yod ma yin nam[#]/_/tshad ma gnyis po kho na yi/_/mtshan nyid ci phyir ston par byed/_/smras pa gnyis po las gzhan pa'i/_/tshad ma 'thad pa ma yin te/_/tshad ma'i mtshan nyid mi ldan pa'am/_/ldan na'ang 'di yi khong [#]gtogs
[\[54b.7\]]phyir/_/gzhan ni sgra las byung ba yi/_/shes pas don rtogs sgra las byung /_/de yang byed pas ma byas pa'am/_/yang na yid ches tshig yin zer/_/'di ni [#]lkog tu gyur pa yi/_/yul can yin phyir mngon sum min/_/rjes dpag tu yang mi 'thad de/_/de yi mtshan nyid bral phyir
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]ro/_/chos kyi bye brag ldan chos can/_/de ni rtags can du rab nges/_/ji srid de yul ma gyur pa/_/de srid rjes su dpag pa min/_/'di la chos can du rtog gang /_/de nyid dpag bya yin na ni/_/de nyid nges par ma gyur pas[#]/_/de yi chos ni nges mi 'gyur/_/_
[\[55a.2\]]gal te snga rol phyogs chos nyid/_/des na de yi 'og rol tu/_/phyogs chos sogs kyi shes bya [#]gang /_/gang gis rjes dpag nyid du 'gyur/_/gzhal bya'i don la nges rtogs pa'o/_/rjes su 'gro ba sgra la med/_/yod pa yis ni thams cad kyi/_/rjes su 'jug pa rtogs par bya[#]/_/_
[\[55a.3\]]gang na du ba yod de na/_/me med rjes 'gro med par gsal/_/de bzhin gang na sgra yod pa/_/de na yod par nges min te/_/de [#]ltar sa phyogs de na med/_/de yi dus na'ang med shes bya/_/rtag cing khyab phyir yod ce na/_/sgra rnams thams cad der mtshungs pa/_/des na kun du mthong ba'i
[\[55a.4\]]phyir/_/ldog pa'ang [#]grub par mi 'gyur te/_/sgra rnams kun gyi [#]ma lus pa'i/_/don rnams brtags par thal bar 'gyur/_/de phyir sgra las byung ba la/_/de 'dra'i yul ni med pa'i phyir/_/tshul gsum po nyid dang bral bas/_/rjes dpag ma yin mngon sum bzhin/_/me la sbyin sreg
[\[55a.5\]]stsogs tshig gis/_/mi g.yo'i shes pa skye ba las/_/de ni tshad ma nyid yin pa'ang /_/'di ni bzlog par nus pa min/_/de la byed pos ma byas pa'o/_/tshig dang don dag kyang med pa/_/de phyir mi srid par bstan pa/_/sgra las byung ba'i mtshan nyid gcig_/nus dang nus min ngo bo yis/_/_
[\[55a.6\]]thams cad du yang rjes 'jug phyir/_/rtag tu rnam shes de 'byung ba'am/_/nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro[#]/_/de ltar brdzun pa nyid kyi rgyu/_/zhe sdang gti mug sogs nyes pa/_/de bzhin bden pa nyid kyi rgyu/_/shes rab snying rje sogs shes bya/_/de yi rten [#]nyid med pa la/_/de dag kyang
[\[55a.7\]]ni srid pa min/_/de phyir don med nyid 'gyur ba'am/_/sgra ni skyes bu rten 'thob pa/_/don rtogs she'am min na ste/_/'di ni bstan pa'i [#]las yin no/_/dngos su don mthong bar 'dod pa/_/skyes bu'i rang 'dod kyis [#]yin gyi/_/yang dag don gsal nus pa ni/_/rang bzhin nyid kyis yod ce
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]na/_/rang bzhin tha dad pa de can/_/brdar [#]shes pa nyid ma yin yang /_/de las don rtogs 'gyur ba yin/_/rang bzhin gyis gsal mar me ni/_/brda la ltos pa ma yin no/_/brda nyid gzhan du 'gyur ba na/_/don kyang gzhan 'gyur sgra las min/_/brda yod gyur kyang sgron mas ni/_/_
[\[55b.2\]]dri ro la sogs gsal byed min/_/rnam par rig par bya ba ni/_/de yi nus pas nus min pa/_/de las mi g.yo gang ma 'gyur[#]/_/de yang brda can la rigs te/_/skyes bu'i tshig dang dbyer med do/_/rigs pa shes pas de dag gi/_/dbye ba gang yang rtogs mi 'gyur/_/rig byed 'don
[\[55b.3\]]pa rigs pa'o/_/lam las mi g.yo 'di mi rtogs/_/yid ches pa nyid mi 'dod pas/_/sgra las byung ba gnyis pa yang /_/_mi bzod 'dod na de nyid do/_/zhes bya'i rnam par nges pa med/_/gang gi tshig las mi slu bar/_/lan grangs du mar mthong ba yi/_/yid ches gyur pa de yi
[\[55b.4\]]tshig_/lkog rtogs phyir ni gzung [#]zhe na/_/snga rol dag tu mi slu ba'ang /_/dus nyid tshe na yid ches min/_/dus gcig nyid ni [#]mi slu ste/_/thams cad du ni nges pa min/_/tshig dang phyi ma'i dngos dag las/_/'brel pa yang ni ci yod na/_/gang gis de rtogs gyur pa las/_/'di ni
[\[55b.5\]]tshad ma nyid du 'gyur/_/dbang po tha dad sogs 'dzin pas/_/'khrul phyir bdag nyid gcig min zhing /_/de las 'byung min ma 'khrul ba/_/gzhan ni yod pa ma yin no/_/ma lus pa yi tshig dag las/_/rjes su bsam pa rjes dpag ste/_/mngon sum mi dmigs pa dag las/_/_
[\[55b.6\]]de'i rgyu de yang nges pa yin/_/'khrul pa'am bsam pa gzhan pa la/_/tshig gzhan par ni mthong ba ste/_/de phyir bsam pa ji lta bar/_/de ni 'jug pa ma yin no/_/'khrul dang ma 'khrul sbyor ba rnams/_/mtshan nyid khyad par can du gsal/_/mkhas dang skabs la sogs pa yi/_/_
[\[55b.7\]]des byas tshig gis nus pa'o/_/mtshan nyid khyad par can gyur pa'i/_/rgyu las de yi bye brag ste/_/gang zhig shes pa ma yin pa'i/_/nges pa 'di yin rtags kyi min/_/yod gnyis ldan pa'i du ba'i dngos/_/dus gcig tshe na gzhan gyur pas/_/nges pa'i dus su'ang du ba ni/_/_
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]me yi rtags su mi 'gyur ro/_/bsam pa de rnams gcig pu ni/_/rjes dpog yin par 'gal ba med/_/nges par yod pa nyid kyi phyir/_/srog chags bcas sogs bsgrub pa yi/_/bsam ba rtogs par bya ba la/_/tshul gsum po nyid rnams gsal
[\[56a.2\]]nyid/_/me ni chos can bsgrub bya ni/_/'bras bu tshig gang las rtogs te/_/me 'di shing gi bsam pa dang /_/ldan pa yin par shes byas te/_/shing gi sgra las rab sbyor phyir/_/dper na sngon dus bdag bzhin no/_/de phyir phyi las pha rol po/_/tshul gsum sogs gsal sgra
[\[56a.3\]]rnams la/_/de la kho bo 'ang tshad ma nyid/_/yin pa nyid du'ang 'dod ma yin/_/gang du de [#]rnams mngon 'dod de/_/tshul gsum pa nyid yin par gsal/_/gang phyir bsam pa bsgrub pa las/_/mtshan nyid khyad par can du bstan/_/de lta yin na sgra nyid ni/_/tshul gsum po nyid
[\[56a.4\]]dang ldan pas/_/de 'dra'i yul na yod pa'i phyir/_/du ba sogs bzhin rjes dpag yin/_/sgra las byung ba rnam par dpyad pa'o/_/[#]gang gis ba men ci 'dra zhes/_/grong pa dag gis dris pa na/_/ba lang ci 'dra de 'dra zhes/_/'brog pas smras pa lta bu'o/_/nye bar 'jal bar grags
[\[56a.5\]]ldan pa/_/de la slar yang ri khrod pas/_/byas pa'i lung las de nyid kyis/_/nang du 'dus par gzhan smras pa/_/ba lang mthong nas 'brog gnas pa'i/_/ba men [#]gang tshe mthong ba na/_/mgrin pa zlum pa'i rnam pa la/_/yan lag pa la char 'dra bar snang /_/de tshe ba min du shes
[\[56a.6\]]pa/_/gzugs tsam khong du chud pa ni/_/mngon sum nyid yin gang yang gzhan/_/bye brag gis ni rtogs bya ste/_/ba lang dang 'dra'i gzugs can 'di/_/de phyir 'di 'dra 'di phyugs zhes/_/dbang po'i byed pa yod pa las[#]/_/skyes phyir mngon sum nyid du 'dod/_/der ni gal te ba lang
[\[56a.7\]]nyid/_/dran pa'i shes pa skyes pa de/_/ba men [#]nye ba na gnas phyir/_/dbang po'i yul du 'gyur ba yin/_/spyi bzhin du ni 'dra ba nyid/_/re re la yang tshang ba yin[#]/_/ma mthong na yang 'dra ba yin[#]/_/de phyir de ni dmigs pa ste/_/'dra bar 'ang [#]dngos po yin pa la/_/gnod par nus
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]pa ma yin no/_/de ni [#]rigs pa gzhan na yang /_/yan lag mang pos 'dra bas 'brel/_/gnas skabs de nyid tshe na yang /_/des na de yi phyugs nyid du/_/mtshungs pa'i rnam shes gang skyes pa/_/de yi dpe ni ba lang gzugs/_/de phyir bye brag can nyid du/_/'dra bas gang zhig
[\[56b.2\]]dran pa de/_/'dra ba nyid la de brten nas/_/nye bar 'jal bas [#]gzhal byar 'gyur/_/mngon sum gyis ni rtogs pa dang /_/'dra ba'i ba lang dran pa na/_/nye bar 'jal ba'i tshad ma las/_/khyad par can gzhan grub pa ste/_/ji ltar sa phyogs mngon sum gyur/_/me nyid kyang ni dran
[\[56b.3\]]bzhin pa'i/_/khyad par can gyi [#]yul nyid kyis/_/rjes dpag tshad ma ma yin min/_/rnam shes [#]de ni mngon sum nyid/_/yin par rigs pa ma yin te/_/don dang dbang por mngon 'brel pa'i/_/bya ba de tshe med phyir ro/_/tshul gsum po nyid mi 'thad pas/_/rjes dpag nyid ni de
[\[56b.4\]]la med/_/'dir ni phyogs chos la sogs pa/_/med par ji ltar brtag [#]par bya/_/gzhal bya yi ni 'dra ba nyid/_/chos kyi snga rol gzung ba min/_/ba men [#]gzung bar gyur pa ni/_/ba lang rjes dpog ma yin te/_/dam bca'i don dang yul gcig phyir/_/ba lang la yod rtags nyid
[\[56b.5\]]min/_/'brel pa med phyir ba men [#]yang /_/ba lang la rtags [#]rigs pa min/_/shes pa de ni ma rtogs pa'i/_/don gsal byed phyir tshad ma ste/_/ba men mthong ba'i snga rol tu/_/de 'dra ma bzung phyir na'o/_/gzhal bya dngos po med pas na/_/'di ni tshad mar mngon 'dod min/_/yan
[\[56b.6\]]lag mang po thun mong bas/_/'brel pa'i 'dra ba yod ce na/_/spyi rnams bsal bas de dag la/_/mang dang de 'brel ga la yod/_/de nyid sgrub par byed pa yi/_/tshad ma yang ni yod pa ste/_/spyi yang dngos po nyid yin zhing /_/mngon sum gyis ni gzung bya yang /_/dngos med las gzhan
[\[56b.7\]]gzhal bya yi/_/thun mong min pa'i dngos po bzhin[#]/_/dngos po med pa'i phyogs bzhag [#]nas/_/spyi yi don ni rab brjod pa/_/grub min dang po'i bsgrub bya yang /_/dam bca'i don du yul gcig nyid/_/der ni 'di ltar rig 'gyur te/_/ba lang gzugs kyi yan lag dang /_/ba min
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]yan lag kha cig ni/_/mtshungs pa'i rgyu [#]las shes pa yin/_/der ni ba men mthong ba na[#]/_/snga na chad lan cig min par yang /_/ba lang gzugs kyi yan lag dag[# ]/mthong phyir 'di yi dran pa byung /_/de nyid phyir rta la sogs pa/_/de dag 'dra la ba men ni/_/_
[\[57a.2\]]mthong ba'i tshe na ba lang blo/_/ci [#]phyir mi 'jug khyad par ci/_/gzhan du sngar shes don gsal phyir/_/'di ni tshad ma ma yin min/_/tshad ma gzhan ni med pa na/_/gang las [#]de ltar 'gyur ba yin/_/'dra ba'i dngos de'ang ba lang gi_/spyi bzhin yod pa yin na ni/_/yongs su 'brel bar ma
[\[57a.3\]]mthong yang /_/mdun na 'dug pa mthong ba nyid/_/de lta'ang dran pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/ji ltar gsal bar bya ba min/_/ba lang ngo bor 'dra ba de/_/yod pa tsam du shes pa ni/_/ba men dang yang 'dra'o zhes/_/de ltar rnam par nges pa min/_/nye bar 'jal ba'ang de lta bur/_/nges par dran la
[\[57a.4\]]mtshan nyid gzhan/_/gal te ming ni 'di nyid kyis/_/de yi sngon du bzung ba min/_/gang 'di'i bdag nyid sngon brjod pa/_/rang gi ngo bo bzung ba yang /_/dngos po yi ming dngos min te[#]/_/gang phyir de min [#]'dzin pa na/_/rang gi de nyid yongs shes kyang /_/yongs su shes pa nyid mi 'gyur/_/de tsam gyi ni cha yis
[\[57a.5\]]ni/_/tshad ma nyid du rnam 'jog la/_/tshad ma rnams ni 'di tsam zhig_/bya min gzhan las [#]thal 'gyur phyir/_/shing gi phreng sogs mthong ba na/_/rtsa 'thung [#]gcig nyid mthong la min/_/gnyis pa'i yal ga can shes pas/_/dang po'i yal ga can nges pa/_/tshad ma gzhan du 'gyur ba yin/_/'dra ba
[\[57a.6\]]ltos la mi sogs phyir/_/nye bar 'jal ba rnams la yang /_/gzung bar 'dzin pa nyid du mtshungs/_/ba men [#]nye bar dmigs pa na/_/rta la sogs pa de dang ni/_/mi 'dra'i shes pa 'byung 'gyur gang /_/de ni gzhan pa'i tshad ma ni/_/dngos po la yang dmigs pa'i phyir/_/dngos po med
[\[57a.7\]]pa'i khong gtogs min/_/phan tshun med pa [#]nyid du ni/_/'dra ba nyid kyi blo la'ang mtshungs/_/'dra ba nyid kyis dben par ni/_/ji ltar de la shes pa bzhin/_/yan lag thams cad mtshungs pa dang /_/bral ba yin par shes par bya/_/yan lag du ma thun mong bas/_/'brel par rang
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]gi shes pa ni/_/yan lag thams cad thun mong du/_/'brel pa de nyid thal bar 'gyur/_/shin tu brtan pa'i ngag thos nas/_/'dra ba'i don du dmigs pa na/_/ming dang 'brel pa rnam rtog [#]pas/_/nye bar 'jal bar kha dog 'dod/_/der ni shin tu bstan [#]pa'i ngag_/mnyan
[\[57b.2\]]pa la ni skyes pa nyid/_/gal te nye bar 'jal ba na/_/mkho ba mtshungs don 'dzin pa na/_/khyad par can gyi yul nyid kyis/_/'brel ba rtogs par 'gyur ba yin/_/gang phyir lung las 'brel ba de/_/spyi yi yul ni rig pa ste/_/khyad par can gyi yul ni der/_/nyer 'jal brtan [# ]
[\[57b.3\]]nas rnam rtog [#]'gyur/_/gal te 'di la ming dang ni/_/'brel pa rtogs par gyur pa na/_/de [#]las gzhan pa'i don rtogs par/_/mi rigs shin tu thal 'gyur phyir/_/sna tshogs lag rgyan can 'ga' yi/_/ming ni bzung [#]bar gyur pa na/_/phyi ma'i dus su sgra de las/_/mdzes pa'i
[\[57b.4\]]cod pan can rtogs 'gyur/_/de phyir snga ma de nyid 'di'i/_/phyi yi rnam rtog gzugs brnyan 'di/_/blo ni spyi yi ming can no/_/ba men nye bar dmigs na yang /_/de nyid la yang 'di ltar 'gyur/_/mthong dang rtog pa'i rnam dbye ba/_/mi shes phyi'o snyam du sems/_/de ltar yang ni
[\[57b.5\]]shes byas te/_/sgra dang rnam par rtog pa'i yul/_/rang gi mtshan nyid yin pa ni/_/rgyas par bsal ba [#]nyid yin no/_/de ni de rnams yul yin du/_/zin kyang nyer 'jal rjes dpag nyid/_/tshul gsum po yi rtags nyid las/_/skyes pa 'di ltar shes bya ste[#]/_/gang zhig ba
[\[57b.6\]]lang 'dra bar ni/_/thos pa'i yul gyi ba min te/_/brda 'dzin pa yi [#]gnas skabs kyi/_/ba men blo gnas lta bu'o/_/gal te blo la [#]gnas pa yang /_/dus der yod pa ma yin na/_/'di ni ba lang dang 'dra zhes/_/brda yi ci las 'brel pa yin/_/'brel pa can las tha dad pa'i/_/_
[\[57b.7\]]'brel pa gzhan yod min par bsgrubs/_/sngon du brda la [#]rna ba yi/_/rnam shes kyis ni sgra bzung la/_/mig gi mdun na gnas pa yi/_/ba min bzung bar gyur pa na/_/mngar ba dang ni dri zhim sogs/_/so sor bzung ba kun sbyor ba/_/rnam shes so so ba dag ni/_/sbyar 'di tshad mar
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]rigs pa min/_/ming dang sbyor ba yang dag rigs/_/dran pa nyid ni bsal ba min/_/thabs mtha' yas pa las byung ba'ang /_/ming 'brel yang dag rigs pa rnams/_/chos mthun nyid la mi ltos kyang /_/mi bdag nyid las 'byung 'gyur te/_/nyi ma'i 'od zer
[\[58a.2\]]gyis gdungs pa/_/rnam par [(]sal [,]sel [)]ba'i gdugs dkar can/_/de rnams nang na mi bdag ces/_/smras pa'i nyer bstan bye brag gis/_/dus phyis de ni mthong ba na/_/mi de 'di'o snyam blo de/_/khyed la tshad ma gzhan thos 'gyur/_/chos mthun la sogs ltos med phyir/_/rjes
[\[58a.3\]]dpag stobs kyis tshad ma gzhan/_/yod pa nyid du gzhan sgrub byed/_/mngon sum rjes dpag las gzhan pa/_/gnyis bcas tshad ma gzhan yin te/_/tshad ma yin phyir rjes dpag bzhin/_/rjes su dpag pa'ang de de bzhin/_/gtan tshigs la gnod ma bstan phyir/_/de rnams
[\[58a.4\]]'brel pa med pa yin/_/de ltar de bzhin yin na ni/_/tshad ma bzhi po'ang khyed kyis bsal/_/khyed kyis der smras lan gang yin/_/de nyid 'dir ni lan du 'gyur/_/nye bar 'jal ba rnam par dpyad pa'o//_//tshad ma drug tu shes byas te/_/gang du don gzhan du 'gyur yin/_/ma mthong
[\[58a.5\]]ba la rtog pa gzhan/_/de ni don gyis go bar [#]bstan/_/de la bsreg par mngon sum rig_/me la bsreg pa'i nus yod dang /_/nyi ma 'gro bar rjes dpag las/_/de yi nus pa la sbyor bas/_/dngos po rnams kyi nus pa ni/_/'bras las don gyi [#]gos sgyur byed/_/'brel pa bzung ba med
[\[58a.6\]]par ni/_/sngar med de yang rtogs par byed/_/'di rnams sngar 'bras 'brel pa'ang min/_/da ltar gzhan 'dzin pa yang min/_/gang las [#]phyogs chos rjes 'gror 'gyur/_/rna ba la sogs nus phyogs la'ang /_/gtan tshigs ji snyed rab sbyor ba/_/de kun chos can ma grub pas/_/gzhi ma
[\[58a.7\]]grub par thal bar 'gyur/_/lha sbyin tshon po nyin par ni/_/mi za zhes sogs tshig thos pa/_/mtshan mo za bar shes pa ni/_/thos las don gyis go bar bshad/_/mtshan mo la sogs tshig [#]rnams don/_/nyin mo'i tshig gis rtogs pa min/_/nyin mo la sogs tshig gi don/_
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]/zab mo'i bza' la 'dre ba min/_/gang gis tshig de de sgrub par/_/byed par 'gyur gyi gzhan pa min/_/don gzhan la ni 'jug phyir yang /_/gnyis pa'i don la rtogs pa min[#]/_/de yi phyir ni tshig [#]gzhan gyis/_/blo la brten par 'di zhes bya/_/des na [#]go byed min par yang /_/tshig
[\[58b.2\]]gang yin de [#]shes bya ste/_/mngon sum tshogs par gang 'gyur ba'i/_/tshad mar de ni brjod bya na/_/tshig tu ma smras pa nyid ni/_/re zhig mngon sum par mi 'dod/_/'di ni de dang lhan cig par/_/nam yang ma mthong rjes dpag min/_/gal te 'brel pa ma mthong yang /_/_
[\[58b.3\]]rtags nyid du ni 'dod pa na/_/de ni brjod pa tsam gyis kyang /_/tshig rnams thams cad rtogs par 'gyur/_/'brel pa med par gzhan dag la/_/de la bye brag med pa yin/_/ba men gyis mtshon pa lang gang /_/shes pas gzung [#]ba nus pa nyid/_/nye bar 'jal stobs las byung ba'i/_/_
[\[58b.4\]]nus pa nyid kyis rtogs par byed/_/brjod pa smra po'i nus pa las/_/gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur te/_/don gyis go bar rtogs par 'gyur/_/de las gzhan pa 'gro ba min/_/slar yang don gyis go ba gzhan/_/nyid kyis sgra ni rtag nyid nges/_/gang phyir rtag pa min na brda/_/tha snyad
[\[58b.5\]]la ni rjes 'jug min/_/tshad mas nges pa'i dngos med pas/_/nag pa'i khyim na med pa yi/_/bye brag las ni phyi rol na/_/yod par 'grub ces gang smras pa[#]/_/dngos med de las byung ba gzhan/_/don gyis go ba zhes bshad do/_/phyogs chos la sogs yan lag ni/_/min
[\[58b.6\]]phyir rjes dpag las gzhan 'di/_/phyi yul bye brag can don nam/_/de yi bye brag can gyi [#]yul/_/gzhal bya yin na gang khyim na/_/med 'di ji ltar phyogs chos yin/_/srog bcas khyim na med pa ni/_/phyogs kyi chos su 'dir rtogs na/_/rgyab na de yod par rig [#]pa'i/_/blo ni skye ba
[\[58b.7\]]ma yin no/_/yod pa nyid dang bral ba yi[#]/_/gang zhig khyim na med pa tsam/_/shi ba la yang de mthong phyir/_/phyi rol gnas par sgrub byed min/_/de la nus bcas dang bral ba'i/_/nus pa gang na srid min pa/_/nus bcas mngon sum nyid yin [#]na/_/don gyis go bas rtogs bya
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]gang /_/sreg pa la sogs rgyu gang yin/_/mi [#]la sogs pa ma nor bar/_/the tshom med par mthong ba ni/_/de la bum pa gzhan cir 'gyur/_/tha dad yin na 'bras bu la/_/de ni dgos pa yin pa'i phyir/_/dngos po byed pa min nyid 'gyur/_/dgos pa
[\[59a.2\]]yin na tha dad 'gyur/_/don byed nus pa'i ngo bo ni/_/nus pa rang gi mtshan nyid de/_/de 'dra'i bdag nyid du snang ba/_/mngon sum gyis ni nges pa yin/_/mtshan nyid gzhan du grub pa nyid/_/tshad ma cung zad kyang yod min/_/des rtogs na yang don med de/_/ngo bos de 'bras grub [#]phyir
[\[59a.3\]]ro/_/nus pa'i mtshan nyid gzhan bral bas/_/don gyis go ba rtogs she na/_/ma yin gzhan du 'brel 'byung phyir/_/dngos po las de 'byung ba yin/_/chu la sogs pa las ldog pa/_/sreg pa la sogs nus bcas med/_/mngon sum gyur bzhin de las gzhan/_/nus pa dgos pa ci
[\[59a.4\]]zhig yod/_/nus de gcig tu tha dad min/_/gnyis ka'i bdag nyid can zhe na/_/ma yin 'gal phyir gzhan min [#]na/_/gang phyir de yang mngon sum gyur/_/mngon sum nyid gnas 'di rnams ni[#]/_/rjes su dpag bya nyid bsal [#]ba/_/nyams min gang gis 'di la ni/_/yul na rjes
[\[59a.5\]]dpag tu mi 'dod/_/snang ba la sogs dngos po gang /_/mngon sum gyi ni yul min pa/_/de rnams nus pa'i mtshan nyid du/_/yod nyid rtags kyis rtogs par byed/_/rgyu mtshan [#]la ni ltos bcas pa'i/_/sgra la sogs pa rigs pa po/_/rgyu gzhan dag ni yod gyur kyang /_/mi 'byung
[\[59a.6\]]myu gu la sogs bzhin/_/nyi ma nye bar len pa yi[#]/_/yul las yul gzhan dag tu yang /_/rgyun mi 'chad 'gro yul gzhan thob/_/'bar ba sogs bzhin shes par bya/_/brtan bdag nyid du dbyer med phyir/_/gzhan par 'di ni mi rigs te/_/de ni yul gzhan phyin pa
[\[59a.7\]]las/_/gzhan pa'i nus pa bsal ba yin/_/tsho la nyin mo mi za ba'ang [#]/_/don de la ni nges pa min/_/zhe sdang gti mug sogs 'brel mi/_/gzhan du yang ni smra bar [#]byed/_/don du gtogs la mi ltos pa/_/'dis ni gal te tshig gzhan yang /_/don dang bcas pa 'dren byed na/_/_
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]tshig gzhan dag kyang 'dren par 'gyur/_/ji ltar nye bar 'gro ba yi/_/ngo bor der ni rtogs pa yi/_/tshad ma gzhan nyid gang yin des/_/don rtogs 'gyur ba brjod 'dod na/_/mtshan mo'i bza' ba dang 'brel ba/_/brjod 'dod mir ni shes par bya/_/nyin mo'i bza' ba dang bral
[\[59b.2\]]ba/_/tsho phyir de la gzhan bzhin no/_/za ba yin dang tsho ba nyid/_/rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa yi[#]/_/'brel pa nges pa de yi ni/_/dngos po las ni dngos po rtogs/_/'brel pa thams cad kyis stong pa'i/_/tshig las ji ltar rtogs 'gyur te/_/gcig las gzhan kun rtogs
[\[59b.3\]]min gyi/_/gzhan du yang ni 'gyur ba yin/_/de phyir 'brel pa med pa dang /_/yod kyang nges par [#]ma bzung ba/_/tshig 'di rtogs bzhin pa na'ang /_/tshad ma can du 'gyur ma yin/_/'brel pa tshad ma nyid gnas pa/_/gal te rgyal po'i bka' yin nam/_/mngon sum 'brel pa med
[\[59b.4\]]bzhin du/_/ji ltar tshad ma nyid du 'gyur/_/'brel pas rtogs byed nyid yin na/_/ci phyir gzhan yang rtogs byed min/_/'brel pas stong pa nyid du ni/_/bye brag ci yang med par 'dod/_/mngon sum la yang 'brel pa nyid/_/tshad ma nyid du rnam par gnas/_/mi slu ba
[\[59b.5\]]ni tshad ma nyid/_/don de [#]las ni bdag nyid thob/_/de rgyu min pa'am rgyu min [#]pa/_/de yang nges par mi slu bar/_/rigs pa min te ma lus pa/_/mi slu bar 'gyur gzhan du min/_/gnyis pa'i tshig [#]ni snang ba yi/_/bsam pa'i rjes su dpog pa ste/_/rjes su 'gro ba'i tshig 'di
[\[59b.6\]]las/_/ldog par go bar 'dod pa yin/_/nye bar 'jal ba [#]tshad ma nyid/_/yin pa rgyas par bsal bas na/_/des bskyed don gyis go ba yis[#]/_/tshad ma nyid kyang bsal ba yin/_/ba lang nye bar dmigs pa nyid[#]/_/nye bar 'jal ba'i tshad mar 'dod/_/de yod pa la dmigs pa
[\[59b.7\]]yang /_/rang nyid [#]nyes pa skyed byed pa/_/'dod phyir don gang rtogs pa la/_/ltos pa'i nus pa gang zhig yin/_/gzhan min pa nyid ma yin yang /_/lag pa bskyod sogs las bzhin du/_/sgra rnams kyis ni don rtogs par/_/'gal bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/ji
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]ltar 'dra ba'i chos dag ni/_/bsres pa rgyur gyur pa yi phyir/_/de phyir sgra rnams go byed pa/_/nyid du 'gal ba ma yin no/_/mngon sum rdzas la brten par ni/_/mthong ba'i bya ba gang yin pa/_/de rnams yi ge ji bzhin du/_/sngar mthong ngo shes rtag
[\[60a.2\]]par 'dod/_/gsal bar byed pa med phyir yang /_/'di ni yod kyang mi dmigs nyid/_/khyed kyi skyed byed gang yin yid[#]/_/de nyid kho bo gsal byed yin/_/de min nus pa thogs med pa/_/yin na shes pa de [#]rtag 'byung /_/de dang ldan pa ma yin na/_/de ni nam yang 'byung mi
[\[60a.3\]]'gyur/_/de phyir de rnams gsal byed pa'i/_/rgyus bskyed pa nyid mi rigs so/_/sngar mthong ngo shes pa rtag nyid/_/gong du bsal ba nyid yin no/_/nag pa khyim na med pa las/_/phyi rol yod pa mi rigs te/_/gang phyir shi bar dogs pa las/_/gzhan du na ni 'thad pa yin/_/_
[\[60a.4\]]gson la khyim na med pa ni/_/phyi rol yod par rab bsgrubs [#]pa'i/_/don gyis [#]go ba 'dir smra ba/_/de min der yang ma nges phyir/_/tshu rol mthong bas nag pa ni/_/khyim du ma mthong tshad ma min/_/de ni srog bcas dang 'brel pa/_/ji [#]ltar rjes su 'jug pa yin/_/ji [#]sta skad la
[\[60a.5\]]sogs pa ste/_/srog dang bcas par nges yin na/_/[#]khyim na med pas med par yang /_/nges 'di tshad ma nyid yin na/_/de lta'ang khyim na med pa nyid/_/bltar rung ma mthong bar nges pa'ang /_/de phyir der ni phyi rol na/_/yod par brtags [#]nyid las nges yin/_/khyim du gang
[\[60a.6\]]zhig ma phrad pa/_/'di ni phyi rol na yod nges/_/khyim gyi dang ra khyim sgo nas/_/yod pa mthong ba'i mi bzhin no/_/'dir ni khyim gyi khong gtogs pa/_/mi mthun phyogs na'ang yod pa'i phyir/_/de phyir don gyis go ba 'di/_/rjes dpag las ni mi phyed do/_/don gyis [#]go ba rnam
[\[60a.7\]]par dpyad pa'o//_//dngos po gang zhig ngo bo la/_/tshad ma lnga po ma bskyed [#]pa'i/_/dngos yod rtogs phyir de la ni/_/dngos po med pa'i tshad ma nyid/_/mngon sum la sogs mi bskyed pa'am[#]/_/dngos po med pa'i tshad mar 'dod/_/bdag nyid yongs su ma gyur
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]pa'am[#]/_/dngos gzhan rnam par rig pa'am/_/tshad ma med pa'i dngos po rnams/_/dngos po med par rtog [#]par byed/_/snga na med pa la sogs pa/_/'di ni rnam pa bzhi ru dbye/_/zho sogs 'o ma la med gang /_/de ni snga na med par brjod/_/zho la 'o ma med pa nyid/_/zhig nas
[\[60b.2\]]med pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/rta sogs ba lang la med gang /_/gcig la cig med par brjod de/_/de las gzhan dngos med cing de'i/_/bdag nyid gzhan la med pas so/_/mgo yi cha ni [#]dma' mo la/_/'brel [#]dang sra sogs ngo bo yi/_/ri bong rwa dag med gyur pa/_/'di
[\[60b.3\]]ni shin tu med par 'dod/_/gal te snga ma [#]med pa sogs/_/dbye bas dngos med yod min na/_/rgyu la sogs pa rnams [#]dbye ba'i/_/tha snyad 'di yang med par 'gyur/_/de dngos min na dbyer med pa/_/des na 'di ni dngos po nyid/_/'bras bu la sogs dngos med
[\[60b.4\]]gang /_/rgyu sogs dngos med yin bdag 'dod/_/gang 'di rjes 'jug mi 'jug gi_/blo yi bzung [#]ba gang de'i phyir/_/ba lang sogs bzhin dngos po nyid/_/gzhal bya'i phyir yang shes par bya/_/dngos med sgra yi brjod bya nyid/_/yin phyir mngon sum sogs las gzhan/_/_
[\[60b.5\]]gzhal bya dngos po med pa bzhin/_/tshad ma rnams kyang dngos med pa'o/_/[#]dngos po med pa'ang tshad ma [#]yin/_/rang dang rjes mthun dpag bya ste/_/gzhal bya yin phyir [#]dngos po bzhin/_/de phyir dngos bdag nyid las gzhan/_/de 'dir rtag [#]pa'i bdag nyid kyi/_/yongs su gyur pa
[\[60b.6\]]bsal bas na/_/de las bzlog pa'i dngos yod pa/_/res 'ga' ba ni mi rigs so/_/gal te de yongs dor tsam gyis[#]/_bdag nyid du ni 'di sems na/_/rtag tu dngos po med nyid du/_/'di ni rgyun mi 'chad ces bya/_/yongs su ma gyur 'di yod na'ang /_/de lta na yang 'khrul pa nyid/_/_
[\[60b.7\]]gnyid [#]dang brgyal sogs gnas skabs su/_/don yod na yang don 'byung phyir/_/gal te rkyen gzhan yod pa la/_/des dben pa yi gzhan mthong phyir/_/bum pa shes pa la sogs pa'i/_/ngo bos de ni yin 'dod na/_/gnyis pa'i phyogs su bstan pa yin/_/'di la bye brag ci yod
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]na/_/gang 'di khyod kyi [#]rnam grangs kyis/_/phyogs gnyis dag tu bshad pa yin/_/dngos gzhan sgrub pa'i shes pa la/_/'jug pa thams cad med pa nyid/_/dngos med gnyis pa la brten nas/_/ma mthong ba yang go bar 'gyur/_/rgyu gzhan nye bar gyur pa na/_
[\[61a.2\]]rung bar mtshungs pa'i ngo bo de/_/des dben gzhan ni ma [#]shes pa/_/de ni med ces bya zhe na/_/blta nus dngos po snang ba ni/_/med nyid mngon sum nyid kyis te/_/de ltar yang dag bstan pa ni/_/'khrul pa can gzhan rnams kyi min/_/gang blo mngon sum mi 'dod pa/_/dngos gzhan
[\[61a.3\]]rnam par rig pa ni/_/skye bar ji ltar shes par byed/_/gal te don gyis go ba las/_/yin na de yang shes bdag nyid/_/yin pas de yang ga la go_/don gyis go ba gzhan dgos na/_/thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur/_/dngos med tshad ma dngos yin na/_/gzhal bya dngos med
[\[61a.4\]]kyang de bzhin/_/dngos med mngon sum nang 'dus pa/_/de bzhin khyod la ji ltar min/_/'bras bu la sogs dngos med pa/_/gang yin rgyu sogs dngos med pa'o/_/der [#]yang gzhan gyis dben bdag nyid/_/mngon sum gyis ni rtogs par byed/_/rang dngos gzhan gyis dngos bdag ni/_/_
[\[61a.5\]]rtag tu yod dang med bdag nyid/_/dngos po'i ngo bo cung zad ni[#]/_/res 'ga' 'ga' zhig gis rtogs 'gyur/_/mngon sum la sogs 'jug pas kyang /_/gang tshe dngos po'i cha 'dzin pa/_/bya ba de ni mi skyed pa/_/dngos po med pa'i cha 'dzin 'dod/_/dngos po rnams kyi rang dngos nyid/_/_
[\[61a.6\]]gzhan las log pa ma yin nam/_/des ni de bdag nyid yod pa'i/_/bdag nyid 'dis ni mngon sum mo/_/yod pa don byed nus pa ste/_/gzhan ni med par bstan pa yin/_/de dag gcig tu nyams gyur par/_/rigs pa ma yin 'gal phyir ro/_/gal te rang sgrub par nus pa/_/_
[\[61a.7\]]gzhan sgrub mi nus ma yin nam/_/de nyid kyi phyir gnyis dngos nyid/_/dngos po gcig la yod ma yin/_/gal te nus med gzhan nyid las/_/gzhan du'ang 'dod pa de lta na/_/dngos po gnyis ni 'thob 'gyur na[#]/_/gcig ni gnyis kyi [#]dngos nyid min/_/dngos po med pa'ang dngos po
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]nyid/_/yin par gong du khas blangs pa/_/de nyid slar yang ngo bo nyid/_/med ces ci phyir smra bar byed/_/ngo bo med phyir shes pa yi[#]/_/ngo bo nyams pas tshad ma nyid/_/mi rigs de ni gzhal bya nyid/_/yang dag rig pa'i rang bzhin no/_/de rgyu yin phyir tshad ma ste/_/mig sogs
[\[61b.2\]]bzhin zhes bya zhe na/_/ngo bo med pa rgyu nyid do[#]/_/'gyur ba nam yang mi srid do/_/shes pa'i ngo bos [#]shes pa na[#]/_/de dngos med par ji ltar shes/_/de yi yul dngos tshad ma nyid/_/las yin thug med ma yin nam/_/dngos po dngos med las tshad ma/_/tshad ma dngos med las dngos
[\[61b.3\]]po/_/gal te med pa go byed nyid/_/yin [#]na phan tshun gnas par 'gyur/_/de yi gcig mthong gang yin pa/_/de ni gzhan mthong yin par brjod/_/rang gi ngo bos bems po nyid/_/min phyir de yang rang dbang 'grub/_/blo ni blo gzhan las grub pa/_/blo gzhan gyis [#]ni rtags
[\[61b.4\]]las te/_/yang na gzhan du mi 'thad pa'am/_/thams cad du yang mi 'byung ba'o/_/brgal zhing brtag [#]pa gsum po 'di/_/re re zhing yang yod srid na/_/thug pa med pa du ma yi/_/khyod kyi 'di la khyab par 'gyur/_/rung ba'i ngo bor mtshungs pa'i phyir/_/gcig nyid nye bar dmigs
[\[61b.5\]]pa las/_/rung ba nyid gzhan med par ni/_/nges par yang dag rtogs par byed/_/mkha' [#]la zla ba med shes par/_/gcig po gang las rig [#]pa yin/_/sgra kun gyis [#]ni dben par yang [#]/_/gang du ji ltar nges par byed/_/snang ba dang ni mun pa yi[#]/_/phung po dag las sgrub pa po/_/de nyid
[\[61b.6\]]shes mkha'o snyam sems te/_/gang phyir gnas med ba ltar yang med/_/sgra kun gyis ni dben par yang /_/'bras bu ma mthong ba las shes/_/de ltar shes pa gzhan dag gi_/nyams su myong las de yang 'grub/_/'di yi [#]dngos med tshad ma ni/_/dngos po'i [#]dngos po de gnas
[\[61b.7\]]pa/_/dngos med sgra yis brjod bya nyid/_/nang du 'dus byas [#]gnod pa med/_/dngos po med pa'i tshad ma ni/_/rang dang rjes mthun pas dpog na/_/de 'dir 'grub [#]pa las bsgrub [#]nyid/_/de 'drar [#]rjes mthun yod phyir ro/_/dngos po med pa rnam par dpyad pa'o//_//_
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]de yod par der 'di 'byung la/_/med par yang ni mi 'byung ba/_/de phyir de las 'byung ba de/_/'di ni rigs pa zhes brjod de/_/'di yod pas ni 'di 'byung gi_/'di med par ni 'di mi 'byung /_/'di ni tshad ma gzhan nyid ces/_/thub pa tsa ra ka smra ste/_/gang phyir
[\[62a.2\]]'di dpe ma dmigs phyir/_/'di ni rjes [#]dpag ma yin no/_/dmigs pa gang gis don gang zhig_/rtogs pa de [#]dngos med pa [#]las/_/med pa nyid du rtogs pa ste/_/mi dmigs pa zhes bya bar 'dod/_/dpe la ltos pa med pa'i phyir/_/'di yang tshad ma gzhan yin no/_/_
[\[62a.3\]]dpe yang med pa nyid du ni/_/'di nyid kyis ni rab tu grub/_/rgyu 'bras nyid dang dngos med dang /_/rtogs pa dang ni 'brel med kyi/_/sgrub dang bsgrub bya gang yin pa/_/de dang 'di la 'di dbyer med/_/de yod 'byung ba ma gtogs par/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid gzhan med/_/snang
[\[62a.4\]]ba mi dmigs ma gtogs par/_/med pa gzhan nyid rtogs pa min/_/dngos po de yi tha snyad du/_/rung ba nyid du rab sgrub byed/_/brda yis dngos su rtogs pa yis/_/don yod nges par mthong ba'o/_/tshogs par rnam par gnas pa yi/_/rgyu ni tshogs pa can nyid de/_/_
[\[62a.5\]]stong yod 'bras bu'i rtags las ni/_/brgya sogs yod pa'i shes pa skye/_/zhes grags pa dang de bzhin du/_/mthangs kyis tshor ba la sogs pa/_/'di 'dra'i 'khrul bcas du ma dag_/tshad mar mi sbyar thal 'gyur phyir/_/gal te 'di ni gnas min pa/_/nyid la nyam [#]thag
[\[62a.6\]]las byed na'ang /_/mngon sum dang ni lkog gyur te/_/don ni rnam pa gnyis su gnas/_/gnyis ka gnyis ka min bdag nyid/_/don gzhan rigs pa min pa nyid/_/gcig la bya dang bya min par/_/shes na gcig nyid nyams pa yin/_/dngos su rnam shes skyed byed
[\[62a.7\]]la[#]/_/mngon sum don du brjod par bya/_/ji skad bstan pa las bzlog pa/_/lkog tu gyur ces bya bar brjod/_/re zhig sgra 'byung nyer 'jal sogs/_/'di ni dang po'i don yul min/_/mngon sum khong gtogs thob pa'am/_/'bras med nyid de dran pa bzhin/_/lkog tu gyur
[\[62b\]]
