[\[62b.1\]]pa'i yul de yang /_/de rnams yul du ji ltar 'gyur/_/gal te dngos gyur lkog gyur 'di/_/min te mngon sum dngos po bzhin/_/gzhan la rnam par brten na yang /_/'di ni de rtogs ji ltar yin/_/gzhan dang 'brel pa'am ma 'brel pa'am/_/tha dad [#]snang ba'am de bzhin
[\[62b.2\]]min/_/ma 'brel pa las de 'byung na/_/nges pa med par thal bar 'gyur/_/gal te tha dad snang 'gyur na/_/khyab pa 'brel par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig lkog tu gyur pa'i don/_/'brel pa'i don la brten pa dang /_/tha dad de gzhan mi brten te/_/rjes dpag yin par bsal [# ]
[\[62b.3\]]zhes bya/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las tshad ma gzhan brtag pa ste nyi shu rtsa gsum [#]pa'o//_//gal te nor bu gzi lta bur[#]/_/dngos po du ma'i bdag nyid can/_/rang bzhin de ltar yin [#]pa 'am/_/yod la sogs pa 'gal ci yod/_/dngos po dngos gzhan
[\[62b.4\]]mtshungs pa yin/_/nam mkha' me tog khyad par med/_/gal te mtshungs min nyid bral na/_/de dag thams cad grub pa min/_/gang phyir thams cad mtshungs min phyir/_/mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos po la/_/dngos po gzhan du nges pa ni/_/dngos po nyid ni [#]med par 'gyur/_/_
[\[62b.5\]]dngos po las ni ldog pa na/_/med pa nyid ni spangs nas ni/_/gzhan du 'gro yod ci zhig mtshon/_/rgyu skar lam gyi mtsho skyes phyir/_/de phyir dngos der 'dod pa ni[#]/_/nam mkha'i me tog dang mtshungs min/_/nam mkha'i me tog mtshungs min par/_/'dod na de phyir dngos [# ]
[\[62b.6\]]de ni/_/de dang mtshungs pa'i dngos po nyid/_/spyi zhes bya bar 'dod par gyis/_/rnam pa gzhan du blo de ni/_/gtor zas so brtag la 'jug ming [#]/_/dngos po rnams su nges nas so/_/'jug pa de ni gang gis byas/_/gal te 'dra bas nges 'di ni/_/de nyid spyir [#]ni bdag can
[\[62b.7\]]'dod/_/rang bzhin rjes 'gro [#]nus pa ni/_/de nyid kyis ni bshad pa yin/_/de phyir shin tu tha dad blo/_/'ba' zhig nyid du grub pa min/_/gang phyir dngos pos ngo bo kun/_/phan tshun du ni tha dad min/_/dngos po'i mthar ni byas pa las/_/gal te 'dra min dang bral ba'i/_/dngos
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]po de ni tha dad min/_/de dbye med phyir de bdag bzhin/_/de las tha dad rang ngo bo/_/mi 'dra bar ni mngon par brjod/_/'dra ba min yang tha dad min/_/de ni phan tshun 'gal ba yin/_/de phyir don rnams tha dad nyid/_/ji ltar yang ni 'dod pa na/_/mi 'dra
[\[63a.2\]]bar ni 'dod par gyis/_/de nas khyad par bdag nyid kyang /_/de nyid kyis na dngos gcig dang /_/rnam pa du mar 'dod pa yin/_/de dag rjes 'jug ldog pa yin/_/blo yi gzung bya nyid du gnas/_/thog mar gang dag rjes 'jug phyir/_/spyi zhes bya bar grags pa yin/_/de
[\[63a.3\]]las gzhan ni log pa'i phyir/_/khyad par yang ni brjod pa yin/_/spyi dang khyad par dag gi ni/_/phan tshun rang bzhin nyid la ni/_/'dre bar gyur pas de nyid du/_/rnam pa gnyis 'di rigs ma yin/_/phan tshun rang bzhin med pa nyid/_/sna tshogs nyid du rjes su 'jug_/de lta bu
[\[63a.4\]]yi ngo bo yang /_/rnam pa gnyis ni rigs ma yin/_/gal te gcig dngos 'di [#]yod na'ang /_/chos kyi dbye [#]ba rab grub phyir/_/gal te tha dad gnas 'gal min/_/dper na byed pa'i nus pa bzhin/_/mthong ba la yang rigs min med/_/gang phyir spyi dang khyad par la/_/gcig
[\[63a.5\]]pu nyid dang tha dad dang [#]/_/'jig rten tha snyad rjes 'jug mthong /_/gcig pu ngo bo nyid yod na/_/tha dad chos grub ma yin nas[#]/_/gang phyir ma brtags dbye ba ni/_/sna tshogs nyid du mngon par brjod/_/nus pa sna tshogs bdag nyid ni/_/brjod par 'dod pa tsam gyis sprul/_/dngos
[\[63a.6\]]po gcig pu'i bdag nyid ni/_/de la tha dad rigs pa min/_/gang de nyid dngos ces brjod pa/_/de nyid gcig ces bshad pa yin/_/de dngos mi 'gyur slar yang [#]de/_/sna tshogs bdag nyid ces bya'o/_/de dngos dang ni de dngos min/_/phan tshun du ni 'gal ba'i phyir/_/dngos po
[\[63a.7\]]gcig pu nyid du ni/_/ji ltar yang ni rigs ma yin/_/sgrub pa dang ni dgag pa ni/_/phan tshun du ni 'gal ba yin/_/gang gis ma 'khrul sems kyis [#]ni/_/gcig tu bya ba nus pa [#]yin/_/rigs mthun pa dang rigs mi mthun/_/du ma las ldog dngos po la/_/de dang de las ldog
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]pa na/_/chos kyi tha dad rab tu brtags/_/de phyir gcig la'ang du ma yin[#]/_/ngo bo nyid brtags rigs pa min/_/dngos po gcig la rnam pa gnyis/_/yang dag par ni yod ma yin/_/gang yang mi yi seng ge sogs/_/rnam pa gnyis su nyer bshad de[#]/_/de dag la yang rnam
[\[63b.2\]]pa gnyis/_/yang dag par ni yod ma yin/_/de ni rdul phran du ma'i tshogs/_/ngo bo gzugs gcig ldan ma yin/_/sna tshogs gang yang [#]de gcig min/_/sna tshogs rigs kyi rin [#]chen bzhin/_/gcig nyid na ni rnam gnyis pas/_/sna tshogs rnam par snang mi 'gyur/_/sbrang ma'i
[\[63b.3\]]rkang pa tsam gyis kyang /_/bsgribs te ma bsgribs pa la ni/_/mi yi seng ge'i cha rjes 'brang /_/ngo shes pa yi rgyu dag ni/_/de yang rdul phran rang bzhin te/_/khyad par can gyi rkyen 'byung bzhin/_/de nyid kyis ni rnam pa yis/_/sna tshogs rin chen la sogs
[\[63b.4\]]bshad/_/du ma'i bdag nyid sna tshogs te/_/gcig pu nyid dang 'gal ba yin/_/don byed par ni nus pa nyid/_/dngos po nyid du bas par brjod/_/gal te rjes 'gro nyid de ni/_/thams cad kun gyi [#]bya byed 'gyur/_/dngos po gcig pu nyid dang ni/_/skyed par nus pa dang sbyor ba/_/_
[\[63b.5\]]de yang gzhan yang [#]khyad med yod/_/ji lta bur ni skyed byed min/_/sngo sogs kho na dngos po nyid/_/gal te rjes 'gror 'dod na ni/_/dkar po ser po la sogs kyang /_/sngon po'i 'bras bu skyed byed 'gyur/_/gnyis pa'i bdag nyid dang bral ba/_/gcig pu nyid ni de las skyes/_/_
[\[63b.6\]]de phyir khyed kyis sna tshogs kun/_/gcig la du ma'i rnam pa med/_/gzegs zan 'dod pa'i yod pa bzhin/_/gal te de nyid dngos nyid min/_/gcig ni du ma'i ngo bo nyid/_/de ltar 'gyur min tha dad phyir/_/'gal ba'i chos dang 'dre ba yang /_/dngos po'i tha dad mtshan nyid de/_/_
[\[63b.7\]]sngon po ser po'i tha dad ni[#]/_/'dod pa ji ltar yang mi 'gyur/_/rjes 'gro rnam pa gzhan dngos phyir/_/de yang spyi dang khyad par la/_/de dag gsal por tha dad du/_/yod pa de ni ji ltar med/_/ji bzhin kha dog khra bo la/_/ji ltar 'dod pa'i kha dog 'dzin/_/sna tshogs nyid phyir dngos
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]de bzhin/_/tha dad tha mi dad par nges/_/gang tshe dngos po khra bo ni/_/cig car du ni rtog [#]par byed/_/de tshe gzhan dang gzhan min sogs/_/dbye ba thams cad rab thim nyid/_/dngos po du ma'i ngo bo la/_/brjod par 'dod pa ngo bor 'dod/_/rim dang cig car 'jug pa
[\[64a.2\]]yis/_/tshig rnams rnam pa gzhan yod min/_/de ma thag tu 'gag pa'i phyir/_/gcig ni sna tshogs nyid ma yin/_/du ma'i ngo bo sna tshogs te/_/gcig nyid lhan cig gnas pa min/_/ji srid rnam pa de dag ni/_/dngos po de la [#]yang dag yod/_/de srid kho nar skyed pa ste/_/_
[\[64a.3\]]de srid dngos por gcig nyid ni/_/dngos po gcig las gzhan [#]nyid du/_/de yi bdag nyid dang bral 'gyur/_/nam mkha'i me tog dang 'dra min/_/de yang don byed nus pa min/_/gcig pu'i nus pa'i rang bzhin te/_/dngos po gzhan la 'jug ma yin/_/'bras bu dmigs par snang ba yi/_/_
[\[64a.4\]]tha dad la sogs bshad pa'i phyir/_/dngos de'i bdag nyid min pa yang /_/de dang ma 'dres pas ni rigs/_/dngos med nyid ni khyad med min/_/dngos po'i mtshan nyid yod pa'i phyir/_/de yang don byed nus pa ru/_/de ltar dngos po zhes su brtag_/nus pa med pa la ldog pa/_/'dra ba
[\[64a.5\]]nyid du brtags pa yin/_/des ni shin tu tha dad pa/_/mtshungs pa nyid du yod par brtags/_/dang po dngos gzhan dang mtshungs pa/_/nam mkha'i me tog de khyad yod/_/mthun dang gzhan dang dngos po las/_/gang gi bdag nyid dngos de ni/_/gal te ldog na mthun pa'i rigs/_/de nyid kyis
[\[64a.6\]]mtshungs ma yin nam/_/de tshe mthun pa'i rigs rnams kyis/_/mtshungs pa nyid du shes par 'gyur/_/de yi bdag nyid khyad med phyir/_/de bzhin du yang de shes min/_/gang phyir rigs mthun pa yi ming /_/gang gis 'di ni 'gyur ba yin/_/de dang mthun pa'i bdag nyid kyang /_/de dang
[\[64a.7\]]rang bzhin tha dad 'gyur/_/rang bzhin de nyid kyis ni de/_/mthun pa zhes byar rtogs pa yin/_/gcig tu rtogs pa'i shes pa la/_/rgyu nyid gzhan ni tha dad phyir/_/gang phyir gcig pu [#]rtogs pa la/_/rgyu ni 'ga' zhig kho na ste/_/nus pa rang bzhin nges tha dad/_/dbang po bdud rtsi la
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]sogs bzhin/_/gal te sngo sogs las min ni/_/ldog pa'i ngo bo'i rten nyid 'dod/_/sngon po la sogs shes pa ni/_/de ni ji ltar skyed yin nam/_/sngo sogs shes skyed [#]sngon po las/_/ji ltar tha dad ldan pa yi[#]/_/rna bas de ni mi skyed de/_/de bzhin mig kyang 'dod par gyis/_/_
[\[64b.2\]]skyed byed las ni ldog pa yi[#]/_/gang gzhan skyed byed dngos por 'gyur/_/de phyir dngos po rnams la ni/_/rjes 'gro yang ni nges pa yin/_/rnam pa gzhan du khyad med phyir/_/rna ba la sogs tha dad kyang /_/de yi skyed byed cis [#]mi 'dod/_/mig gzugs la sogs khyad par bzhin/_/skyed
[\[64b.3\]]byed la sogs las ldog pa/_/mig sogs pa ni grub pa min/_/gang phyir khyad med de dag ni/_/bdag nyid kyang ni skyed byed 'dod/_/dngos po rnams kyi rang bzhin las/_/ldog pa nyid ni dmigs [#]mi 'gyur/_/rang bzhin las ni ldog pa na/_/rang bzhin med par thal bar 'gyur/_/skyed byed
[\[64b.4\]]gzhan las de dag ni/_/ldog pa nyid du brjod pa na/_/des bskyed ngo bo nyid ma yin/_/de yang kho bo cag nyid 'dod/_/de yi skyed byed de yang ni/_/rang bzhin nyid du brjod pa yin/_/de kun de las nges par ni/_/rang gi rgyu las yang dag 'byung /_/gcig pu'i bdag nyid rjes 'gro'i phyir/_/_
[\[64b.5\]]gal te de dag skyed byed yin/_/bdag nyid gcig la'ang de yod yin/_/lhan cig byed pa gzhan ci zhig_/khyad par gzhan ni med pa'i phyir/_/gal te gcig pu skyed byed phyir/_/de tha dad phyir nus min nam/_/tha mi dad yin ma tshang ci/_/ji ltar rjes 'gro khyad med kyang /_/thams cad
[\[64b.6\]]thams cad byed pa min/_/sna tshogs nyid la khyad med kyang /_/de lta nyid du nges par 'gyur/_/tha dad 'ga' zhig kyang skyed byed/_/rang bzhin gyis ni nges par 'gyur/_/rjes 'gro nyid ni gcig cig la/_/skyed byed skyed byed min ci zhig_/gal te der yang khyad yod na/_/yod chu de ci dngos de
[\[64b.7\]]nyid/_/de tha dad phyir mi skyed pa/_/rjes 'gro las gzhan ma yin nam/_/de nyid yang dag pa yi don/_/gang zhes don byed nus pa yin/_/de la rjes 'gro can ma yin/_/rjes 'gro gang des 'bras skyed [#]min/_/bdag nyid gang zhig mngon 'dod pas/_/skyes [#]bu de ni rab 'jug 'gyur/_/_
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]de la gnas pa nyid spyod pas/_/tha dad tha mi dad mi rtogs/_/gzhan du [#]bdag nyid tha dad la/_/log pa nyid du mtshungs nyid du/_/yod nyid dngos po'i rjes 'gro na/_/rab 'jug la sogs thal bar 'gyur/_/bram ze gcer bu ser skya bas/_/rtogs pas dpyad [#]pa nyid
[\[65a.2\]]du ni/_/sna tshogs su ni brjod pa na/_/ci zhes [#]phul du byung ba smras/_/gser gyi phor bu chag pa yis/_/gang tshe gser gyi gdu bur byas/_/de tshe snga 'dod mya ngan skyed[#]/_/phyi ma 'dod pas dga' ba'ang skyed[#]/_/gser 'dod pa ni btang snyoms so/_/de phyir mngon sum bdag nyid can/_/_
[\[65a.3\]]skye dang 'jig dang gnas med na/_/blo gros gsum du 'gyur ma yin/_/'jig pa med na mya ngan med/_/skye ba med na rga [#]ba med/_/gnas pa med na btang snyoms med/_/des ni spyi ni rtag pa nyid/_/de ltar de yang rigs pa min/_/rten ni mi mtshungs nyid kyi phyir/_/gang phyir skye dang
[\[65a.4\]]gnas dang 'jig_/don gcig la ni brten pa min/_/phan tshun 'gal ba rnams la ni/_/dus ni mtshungs pa thob par 'gyur/_/'di ni skad cig 'jig pa nyid/_/yod na thams cad 'khrul ma yin/_/gser phor gyi ni dngos po yang /_/gser gyi bdag nyid rang bzhin las/_/_
[\[65a.5\]]rjes 'gro med par [#]'jig pa yis/_/'ga' zhig la ni mya ngan skyed/_/rnam kun sngon ni med ngo bo'i/_/de yi bdag nyid gdu bu ni/_/'byung ba na ni dga' ba bskyed/_/gang na yang ni brtan pa med/_/gser gyi bdag nyid dngos po dag_/gang tshe mthong ba blo gros rmongs/_/'dra ba gzhan
[\[65a.6\]]ni 'byung ba na/_/de tshe brtan pa nyid du sems/_/gser ni brtan pa'i ngo bo nyid/_/de yi ngo bo gdu bu yang /_/snga phyi la sogs gnas skabs la/_/mthong 'gyur gzhan gyi du ma nyid/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i tshig [#]le'ur byas pa las 'gyur bar smra ba brtag [#]pa ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi [# ]
[\[65a.7\]]pa'o//_//gser gyi rjes 'gro mtshungs pa yi[#]/_/dus gnyis rjes 'gro ma yin no/_/gnas skabs tha dad ldan dngos po/_/'ga' zhig sangs rgyas pa yang 'dod/_/gnas skabs tha dad yod na yang /_/ji ltar kha dog ma spangs gser/_/dus gsum
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]du ni de bzhin dngos/_/'di ni rdzas ma [#]spangs pa min/_/'das dang ma 'ongs pa'i shes pa/_/gzhan du yul med par ni 'gyur/_/gnyis la brten pa'i rnam shes ni/_/skyob pas ji ltar gsungs pa yin/_/'das pa'i las kyang yod min na/_/ji ltar 'bras bu ster
[\[65b.2\]]bar 'dod/_/'das dang ma 'ongs shes dbye ba/_/rnal 'byor pa la ji ltar 'grub/_/de phyir 'das dang ma 'ongs pa'i/_/yul ni rdzas su med pa min/_/dus kyis bsdus pa'i gzugs la sogs/_/dngos po la sogs da ltar bzhin/_/gang las dus tha dad rjes 'gro/_/de
[\[65b.3\]]ltar 'di ni bsam mi bya/_/gang phyir byed pas rnam phye ba/_/'dir ni dus rnams rtag [#]par 'gyur/_/byed pa la ni gang gnas pa/_/de ni de lta ba [#]ru brjod/_/byed pa zhig la 'das pa ste/_/de ma thob pa ma 'ongs pa/_/byed pa 'bras bu 'dren pa ste/_/chos rnams kyi ni skyed byed
[\[65b.4\]]min/_/'das pa 'dren pa yod min te/_/de la byed pa yod ma yin/_/de dag chos la byed pa 'di/_/gzhan nyid dam ni de nyid du/_/khas long gang phyir gzhan 'gro ba'i/_/dngos po nyid du yod ma yin/_/gzhan nyid du ni gnas pa na/_/snga phyi la yang rang bzhin med/_/rgyu nyid
[\[65b.5\]]'dus byas nyid sogs bzhin/_/byed pa yang ni rtogs par gyis/_/rang bzhin rtag tu gnas pa'i phyir/_/gzhan du rtag pa nyid du 'gyur/_/gang phyir gzugs las tha dad pa'i/_/rtag pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa min/_/rim dang rim min 'gal ba'i phyir/_/rtag pa yi ni [#]rgyu nyid
[\[65b.6\]]ni/_/sngar sun phyung ste 'dus byas ni/_/rtag pa la ni gsal brten [#]min/_/phung po la sogs tha dad pa'i/_/byed pa ru ni rjod byed pa/_/rang gi grub mtha' dang 'gal ba/_/bzlog par dka' bar thal bar 'gyur/_/gzhan nyid min yang byed pa ni/_/chos dang tha mi dad pa'i
[\[65b.7\]]phyir/_/chos kyi rang gi [#]ngo bo bzhin/_/dus kun tu ni thal bar 'gyur/_/des na dus kyi rnam dbye 'di/_/de yi dbang gis rtag mi 'gyur/_/de yi rnam par dbye ba yin/_/zhig dang thob dang ma thob med/_/byed dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir/_/chos ni byed pa [#]bzhin du 'gyur/_/sngon
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]dang phyi ma rnam gcod cing /_/dbus tsam du ni yod pa can/_/rgyun du byed pa yod pa min/_/chos ni rtag tu'ang yod par brjod/_/chos las gzhan ni byed pa min/_/lha yi spyod pa bsal ba yin/_/byed pa gzhan ni ltos bcas na/_/gal te der yang dus gnas
[\[66a.2\]]pa/_/mtshungs par rjes su rtsod pa ni/_/kun du 'gro ba ma yin nam/_/rang gi ngo bo tha mi dad/_/gal te khyad par mthong na yang /_/thogs dang bcas pa nyid bzhin du/_/de ni rang bzhin la phan min/_/dngos po rjes su 'gro ba las[#]/_/thogs dang bcas pa nyid sogs ni/_/'ga'
[\[66a.3\]]zhig res 'ga' bar 'dod min/_/dngos po nyid du brjod phyir ro/_/gzhan gyi bye brag 'gugs pa min/_/dngos po nyid du de ltar brjod/_/gzugs kyis de zhes sgra yis ni/_/'on kyang sems kyi bag chags so/_/byed pa rgyun la sogs pa bzhin/_/de nyid gzhan nyid rnam pa
[\[66a.4\]]yis/_/'on te brjod du med par brjod/_/byed pa rgyun la sogs pa bzhin/_/de ltar kun rdzob ma yin nam/_/des na rtag pa nyid kyis ni/_/rgyu bzhin du ni 'bras bu la'ang /_/de ni gang du'ang dgos pa min/_/gang phyir dngos nyid don byed nus/_/de dang 'di ni nye ba ste/_/ngo
[\[66a.5\]]bo nyid du yod ma yin/_/de yis [#]byas pa'i dus gsum gyi/_/rnam gzhag de nyid du mi 'thad/_/byed pa zhes bya'i 'bras 'gugs pa'i/_/nus gsang sgra yi spyod yul min/_/nus pa kho na'i dngos nyid phyir/_/tha snyad du de ji ltar yod/_/gang 'di dngos po snang ba ni/_/btso
[\[66a.6\]]dang sreg sogs 'bras bur byed/_/'das dang ma 'ongs par gnas pa/_/de nyid khas len byed dam ci/_/gal te [#]nyid ces bya ba de[#]/_/de nyid gcig pu'i bdag nyid yod/_/byed dang byed pa'i ngo bo ni/_/zhig pa zhes bya ji ltar yin/_/dngos po gcig pu 'di nyid la/_/khyad par
[\[66a.7\]]med na [#]phan tshun du/_/'gal ba'i rnam pa de dag tu/_/ji lta bur na rig [#]pa yin/_/gnas skabs gcig ni yongs btang nas/_/gnas skabs gzhan ni yongs 'dzin phyir/_/de ni khyad med ma yin te/_/khyad par med ces btags pa yin[#]/_/dngos po gnas skabs tha dad
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]cing /_/ma yin byed po mi 'thob phyir/_/de dag nyid ni yod pa'i phyir/_/'bras bu yod par dmigs par 'gyur/_/dus rnams su ni dngos de dag_/tha mi dad pa ji ltar 'gyur/_/ma byung ba ni byung ba dag_/'jig 'gyur de bdag nyid ci ltar/_gnas skabs su yang dbus ma la/_/rang
[\[66b.2\]]bzhin gyis ni byed po nyid/_/de phyir de nyid rang ngo bo/_/de nyid gnas skabs gzhan dag la'ang /_/de yi byed pa zhig pa dang /_/de yi de dag ji ltar 'dod/_/gzhan gyi ngo bos byed pa na/_/byed pa nyid ni thob pa'ang med/_/'das dang ma 'ongs par gnas pa'i/_/me sogs gal te gzhan
[\[66b.3\]]yin na/_/de phyir 'dres sogs skyon de ni/_/phyogs 'di la ni gzhi med pa/_/da ltar ma byung de nyid ni/_/'bras bu skyer rung 'byung ba ni/_/'byung ba [#]de ni gnas pa min/_/'di rjes 'gro med bdag nyid grub/_/gang phyir don byed nus pa ni/_/de nyid yang dag dngos po ste/_/de dag la
[\[66b.4\]]ni de yang med/_/gang yod de las 'bras mi 'byung /_/ma byung [#]ba ni byung ba'i phyir/_/'das pa yang ni dngos po 'di/_/gzhan bzhin da ltar ba bsal thob/_/res 'ga' la ni nyid kyis kyang /_/rgyu med gzhan la mi ltos phyir/_/rtag tu yod pa'ang [#]med par 'gyur/_/rgyu ni nges par
[\[66b.5\]]yod pa can/_/don ni da ltar rab tu brjod/_/so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa las/_/mtshan nyid mi 'dod gzhan dag 'dod/_/gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dus byas nyid/_/skye dang gnas sogs 'brel pa'i phyir/_/de la skye ba'i khyad par gang /_/bskyed pas skyed byed brjod pa yin/_/_
[\[66b.6\]]'di zhes bya ba yod pa'i dngos/_/ma skyes [#]de nyid gzhan nyid yin/_/de las [#]gzhan min khyad par ni/_/re zhig byed par nus ma yin/_/yid phyir sngar yang grub pa'i phyir/_/grub pa yis ni dus phyis bzhin/_/'di ni khyad par gzhan nyid min/_/tha dad phyir dang ma 'brel phyir/_/de ni
[\[66b.7\]]snga ma med pa'i phyir/_/yod pa'i 'bras bur thal bar 'gyur/_/rnam pa gzhan dang gnas dang 'jig_/gzhan nyid de nyid brtags pa dang /_/rgas [#]sogs yul gyi skyon rnams ni/_/de dag kho nar yongs su sbyar/_/nus pa nges pa'i bdag nyid kyis/_/'di dag rang gi [#]'bras bu
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]sogs/_/rigs la sogs pa'ang de'i ngo bor/_/snga phyi la yang yod pa min/_/nus pa'i ngo bo yod pa'i phyir/_/rang dang mthun pa'i bya ba ni/_/de tshe ci phyir rtsod pa [#]min/_/de rtsom dpag med dus ni thob/_/'on kyang 'das dang ma 'ongs dngos/_/skad cig ma
[\[67a.2\]]min pa ni/_/de dag slar yang thog ma nas/_/des ni dpag med dus thob 'gyur/_/de skyes pa yi skad cig gang /_/des ni de [#]lta ba ru brjod/_/skyes nas 'jig pa gang yin pa/_/de ni 'das pa 'byung ma 'ongs/_/'on te de dag skad cig min/_/khyed kyi grub mtha' dang 'gal
[\[67a.3\]]'gyur/_/'dus byas thams cad skad cig mar/_/grub mtha' las ni rab tu bshad/_/rig pas gnas [#]kyang yod na ni/_/nges par skad cig mar 'jig yin/_/da ltar ba [#]bzhin 'dir yang ni/_/'brel pa sngar ni bsgrubs pa yin/_/'di dag 'dis ni ma 'ongs pa/_/don byed
[\[67a.4\]]nus pa yin nam min/_/don byed nus pa yod pa na[#]/_/da ltar ba ni de gzhan bzhin/_/da ltar ba ni ma yin na/_/nus pa thams cad dang bral phyir/_/nam mkha'i pad+ma la sogs bzhin/_/'jig dang mi skyed [#]thal bar 'gyur/_/brgal zhing brtag [#]pa mtshungs par byas/_/ma nges
[\[67a.5\]]par ni brtag [#]pa las/_/de dag kyang ni rgyu mtshan min/_/don byed nus par nges pa ni/_/dngos po rnams kyi rkyen las so/_/rgyu med nyid kyis mtshungs pa ni/_/thams cad thams cad la dngos yin/_/nges par don byed nus pa yi/_/skye ba rkyen [#]gyis nges par 'byung /_/da ltar ba yi
[\[67a.6\]]dngos po yi/_/mtshan nyid yod pas gzhan yod min/_/'das dang ma 'ongs pa dag la/_/de nyid khyed la ma nyams yod/_/de phyir da lta [#]ba nyid ni/_/de dag las ni cis mi 'byung /_/des na mtho ris thar pa yi/_/'brel pa'i brtson pa 'di don med/_/'bad pas 'bras bu
[\[67a.7\]]bsgrubs pa ni/_/de ni cung zad dmigs su med/_/'on te don byed nus pa yang /_/med par de dag la khas len/_/de ltar yin na de yi phyir/_/gtan tshigs rnams ni dngos med chos/_/ma grub phyir na grub rten min/_/da ltar nyid ni grub pas na/_/'gal yin chos can la gnod
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]phyir/_/byung nas gzugs ni gang song ba/_/der ni 'das pa [#]rab tu bshad/_/rkyen dang ldan pa yod pas na/_/gang byung de ni ma 'ongs pa/_/yod pa da ltar ba nyid du/_/'gyur ba zhes byar bsgrubs pa yin/_/gang phyir [#]yod pa mtshan [#]nyid ni/_/da lta ba yi mtshan nyid yin/_/_
[\[67b.2\]]'das la sogs pa gzugs sogs nyid/_/de bzhin 'byung ba'i khongs chud de/_/sgro btags gnas skabs 'di la ni/_/bshad pa yin te yang dag min/_/gnyis la brten pa'i shes pa ni/_/gang gsungs de nyid gzigs pa yi[#]/_/yul dang bcas pas sems dgongs
[\[67b.3\]]nas/_/de ni brtan par bzhed pa yin/_/rtag pa'i dbang phyug sogs kyi blo/_/gang phyir dmigs pa med pa yin/_/sgra dang ming la sogs pa'i chos/_/de yi rnam pa dang bral phyir/_/rtog pa'i rjes 'gro tsam gyis ni/_/rnam shes zhes byar bshad pa yin/_/de 'dir bems po
[\[67b.4\]]ngo bo nyid/_/rab gsal nas ni yongs brtags yin/_/'das pa rnam smin rgyu 'bras ni/_/ster ba khas len ma yin te/_/de yi bag chags ldan shes pa'i/_/rgyu las 'bras bu 'dod pa yin/_/de nyid kyang [#]ni bag chags kyi/_/sems kyi rgyu la brten nas ni/_/las de yod
[\[67b.5\]]ces nyer btags te/_/brten [#]pas dngos po mi 'jigs [#]bzhin/_/chad pa'i lta ba spangs bya'i phyir/_/de ltar bstan bcos las bshad yin/_/rnam pa gzhan du stong nyid mdor/_/gsungs pa de ni ji ltar 'dod/_/dngos sam brgyud pa'i sgo nas ni/_/rgyu 'am 'bras bu nyid gyur pa/_/_
[\[67b.6\]]da lta ba yi ngo bo gang /_/de ni rnal 'byor ba dag shes/_/rnam rtog rjes 'gro'i bdag nyid kyi/_/dad pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes/_/de nyid du ni [#]yul med kyang /_/slar yang rjes su shes pa yin/_/des na rgyu dang 'bras bu ni/_/'das dang ma 'ongs pa yi rgyun/_/de la rten [#]nas rab 'jug 'gyur/_/'das
[\[67b.7\]]dang ma 'ongs bstan pa'o/_/rtog pa'i dra ba ma lus pa/_/spangs pa'i ye shes rgyun ldan pa'i/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa ni/_/lhun gyis grub par 'jug pa yin/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i rab tu byed pa las dus gsum brtag pa ste nyi shu rtsa lnga [#]pa'o//_//_
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]gal te dngos po'i rjes 'gro ba/_/'dir ni cung zad yod ma yin/_/de tshe 'jig rten pha rol pa/_/med phyir 'jig rten pha rol med/_/lus dang blo dang [#]dbang po sogs/_/so sor skad cig 'jig pa'i phyir/_/'jig rten pha rol pa rigs min/_/gzhan ni khas
[\[68a.2\]]len ma byas pas/_/de yi 'byung ba'i khyad par las/_/de ltar de dag las shes nyid/_/ji ltar rgyu dang nus sogs bzhin/_/skye ba'i [#]gsal bar byed pa'o/_/de yang sa la sogs pa yi/_/khyad par rnams la 'jug pa [#]ste/_/lus dang dbang po sogs kyi ming /_/gzhan ni de nyid
[\[68a.3\]]du yod min/_/rtsod pa'i gzhir gyur sems dag ni/_/tha dad lus la gnas pa'i phyir/_/rgyu 'bras nyid ni yod pa min/_/ba lang rta yi shes pa bzhin/_/brjod par 'dod pa'i shes pa yis/_/blo rnams skyed par 'dod pa min/_/shes pa nyid phyir rgyud gzhan dang /_/'brel pa'i
[\[68a.4\]]blo rnams lta bu'o/_/chags pa dang bcas 'chi ka'i sems/_/sems gzhan dang ni 'brel byed min/_/'chi ba'i sems kyi ngo bo'i phyir/_/nyon mongs bral ba de ji bzhin/_/de phyir srog rtsol sogs byin rlabs/_/lus nyid las ni shes pa ni/_/skye bar 'gyur ba rigs so
[\[68a.5\]]zhes/_/zla ba can dang rta mchog zer/_/nur nur po sogs shes yod la/_/rigs pa med par smra ba yin/_/dbang po dag ni ma skyes phyir/_/de la rtogs bya'i don ni med/_/don rtogs pa las gzhan nyid du/_/ngo bo'i shes pa rigs pa min/_/de tshe nus pa'i ngo bo yis/_/blo zhes bya
[\[68a.6\]]ba'ang yod pa min/_/nus pa rnams ni rten med par/_/gnas par 'thad pa ma yin te/_/shes pa'i rten gyi bdag nyid ni/_/yod na lus nyid de yi rten[#]/_/mthar ni lus ni ldog pa na/_/shes pa'i 'jug pa ci la brten/_/de yi de ma thag byung ba'i/_/gal te lus gzhan la brten na/_/_
[\[68a.7\]]lus gzhan mthong ba med pas ni[#]/_/de ni yod par ji ltar shes/_/glang po rta sogs sems bzhin du/_/tha dad lus la 'jug pas na/_/shes pa de ni rgyun gcig pu/_/'brel pa ru ni ji ltar 'gyur/_/de phyir shes pa'i rten gcig ni/_/thog mtha' med pa'i skyes bu 'ga'/_/_
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]'khor ba par ni 'dod par gyis/_/yang na med pa [#]nyid khas long /_/de la 'jig rten pha rol ni/_/nye bar len dang blang bya ru/_/'gyur ba'i shes rgyun la sogs las/_/'ga' zhig gzhan ni yod ma yin/_/de yi thog mtha' med pa yi/_/sngon dang phyi ma da ltar gyi/_/'ga' zhig
[\[68b.2\]]nges pa'i bar mtshams kyi/_/gnas skabs nyid du yongs su bshad/_/mthong ba'i bde ba tsam zhen pas/_/ji ltar de tsam brtag [#]pa yin/_/'jig rten pha rol yul gzhan sogs/_/de ltar de ni kho bo smra/_/gal te de dang tha dad pa'i/_/'jig rten pha rol bkag yin na/_/de tshe
[\[68b.3\]]bsgrub pa don med de/_/de med nyid la rtsod med phyir/_/rgyun ni dngos med ma yin phyir/_/gnas skabs gzhan ni yod pa min/_/de la gnas pa'i 'jig rten ni/_/pha rol ji ltar de nyid kyis/_/de ltar ma yin rgyun gyi sgras/_/skad cig rgyun can de dag ni/_/zor yang phyir na nags
[\[68b.4\]]tshogs bzhin/_/ma lus pas ni rab bstan te/_/gcig pu nyid du brtags pa ni/_/de nyid gzhan nyid sogs brjod med/_/nam mkha'i me tog phreng ba bzhin/_/rang bzhin med pa nyid du 'dod/_/de yang thog mtha' med pa ni/_/ji ltar yang dag bsgrub par 'gyur/_/gal te
[\[68b.5\]]thog mar 'dod pa'i sems/_/de ni rgyu med 'gyur ba'am/_/yang na brtag [#]pa'i rgyu las byung /_/de yang rang bzhin nyid kyis rtag/_/'byung ba tsam las byung ba'am/_/yang na gzhan shes tsam las byung /_/ma la sogs pa thog ma'i sems/_/de la rgyu med res 'ga' bar/_
[\[68b.6\]]rigs min gzhan du de yi ni/_/yod nyid rtag tu snang bar 'gyur/_/rtag [#]pa'i yid dus phyogs dang ni/_/dbang phyug bdag sogs kyis byas min/_/de nyid kyis na rtag yod min[#]/_/thal 'gyur phyir ro de med phyir/_/rnam shes gcig pu rtag pa yi/_/rang bzhin zhes smra gzu lums
[\[68b.7\]]yin/_/gzugs dang sgra sogs kyi sems dag_/gsal bar tha dad snang ba'i phyir/_/sa dang chu dang me sogs pa'i/_/'byung ba las ni skyes pa dang /_/gsal ba min pa'i sems rnams ni/_/cig car 'byung bar thal bar 'gyur/_/'byung ba bzhi po de yang ni/_/gzhan gyis [# ]
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]bstan pa'i ngo bor 'dod/_/lhan cig byed pa'i ltos la yang /_/'on te 'di nyid skad cig mar/_/gzhan dag gis kyang brjod na ni/_/de ltar yin na de dag gi_/ji ltar grub mtha' la mi gtod[#]/_/de ni nges par gnod gyur kyang /_/rigs pa yin zhes khas
[\[69a.2\]]len byed/_/sngar bshad rigs pas skad cig mar/_/thams cad nyid du rigs pa yin/_/rang gi phyogs la ltos med cing /_/gal te rigs pa'i rjes chags na/_/'byung ba nyid ni yod min pa'i/_/rigs pa'i mchog 'di 'dod par gyis/_/de dag yan lag can dngos med/_/_
[\[69a.3\]]rdul phran dngos nyid kyang rigs min/_/rdul phran rnams ni med pa'i phyir/_/de ltar de ni 'chad par 'gyur/_/bag chags yongs su smin pas na/_/phyi rol med pa'i ngo bo ni/_/rnam shes la ni so sor snang /_/rmi lam sogs mtshungs gzhan du min/_/rnam shes nyid kyi snang ba
[\[69a.4\]]la/_/brten nas rab tu brtags pa yin/_/gal te 'byung ba bzhi po ni/_/rmi lam sgyu [#]ma dang 'dra ste/_/de tshe de las gzhan med phyir/_/rgyu nyid du ni mi 'thad do/_/sngar gyur 'byung ba nges gnas pa/_/shes pas gzhan ni skyed byed yin/_/gal te rgyud gzhan gyi rnam
[\[69a.5\]]shes/_/de yi rgyur ni 'dod pa na/_/de ci nye bar len yin nam/_/yang na lhan cig byed pa'am/_/gal te nye bar len 'dod na/_/bu tsha'i shes pa'i rgyun la ni/_/pha ma 'dus sogs 'dus byas la[#]/_/khyad par rjes 'gror 'gyur ba yin/_/gang phyir nyer len nyer blang ba'i/_/_
[\[69a.6\]]chos 'di nyid ni rnam gnas pa/_/rjes su 'gro dang ldog pas na/_/rang gi rgyu las [#]nges pa yin/_/rang gi nyer len stobs byung na/_/rgyud gzhan pa yi [#]rnam shes ni/_/lhan cig byed nyid du brtag la/_/gang yang 'gal ba slar yang med/_/de phyir thog ma'i rnam shes ni/_/rang
[\[69a.7\]]gi nyer len stobs las byung /_/rnam shes nyid sogs gtan tshigs kyis/_/da ltar ma [#]yin rnam shes bzhin/_/rgyu gzhan pa ni spangs pa'i phyir/_/rgyu nyid med par gnas pa la/_/rnam pa gzhan du nges pa'i chos/_/'di ni de yi thal 'gyur min/_/shi ka'i skad cig rnam
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]shes ni/_/rang gi nyer blang skyed nus te/_/chags pas byas pa'i 'brel pa nyid/_/sngon gyi rnam par shes pa bzhin/_/gang gi ngo bos rnam shes ni/_/skyed par byed pa yod nges yin/_/snga phyir de ni ma nyams su/_/zin kyang ci phyir rgyu ma yin/_/pha rol phyogs kyi rnam
[\[69b.2\]]shes ni/_/lus skyes kho na yin pas na/_/bsgrub par bya ba'i chos ldan pa/_/dpe ni de dag ji ltar 'grub/_/lus ni rnam shes rgyu nyid du/_/sngar ni bkag byas ma yin nam/_/sems rnams cig car thob phyir dang /_/tha dad pa la med pa'i phyir/_/'dod na sdug pa yid
[\[69b.3\]]byed sogs/_/dran dang chags sogs rnam shes ni/_/'byung ba nyid du rnam par nges/_/de ni dgag par mi nus so/_/goms pa'i khyad par sngar yod pa/_/'phel dang 'grib pa dag las ni/_/blo rnams 'grib dang phul du byung /_/blo la snang bar gyur pa yin/_/don gzhan
[\[69b.4\]]la chags mi mthun sems/_/don gzhan 'dzin pa med phyir ro/_/shes pa shes pa'i rgyu nyid la/_/rtsod pa nyid du 'gyur ba min/_/de nyid phyir lus tha dad la/_/brten pa nyid du 'grub mi 'gyur/_/sems ni ltung ba'i chos can min/_/lus can rnams la ji ltar rten/_/'bab
[\[69b.5\]]pa la ni gegs byed phyir/_/chu la sogs pa'i rten du 'gyur/_/'gro ba med pa'i sems rnams la/_/rten dag gis ni ci zhig dgos/_/gal te dag gis [#]bdag nyid gnas[#]/_/brten par 'dir ni rtog na sems/_/lus ni bdag nyid mi rigs phyir/_/khyed kyi de yang 'thad par [# ]
[\[69b.6\]]min/_/ji ltar de yi bdag nyid lus/_/gzhan dag gis ni gsal bar rtogs/_/de ltar 'dod chags zhe sdang las/_/sogs pa'i sems kyang cis mi rtogs/_/sems ni bdag nyid kyis rig [#]ste/_/lus ni gzhan dag gis kyang rig_/'di ltar gang dag de tha dad/_/rgyu
[\[69b.7\]]gser dang ni zlos gar bzhin/_/gnyis su med pa'i phyogs la ni/_/gtan tshigs 'di ni 'khrul [#]ma yin/_/rang rang gi ni snang ba ni/_/rig phyir rab rib la sogs bzhin/_/sems ni skyes ma thag 'jig pa/_/bar chad med par mtshon gyur te/_/lus ni de yi dngos yin na/_/_
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]skad cig nyid du cis mi 'dod/_/de la brten nas 'byung ba dang /_/de ni ma 'khrul pa yi phyir/_/gal te de la brtan [#]'dod na/_/de ltar na yang 'khrul [#]nyid yin/_/sngar gnas pa yi shes pa yang /_/skad cig so sor 'jig lus la/_/bstan [#]nas rgyun mi
[\[70a.2\]]'chad par ni/_/nying mtshams sbyor ba kho nar byed/_/gal te rgyun gcig ngo bo yis/_/der ni tha dad nyid min na/_/gzhan du yang ni rgyun gcig tu/_/yod nyid tha dad mi 'gyur mod/_/zag pa zad pa'i rnam shes ni/_/nying mtshams sbyor med ci la shes/_/gal te gzhan grub
[\[70a.3\]]mtha' yis ni/_/cha [#]yin tshad mar ma bzung phyir/_/'dir ni blo bzangs 'gal [#]gang dag_/rgyal ba mi gnas mya ngan 'das/_/theg pa gnyis ni de'i theg par/_/'dus par yang ni rab tu [#]bshad/_/phyir rgol 'dod pa'i grub mtha' la/_/khyod ni rten yang bsgrub bya yi/_/ches [#]dang
[\[70a.4\]]ldan pa'i dpe 'di ni/_/de dag la ni grub pa min/_/gnod pa can yang ma brjod phyir/_/ldog pa la yang the tshom za/_/rigs mi mthun la yod dogs phyir/_/nur nur sogs la rnam shes ni/_/yod ces bya ba gzu lums min/_/dbang po ma skyes pa nyid la/_/der mi [#]shes
[\[70a.5\]]pa ci phyir med/_/rnam shes kun ni dbang po dang /_/don gyis stobs las byung zhes pa/_/de ni mi rigs gang phyir de/_/gzhan du rmi lam sogs su'ang rig_/don rtogs [#]pa las gzhan dngos kyang /_/'di la nges par byas pa yin/_/des na rgyal [#]ba la sogs [#]la/_/_
[\[70a.6\]]'di ni yod par 'thad pa yin/_/de tshe nus pa'i ngo bo yis/_/blo ni gnas par 'gyur ba min/_/de tshe rang don [#]kho na yis/_/blo rnams yod par 'dod pa yin/_/gnyid dang brgyal sogs gnas skabs su/_/sems med khyed kyis ci la nges/_/gal te rigs [#]pa med pa'i
[\[70a.7\]]phyir/_/de yang gang las rtogs pa yin/_/gal te khyod ni de dag la/_/'di ltar nges par 'jug 'gyur te/_/sems ni rig pa min zhes min/_/de ltar yin na sems ldan grub[#]/_/gal te brgya la rnam shes de/_/gnas skabs de dag la [#]yod na/_/sad pa la sogs
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]dran pa ni/_/de [#]yi rnam pa ci mi 'gyur/_/de ni grub pa'i rgyu min no/_/shin tu gsal sogs med pa'i phyir/_/dran pa rab tu mi 'byung ste/_/skyes ma thag sogs sems bzhin no/_/gal te de ltar yid 'di la/_/yod nyid de dag la ci nges/_/sngar bstan gtan tshigs
[\[70b.2\]]nyid kyis ni/_/nges par 'gyur bar go bar gyis/_/gnyid dang brgyal sogs gnas skabs la/_/gal te sems med par 'dod na/_/'chir 'gyur de [#]ni yang skyes na/_/'chi ba med pa kho nar 'gyur/_/mig la sogs la ltos med phyir/_/rang dga' yid kyi [#]blo yin te/_/_
[\[70b.3\]]rang gi nyer len stobs nyid kyis/_/rmi lam sogs ltar 'byung bar 'gyur/_/'di ltar rnam par rtog [#]rnams ni/_/dbang po dang don ltos pa min/_/de yi bya ba med na yang /_/nam mkha'i ut+pal yod phyir/_/de dag yod phyir sngo sogs pa'i/_/rnam par rtog pa gang byung gyur/_/_
[\[70b.4\]]de ni don med snang ba dang /_/mtshungs pa kho nar [#]nges par 'gyur/_/rnam par rtog pa rnams la ni/_/sgra don so sor snang bas na/_/dngos po'i ngo bor mi snang ste/_/de ltar thams cad rgyas bstan zin/_/gsang nang la sogs gnas skabs su/_/lus ni rnam par 'gyur na yang /_/_
[\[70b.5\]]yid kyi blo ni mi 'gyur te/_/de phyir de la 'di brten min/_/rab rib la sogs phra mo yis/_/mig ni rnam par 'gyur ba na/_/mig la sogs la brten pa'i blo/_/rnam par 'gyur ba nyid du skyes/_/de phyir lus ni 'jig na yang /_/yid kyi blo ni 'dir [#]brten min/_/rang gi nye bar
[\[70b.6\]]len stobs kyis/_/'byung 'gyur 'gal ba med pa can/_/gang phyir yid blo 'ba' zhig kyang /_/'gal ba med pa de ltar yin/_/de phyir lus gzhan yod grub phyir/_/kho bo cag gis 'bad mi dgos/_/de ni dgag par nus min te/_/ma mthong na yang the tshom phyir/_/mig mi
[\[70b.7\]]gsal bas du ba ni/_/phra sogs mi mthong bzhin de 'gyur/_/tha dad lus la brten na yang /_/de yi khyad par rjes byed phyir/_/rgyun gcig tu ni 'brel pa yin/_/shes pa snga ma'i rgyun bzhin no/_/skyes ma thag pa dag la yang /_/'on kyang nu ma 'thungs sogs la/_/mngon par 'dod pa
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]'byung ba dang /_/nye bar gnod las skyo bar 'gyur/_/du dang nu ma 'thungs sogs pa'i/_/'bras bus de ni rtogs [#]par 'gyur/_/de yang thams cad rtogs bdag nyid/_/de dang ming ni rjes 'brel can/_/ming gi [#]ngo bo goms pa ni/_/skye ba 'di la yod pa min/_/_
[\[71a.2\]]de dag la gzhan srid med na/_/de ni chad par thal bar 'gyur/_/des na mi nyams myong goms pas/_/de ni bag chags stobs las byung /_/de dag rnam rtog [#]dngos nyid kyis/_/da ltar ba yi rnam rtog bzhin/_/gang phyir mi nyams myong goms pa'o/_/bag chags yongs su smin
[\[71a.3\]]pa las/_/rtog skyes de dag la 'jug phyir/_/de phyir srid gzhan rab tu grub/_/ming ni [#]goms pa'i stobs nyid de/_/gal te de dag la de 'byung /_/des na ci phyir ngag gsal dang /_/dran pa'ang smra mkhas [#]bzhin ma byung /_/gsal ba [#]nye bar nyams pa dang /_/yongs smin 'khrug [#]pa
[\[71a.4\]]nyid kyis na/_/de dag la 'di mi 'byung ste/_/'dus pa'i nad kyi gnas skabs bzhin/_/bdag nyid chen po gang dag la/_/cung zad kyang ni nyams pa med/_/de dag gi [#]gang gsal thos shing /_/dran pa gsal po de yang yod/_/'dod chags zhe sdang sogs 'di dag_/gsal bar
[\[71a.5\]]goms pa'i sbyor las byung /_/rjes 'gro dang ni ldog pa las/_/byung [#]'gyur yongs su nges pa yin/_/gang dag thog mar byung gyur na/_/de dag 'dir goms dang bral yin/_/gal te srid pa gzhan med na/_/de dag skye ba'i rgyu ni gang /_/nye bar gnas pa dmigs pa las/_/de dag skye 'gyur
[\[71a.6\]]mi 'thad de/_/so sor rtog [#]pa yod pa na/_/de yod na yang de mi 'byung /_/so sor rtog [#]pa ldog pa na/_/de dag stobs 'phel snang ba'i phyir/_/phyin ci log tu nges 'phel bas/_/zhig dang ma skyes pa yi yul/_/gtsang dang bdag dang brtan sogs su/_/nyer brtag bud med sogs
[\[71a.7\]]bdag la/_/'dod chags la sogs 'byung 'gyur te/_/yul yang de yi ngo bo [#]min/_/de phyir rigs mthun goms nus las/_/dmigs pa med pa nyid du ni/_/tshe 'di'i 'dod chags sogs 'byung ste/_/chags sogs nyid phyir phyi ma bzhin/_/so sor rtog pa dang bral zhing /_/yul
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]ni nye bar gnas pa na/_/tshul bzhin ma yin yid byed pa'i/_/dbang gyur stobs ni ji lta bar/_/bde dang sdug bsngal sogs 'byung ste/_/de la rigs dang mthun pa yi/_/bag chags yongs su smin gyur pa/_/chags sdang la sogs nyon mongs 'byung /_/des na dngos su yul rnams
[\[71b.2\]]ni/_/chags sdang la sogs rgyu ma yin/_/kun la de yi shes pa bzhin/_/de la nyon mongs cig car 'gyur/_/gzhan spyod pa la dmigs pa'am/_/gzhan gyis smras pa'i stobs kyis ni/_/de dag la ni chags skye min/_/'khrul pa ru ni dmigs pa'i phyir/_/spyod pa ma mthong ma thos
[\[71b.3\]]pas/_/phag dang ri [#]dwags la sogs ni/_/rigs mtshungs 'gro ba la sbyor ba/_/bya ba sna tshogs grub par 'gyur/_/shes rab tshul khrims bzod sogs ni/_/'khor bar mi 'jug pa yi chos/_/rang bzhin gyis 'byung mi 'gyur te/_/de nyid kyis na smyon sogs bzhin/_/bad kan la
[\[71b.4\]]sogs nus pa yis/_/de dag kyang ni 'byung ba min/_/snga ma bzhin du 'khrul pa ni/_/thams cad du ni dmigs pa'i phyir/_/de phyir thog mar byung de dag_/gang zhig goms pa sngon song bar[#]/_/de nyid srid pa gzhan [#]grub pas/_/des na med nyid log pa nyid/_/'dir ni goms pa sngon
[\[71b.5\]]song nas[#]/_/sgrub par byed na mthong 'dod gnod/_/srid pa gzhan ni sngon song nyid/_/sgrub [#]byas stong pa'i dpe yin te/_/khyad par med pas bsgrub byas na/_/gtan tshigs 'di ni 'gal ba nyid/_/de bzhin srid la gzhan goms pa'i/_/rgyud [#]nyid yongs su gyur pa'i phyir/_/spyi tsam
[\[71b.6\]]nyid kyis bsgrub bya ni/_/gtan tshigs kyang ni 'gal ba min/_/gang phyir des na 'gal med pas/_/gang gis de ni ldog par 'gyur/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i tshig [#]le'ur byas pa las 'jig rten rgyang pan pa'i brtag [#]pa ste nyi shu rtsa drug [#]pa'o//_//gal te shes pa las gzhan
[\[71b.7\]]par/_/'byung ba bzhi po [#]yod pa min/_/gsal bar snang bar gyur pa yi/_/rnam bcad 'di ni ci zhig yin/_/'di ltar snang ba de nyid kyang /_/med pa nyid du khas len na/_/sems ni yod pa nyid du yang /_/khyod la tshad ma ci zhig yod/_/phyi rol don du snang ba 'di'i/_/bdag
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]nyid ji ltar snang ba yin/_/'on te rdul phran rang bzhin nam/_/yang na yan lag can mtshan nyid/_/re zhig phra rab rnams kyis ni/_/rnam pa so sor rig pa min/_/phra rab cha med du ma dang /_/lus can shes la mi snang phyir/_/cha shas dbye ba [#]dang bral bar/_/_
[\[72a.2\]]rdul phran rnams ni snang bar 'gyur/_/rang gi rnam pa mi snang phyir/_/gzhan du de dang mngon sum min/_/lhan cig tu ni skyes pa yang /_/de dag rang bzhin du ni snang /_/gnas skabs de dag la 'di nyid/_/cha med ngo bo nyid mi spong /_/gal te 'grib pa'i mthar thug pa'i/_/rang bzhin
[\[72a.3\]]de ltar yod na ni/_/tshor ba la sogs lta bur ni/_/de dag lus med cis [#]mi 'gyur/_/skad cig mtshungs pa gzhan skye'i phyir/_/rtag pa nyid du 'khrul pa gzhan[#]/_/gal te rigs mthun par med par/_/'dzin na rigs pa 'khrul pa yin/_/mngon sum rang [#]gi bya ba yi/_/stobs nyid
[\[72a.4\]]kyis ni shes pa bsre/_/gal te skyed byed ma yin par/_/de ci mngon sum spyod yul yin/_/dngos po rnams ni skad cig mar[#]/_/rjes su dpag pas nges pa yin/_/ser po dkar po la sogs ni/_/rdul phran yin par ci las shes/_/phyi rol mig gis gzung bya ni/_/rags phyir
[\[72a.5\]]ril sogs bzhin du/_/phra sogs sngon song de la yang /_/rjes dpag 'di nyid yod ce na/_/rags pa nyid ni dngos chos su/_/chos can gnyis la grub pa min/_/rags pa yan lag can ni med/_/rdul phran yang ni de lta min/_/'on te yul ni rgya che bar/_/gnas pa'i
[\[72a.6\]]gzugs ni de bzhin 'byung /_/de lta yin na 'khrul shes la/_/snang ba'i gzugs kyis the tshom za/_/gal te de brdzun de ltar min/_/bye brag rab tu bsgrub par gyis/_/de dang 'di dang khyad par ci/_/gal te don byed mi slu ba/_/don byed snang ba'i rnam shes ni/_/mi slu bar ni brjod pa
[\[72a.7\]]yin/_/rgyu yi nus pa nges pa yi[#]/_/gzhan du thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur/_/gang tshe mtshungs dngos gzung bya zhing /_/mtshungs min nyid ni gzung bya min/_/rdul phran ngo bo gnyis nyid phyir/_/de tshe ci phyir mi 'thad pa/_/gang tshe spyi [#]dang khyad par gyi/_/bdag nyid dngos po thams cad
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]kyis[#]/_/mtshungs dang mi mtshungs dngos nyid kyis/_/rdul phran ngo bo gnyis su brjod/_/de la mtshungs pa'i ngo bo gang /_/de ni mig gi shes pa'i yul/_/des na rnam gcig shes pa ni/_/rdul phran rnams la 'thad pa nyid/_/mtshungs pa min pa'i [#]ngo bo gang /_/de ni rnal 'byor mngon
[\[72b.2\]]sum yul/_/de ltar blo dman 'ga' zhig ni/_/'khrul pa ru ni brtags pa yin/_/dngos po gcig la ngo bo gnyis/_/ji ltar shes bya rigs pa yis/_/de dag dngos nyid thob pa'am/_/phan tshun ngo bo med pa'i phyir/_/phan tshun bdag nyid yin na yang /_/ngo bo gnyis te
[\[72b.3\]]'gal bar 'gyur/_/khyad par yang ni mig sogs pa'i/_/dbang po rnams kyis dmigs pa yin/_/phan tshun 'gal ba'i bdag nyid kyi[#]/_/ngo bo ji ltar gcig tu 'gyur/_/rig phyir dngos po gcig pu la/_/'gal ba dag ni mi srid min/_/gcig ni rnam [#]pa gcig 'gyur bar[#]/_/_
[\[72b.4\]]de shes dbang phyug bka' ni min/_/gang zhig ji ltar dmigs 'gyur bar/_/de ni de ltar khas blangs [#]gis/_/de min med kyang rig pa'i phyir/_/dung la ser sogs ngo bo bzhin/_/'gal ba'i ngo bo dang 'dres [#]las/_/tha dad mtshan nyid gzhan ni med/_/tshad mas grub par ma gyur
[\[72b.5\]]kyang /_/rdul phran rnams la the tshom za/_/'di dag la ni med pa yi[#]/_/rtog ldan nges pa ji ltar skye/_/yang dag 'byar dang bskor ba'am/_/bar med rnam par gnas kyang rung /_/dbus nas rdul phran rdul gcig la/_/bltas pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa/_/rdul phran gzhan la
[\[72b.6\]]ltas pa [#]yang /_/de nyid gal te yin rtog na/_/de lta yin na sa 'dzin sogs/_/rgyas par 'gyur ba rigs pa min/_/rdul phran gzhan la lta ba'i dngos/_/gal te gzhan du 'dod na ni/_/rdul phran gcig pu cha shas ni/_/med pa ru ni ji ltar 'gyur/_/cha shas dbye ba med pa
[\[72b.7\]]gang /_/rdul phran du ni ji ltar 'gyur/_/[#]rdul phran du ni gzhan dag 'dod/_/de nyid la ni rnam dpyad byas/_/de phyir thug med srid pa min/_/gang tshe de dag dngos rnams kyi/_/rdul phran nyid du khas len byed/_/de tshe de dag dam bca' ni/_/gdon mi za bar nyams par 'gyur/_/_
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]gtan tshigs gzhi ma grub pa min/_/gzhan gyi khas len sbyor sogs pa'i/_/stobs kyis gcig nyid sel ba yin/_/de ltar phyogs rnams thams cad la/_/bdag nyid gcig pu de mi rigs/_/gcig ni ma grub pa yi phyir/_/du ma'i rang bzhin yang
[\[73a.2\]]mi srid/_/de phyir rdul phran nges par [#]ni/_/med par [#]nges par skye rung yin/_/gcig dang du ma'i rang bzhin gyis/_/stong phyir nam mkha'i pad+ma bzhin/_/rdul phran mi rigs pa yi phyir/_/yan lag can yang yod pa min/_/gang phyir de ni rdul phran gyis/_/rtsom par gzhan dag gis
[\[73a.3\]]khas blangs[#]/_/snang ba med dang snang dang bcas/_/gzhan gyi snang ba kho na yi/_/rnam par shes pas phyi rol don/_/rnam pa gang gis kyang mi shes/_/rnam shes bems po'i rang bzhin las/_/bzlog par rab tu skye ba ste/_/bems min rang bzhin gang yin pa/_/de 'di'i bdag nyid shes pa
[\[73a.4\]]yin/_/gcig pa cha med rang bzhin las/_/gsum gyi rang bzhin mi 'thad phyir/_/'di yi rang gis rig pa ni/_/bya dang byed pa'i ngo bor smin[#]/_/de phyir 'di ni shes pa yi[#]/_/rang bzhin yin pas bdag shes rung /_/don gyi ngo bo gzhan pa ni/_/de yis ji ltar shes par 'gyur/_/_
[\[73a.5\]]de yi rang bzhin gzhan la med/_/gang gis de shes gzhan yang shes/_/dngos po rnams ni don dam par/_/tha dad nyid du gnas phyir ro/_/shes pa'i ngo bor skyes pas na/_/shes pa shes par rigs pa yin/_/don ni shes dngos ma skyes pas/_/des ni ji ltar shes par 'gyur/_/_
[\[73a.6\]]shes pa rnams bcas phyogs la ni/_/dngos su de nyid tha dad kyang /_/de dang gzugs brnyan 'dra bas na/_/gdags pa tsam gyis tshor bar rung /_/don gyis rnam par bsgyur ldan pa'i/_/rnam shes su zhig mi 'dod pa/_/de la phyi rol rig pa yi/_/rnam pa 'di yang yod ma yin/_/_
[\[73a.7\]]brgya la glang po shing la sogs/_/ji ltar ral gri'i me sogs kyis/_/de yi ngo bo ma yin yang /_/bcad sreg [#]sogs byed 'di de bzhin/_/gang phyir de dang 'di mtshungs min/_/de dag 'dir bskyed pa yi rgyu/_/yin pas de lta'i ngo bor [#]grub/_/shes pa de 'drar skyed byed min/_/gang tshe
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]gzung bya'i yongs gcod ni/_/shes pa'i ngo bor srid pa yin/_/de yi yongs gcod ngo bo nyid/_/shes pa la ni 'thad pa yin/_/gzhan du na ni yongs gcod pa'i/_/ngo bor shes pa zhes bya bar/_/gsal bar brjod bya nyid yin no/_/'di ltar don rigs [#]ma bstan to/_/yongs gcod
[\[73b.2\]]de ni gang gis shes/_/brgal zhing brtag pa'i gzhi ma yin/_/de yi bdag nyid yongs gcod de/_/bde sogs bde ba nyid sogs bzhin/_/rang gi ngo bor rig pa'i phyir/_/shes byed gzhan la ltos pa min/_/'di la [#]ma rtogs pa yod min/_/rang rig pa yi don 'di yin/_/_
[\[73b.3\]]gal te don rtogs bya ba byed/_/shes pa nyid du mi rtogs pas/_/des na gsal byed nyid yin pas/_/rtogs phyir gzhan la ltos pa yin/_/de don bdag nyid nyams myong na/_/de 'dra'ang gsal ba nyid du yod/_/'di la bdag nyid nyams myong med/_/de phyir bdag nyid gsal byed
[\[73b.4\]]min/_/mig sogs rnams ni gzugs sogs la/_/gsal bar byed pa nyid yin pas/_/ji ltar rnam bzhag snang gyur pa/_/de ltar 'dir yang 'gyur ba yin/_/phyi rol don la gsal byed yin/_/nus pa med phyir bdag gsal min/_/[#]dngos po rnams kyi nus pa ni/_/brgal
[\[73b.5\]]zhing brtag pa ma yin no/_/don la rnam par rig pa ni/_/shes nyid brjod pa ma yin nam/_/de ni de bdag nyid 'gyur na/_/bya ba gzhan ni ci zhig 'gyur/_/don gyi nyams myong ngo bo ni/_/gal te de yang shes bdag nyid/_/de tshe don nyams myong bdag nyid/_/shes la rigs so de
[\[73b.6\]]yod min/_/khas len don yod spangs [#]par ni/_/thal 'gyur phyir te rang nyid las/_/nyams myong bdag nyid skye na yang /_/don rig rab tu grub pa min/_/ji ltar rnam bcas shes pa yi/_/phyogs la don gyi gzugs brnyan ni/_/pha rol po la der nye [#]ba'i/_/rgyu mtshan yod pa ma yin no/_/_
[\[73b.7\]]rang bzhin bems po'i dngos nyid phyir/_/gal te 'di bdag nyams myong min/_/shes pa rig pa med pa na/_/de tshe don gyi [#]nyams myong 'jig_/don gyi nyams myong zhes bya bar/_/shes pa kho nar brjod pa yin/_/de ni ma grub dngos nyid ni[#]/_/de ni rab grub gzhan cir 'gyur/_/shes
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]pa gzhan gyis nyams myong na/_/don de rang gis myong ma grub/_/grub pa ma grub pa yi phyir/_/gang gi tshe na grub par 'gyur/_/gal te de yi [#]shes skye na/_/rang bdag rig par ma gyur par/_/gzhan gyis rig pa grub smra na/_/de ltar de ni legs smras yin/_/_
[\[74a.2\]]de la [#]nyams myong ma grub na/_/snga ma la yang ma grub nyid/_/de la gzhan rig skye ba na/_/thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur/_/spyod yul gzhan la 'pho ba na/_/de ltar 'gyur min de yang snang /_/spyod yul gzhan du 'pho ba na/_/tha ma gang yin de rang ngam/_/gzhan las grub pa ma
[\[74a.3\]]yin te/_/de ma grub pas kun grub min/_/des [#]na 'gro ba ma lus pa/_/dmus long nyid du thal bar 'gyur[#]/_/tha ma rang gis grub pa na[#]/_/gzhan dag la yang de nges yod/_/shes phyir gzhan du khyed cag la/_/de dag shes med bum sogs bzhin/_/mig ni gzugs la rnam shes
[\[74a.4\]]ni/_/skye [#]byed phyir ni gsal byed min/_/de ni rig phyir ma yin te/_/des na shes dang 'di cis mtshungs/_/gang zhig rig pa nyid 'gyur na/_/gang zhig rig par nges pa yin/_/de las de ni tha dad min/_/de las de yang dbyer med 'gyur/_/ji ltar sngon po blo bdag nyid/_/_
[\[74a.5\]]ji ltar zla ba gnyis pa yang /_/sngon po'i rnam pa shes pa 'di/_/sngon po'i blos kyang rig pa yin/_/gal te tha mi dad yin na/_/shes pa'i bdag nyid gzhan bdag min/_/shes bya sngon po'i blo rig ni/_/des sngo [#]rnam pa ji ltar rig_/rig pa 'di dag thams cad ni/_/don gzhan
[\[74a.6\]]spyod yul can ma yin/_/rig pa'i rang bzhin nyid kyis rig[# ]/rang gi bdag nyid rig pa bzhin/_/gtso bor don ni 'dzin byed min/_/rang gi rang bzhin la gnas phyir/_/don gyi [#]rnam pas bsgyur ldan dang /_/bral zhing [#]brtags pas don 'dzin min/_/dag pa'i shel dang 'dra ba [#]ni/_/don
[\[74a.7\]]gyi rnam pa dang bral ba/_/shes pa gang su 'ga' zhig 'dod/_/de dag la ni sgrub pa yin/_/'dra ba dang bcas rnam shes ni/_/phyi rol don rigs [#]'gyur zad mod/_/de yang thams cad du med phyir/_/don rigs [#]gnas pa rigs pa min/_/shel las tha mi dad pa'i phyir/_/rnam pa du ma
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]nyid mi 'gyur/_/des na de yi stobs kyis [#]ni/_/don rigs [#]gnas pa yod pa min/_/rnam pa dang tha dad pa'i [#]phyir/_/shes pa'ang gcig nyid du mi 'gyur/_/gzhan du 'di las [#]gcig nyid du/_/ji ltar yongs su brtags par 'gyur/_/kun nas bdag nyid dang mtshungs na/_/shes pa
[\[74b.2\]]mi shes sogs nyid 'gyur/_/cha 'ga' zhig ni mtshungs pa na/_/thams cad thams cad rig par 'gyur/_/gzhan gyi rnam pa'i shes pa yang /_/gal te don rig yin pa na/_/kun kyang kun gyis shes par 'gyur/_/nges par byed pa'i rgyu yang med/_/ji ltar khyed cag gis shes pa/_/de
[\[74b.3\]]nyid kyis na rnam med ni/_/yang dag ma yin rnam par rig_/gal te yang dag don de bzhin/_/sems dang sems las byung ba yi/_/rang bzhin thun mong ma yin 'di/_/des na gzhan dag gtso bor ni/_/rig pa de ni gang gis min/_/tshogs pa gcig la rag las nyid/_/rgyu dang 'bras
[\[74b.4\]]bu nyid sogs sam/_/yang dag brten nas zhes bya bar/_/yang dag rig par nyer brtags [#]'gyur/_/gzugs med pa yi dngos po ni/_/tshogs pa gcig la rag las min/_/'di yi rig pa phal pa yang /_/shin tu med pa kho na'ang min/_/'on kyang yang dag min rnam pa/_/'khrul
[\[74b.5\]]pas reg ces bya bar brjod/_/de nyid kyis rig ma yin te/_/des na yul med pa de yin/_/gal te der yang rnam shes ni/_/'khrul pas de ltar snang 'gyur na/_/rig par byed par brjod pas na/_/de ni yul med gsal bar 'gyur/_/rnam pa dang bcas rnam med pa/_/de ni [# ]
[\[74b.6\]]gzhan med rigs ma yin/_/des na sangs rgyas rnam shes la/_/kho bo cag ni rtag 'jug byed/_/de dang 'dra ba nyid 'byung [#]bas/_/gzhan gyi 'dod chags sogs rig nas/_/sgrib pa yod pa 'thob 'gyur te/_/dmigs pa can gyi gzhung lugs la/_/dpag bsam shing dang
[\[74b.7\]]'dra bar ni/_/kun rtog rlung gis mi [#]bskyod kyang /_/thub pas 'jig rten thams cad kyi/_/don gyi phun sum tshogs pa mdzad/_/rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen pa ni/_/des na gzigs pa med par bstan/_/lhun gyis grub pa thams cad kyi/_/ma lus kun mkhyen don bsgrub phyir/_/_
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]dkar sogs ngo bo blo min na/_/de ni re zhig ji ltar 'gyur/_/blo ni dkar sogs dngos nyid na/_/phyi don tshad ma gang gis grub/_/sngo sogs so sor snang ba ni/_/mi slu nyid kyis shes pa yi/_/rnam pa nyid kyi rigs mthun las/_/skye bar bsgrub [#]na
[\[75a.2\]]shes pa bzhin/_/phyi rol don ni thob byed dam/_/gal te de yi nus pa ni/_/mi slu ba nyid du 'dod na/_/phyi don smyon la de grub min/_/gal te don byed par snang ba'i/_/shes pa la ni rgyu nyid du/_/mi slu ba nyid du 'dod na/_/de ltar mig med la de srid/_/ji ltar phyi rol chu sogs
[\[75a.3\]]la/_/nus pa nyid du nges 'dod na/_/shes bdag [#]nyid la yang de bzhin/_/des na ldog nyid the tshom za/_/rjes su dpag la snang ba yis/_/gsal bar ma nges thun mong 'di/_/me sogs gsal ba'i gzugs dang ni/_/'di ni mtshungs pa ma yin no/_/gal te yul gyi rnam bcad
[\[75a.4\]]snang /_/nang gi nyams myong las tha dad/_/gzhal bya nyid sogs gtan tshigs kyis/_/rgyu gzhan la gnas sems gzhan no/_/'dir yang 'khrul pa nyid yin te/_/sems de rang gi ngo bo dang /_/de bzhin mig nad las byung ba'i/_/zla ba gnyis la sogs kyis 'khrul/_/gal
[\[75a.5\]]te phyi don rnam gzhan du/_/'di [#]ni rig pa yin brjod na/_/snang bar 'gyur ba'i rnam pa ni/_/de ni don de bdag nyid min/_/de ni de ltar snang 'gyur bas/_/rnam par shes pas rtog [#]mi 'gyur/_/gal te snang 'gyur mi rigs [#]na/_/de rig rnam pa gzhan yang rig_/de ni phan tshun
[\[75a.6\]]'gal nyid na/_/ji ltar 'thad pa zhes byar 'gyur/_/de nyid kyi phyir sems rnams la/_/rang rig nyid ni bsgrub dka' nyid[#]/_/bdag nyid 'gyur ba'i snang ba ni/_/de tshe rig par snang ba'i phyir/_/de phyir don nyid rtogs byed dang /_/yod pa rnam gzhan rtog pas na/_/blo 'di nyid ni
[\[75a.7\]]'khrul pa yin/_/des na bdag nyid rig pa yin/_/'on te 'dzin pa'i ngo bo gang /_/de ni de gzung las tha dad/_/de rig na de mi rig phyir/_/ji ltar ro sogs 'dzin pa ltar/_/gzung ba'ang de 'dzin pas de bzhin/_/gang gis de ni rtogs [#]pa na/_/nges par rtogs par [#]mi 'gyur
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]te/_/ro 'dzin pa la sogs pa bzhin/_/tha dad ro sogs bzhin du bsgrub/_/yang na dngos gcig mi shes phyir/_/rgyud gzhan la gnas blo bzhin no/_/shes pa rang cha 'dzin byed min/_/shes las skyes 'gyur rang [#]nus bzhin/_/bzung [#]ba la dgag pa de bzhin/_/gang
[\[75b.2\]]gis bag chags gnyis bral yin/_/nag pa'i shes pas de byung ba'i/_/shes pa'i gzung bya rtogs [#]byed min/_/shes pa nyid phyir ji bzhin du/_/de ni gzhan pa'i lus byung ba/_/so so ma yin rig phyir dang /_/de nyid sngar ni bstan pa'i phyir/_/ngo bo gcig pu mi shes pa'i/_/_
[\[75b.3\]]bar du gtan tshigs ma grub nyid/_/de ni phyi rol phyogs dang 'brel/_/zhes bya 'dis ni bzung ba yin[#]/_/rnam pa gzhan dag rig 'gyur te/_/'dzin par nyams myong med par brjod/_/de tshe bdag gi don cir yang /_/'dzin pas byas pa dran pa med/_/gzung ba'i ngo bo dang bral ba/_/_
[\[75b.4\]]'dzin pa skyes par dran par 'gyur/_/de phyir tha mi dad yin na/_/gzung ba la yang dran par 'gyur/_/'dzin pa dran pa yod pa na/_/der ni de nyid 'dzin par 'gyur/_/rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa yi/_/de ltar de dag tha dad grub/_/de ltar gtan tshigs de dag ni/_/_
[\[75b.5\]]bsgrub bya'i chos can la ni grub/_/dmigs pa rab tu ma grub na/_/don mthong rab tu mi 'grub bo/_/de phyir 'dzin pa rig med par/_/gzung ba rig par 'gyur ba min/_/mig nad can gyis mthong ba yi[#]/_/ser sogs de bzhin gsal por
[\[75b.6\]]snang /_/'dzin pa'i cha la reg [#]bya min/_/de bzhin du ni gzhan yang ni/_/khyad par mtshon pa med pa yi/_/gzung ba'i ngo bo la de'ang dran/_/thams cad las ldog ngo bo la/_/de myong goms [#]sogs med pa'i phyir/_/gzhan du cir yang de lta bu/_/'dzin
[\[75b.7\]]ces dran par mi 'gyur ro/_/dag cing shel dang 'dra bar ni/_/dran pa yod pa'ang ma yin no/_/dung la ser sogs rnam shes kyis/_/gtan tshigs phyi ma gnyis po yang /_/gsal por ma nges nyid yin te/_/sgrub pa gzhan la 'ang phyogs 'dis yin/_/des na rtsod pa'i gzhir gyur
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]yin/_/shes pa nyid phyir gnyis su med/_/rig bya rig par byed po dag_/bral zhing gzugs brnyan lta bu yi[#]/_/gzugs brnyan la yang shes pa ni/_/dmigs pa dang ldan 'dod min nam/_/mig gi snang ba ldog pa na/_/rang gdong de bzhin mthong phyir
[\[76a.2\]]ro/_/mngon par [#]phyogs de snang phyir dang /_/tshad yul bye brag sogs mthong phyir/_/rang gi gdong [#]sogs de bzhin du[#]/_/mi mthong dngos po gzhan bzhin no/_/rnam shes nyid dang gsal ba nyid/_/de yang phyi rol la brten min/_/rnam med la sogs mi rung bas/_/des na
[\[76a.3\]]'di yi khyab pa des/_/de ma thag pa'i shes nus la/_/bzung [#]ba'i cha ni yul dngos gnas/_/de nyid min par kho bo 'dod/_/des na de ni ma bsgrubs so/_/rnam rig tsam nyid bsgrub pa ni/_/blo ldan rnams kyis dri med mdzad/_/kho bo cag gis de phyogs ni/_/don dam nges par
[\[76a.4\]]bskyed par byas/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa las phyi rol gyi don brtag pa ste nyi shu rtsa bdun [#]pa'o//_//yang 'dir gzhan dag mi shes pa'i/_/dri mas gos pa'i blo can rnams/_/sems tsam tshul 'di mi rigs te/_/thos pas gnod pa'i phyir
[\[76a.5\]]zhes smras[#]/_/de ni kun la tshad ma ru/_/skyes bus ma byas par ni gnas/_/gang phyir skyes bus byas tshig gis/_/log pa nyid du rtog [#]par 'gyur/_/nyes pa yod dam med par ni/_/skyes bu'i ngag la the tshom za/_/byed po med phyir thos po la/_/skyon yod the tshom yod pas
[\[76a.6\]]min/_/byed po re zhig ma mthong na/_/gang tshe yod ces 'dod pa yin/_/sngon ma mthong dang 'brel pa ni/_/mi shes rgyu yis da ltar smod/_/rjes su dpag pa dang bral yang /_/de ni yod par brtags pa yin/_/byas dang ma byas pa'i lung ni/_/kho bo cag la de grub min/_/_
[\[76a.7\]]rang nyid [#]tshad ma yin pa'i phyir/_/byas pas 'di ni rtogs [#]byed min/_/drang srong yid sogs tshig [#]kyang ni/_/de nyid kyis ni bden par 'gyur/_/ma 'brel zhe sdang dang bcas pa/_/bden par smra bar ji ltar 'gyur/_/de phyir byed po sgrub pa'i lung /_/gzhan byas bdag cag la grub min/_/_
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]gal te rig byed byed po dang /_/'dra ba dang [#]ltar cung zad snang /_/de phyir nye bar 'jal ba des/_/byed po la yang nyer 'jal 'gyur/_/gal te byed po med cung zad/_/gzhal byas grub par mi 'gyur na/_/des na [#]nges bar byed po ni/_/don gyis go ba'i gzhal byar 'gyur/_/de med
[\[76b.2\]]kyang ni rig byed la/_/mi 'thad cung zad gang yang med/_/de yod na ni tshad ma sogs/_/mang po grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/der ni lnga por ma nges phyir/_/dngos med nyid kyis rtogs [#]par 'gyur/_/des na de yod rnyed dka' ste/_/dngos med tshad mas gnod pa'i phyir/_/tshad ma ma yin
[\[76b.3\]]nyid ldog [#]phyir/_/rig byed skyes bus ma byas nyid/_/gang 'dod de yang dngos min pas/_/sgrub pa rnams kyi [#]bsgrub bya min/_/rtog [#]ge rnams kyis gang smras zhes/_/skyes bus byas pa nyid sgrub pa/_/de ni spang bar [#]byas pa min/_/rig byed skyes bus ma byas grub/_/dngos
[\[76b.4\]]po'i ngo bor phyogs gang dag_/gtso bo dang ni rdul phran bzhin/_/de dag gang rung ma grub na/_/cig shos rang nyid kyis mi grub[#]/_/gtso bo yi ni rgyu nyid kyi[#]/_/sgrub pa yang ni spang byas kyang /_/gtan tshigs gzhan ma rnams kyis ni/_/rdul phran kyis byas 'gro bsgrub bya/_/_
[\[76b.5\]]dngos po'i phyogs ni bsgrub don du/_/sgrub pa gang zhig brjod pa min[#]/_/de ni gzhan dag spang [#]byas na/_/med pa rang nyid kyis [#]ni grub/_/snga phyi yi ni mtha' dag la/_/gzhan gyis sgrub pa gang brjod yin/_/de ni spang bar byas nas ni/_/rig byed smra ba'i bya ba rdzogs/_/rtag
[\[76b.6\]]nyid dngos po'i ngo bo gang /_/de ni ma bsgrubs na yang ni/_/snga ma'i phyogs [#]gnyis sun bton te/_/rang nyid kyis te grub par 'gyur/_/thog ma'i rig [#]byed kyis mtha' gang /_/skyes bus byas pa'i mtshan nyid can/_/phyi mtha' 'jig pa'i ngo bo yang /_/de dag med pa rtag pa nyid/_/thog
[\[76b.7\]]mar rig byed gang byas min/_/phyis kyang 'jig par mi 'gyur ba/_/de nyid de yi rtag pa nyid/_/gal te shes bya der yang 'dod/_/ma byas nyid dang 'jig med kyis/_/rtag pa nyid du 'dod pa yin/_/de dag dngos med bdag nyid kyis/_/rang gi sgrub [#]pa la ltos min/_/rig byed ngag don
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]log pa nyid/_/rjes su dpag pas gang brjod pa/_/de yi rig byed sgrub shes pa'i/_/stobs kyi phyogs ni ldog par 'gyur/_/de ni mngon sum mtshungs nyid phyir/_/rig byed las byung stobs chen can/_/des na rjes su dpag pas ni/_/ji ltar yang ni gnod nus
[\[77a.2\]]min/_/mngon sum phyogs la dgos [#]pas na/_/gang phyir bstan bcos nyid gnas yin/_/de ni shin tu stobs ldan phyir/_/rjes su dpag pa la gnod byed/_/dpe la ltos pa med phyir dang /_/skyon med phyir na zor yang min/_/lung ni tshad ma nyid yin la/_/de dang rjes dpag 'dra
[\[77a.3\]]ba min/_/des na lung dang rjes dpag pas/_/don gang la ni the tshom 'gyur/_/de la stobs chen lung gis ni/_/de nyid kyis ni nges par byos/_/rig byed kyis don rtogs byed kyang /_/bdag la tshad ma min de ltar/_/bden smras zhe sdang tsam gyis ni/_/brjod par nus pa ma yin no/_/mi
[\[77a.4\]]'dod pa dang zhe sdang gis/_/tshad ma min pa nyid mi 'gyur/_/dga' ba dang ni 'dod pa yis/_/tshad mar brtags par mi 'gyur ro/_/zhe sdang can yang rig byed la/_/tshad ma yin pa nyid kyi [#]rgyu/_/cung zad smra bar mi byed de/_/gang gis de dag bden smras 'gyur/_/'dzin dang 'dod dang 'chad
[\[77a.5\]]pa yis/_/las la rtag tu mngon sbyor bar[#]/_/log pa nyid rgyu mi shes na/_/ring na gnas pas ji ltar shes/_/gang phyir des ni nges sbyor ba/_/de dang 'brel pa'i dgos pa can/_/der gnas yon tan skyon rnams ni/_/de dag shes pa'i dbang du byas/_/tshangs la gang dag sdang [#]ba ni/_/_
[\[77a.6\]]sdig can rig byed las ring gnas/_/rig byed skyon dang yon tan tshig_/ngo tsha med par ji ltar brjod/_/gzhan yang rna [#]skyes ngo shes pas/_/sgra yang [#]rtag pa nyid dang ni/_/khyab pa nyid dang 'grub pas na/_/bzlog la nges par su zhig byed/_/des na dus ni thams cad dang /_/yul kun
[\[77a.7\]]du ni gcig nyid gang /_/ngo shes pa yi mngon sum gyis/_/rang grub 'di la gnod phan yin/_/'bar sogs skad cig nyid yin yang /_/ngo shes she na de min te/_/kho bo'i spyi ni rtag nyid pas/_/'di yi ngo shes pa 'di yin/_/khyad par 'ga' zhig gis [#]ni cha/_/gang la blo ni tha dad 'gyur/_/_
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]de la ngo shes cha [#]yin te/_/tha dad blo yis nges par 'gyur/_/yul dang dus sogs tha dad pa'i/_/ba lang sgra gsal blo rnams ni/_/thams cad mtshungs pa'i yul can nam/_/sna tshogs don gyi yul can min/_/ba lang zhes bya las skyes phyir/_/da ltar skyes pa'i blo bzhin no/_/_
[\[77b.2\]]snga de'i ba lang sgra blo yis/_/ba lang sgra ni rab brtan yin/_/ba lang sgra yi yul nyid kyis/_/ji ltar phyi de skyes pa bzhin/_/'di yang de ni shes yin te/_/gtan tshigs de phyir snga blo [#]bzhin/_/gnyis ka yang ni yul gcig yin/_/ji ltar blo ni gcig bzhin blo/_/yul
[\[77b.3\]]dang dus sogs tha dad pa/_/ba lang nyid blo ma lus pas/_/ba lang sgra gcig skyed 'gyur te/_/ba lang blo phyir blo gcig bzhin/_/snga de'i ba lang sgra brjod pa/_/phyi de yang ni yod pa yin/_/ba lang sgra yis shes rtogs phyir/_/phyi de brjod pa'i sgra bzhin no/_/phyi de ba lang sgra thos pa/_/bdag gis sgra de snga de'ang thos/_/_
[\[77b.4\]]sngar bstan gtan tshigs nyid kyis ni/_/phyi de brjod pa'i sgra bzhin no/_/sgra yang brjod par bya ba gang /_/de bstan yun [#]ni ring por [#]phan/_/'brel ba nyams myong la ltos pas/_/shes bya la shes 'jug phyir ro/_/de 'dra gang yin brtan par mthong /_/du ba'i spyi yi cha bzhin no/_/'brel pa'i shes pa la ltos pa/_/mi [#]brtan pa ni rtogs byed
[\[77b.5\]]min/_/de tshe rgyu mtshan nyid yin phyir/_/mar me glog gi gsal ba bzhin/_/sgra yi mi rtag nyid phyogs las/_/rjes su dpag pas gtan grub pas/_/de kun gyis ni 'gal bar 'gyur/_/bum sogs gcig nyid thob gyur na[#]/_/rigs rten 'dod pas grub pa [#]sgrub/_/gsal ba rnams la
[\[77b.6\]]gcig nyid du/_/phyogs 'di yis ni byed pa na/_/de tshe mthong ba dang 'gal nyid/_/tshad ma kun gyis brjod par bya/_/bcos ma'i 'brel pa nyid yin na/_/de yi sbyor ba med pa'i phyir/_/gsal ba de gcig la gnas pas/_/'brel pa thams cad khyab 'gyur min/_/sa las
[\[77b.7\]]byung dang yod rdzas sogs/_/mjug ma nyid sogs 'jol ba'i phyir/_/sbyor ba mang du byed pas na/_/ba lang nyid nges 'gyur ba min/_/de phyir sgra ni bcos ma min/_/res 'ga' yang ni 'jig mi 'gyur/_/rtag pa dang ni rten 'brel phyir/_/nam mkha' rdul phran lta bu'o/_/_
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]spyi rnams du ma mngon phyogs pa'i/_/yul can lan cig thos pas [#]na/_/rang don brjod nyid dmigs dgar bas/_/sgra yis [#]rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/mang du thos pas de nyid ni/_/srog chags nyid la sogs pa dang /_/gar sogs 'gro ba la sogs
[\[78a.2\]]dag_/lkog shal mjug ma nyid sogs kyang /_/khra bo sogs dang khu yu sogs/_/gsal ba'ang rang gi rgyu spangs nas/_/dmigs dgar ba la nyid brjod [#]nyid/_/yun ring nas ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/dus de tsam du bstan pa 'di/_/phyogs ni su zhig rjod [#]par byed/_/_
[\[78a.3\]]slar yang rgyu mtshan 'di yis ni/_/'di la 'dzin pa mi srid nyid/_/ji ltar bum sogs rnyings pa'am[#]/_/mtshon sogs kyis ni bcag pa yis/_/'jig par 'gyur ba rtogs pa yin/_/de bzhin sgra las rgyu yod min/_/yul dang dus dang sbyor byed rnams/_/tha dad pas [#]kyang
[\[78a.4\]]dbye ldan min/_/ga sogs yi ge gang gis ni/_/de la ngo shes gsal bar yod/_/myur ba la sogs dbye bas kyang /_/ga gsal gzhan las [#]rnam bcad par/_/ga yi gsal gzhan gsal po ru/_/rdzogs par 'gyur ba rtogs pa yin/_/shin tu dmigs bkar
[\[78a.5\]]yi ge ga_/ga nyid rten ni yod pa min/_/ga gzhan blo yis ma rtogs phyir/_/gzhan gyis brtags pa'i gnyid bzhin/_/yi ge nyid sbyor 'di bsgrub bya/_/yi ge kha sogs nyid bzhin no/_/ldog pa yang ni ma mthong phyir/_/'dir ni mthong ba ldog byed min/_/yi ge'i
[\[78a.6\]]bdag nyid gnyis grub ni/_/rtag pa nyid sogs rtogs pa la/_/ji ltar 'dod yin de bzhin du/_/grub pa nyid las khas blang gis/_/des na yi ge gcig nyid du/_/blo ni gcig nyid skye bar 'gyur/_/gsal bar byed pa'i dbye ba yis/_/khyad par gyi blo yod par 'gyur/_/_
[\[78a.7\]]gang la rna ba'i yul gnyis la/_/de la blo gnyis skye min nam/_/khyed la dbang po [#]las 'das phyir/_/ji ltar sgra yis khyad par blo/_/sgra tsam legs byas rna ba yis/_/gang tshe sgra ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/de dang nyer bsres de yis [#]ni/_/rtogs pa yin zhes 'ga' zhig zer/_/yang
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]na de dag 'dzin pa min/_/de yi dbang gis sgra blo skye/_/legs par byas pa'i rjes byed phyir/_/de yang chen po nyid sogs rtogs/_/mngar ba kha ba'i ngo bo dang /_/de bzhin dkar po'ang ser po ru/_/mkhris pa'i gnad kyis sems 'khrul pas/_/de ltar yul ni 'dzin par byed/_/_
[\[78b.2\]]de bzhin shugs kyis rgyug pa dang /_/gru la zhugs nas 'gro ba yis/_/'khrul pas [#]ri la sogs par ni/_/de dag 'gro bar snang ba [#]'gyur/_/sbal pa'i zhag gis mig byugs pas/_/'o [#]ma'ang sbrul gyi ngo bor snang /_/gsal ba nyung dang mang nyid kyis/_/de brten spyi yang che chung
[\[78b.3\]]'dzin/_/de dag rnams ni ji bzhin du/_/rgyu mtshan 'dzin pa med na yang /_/gsal byed la gnas ma rtogs nas/_/de ltar gsal bya la 'khrul 'gyur/_/thung sogs dbye ba rang bzhin gyis/_/rtag par smra ba la 'gal yin/_/gang zhig rtag tu yod pa yin/_/rang nyid kyis
[\[78b.4\]]de tshad gcig cis/_/de phyir de yi brjod pa yi/_/tshad kyi dus ni rtogs par gyis/_/tshad gnyis sam ni tshad gsum mam/_/rang nyid kyis ni tshad gcig min/_/sgra tsam rnams kyis gsal ba ni/_/sgra la mi 'thad pa [#]yin nam/_/sgra ni legs par byas pas sam/_/dang
[\[78b.5\]]po 'am ni gnyis der 'gyur/_/de la gal te sgra legs byas/_/thams cad kyis ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/cha shas med pa'i khyab pa la/_/phyogs gcig legs par byar [#]mi 'dod/_/brten pa yi ni dbye bas kyang /_/legs par bya [#]ba nges mi 'gyur/_/gang phyir sgra ni rten med pa/_/_
[\[78b.6\]]nam mkha'i bdag nyid la sogs bzhin/_/'on te nam mkha' [#]rten yin te[#]/_/de yang cha med dngos yod pas/_/ma lus sgra ni rtogs pa'i phyir/_/phyogs gcig legs sbyar [#]mi 'gyur te/_/phyogs gcig legs par byas pa na/_/ji srid nam mkha' la gnas pa/_/ma lus
[\[78b.7\]]ngo bo nyid kyis ni/_/lus pa med par rtogs nus min/_/mkha' nyid rnam par 'dod phyogs la/_/khyab pa nyid phyir mtshungs thob 'gyur/_/ring du gnas kyang sgra rnams kyi[#]/_/shes pa 'byung bar thal bar 'gyur/_/srog chags kun gyi rna ba ni/_/gcig nyid du ni de ltar
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]'gyur/_/des na gcig gis thos dus su/_/de dag thams cad kyis thos 'gyur/_/de yang cha shas med nyid phyir/_/chos dang chos min legs byas pa/_/gnas skabs gnyis ni grub pa'i phyir/_/rna ba nam mkha'i phyogs 'gyur min/_/lan cig rna
[\[79a.2\]]ba legs byas pas/_/sgra ni thams cad rtogs par 'gyur/_/bum pa'i phyir ni mig phye bas/_/snam bu mi mthong bar mi 'gyur/_/yul yang legs par byas pas na/_/de nyid kho nar thal bar 'gyur/_/yul mtshungs par ni gnas pa na/_/legs par byas la khyad med phyir/_/_
[\[79a.3\]]brtan pa'i rlung ni yongs spangs pas/_/'di la legs byas 'gyur ba min/_/sgrib pa rnams ni yongs spangs nas/_/de yi phyogs gzhan dmigs par 'dod/_/sgra ni gcig nyid yin pa na/_/legs byas ma byas mi 'grub po/_/gnas skabs gcig ni khas len na/_/kun gyis
[\[79a.4\]]rtogs 'gyur yang na min/_/gnyis ka legs par byas pa na[#]/_/so sor bstan skyon kun 'byung 'gyur/_/des na sgra la gsal byed ni/_/ji ltar yang ni mi 'thad do/_/bshad pa byed pa po yis ni[#]/_/rna ba legs byas phyir lan brjod/_/de dbye thos pa'i dbye ba la'ang /_/_
[\[79a.5\]]thos pa po la'ang gnas pa yin/_/ji ltar mig la phan btags [#]pas/_/bum sogs rnams la mar me sogs/_/gsal 'dod rna ba legs byas phyir/_/sgra tsam de ltar byung ba yin/_/legs byas rnam pa gang gis ni/_/'dir ni brgal zhing brtags [#]pa med/_/skye ba
[\[79a.6\]]la [#]yang mtshungs nyid pas/_/der yang nus pa dbang 'das phyir/_/nus pa 'bras bus gtan rjes dpog_/gang gis de ni brgal zhing brtag_/de yod de 'byung tsam gyis ni/_/tshad mas [#]de ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/des na dbang 'das nus pa yin/_/de dag dbang 'das nus
[\[79a.7\]]pa ni/_/dbang po la ni skyed byed pas/_/mngon gsal rgyu ru kho bo 'dod/_/gang dag ma phrad par skye ba[#]/_/sgra 'di rna bas 'dzin par byed/_/ring dang bar du chod sogs la/_/de dag la phra mtshungs nyid yin/_/de la ring dang nyer gnas pa'i/_/bzung [#]dang ma bzung mtshungs par 'gyur/_/_
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]rim gyis kyang ni mi 'gyur te/_/myur dang dal sogs kyang mi 'byung /_/de phyir gtsang sbra can mthong ba'ang /_/blta ba yang [#]ni blta bar gyis/_/'bad rtsol gyis ni bskul ba'i rlung /_/lte ba las byung rgyu zhing 'gro/_/rkan [#]la sogs par ldan pa dang /_/rnam par dbye ba rjes su byed/_/shugs
[\[79b.2\]]nyid ldan phyir de yang ni/_/ji srid shugs yod bar du gnas/_/de yi rang gi yan lag ni/_/brtan pa'i rlung dang lhan cig tu/_/'gro zhing ldan dang rnam dbye ba/_/nges pa skyed par 'gyur ba yin/_/rna ba'i nam mkhar phyin 'gyur [#]na/_/rna ba'i nus pa skyed byed yin/_/de yod pas na sgra
[\[79b.3\]]rtogs phyir/_/legs byas ma mthong na yang legs/_/skye ba'i nus pa bzhin de yang /_/bdag la ci yang lhag pa med/_/sgra yi bye brag gzung [#]ba'i phyir/_/de'i khyad par yang de bzhin 'gyur/_/rtsig pa la sogs rlung gi ni/_/gegs su rab tu 'thad pa yin/_/de ni drag por 'jug pa
[\[79b.4\]]yin[#]/_/rna ba'i phyogs kyis gegs byed rigs/_/de ni rim pas 'jug nyid phyir/_/'jig pa dang ni shugs bcas yod/_/legs byas rim pas gsal po nyid/_/mi gsal sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan rigs/_/kho bos [#]nges par rna ba ni/_/nam mkha' [#]khas len mi byed do/_/nam
[\[79b.5\]]mkhar [#]cha shas med min te/_/rgyal ba grangs can gyis bkag phyir/_/de na [#]nam mkha'i phyogs gcig gam/_/yang na dngos po gzhan du 'gyur/_/so so'i mi la gnas rna ba/_/'bras bu'i don gos [#]kho bos rtogs/_/gal te khyab pa gcig nyid ni/_/de lta na yang rten gang la/_/_
[\[79b.6\]]sgra tsam gyis legs byas de yod/_/des ni sgra rnams rtogs par byed/_/'on kyang dbang po legs bya ba/_/de yang rten gyi phyogs kyis 'byung /_/des na rna ba legs byas na/_/rna bas sgra ni thos 'gyur min/_/sgra tsam rna phyogs ma phyin [#]pas/_/rna ba'i dbang po legs byas min/_/_
[\[79b.7\]]des na rten gyi dbye ba yis/_/legs par byed pa nges par gnas/_/'o na rten ni gcig la ni/_/dbang po legs par bya ba [#]thob/_/lus kun la ni rtogs byed pa/_/dbang po gcig tu sgra la 'gyur/_/skyes bu'i lus kyi phyogs rnams la/_/rnam par shes pas skyed 'dod yin/_/_
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]des na gtso bo tha dad pas/_/rna ba'i legs byas tha dad 'gyur/_/bdag ni phyogs rnams dang bral yang /_/ma lus par ni rtogs byed pa/_/lus nyid la gnas 'dzin pas [#]na/_/kho bos de smras 'gal ba med/_/de nyid kyi [#]na rgyu yis ni/_/'on pa nyid
[\[80a.2\]]sogs gnas pa yin/_/chos dang chos min dbang byas pa/_/de nyid gzhan longs spyad [#]bya yin/_/ji ltar dbang dang bral ba rna/_/yul der gnas par gyur na yang /_/longs spyod mi rnyed de bzhin du/_/gzhan gyis thos kyang 'on pas min/_/rna ba sgra dang rten dag ni/_/rang nyid
[\[80a.3\]]kyis ni yan lag bral/_/phyogs gcig la ni gnas pa min/_/de lta na yang de skyon med/_/gsal bar byed pa'i rlung rnams la/_/tha dad yan lag phyogs nyid dang /_/rigs kyi tha dad pa yod pas/_/de nyid kyis [#]ni legs par gnas/_/gzhan gyi don du rlung bskul bas/_/ji
[\[80a.4\]]ltar khyed la gzhan byed min/_/de bzhin yid bzhin [#]legs byas pa'i/_/nus pa gzhan ni legs byed min/_/rkan sogs sbyor ba gzhan dag gis/_/ji ltar yi ge gzhan byed min/_/de nyid sgra tsam gzhan bskul bas/_/sgra tsam gzhan ni byed pa min[#]/_/de phyir skye dang
[\[80a.5\]]gsal dag ni/_/'bad rtsol brjod par 'dod pa la/_/kun la nus pa'i bye brag ni/_/'bras bu'i don gos mtshungs par nges/_/yang na rig byed rjes 'brangs pas/_/phyogs ni rna ba nyid nges bya/_/nam mkha'i bdag nyid rna ba ru/_/brjod par rig byed gang na'ang med/_/phyogs ni rna ba
[\[80a.6\]]yin no zhes/_/de ni rab tu thim skabs brjod/_/de yang rang bzhin 'gro nyid kyi/_/tshig gis mig la sogs pa bzhin/_/ji ltar 'di mig gzi brjid kyi/_/rang bzhin du nges nyi ma la/_/'gro bar 'gyur zhes brjod pa yin/_/de bzhin rna ba phyogs bdag nyid/_/phyogs ni kun
[\[80a.7\]]'gro gcig pu nyid/_/nam mkha' ji srid du gnas pa/_/rna ba'i bu gas yongs bcad pa/_/rna ba yin no mkha' phyogs bzhin/_/nam mkha' cha nyid brtags [#]pa la/_/ji srid cung zad rigs pa yin/_/phyogs kyi cha la'ang de mtshungs te/_/lung gis khyab par 'gyur ba yin/_/_
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]des na bsod nams bsod nams min/_/dbang byas rna bug gis yongs bcad/_/phyogs rdzas cha yi rna [#]gang yin/_/de ni legs par bya bar [#]'gyur/_/yul yang legs par byed pa na/_/des na gcig la legs byas yin/_/mi yi nus pa tha dad phyir/_/thams cad kyis ni
[\[80b.2\]]rtogs 'gyur min/_/ji ltar skye bar gyur pa [#]'di/_/phyogs dang yul la sogs pa yi/_/dbye bas kun la yod na yang /_/thams cad kyis ni rtogs bya min/_/de bzhin gang dang nyer gnas pa/_/sgra tsam gyis ni legs byas gang /_/de dag nyid kyis sgra thos 'gyur/_/ring
[\[80b.3\]]na gnas par cis mi 'gyur/_/sgra yi skye ba bkag pa'i phyir/_/gzhan du mi 'thad pa yin na/_/sgra tsam rnams kyi khyad par las/_/legs par bya ba nges skyed 'gyur/_/'dir ni de yod de 'byung nyid/_/nus pa yod nyid rtogs byed pa/_/rna ba'i nus pa bzhin du 'dod/_/de ru
[\[80b.4\]]blo ni yang dag bsdus/_/gnyis ka legs par byas phyogs las[#]/_/nyes pa gnyis char brdzun pa yin/_/gang gis gang rung ma tshang na/_/thams cad kyis kun [#]rtogs mi 'gyur/_/ji ltar nyid [#]gcig chu sogs la/_/dbyer med de yang du ma yi/_/bdag nyid du ni snang bar
[\[80b.5\]]'gyur/_/sgra yang de bzhin shes par bya/_/gsal byed sgra tsam grags pa las/_/de yi yul ni nges gzung [#]'gyur/_/bar mtshams med pa'i nam mkha' las/_/khyab nus sgra tsam la ni med/_/des na ma bcad pa'i ngo bos/_/de ni thams cad du rtogs min/_/sgra tsam yul gyi tha
[\[80b.6\]]snyad nyid/_/thos pa der ni rjes su byed/_/bar mtshams ma khyab pa nyid kyis/_/rnam gcod kyang ni nges par 'gyur/_/de dag nyung la yul gcig pas/_/sgra yang ma khyab pa ru nges/_/'gro dang shugs nyid bcas [#]pa yis/_/de dag gang dang gang las 'byung /_/nyan po de dang de las
[\[80b.7\]]ni/_/sgra ni 'byung [#]ba bzhin du sems/_/gzugs brnyan re re tha dad pa/_/so so'i snod du cig car du/_/snang ba rgyu mtshan gang gis ni/_/'dzin par 'gyur zhes brjod pa na/_/'dir smras gang tshe re zhig ni[#]/_/chu la yid 'ong g.yo ba yi/_/mig gi snang ba gang byung ba/_/de ni ldog
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]par gyur pa na/_/nyi ma rnam pa du ma ni/_/ci ste snod du tha dad gzugs/_/rang gnas la gnas 'dzin gyur na/_/de tshe du ma ga las byung /_/sor mos cung zad mnan mig gis/_/ji ltar gcig ni du ma ru/_/snang 'gyur mi 'jug tha dad pa/_/kho bos sgra
[\[81a.2\]]yang de bzhin no/_/gzhan dag 'di la rgol ba na/_/gzugs brnyan 'char bar 'dod pa can/_/gal te de nyid rtogs gyur [#]na/_/ci phyir steng du snang mi 'gyur/_/khron pa la sogs gting du ni/_/gzugs brnyan med na ji ltar snang /_/shar bltas me long la bltas na/_/nub
[\[81a.3\]]tu bltas par ji ltar 'gyur/_/chu la nyi ma snang ba ni[#]/_/mig gcig steng dang 'og gi ni/_/phyogs gnyis su ni rtags [#]'jug 'gyur/_/rten ni yon por gnas nyid phyir/_/de la steng phyogs gsal ba yi/_/bdag gis nyi ma mthong bar 'gyur/_/brgyud nas bkod par gyur
[\[81a.4\]]pas na/_/'og na gnas pa mthong bar 'gyur/_/de ni gcig nyid phyir steng na/_/gnas pa 'og tu snang bar 'gyur/_/des na 'og ni kho na ru/_/bar mtshams bcad par nyi ma snang /_/de bzhin shar du song 'jug pas/_/nub phyogs song 'jug la bkod pa/_/gdod mthong
[\[81a.5\]]ba na 'khrul pa yis/_/nub phyogs lta bar rtogs pa yin/_/du ma'i yul rnams la gnas pa/_/gzugs brnyan yod pa yin na yang /_/mtshungs pa'i blos ni rtogs nyid phyir/_/du ma nyid du yod pa min/_/yul gyi dbye bas tha dad nyid/_/de ni rjes su dpag las byung /_/_
[\[81a.6\]]de 'di yin zhes shes pa ni/_/mngon sum yin nges gnod par 'gyur/_/ji ltar rim gyis skyes bu ni/_/tha dad yul du 'gro ba [#]yang /_/lha sbyin tha dad mi 'gyur te/_/de ltar sgra yang tha dad min/_/gcig pu nyid du rtogs 'gyur bas/_/ji ltar yang yang mthong 'gyur ba/_/de ni
[\[81a.7\]]dus [#]dbyes phye mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin sgra yang yul gyis min/_/gal te rim gyis 'gal med na/_/khyab pa nyid du'ang lta [#]bar gyis/_/mthong ba grub phyir chos gang yin/_/rnam pa kun gyis de khas long /_/ji ltar khung [#]yang bskos pas/_/shin tu ma byas pa yin yang /_/_
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]nam mkha'i [#]la ni che blo nyid/_/dog pa la ni blo chung 'gyur/_/des 'dir gzhan gyi khyad par gyis/_/sgra 'jug de ltar blo 'khrul yin/_/sgra la [#]gnas pa'i rags [#]nyid dang /_/phra ba nyid ni mtshon 'gyur min/_/blo yi gsal dang mi gsal nyid/_/che chung nyid du brtags pa yin/_/_
[\[81b.2\]]bum sogs la yang brtag [#]par ni/_/'od chen pos ni gsal byas nas/_/de yang gsal po kho nar 'gyur/_/'od chung gsal byas min gsal 'gyur/_/de bzhin ring sogs thams cad ni/_/sgra la chos rnams gnas yin zhes/_/don dang 'brel par ma mthong na/_/sgra ni
[\[81b.3\]]rjod par byed 'gyur min/_/de lta yin na sngar med pa'i/_/kun gyis rang don rtogs par 'gyur/_/mi rtag yin na 'di la ni/_/'brel pa mthong bar 'thad pa min/_/gal te 'brel shes grub pa na/_/nges par dus gzhan la gnas min/_/gzhan la 'brel par rtogs pa na/_/_
[\[81b.4\]]gzhan la rjod [#]par byed 'gyur min/_/ba lang sgra la 'brel shes na/_/rta yi sgra ni rjod byed min/_/'on te gzhan yang rang bzhin gyis/_/cung zad kho na rtogs byed na/_/de la rgyu mtshan med pas na/_/de gang yin zhes nges mi 'gyur/_/gang phyir nyan pa po rnams la/_/de lta bu yi
[\[81b.5\]]tha snyad kyi/_/shes pa zhes byar 'thad par 'gyur/_/de ltar brjod pa po rigs min/_/mi shes pa yis thog mar ni/_/sgra ni gang zhig brjod par 'dod/_/gal te shes par gyur na ko/_/nges par de sngar shes pa min/_/mngon sum yan lag nyid kyi phyir/_/'od ni sngar
[\[81b.6\]]yang gsal bar byed/_/'dra ba nyid ni ma rtogs phyir/_/de yi sgro nas rjod byed min/_/gang gcig dang ni 'dra ba yis/_/gzhan ni rjod par byed par brtags[#]/_/'brel pa nyid du ma mthong na/_/gang tshe thams cad mtshungs nyid yin/_/gal te sngar mthong don ldan na/_/de ni de
[\[81b.7\]]tsam ga las khom/_/lan 'gar dmigs par ma grub [#]na/_/don dang ldan par rtogs mi 'gyur/_/sgra gzhan rtogs par ma byas la/_/dus der de ni don med min[#]/_/sgra gzhan thos la de nyid ni/_/don dang ldan 'gyur ngo mtshar che/_/re zhig sgra ni ma brjod na/_/'brel pa byar
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]ni mi 'dod do/_/brjod ma thag tu 'jig pa la/_/'brel pa yis ni dgos pa med/_/des na 'brel med 'jig nyid kyis/_/snga ma re zhig don med yin/_/phyi ma 'brel par ma byas par/_/don dang ldan par ji ltar shes/_/sgra brjod dang ni 'brel byed dang /_/_
[\[82a.2\]]'jig rten tha snyad bya ba rnams/_/rim pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin pas/_/su zhig la la cig car byed/_/yul dus sogs tha dad skyes bus/_/sgra gzhan sngar ni ma thos pas/_/sgra gcig la yang bcos ma yin[#]/_/'brel pa grub pa ma yin no/_/'di la 'brel pa brjod na yang /_/_
[\[82a.3\]]sun dbyung de nyid kho nar 'jug_/zhig dang med dang da ltar la/_/brjod pa srid pa ma yin na/_/smra pos don ldan sgra gang zhig_/nyan pa po las rjod par byed/_/de ni brjod par nus pa min/_/brjod pa de ni don ldan min/_/'dra ba nyid ni rjod byed na/_/nyan pa po la de ru ni/_/don
[\[82a.4\]]ldan 'dra ba'i sgra 'thad min/_/don dang ldan par 'dzin med phyir/_/rang nyid kyis de don ldan min/_/smra po nyan pa'i dus su yang /_/de nyid du ni thal bar 'gyur/_/de phyir sgra don mi 'brel ba/_/rtag pa nyid du khas len gyis/_/brda las byung bar rigs min te/_/rnam pa kun gyis de
[\[82a.5\]]med phyir/_/brjod bya rjod byed phan tshun du/_/bdag nyid kyis ni nus yod min/_/gal te mig gis brda bzhin du/_/brda yis skyes bu rtogs 'gyur na/_/mi re re la brda re'am/_/yang na bzlas nas brjod pa yin/_/'gro ba yi ni thog ma ru/_/'ga' yis cig car byas yin
[\[82a.6\]]grang /_/re re 'brel pa tha dad dam/_/yang na gcig pu kho nar 'gyur/_/gcig nyid yin na byas mi 'gyur/_/tha dad yin na blo tha dad/_/smra nyan blo ni tha dad phyir[#]/_/tha snyad 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/smra po'i blo la 'brel pa gzhan/_/de bzhin gzhan ni nyan pa la[#]/_/nyan pa po
[\[82a.7\]]la 'brel byed na/_/rjod [#]pa po yis gang rtogs 'gyur/_/de yis sngar ni mthong ba gang /_/de ni nyan pa la mid [#]min/_/gsar du gang zhig byed pa na/_/de yang ston byed mthong ba min[#]/_/bum sogs la mtshungs nyid ce [#]na/_/de min phyir ni rab grub phyir/_/gal te nus pa rtogs
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]pas ni/_/gsal bar byed par mi nus so/_/gang zhig byed pa de la yang /_/nus pa 'bras bu la yod [#]yin/_/de lta bu [#]yang rnam pa yis/_/chu mchu la sogs nus grub yin/_/de la thog ma nyid yod min/_/khyed la 'brel pa thog mar bcas/_/gal te de la yang spyi ni/_/_
[\[82b.2\]]rtag par khas len byed pa na/_/de lta na yang bdag 'dod grub/_/rnam pa gnyis ni mi srid do/_/nus pa nyid ni 'brel pa ste/_/de la dbye ba snang mi 'gyur/_/de yang 'bras bus rjes dpag yin/_/de yi dbye ba rjes byed 'gyur/_/gzhan du mi 'thad pa yis ni/_/nus pa yod par brtags
[\[82b.3\]]pa yin/_/gcig gis don ni grub pa na/_/mang por brtags pa 'dod pa min/_/'brel pa brjod pa'i dus su yang /_/ba lang sgra sogs brjod pa na/_/'ga' zhig 'brel pa'i blo yis ni/_/don rtogs de bzhin gzhan gyis min/_/de la 'brel pa med pas na/_/kun gyis don ni
[\[82b.4\]]nges mi 'gyur/_/gal te yod na kun gyis rtogs/_/de min 'ga' sogs ma bzung phyir/_/shes byed nyid kyis 'brel pa na/_/rang bdag nyid ces rtogs pa yin/_/des na 'di ni yod na yang /_/ma bzung bar ni gsal byed min/_/la lar don ni yod na yang /_/ma bzung ba [#]ni
[\[82b.5\]]mthong ba yin/_/shin tu med pa yang yod nyid du/_/'ga' zhig la yang mi 'thad do/_/dngos po gcig la yod med dag_/'gal ba gnyis ni mi 'gyur ro/_/shes dang mi shes nyid dag la'ang /_/'gal nyid mtshungs pa ma yin nam/_/shes pa skyes bu'i rten yin pas/_/de dbyes [# ]
[\[82b.6\]]de dbye 'gal ba min/_/skyes bu gzhan la gnas pa ni/_/shes pa de yis gnod 'gyur min/_/long dang ma long nyer gnas pa'i/_/dkar po long bas mi [#]mthong ste/_/cig shos kyis ni mthong bar 'gyur/_/de [#]dag la de yod med min/_/mi yi nus dang mi nus pa'i/_/dbye bas [# ]
[\[82b.7\]]der ni 'gal bar 'gyur/_/'brel pa ma rtogs las rgyu gzhan/_/'dir shes pa la yod pa min/_/de bzhin dbang po dang mtshungs pa/_/tha snyad la ni dmigs pa ni/_/gang dag la yod de dag des/_/don rtogs gzhan min long ba bzhin/_/mi shes pa ni thams cad la/_/snga ma
[\[83a\]]
