[\[83a.1\]]snga ma'i grags pa yis/_/'brel pa grub ces de bzhin du/_/'brel pa thog ma med pa yin/_/zlos nas brjod par 'jug pa ni/_/mi rigs tha snyad yod phyir ro/_/'byin pa'i dang por byar med de/_/de 'dra'i dus ni 'dod pa min[#]/_/'gro ba thams cad res
[\[83a.2\]]'gal [#]yang /_/mi 'dra bar ni 'dod pa min/_/rab tu thim pa chen po zhes/_/don dam par ni rtogs 'gyur min/_/mtshan mo rab thim zhes bya yin/_/las kun thim pa nyid kyi phyir/_/nyin mo 'byin pa zhes bya ste/_/las rnams kun ni 'jug pa yin/_/yang na yul
[\[83a.3\]]zhig rigs [#]rgyud ni/_/chad pa'i ngo bor rab thim yin/_/thams cad chad pa'i bdag nyid kyi/_/thim pa'i tshad ma bdag med de[#]/_/dran pa ma nyams pa 'ga' zhig_/'byin dang bsdu ba'i byed po ni[#]/_/dbang phyug la sogs brtan rigs min/_/yang na [#]'brel pa rtogs [#]par byed/_/_
[\[83a.4\]]go rims mi rtag pa nyid kyis/_/rjod byed mi rtag 'gyur min nam/_/tshig ni rjod [#]byed 'dod pa ste/_/rim pa la ni rag [#]las blo/_/kun 'gro nyid phyir khyed la ni/_/rang nyid kyis yin rim ldan min/_/mi rtag sgra tsam gyis 'bras phyir/_/des na rim pa 'jig pa yin/_/de yi
[\[83a.5\]]brjod 'dod dbang gis ni/_/skyes bu la de rag las 'gyur/_/des na yi ge rtag pa nyid/_/khyed la 'bras bu med par 'gyur/_/rim pa med pa'i yi ge ni/_/ston par byed par shes 'gyur min/_/khyed la rim pa tshig nyid de/_/de phyir de ltar thal bar 'gyur/_/gang dag
[\[83a.6\]]rim pa dang bral tshig[# ]/yi ge dang bral tshig yin te/_/de dag la ni sgra rtag nyid/_/rtogs pa de ni don dang ldan/_/re zhig go rims nyid tshig tu/_/bdag cag la ni thal 'gyur min/_/gang gis dngos po gzhan rten pa/_/de ni gsal byed mthong 'gyur min/_/de dag la ni
[\[83a.7\]]chos tsam 'di/_/dngos po gzhan du mi 'dod do/_/des ni [#]'di ltar rtogs pa na/_/yi ge rnams ni go byed 'gyur/_/rim pa 'bras bu nyid min te/_/sngar grub yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir/_/smra po 'ga' zhig rang dbang gis/_/rim pa shes par 'gyur min te/_/ji ltar gzhan
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]dag gis brjod pa/_/de ltar 'dir ni brjod par 'dod/_/gzhan yang de ltar nges na yang /_/'brel pa bzhin 'di thog ma med/_/des na brtser gnas brten [#]min yang /_/tha snyad du ni de rten yin/_/skyes bu rnams kyi rang dbang nyid/_/kho bos 'bad pas bkag pa yin/_/'o na
[\[83b.2\]]yi ge rnams kyis ni/_/brtser gnas brtan min de ltar grub/_/yi ge rtag pa yod min [#]na/_/tha snyad las ni rim par byung /_/rdul phran rtag par [#]yod na ni/_/ji ltar bum sogs gsal [#]bkod yin/_/de med rtsa ba med pa yi[#]/_/bkod pa'i nges par bzung ba yin/_/_
[\[83b.3\]]gzhan gyis brjod pas dgag [#]gis brjod/_/brjod 'dod de 'dra nges par 'gyur/_/de lta na yang brtan nyid 'gyur/_/chad ma gzhan gyi [#]khyed la med/_/ji ltar rigs kyi bum sogs kyi/_/tha snyad nye bar mtshon pa yin/_/de bzhin go rims la sogs pa'i/_/tha snyad rigs kyi sgo
[\[83b.4\]]nas grub/_/re zhig rkan la sogs pa'i rigs/_/skyes bu thams cad la gnas 'gyur/_/smra po de dag rnams kyis ni/_/sgra tsam mtshon nas skul [#]bar byed/_/ji srid yig [#]yod sgra tsam gyis/_/rigs tha dad pa sgra la ni/_/mngon par gsal ba'i [#]rgyur 'jug pa'am/_/yang
[\[83b.5\]]na gsal ba de ldan yin/_/de la rkan sogs ldan pa dang /_/rnam dbye'i rim pa sngon 'gro can/_/sgra tsam rnams la go rims 'gyur/_/rigs kyi [#]gnyis ka'i rtags [#]nyid kyang /_/ji ltar bskor ba sogs rnams kyis[#]/_/dbye rigs sogs kyis mtshon byas pa/_/rim pa'i
[\[83b.6\]]rjes dran 'gyur de ltar/_/rkan sogs sgra tsam yig rten yin/_/phra ba nyid phyir gsal rnams la/_/rigs kyis chos ni nges bzung [#]yin/_/de yi dbang gis yig rnams la/_/khyab nyid yin yang rim pas 'dzin/_/de ltar sgra tsam gyis yon tan/_/thams cad rtag nyid du
[\[83b.7\]]gnas pa/_/yi ge'i rjes su byed pas na/_/don gyis [#]dbye ba rtogs par 'gyur/_/yi ge rnams kyi go rims dang /_/thung dang ring dang ches ring dang [#]/_/sgra tsam khyad par can dus kyi/_/rnam dbyer [#]de dag shes par 'gyur/_/dus ni ci [#]yin khyab cing rtag_/rab tu dbye ba'ang
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]rtogs [#]par 'gyur/_/dngos po kun la yi ge bzhin/_/la las [#]'ga' zhig gis gsal byas/_/yi ge rnams la gsal 'gyur na/_/de ni don rtogs yan lag 'gyur/_/gzhan du yang ni yod pa'i phyir/_/de yi rang bzhin rtag nyid yin/_/de
[\[84a.2\]]phyir 'ga' zhig 'jig de 'dra/_/tshig gi chos ni yod pa min[#]/_/des na yi ge rtag smra la/_/tshig rtag nyid du grub pa yin/_/gzhan gyi chos kyang yan lag nyid/_/rta yi shugs sogs bzhin du brjod/_/sgra kun rtag pa nyid la ni/_/don gyis go ba tshad ma yin/_/sgra ni mi rtag
[\[84a.3\]]nyid sgrub na/_/rang gi tshig la sogs dang 'gal/_/bsgrub par bya ba'i don rtogs phyir/_/dam bca' thams cad brjod pa yin/_/mi rtag [#]na de rang gi don/_/smra nus min zhes dpyad zin to[#]/_/des na don rtogs pas grub phyir/_/rtag nyid ces byas gnod par 'gyur/_/don
[\[84a.4\]]gyis rjod byed nus par ni/_/khas blangs byas nas bsgrub pa na/_/sngar ni khas blangs byas pas kyang /_/gzhan gyis 'jig nyid la gnod 'gyur/_/bstan bcos so so la brten pa'i/_/don rtogs med [#]pa rnams kyis ni/_/'jig pa nyid du smra kun la/_/lung gis kyang ni
[\[84a.5\]]gnod par 'gyur/_/sngar bshad pa yi phyogs kyis ni/_/'jig rten kun la grags pas brjod[#]/_/sngar bshad gtan tshigs kho na yis/_/rjes dpag dang yang 'gal bar 'gyur/_/rna ba las skyes ngo shes pas/_/sgra ni rtag par nges byas phyir/_/mngon sum gyis kyang 'gal
[\[84a.6\]]ba nyid/_/snga ma kho nar bstan [#]zin to/_/'jig pa nyid du bsgrub [#]pa yis/_/sgra de gang yin zhes brjod dgos/_/yon tan gsum mam de gang zag_/ngo [#]bo'am yang na [#]mkha'i yon tan/_/'on te yig gzhan sgra bdag nyid/_/yang na brjod min rlung ngo bo/_/tshig ngag bdag nyid
[\[84a.7\]]gsal ba'am/_/yang na 'dra nyid gzhan sel yin/_/de rnams mi rtag nyid yod mod/_/kho bo'i de rtag nyid mi 'dod/_/ma grub khyad par nyid dang ni/_/gzhi ma grub pa'i gtan tshigs 'gyur/_/'on te bdag 'dod phyogs khyod 'dod/_/rang nyid kyis ni de gnyis 'gyur/_/'on
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]te sgra tsam mi rtag brjod/_/de yin sgra yin khyed cag la/_/mi rtag yin pas kun gyis ni/_/de yang rtag par 'dod dang 'gal/_/gal te shin tu 'jig nyid du/_/mi rtag nyid du brjod pa ni/_/de yis khyad par ma [#]grub pa'i/_/phyogs 'gyur kho bo la ni yin/_/gal te ci
[\[84b.2\]]zhig ltar 'dod pas/_/rtag pa nyid [#]ni brjod pa na/_/mngon par mi gsal gnas skabs las/_/de ni mngon gsal bdag nyid 'dod/_/dbang po 'ba' [#]zhig gis bzung nyid/_/gtan tshigs su ni 'dir rtog na/_/bsgrub par byas pa'i rigs kyis ni/_/da ltar 'khrul par
[\[84b.3\]]rtogs par 'gyur/_/phyogs kyi chos nyid ma grub na/_/ji ltar phyir rgol ba la ni/_/gtan tshigs brjod par mi 'thad de/_/de bzhin rjes 'gro ldog pa yang /_/gal te der bsgrub [#]smra ba la/_/rigs grub ma gyur de lta na'ang /_/ji srid de ni brtsal [#]ma byas/_/de srid gtan
[\[84b.4\]]tshigs nyid 'gyur min/_/dbang po las byung nyid sogs la'ang /_/dngos po ji ltar yin dpyad bya/_/bsal [#]las gzhan pa'am gzhan nyid min/_/tha dad tha mi dad gsal dpyad/_de la thun mong ming ma grub/_/mthun phyogs bsgrub par bya dang bral/_/smra ba po la ltos nas ni/_/_
[\[84b.5\]]rnam par brtags [#]pa'i rjes 'brangs brjod/_/brtsal [#]ma thag byung shes pa ni/_/byas dang mi rtag sgrub pa gang /_/skad cig ma ni ldog pa yis/_/so sor brtags dang ma brtags pa'i/_/'gog dang nam mkha' dang gsum pos/_/de ni ma nges pa nyid yin/_/blo ni sngon song 'jig pa
[\[84b.6\]]la/_/so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa'i blo/_/blo ni sngon du ma song ba'i/_/'gog pa so sor ma brtags yin/_/'jig nyid phyir na de dag gnyis/_/ma byas par yang mthong ba yin/_/rang bzhin gyis grub 'jigs [#]pa yis/_/rgyu med ces ni de dag smra/_/me dang 'brel pas
[\[84b.7\]]shing las ni/_/sol ba'i rgyun [#]ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rang bzhin las 'byung 'jig pa ni/_/skyes ma thag pa tsam du gnas/_/phra zhing 'dra ba'i rgyun 'jug phyir/_/nye bar mtshon par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang tshe mi mthun pa yi rgyus[#]/_/'dra ba'i rgyun la bsnun pa na/_/mi mthun pa yi
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]'bras bu yis/_/de tshe rags par mngon gsal 'gyur/_/des na rgyu las mi mthun rgyun/_/gang phyir skye bar 'gyur ba yin/_/de nyid kyis ni ma byas na'ang /_/'jig pa nges par gsal bar 'gyur/_/de ni tho bas bsnun sogs pa'i/_/brtsal [#]ma thag tu
[\[85a.2\]]'byung ba yin/_/gang phyir ma byas par ni snang /_/des na gtan tshigs 'khrul pa yin/_/nam mkha' yang ni rtag yin na/_/gang tshe sa dang chus gang ba/_/sa brkos chu ni 'chu sogs kyis/_/de bsal nas [#]ni gsal [#]bar 'gyur/_/de tshe brtsal [#]ma thag byung zhes/_/de la
[\[85a.3\]]yang ni snang bar 'gyur/_/de phyir der shes gang brjod pa/_/gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid yin/_/'dir mthun phyogs kyang brtags [#]bya ste/_/thos pa'i don ni bsgrub bya med/_/gsal ba'i mtshan nyid phyogs yin yang /_/rigs dang gzhan nyid gzhan min dpyad/_/gzhan
[\[85a.4\]]yin [#]chos can bdag ma grub/_/de nyid chos can gzhan ma grub/_/khyad par med na mi rtag dang /_/rtag dngos de dag la mi 'grub/_/'di la rigs zhes kha cig brtag_/cig shos 'jag pa ru ni 'dod/_'dres pa'i ngo bo gcig yin zhes/_/dngos po sngar ni bstan zin to/_/_
[\[85a.5\]]de ltar mi rtag la dpyad bya/_/'jigs [#]pa bdag cag bsgrub [#]byas stong /_/gzhan yin [#]khyed cag bsgrub byas stong /_/de ni sun dbyung tshig gi phyogs/_/gal te tshig dang don 'brel na/_/rtag pa nyid du bsgrub byas kyang /_/ngag gi don la rig byed ni/_/tshad ma nyid du grub mi
[\[85a.6\]]'gyur/_/skyes bu rnams la brda yis ni/_/yon tan 'phel la sogs pa [#]bzhin/_/rgyu med kyang ni mchod sbyin pas/_/med pa'i don ni yongs brtags yin/_/gzhan yang tshogs pa can phyir te/_/skyes bu las byung gtam bzhin no/_/'dir ni yid ches skyes bu med/_/des [# ]
[\[85a.7\]]na rig byed tshad ma min[#]/_/'brel pa byar mi 'dod pa yis/_/rigs las ngag kyang rtag [#]par brjod/_/gang gis mthong don tha snyad phyir/_/brda las byung ba'i shes pa ni/_/'phel sogs las ni srid pa yin/_/rig byed la [#]ni mi 'thad do/_/mtho ris mchod sbyin sogs 'brel
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]ba/_/dbang po las 'das su yis [#]mthong /_/de yang don byed [#]ma yin te/_/de yi don shes 'byung ba'i phyir/_/tshogs pa can gyi sgrub pa la[#]/_/'di 'dra'i mi mthun bsgrub brjod bya/_/rig byed 'don pa thams cad ni/_/bla ma'i 'don pa sngon song yin/_/rig byed 'don pa brjod
[\[85b.2\]]nyid phyir/_/de ltar 'don pa ji bzhin no/_/b+ha ra ta yang de ltar 'gyur/_/byed por [#]dran pas gnod par 'gyur/_/rig byed po ni dran med de/_/gang de don gzhan brjod rgyu mtshan/_/'das dang ma 'ongs dus dag ni/_/rig byed byed po dang bral ba/_/dus nyid phyir na 'di ltar de/_/de ltar
[\[85b.3\]]snang ba'i dus bzhin no/_/rig byed la ni tshangs la sogs/_/byed po min par rtogs par gyis/_/skyes bu nyid sogs gtan tshigs kyis/_/dper na tha mal mi bzhin no/_/des na rig byed kyi [#]ni tshig_/brdzun min par ni shes par gyis/_/rang don smra po ma ltos phyir/_/tshig
[\[85b.4\]]don la ni tshig blo bzhin/_/de byas shes pa yang dag yin/_/rtag pa'i ngag las byung nyid phyir/_/de yang dag gis blo bzhin rtag_/rtag pa nyid du gyur [#]pas so/_/bskul ba las ni byung ba'i blo/_/tshad ma yin te skyon bral ba'i/_/rgyu rnams kyis ni bskyed byas phyir/_/rtag yid ches
[\[85b.5\]]sogs dbang blo bzhin/_/de bzhin yid mi ches smras pa'i/_/ngag gis skyes [#]phyir yul dus sogs/_/dbye sogs la ni gnod med phyir/_/yid ches dag byung shes pa bzhin/_/rig byed tshad mar gnas pas [#]na/_/slob dpon slob ma'i brgyud pa yi/_/thog ma med nas brtags pa yang /_/_
[\[85b.6\]]skyon med nyid du 'gyur ba yin/_/des na 'jig rten kun mig gcig_/rig byed 'dra ba snang [#]ba la/_/gzhan dag 'ug pa bzhin du ni/_/ma mthong chos min las skyes lo/_/gnyis skyes las ni de kun ni/_/log pa [#]nga rgyal gyis spros yin/_/'dir ni srin bu'i [#]yig 'drar yang /_/_
[\[85b.7\]]de dag legs bshad cung zad med/_/byed po med pa yin na yang /_/de ni bden don 'gro ba yin/_/de rgyu yon tan bral ba'i phyir/_/skyon med pa yis brdzun don bzhin/_/skyes bu yis ni byas pa la/_/yon tan yod ces dogs par 'gyur/_rig byed byed po med pa'i
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]phyir/_/bdag la yon tan yod dogs [#]med/_/des na bden dang log don nyid/_/rgyu rnams mi la rten [#]pa'i phyir/_/shes rab snying brtse med la sogs/_/med phyir de gnyis [#]yod pa min[#]/_/des na don med 'thob [#]'gyur te/_/khur ba drug sogs ngag bzhin
[\[86a.2\]]no/_/gal te bya ba byed dang ldan/_/don rnams rtogs [#]par 'gyur zhe na/_/de ni rang bzhin gyis don dang /_/ldan pa min yang khyed la ni/_/rtogs pa der 'gyur skyes bu yi[#]/_/bshad pas lha mi'i bshad sogs bzhin/_/skyon med na yang bden pa'i don/_/grub min gzhan yang
[\[86a.3\]]yod pa'i phyir/_/gang phyir don med ces bya ba/_/phung po gzhan yang yod pa min/_/'on te rig byed rang nyid kyis/_/mi rnams la ltos med pa can/_/bden don rnam shes skyed nus yin/_/des na 'di yi [#]bden don 'dod/_/de ltar [#]na ni bar med par/_/shes pa de ni brtag
[\[86a.4\]]'byung 'gyur/_/rgyu ni rtag tu gnas nyid phyir/_/dper na mngon 'dod skad cig la/_/yang na rnam shes gcig pu la/_/de skyes ma lus 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rgyu ni nus pa can yod phyir/_/rig byed 'di ni mi rtag 'gyur/_/nus pa slar yang blo 'byung [#]'gyur/_/'on te lhan cig
[\[86a.5\]]byed pa ni/_/bshad sogs la ni ltos pa na/_/de dag la ni rim yod pas/_/rnam shes de yang rim ldan 'dod/_/de lta min zhes nus de la/_/ltos pa ci 'dra ba 'byung 'gyur/_/gal te de ldan de nus na/_/khyed la rtag ste 'di gang gis/_/gal te sngar ni nus med pa'ang /_/_
[\[86a.6\]]des dag gis ni nus ldan byas/_/khyed la skyes bus byas thal 'gyur/_/shes pa'i yan lag skyes rten phyir/_/ji [#]srid skyes bu rnams kyis te/_/mar me [#]'gyur bas gsal byas min/_/de srid rig byed du [#]gnas pas/_/khyed la shes pa skyed byed min/_/gang phyir shes pa de
[\[86a.7\]]yi rgyu/_/skyes bu'i shes pa las 'byung [#]'gyur/_/des na skyes bus ma byas nyid/_/yang dag don shes rgyun mi rtag_/skyes bus ma byas pa nyid de/_/rig byed la yod kyang don med/_/'di yi 'dod pa'i 'bras bu gang /_/de shes skyes bu la brten 'byung /_/gal te rtag tu
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]nus na 'dir/_/ci ste gzhan la ltos pa yin/_/des na khyed la nus rgyu gcig_/yod kyang shes pa nyid 'byung 'gyur/_/'dir ni rang dgar skyes bu rnams/_/rig byed ji gar 'chad byed na/_/de dag rnams ni dgag pa ru/_/su zhig gis ni nus pa yin/_/des na gti
[\[86b.2\]]mug nga rgyal sogs/_/skyon gyis 'di dag bslad pa yin/_/thos pa phyin ci log bshad pa/_/byed ces dgos par 'gyur ba yin/_/de dag dbang po las [#]'das pa/_/mthong ba'i mi gcig kyang 'dod min/_/bskul ba ma ltos mtho ris dang /_/mchod sbyin sogs 'brel
[\[86b.3\]]shes nyid med/_/gang phyir dbang po las 'das don/_/khyed kyis dngos su mthong 'dod min/_/rtag pa'i tshig gis gang mthong ba/_/de ni mthong bar 'gyur ba yin/_/gang gis rig byed mi la ni/_/ma ltos rang nyid don brjod min/_/long ba 'khar ba thogs [#]pa ltar/_/skyes
[\[86b.4\]]bu'i bshad pa la ltos yin/_/de ni de yis drangs gyur na/_/lam log par ni ltung bar 'gyur/_/des na rig byed snang bzhin du/_/mig gcig 'gyur ba 'thad pa min/_/rang dgar shes pa skyed na yang /_/tshad ma nyid du gsal ba ru/_/'di nyid la ni mi srid de/_/skyes bu la
[\[86b.5\]]ni ltos phyir ro/_/ji bzhin don rtogs rgyu nyid de[#]/_/tshad ma nyid du brtags pa yin/_/skyes bu'i bshad pa la ltos pas/_/'di la tshad mas brtags legs min/_/rig byed tshad mar mi gnas pas/_/slob dpon slob ma'i brgyud pa 'di/_/thog ma med par brtag [#]bya ba'ang /_/skyon
[\[86b.6\]]med nyid du rigs [#]pa min/_/gang phyir de na gcig kyang ni/_/dbang po las 'das mthong 'dod min/_/de phyir thog ma med pa yi/_/dmus long brgyud pa bstan pa yin/_/long bas long ba khrid pa na/_/yang dag lam ni nges rtogs min/_/de lta min pas 'di la ni/_/thog med
[\[86b.7\]]brtags pa 'bras med yin/_/yid dang rgyas pa la sogs kyang /_/gzhan las rig byed de nyid shes/_/de dag gis don 'di bkod min/_/zhes pa 'di la tshad ma'ang med/_/bden don rtag pa'i 'brel can gyis/_/tshad ma nyid ni yin yang bla/_/dbang po las 'das sbyor ba de/_/_
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]'dir ni 'ga' yis nges pa min/_/gang phyir don de dbang 'das pa/_/der gnas sbyor de'ang dbang po 'das/_/khyed la mi kun de dag gis/_/rang gis dbang po 'das mi mthong /_/thos pa de yi bdag gi ni/_/don 'brel 'di yin zhes brjod min/_/skyes bus brtags pas don 'brel nyid/_/_
[\[87a.2\]]skyes bus byas pas tha dad min/_/de phyir ji ltar mis [#]byas pa/_/phyin ci log pa nyid du dogs/_/mi rnams kyis ni nyer btags [#]la'ang /_/de bzhin dgos [#]der cis mi 'gyur/_/rig byed tshad mar gnas na yang /_/slob dpon slob ma'i brgyud [#]pa ni/_/thog ma med par brtags pa
[\[87a.3\]]de/_/dmus long brgyud [#]pa 'dra bar 'gyur/_/me la sbyin sreg sogs tshig gis/_/the tshom sogs med mtho ris la/_/mngon sum gyi ni blo bzhin du/_/mi g.yo blo skyes ma yin nam/_/rig byed kyis de byed pa na/_/ji ltar tshad ma nyid dmigs yin/_/gang phyir tshig des don
[\[87a.4\]]de ni/_/'ga' zhig the tshom za rtogs yin/_/phyin ci log gang gzhan bzhin du/_/the tshom skyes phyir de bzhin min/_/rtogs pa dang ldan 'ga' zhig gis/_/de la bye brag mthong ba med/_/dbang po las 'das don la ni/_/yod med nges pa rigs pa min/_/gal te
[\[87a.5\]]rig byed dag nges na/_/gzhan las gzhan 'dra ci ste min/_/dad pas dbang med blo can ni/_/gtsang sbra can rnams mi g.yo ba'i/_/blo nyid skye bar 'gyur ba yin/_/gzhan la [#]gzhan dag la de mtshungs/_/'di ltar bde gshegs pa sogs la/_/mchod sbyin srog bcad [# ]
[\[87a.6\]]dang ldan pas/_/ngan song sdug bsngal 'byung 'gyur pa'i/_/blo ni mi g.yo skye bar 'gyur/_/blo 'di la ni 'ba' [#]zhig kyang /_/gnod pa da ltar snang 'gyur min/_/gal te la lar res 'ga' dogs/_/rig [#]byed ngag la'ang de dang mtshungs/_/gal te mi 'dod rag las pa/_/brda
[\[87a.7\]]ni mi rtogs reg [(]byid [,]byed [)]'dis/_/rang gi [#]don ni gsal byed ni[#]/_/de tshe tshad ma nyid rigs yin/_/de tshe gti mug nga rgyal sogs/_/skyon gyis bslad pa'i blo rnams kyis/_/gzhan du bshad par byas na yang /_/rang gi don ni 'dor mi byed/_/gang phyir de yi yul can nyid/_/_
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]blo ni myur du skyed par byed/_/skyes bu rnams kyis 'dod pa yi/_/'di ni don gzhan gsal byed min/_/mi [#]'dod la ni ltos pa na/_/skyes bus byas dang bye brag med/_/de la rag las gsal ba yin/_/de yang phyin ci log par 'byung /_/gzhan yang skyes bus ma byas la/_/_
[\[87b.2\]]ji ltar rang bzhin gyis bden don/_/'dod yin de bzhin brdzun nyid ni/_/ci ste dogs [#]par byed pa min/_/bdag nyid kyis bden don rtogs pa'i/_/rgyu nyid yin pas 'di bden na/_/de ltar bdag nyid kyis log par/_/rtogs pa'i rgyur yang dogs par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang
[\[87b.3\]]rig byed tshad ma ni/_/gang tshe khyed la gal che na/_/de tshe skyon med byed po sogs/_/nges par bsgrub [#]la 'bad par gyis/_/skyon med pa yi byed pa pos/_/'di byas skyon med gsal byas kyis/_/gsal bar byas na 'jig rten 'dir/_/yang dag don shes sgrub byed yin/_/shes
[\[87b.4\]]rab snying rje [#]sogs ldan pa'i/_/skyes bus byas pa'i tshig dam pa/_/de ltar legs par nges byas na/_/ji bzhin don shes rgyu ru 'gyur/_/mis ni ma byas pa tsam gyis/_/ji bzhin don shes rgyu min te/_/nags kyi me la sogs pa ni/_/log pa'i shes pa'i rgyur yang
[\[87b.5\]]mthong /_/me yi snang ba yod pa na/_/mtsho skyes sngon po'ang dmar snang 'gyur/_/gal te me sogs byas nyid kyis/_/de yi rgyu ru 'thad 'gyur na/_/don rnams kyis ni byas nyid kyis/_/log pa'i shes pa'i rgyu mtshan nam/_/de ltar du ba me la ni/_/ji bzhin gsal bar byed
[\[87b.6\]]'gyur min/_/de ltar rig byed ma byas pa/_/de kho na nyid shes pa yi/_/rgyu mtshan gnas pa ma yin pas/_/de phyir 'di brtags don med yin/_/des na skyes bus ma byas nyid/_/gsal dang rtag nyid gyis grub pa/_/sgra don 'brel pa brtag [#]pa yang /_/don med nyid du brjod pa
[\[87b.7\]]yin/_/de ni yod pa na yang 'di/_/ji bzhin shes don rgyu nyid du/_/mi 'dod par ni 'das ma thag_/rgyas pa ru ni bshad zin to/_/des na de nyid rab spong la/_/kho bo la ni cher mos med/_/gnas skabs nye bar mkho min la/_/su zhig gegs ni byed pa yin/_/thos pa de
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]la ji bzhin don/_/shes pa'i rgyu nyid 'thad pa yin/_/skyes bus ma byas yin na yang /_/de ni ma grub ces bsgrubs zin/_/phra ba'i blo yi mig can gyi[#]/_/blo rnams lam gang la dpyod pa'i/_/de yis bdag gis brlabs nas ni/_/'dir [#]ni cung zad
[\[88a.2\]]bsdus nas brjod/_/tshad ma rnams ni log na yang /_/gzhal bya ldog par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang phyir khyab dang byed [#]rgyu nyid/_/de dag la ni der yod min/_/des na thos pa'i byed po ni/_/tshad ma lnga pos ma rtogs kyang /_/byed po mi shes rab [#]sogs bzhin/_/dngos med nyid kyis
[\[88a.3\]]rtogs mi 'gyur/_/'on te don bcas nyid kyis sam/_/rnam par dbye don nyid kyis kyang /_/de rnams kyi ni byed po dpog_/ci ste thos pa'ang de bzhin min/_/sems can kun gyis ma rtogs nyid/_/the tshom za min de res [#]'ga'/_/su zhig tshad ma 'ga' yis kyang /_/rtog [#]pa
[\[88a.4\]]yin yang the tshom 'gyur/_/srid gsum nang na gnas pa yi/_/srog chags thams cad gsal po ru/_/rnam pa kun gyis yongs shes gang /_/des ni nges par byed 'di nus/_/rang nyid kyis ni ma rtogs nyid/_/'khrul pa yin zhes 'di lta bur/_/skyes bu gzhan gyis kun
[\[88a.5\]]rtog gang /_/de med par ni nges pa yin/_/rig byed la gdon [#]par byed na/_/byed po yin zhes mngon sum rtog_/de dag gsal byed rigs yin te/_/rtag la gsal ba mi srid phyir/_/dmigs par gyur pa'i rang ngo bo/_/de yi bya bas yang dag byung [#]/_/de dag sngar yang yod
[\[88a.6\]]pa na/_/dmigs pa yod par thal bar 'gyur/_/rig byed de yi 'bras bu ni/_/tha snyad sogs su rung bar nges/_/de yi bya bas 'di yod phyir/_/sa bon las ni myug sogs bzhin/_/gsal byed yi ge'i dngos yod phyir/_/zlos gar gyi ni gtam [#]sogs bzhin/_/skyes
[\[88a.7\]]bus byas nyid rig byed la/_/rjes su dpag pas kyang rtogs 'gyur/_/gzhan du rim dngos nyid min te/_/rtag nyid phyir dang khyab byed phyir/_/gsal bas byas pa'i rim yod min/_/rtag las gsal ba mi 'thad phyir/_/lung dang nye bar 'jal ba dag_/don gyis go la tshad nyid
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]de/_/dgag par byas yin de na yang /_/'di dag nyer dgod rigs pa [#]min/_/tshad ma nyid min [#]ldog pa'i phyir/_/rigs [#]byed skyes bus ma byas nyid/_/gang 'dod de yang dngos nyid phyir/_/sgrub pa rnams kyis bsgrub bya min/_/de dag gis thos rang dbang yin/_/skyes bu'i bya
[\[88b.2\]]ba mi ltos phyir/_/de yang dngos po la yod chos/_/yang na dngos bdag nyid de bzhin/_/dngos po'i phyogs ni grub don du/_/sgrub pa gang yang brjod pa yin/_/khyed la de ni gsal [#]byas kyang /_/rang nyid dngos med grub 'gyur min/_/de yod sgrub pa gsal byas nas/_/de yod nges
[\[88b.3\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/de yod pa ni ldog pa ni[#]/_/de tsam gyis ni nges yod min/_/tshad ma rnams ni log na yang /_/don med par ni mi 'grub bo/_/des [#]na gnyis ka la phyogs ni/_/mi 'grub pa de [#]tsam du 'gyur/_/lus can min phyir sgra rtag min/_/bde sogs rnams kyis 'khrul
[\[88b.4\]]phyir ro/_/de ltar brjod kyang ji bzhin sgra/_/'jig nyid rab tu mi 'grub bo/_/des [#]na snga phyi mtha' dag la/_/gzhan gyis sgrub pa gang brjod yin/_/de ni gsal bar byas na yang /_/rig byed smra de'i don rtogs [#]min/_/ma byas dang ni mi 'jigs pas/_/gal te rtag nyid 'dod pa [# ]
[\[88b.5\]]na/_/bkag pa tsam gyi dngos dag gis[#]/_/nus med la yang de mtshungs yin/_/des na nam mkha'i me tog bzhin/_/des na ji ltar mkha'i pad ma/_/rtag pa nyid ni dngos min te/_/de bzhin rig byed la yang ni/_/des na tshad ma nyid grub min/_/byas pa nyid dang 'jig nyid ni/_/_
[\[88b.6\]]dgag par yang ni mi grub [#]bo/_/sgrub par byed pa sun phyung bas/_/des na rtag nyid smra mi 'grub/_/gal te ma yin dgag bdag nyid/_/de dag gis ni rtag nyid 'dod/_/de dag dngos po'i bdag nyid kyis/_/rang gis [#]grub pa la ltos yin/_/phyogs snga ma gnyis sun phyung bas/_/_
[\[88b.7\]]dngos po'i ngo bor rtag nyid gang /_/de ni [#]bsgrub par ma byas na/_/bdag nyid kyis te bsgrub [#]'gyur min/_/tshul gsum ngo bo nges pa ni/_/sgrub pa gang zhig rab gsal [#]byas/_/khyod kyi phas kyang nam du yang /_/de ni dgag par mi nus so/_/rig byed las ni skyes bu ni/_/mi
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]'jig par ni gang bshad pa/_/de la rjes su dpag pas gnod/_/gsal bar bdag med bstan zin to/_/der ni rigs sogs gzhan smras pa'ang /_/tshad mar gnod byar bsgrub byas zin/_/rjes su dpag pas [#]de yang ni/_/'brel pa nges can sngar bshad
[\[89a.2\]]zin/_/dngos po'i rjes 'brel pa'i de la/_/sgra tsam snying po med pas sam/_/yang na de las byung blo yis/_/rmongs pa su zhig gnod snyam sems/_/skyes bu'i ngag las shes pa yang /_/dbang po las 'das 'jug pa yin/_/de yang mngon sum dang mtshungs nyid/_/ci phyir khyed
[\[89a.3\]]cag mngon 'dod min/_/'brel ba ma mthong ba yi phyir/_/dpe la ma ltos skyon med pa'ang /_/de la yang yod kho na yin/_/skyes bu la brtan [#]phyir 'di la/_/gnod pa yod par dogs she na/_/de ltar rig byed dag la yang /_/dogs pa de yang ldog mi 'gyur/_/de ni log rtog rgyu
[\[89a.4\]]nyid kyi/_/rang bzhin du ni 'gyur ba yin/_/mi [#]byas sgra yi don rtogs kyang /_/de ni bdag la tshad ma min/_/zhes bya de ltar zhe sdang gis/_/mkhas pas byed pa nus ma yin/_/des na dbang 'das las sgra kun/_/stobs dang stobs min mtshungs yin na/_/gcig nyid la ni rjes
[\[89a.5\]]chags 'di/_/rgyu mtshan gang gis sbyor bar byed/_/'das ma thag brjod rigs [#]pa ni/_/rig byed tshad ma min pa'i rgyu/_/shes rab can rnams kyis gsungs pas/_/des na de dag bden smrar 'gyur/_/log par rjes chags las skyes pa'i/_/rig byed bsam pas rmongs
[\[89a.6\]]byas pas/_/rig byed log pa nyid kyi rgyu/_/mi shes cung zad ngo mtshar med/_/sog [#]po par sig sogs rnams la/_/ma [#]ni bag mar legs sogs pa'i/_/de spyod rtag tu lhur len pa/_/de'i skyon cung zad mthong ba med/_/ngo shes mngon sum yin par ni/_/sngar ni bkag pa
[\[89a.7\]]kho na yin/_/'khrul pa'i phyir dang rtogs bcas phyir/_/de yis rtag nyid nges 'gyur min/_/de [#]ni ne tso'i smra ba yin/_/ri skegs tshig tu 'di snang phyir/_/sgra yi shes pa mang du ni/_/ldog par 'gyur ba'i ngo bo yin/_/de ni gsal byed dbye zhe na/_/gsal ba spong ba 'chad par
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]'gyur/_/rig [#]pa 'di nyid kyis khyed la/_/thams cad 'dir ni gcig nyid 'gyur/_/des na khyed la gsal byed dang /_/gsal bar bya ba cung zad med/_/rnam dbye dang bral cig la ni/_/dbye bar brtags pa 'gal ba yin/_/sgra 'di dag ni skyes bus byas/_/'di dag skyes
[\[89b.2\]]bus ma byas zhes/_/de yi rnam par gzhag pa yang /_/ngo shes rjes 'brang [#]byed grub min/_/gsal byed rim pa gnas pa'i phyir/_/'ga' zhig rim pa nyid du gnas/_/rim pa nges par sbyor ba can/_/de dag skyes bus ma byas 'dod/_/rkan [#]sogs gsal byed rim
[\[89b.3\]]pa ni/_/skyes bus byas chos 'di min nam/_/de ni 'dod la rag las phyir/_/phyin ci log tu rtogs par 'gyur/_/me nyid la sogs spyi nyid ni/_/rgyas pa ru ni gsal [#]byas zin/_/des na der ni ngo shes pa'i/_/spyi nyid rtag par kho bos 'dod/_/skad cig re rer 'jigs [#]'gyur
[\[89b.4\]]bas/_/yi ge rnams la khyad med phyir/_/ngo shes spyi yis gang nyid ni/_/de bzhin du ni yin zad mod/_/myur dang dal sogs cha gang la/_/tha dad blo ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de la ngo shes pa'i shes pa/_/tha dad blos [#]ni nges byas min/_/sgra gcig nyid ni grub don du/_/gtan
[\[89b.5\]]tshigs rnams ni smras pa la/_/mi mthun phyogs la 'gal med phyir/_/so sor 'brel grub mi 'gyur ro/_/du ma'i spyi yi [#]cha yang ni/_/bdag la brtan par grub pa min/_/de min ngo bo las ldog pa/_/dngos po tsam ni bsgrubs pa yin/_/gang sogs gcig nyid thob gyur na/_/_
[\[89b.6\]]rigs rten 'dod pas grub pa sgrub/_/de min ngo bo yongs ldog [#]pas/_/dbyer med nyid du brtags pa yin/_/gsal ba gcig tu nyid 'gyur na/_/tshad ma kun gyis gnod par 'gyur/_/dbang po las byung sogs rnams kyis/_/so sor sbyor yig dbye nges phyir/_/yid 'ong yid mi
[\[89b.7\]]'ong [#]sogs kyi/_/dbye gang mngon sum gyis rtogs 'gyur/_/blo rnams rim par 'byung ba'i phyir/_/tha dad 'grub 'gyur myur sogs bzhin/_/yul dang dus sogs tha dad pa'i/_/ba lang sgra gsal blo rnams kyi/_/don gcig pa min tha dad par/_/snang phyir gzugs ro
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]sogs blo bzhin/_/drug snang la sogs dbye snang bar/_/mngon sum gyis ni nges par 'gyur/_/gsal byed kyi [#]chos 'di min te/_/zhes bya deng [#]ni brjod par 'gyur/_/snga de phyi re'i [#]zhag la ni/_/ba lang sgra zhes kun 'di dag_/don gcig pa min rim
[\[90a.2\]]'byung phyir/_/sgra dang dri sogs pa'i blo bzhin/_/de lta min na blo kun ni/_/dmigs pa gcig tu 'gyur ba yin/_/nus ldan rgyu ni nyer [#]gnas phyir/_/rim gyis 'byung ba'ang 'gal ba yin/_/dngos po rnams ni tha dad kyang /_/rang bzhin nyid kyis gcig rtogs pa'i/_/nus
[\[90a.3\]]pa nges par yod min te/_/sngar ni rab tu bstan zin to[#]/_/gcig tu rtogs pa de las [#]ni/_/sgra ni gcig tu nges byed pa/_/'jig rten pas ni sgra gcig la/_/sbyor ba mang po snyam du sems/_/gsal ba du ma la gnas phyir/_/'brel pa 'thad par 'gyur ba yin/_/de phyir
[\[90a.4\]]gsal ba rnams la ni/_/'jig rten thams cad pa nyid 'gyur/_/sgra don lhan cig don dam par/_/'brel pa yod min de las ni/_/ma skyes phyir dang tha dad phyir/_/des na 'khrul pas nye bar brtags/_/khyab min srid phyir sgra don gyi/_/gnas pa kun ni bslad pa yin/_/_
[\[90a.5\]]'di ltar de ni rgyas pa ru/_/sngar ni bstan par byas zin to/_/ba lang nyid ni rtag pa dang /_/'brel par brtags pa'ang spangs pa yin/_/rdul phran mkha' sogs kyang spangs nas[#]/_/des na gtan tshigs kyi dpe min/_/ngo bo gcig nyid 'khrul pa yi[#]/_/shes pa rnams
[\[90a.6\]]kyis nges byas phyir/_/dmigs bkar ba lang [#]nyid brjod nyid/_/yun ring [#]nas ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/yang dag skad cig ma nyid phyir/_/de [#]tsam dus 'di brten min yang /_/shes bya de yi brten pa ni/_/phyis ni ji ltar yang 'dod yin/_/bum sogs la yang cung zad ni/_/_
[\[90a.7\]]'jig pa'i rgyu ni yod pa min/_/zhes bya 'di la [#]bstan zin to/_/de ci sgra la 'byung 'gyur yin/_/ngo shes pa ni bslad [#]pa ru/_/sngar ni rab tu bstan zin pas/_/yul dus sbyor ba po rnams kyi/_/dbye bas yi ge'ang dbye bar 'gyur/_/drug ldan drang srong sa 'dzin dang /_/lnga
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]pa la sogs rab dbye bas/_/ga yi gsal ba [#]gzhan gsal bar/_/mngon sum gyis ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/gsal bar byed pa'i dbye ba yis/_/dbye ba'i gnas pa 'di rigs min/_/rtag pa la ni gsal yod min/_/zhes bya 'og nas 'chad par 'gyur/_/ga las
[\[90b.2\]]tha dad pa yi spyi/_/yang dag par ga nyid 'dod min/_/de yi phyir ni sbyor ba la/_/grub pa la sgrub bzlog par dka'/_/gzhan sel bdag nyid can la yang /_/ga nyid la ni rten yod min/_/rnam pa 'di nyid kyis zhe na/_/de min rten mi 'grub thob 'gyur/_/yi ge ga min
[\[90b.3\]]las ldog pas/_/ga yig [#]rnam pa nyid du 'gyur/_/chos can gang la chos yin no/_/yang dag par ni rjes dpag kun/_/gnyis ka la grub la ltos yin/_/dpe sogs rang nyid la ltos pa/_/des dpe'i chos can ma grub 'gyur/_/khyed kyi [#]'bad pa 'di kun gyis[#]/_/ga
[\[90b.4\]]yig gcig nyid bsgrub don du/_/de la khyed la mngon sum gyis/_/gnod pa bzlog par dka' ba'ang smras/_/snga de phyi de la sogs pa'i/_/yi ge ga zhes 'di dag ni/_/rim gyis 'byung bas don gcig min/_/gzugs dang ro sogs blo bzhin no/_/des na yi ge gcig brtan
[\[90b.5\]]par/_/gnas pa gnyis ka la mi 'grub/_/de'i phyir nyer btags nyid 'di la/_/rtag pa nyid ni brtags [#]pa yin/_/sgra ni dmigs pa'i dus su ni/_/rna ba legs par byas pa dang /_/sna [#]bug mtha' la gnas gyur pa'i/_/rlung rnams rtogs par 'gyur ba min/_/sgra tsam legs
[\[90b.6\]]byas rna ba yis/_/gang tshe sgra ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/de dang nyer bsres de yis ni/_/rtogs la mngon sum gyis gnod 'gyur/_/mngar ba la sogs la 'jug pa/_/kha dang ser po'i ngo bo [#]yis/_/ji ltar shes pa yul med pa/_/de bzhin sgra yang shes par 'gyur/_/myur dang
[\[90b.7\]]dal sogs ngo bo yis/_/gzhan pa'i sgra ni snang mi 'gyur/_/de min ngo bo de dngos nyid/_/shes phyir ji ltar yul med min/_/de ltar min na don de nyid/_/rtogs par byed pa de 'gal 'dod/_/rnam pa gzhan ni rig pa na/_/don de nyid ni ji ltar rig_/rnam pa med pa'i shes
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]pa la/_/khyed la phyi'i don rnams [#]de nges/_/de yi bdag nyid phyi rol min/_/de bzhin du de ji bzhin [#]rig_/shes pa rnam bcas phyogs la yang /_/phyi rol rnam pa rjes mthun par/_/shes pa la ni snang gyur pas/_/don rtogs zhes ni brjod pa yin/_/_
[\[91a.2\]]'dir ni phyi rol rjes mthun par/_/shes pa 'jug par mi 'gyur te/_/des na yul med pa yi sems/_/thams cad 'khrul pa yin zhes gdags/_/rtag pa la ni khyad par du/_/gsal byed yod pa rig pa min/_/de yi legs byas rjes mthun pas/_/des sgra la blo tha dad
[\[91a.3\]]min/_/bum pa la sogs gzung [#]don du/_/ji ltar mig la mar me yi[#]/_/nus pa skyed byed de bzhin du/_/sgra dmigs phyir ni sgra tsam gyis/_/rna ba la ni nus pa bskyed/_/sgra ni rtag tu dmigs rung bar/_/rang bzhin gyis ni gnas she na[#]/_/rna ba legs par ma byas
[\[91a.4\]]kyang /_/de ni ci yi phyir mi dmigs/_/de phyir legs byas rna ba ni/_/yod pa'i dus bzhin de yang ni/_/rung ba'i rgyu ni yod pas na/_/dmigs pa kho na yod par 'gyur/_/gal te de dmigs rung min na/_/phyogs kyang de ni ji ltar 'gyur/_/'gyur na [#]rung ba nyid ldan pa'i/_/_
[\[91a.5\]]sgra gzhan skye bar 'gyur ba yin/_/yang na phyis kyang shes pa ni/_/de yi stobs las byung ba min/_/legs byas rna ba la sogs las/_/de ni skye bar brjod pa yin/_/de ltar sgra ni shes bya ru/_/mi 'gyur nye bar mkho min phyir/_/ro sogs las ni de la ni/_/khyad par cung zad
[\[91a.6\]]kyang yod min/_/legs byas rna ba la sogs las/_/sgra la ltos med de dag gis/_/shes pa 'di ni sgra rtogs pa'i/_/rang bzhin zhes bya bskyed pa yin/_/don shes shes bya'i ngo bo 'di/_/de lta na yang sgra 'jug 'gyur/_/khyed la de yi rnam shes kyang /_/zhes bya rjes su 'jug
[\[91a.7\]]par 'gyur/_/de lta min na rnam shes ni/_/rjes 'jug ma yin de shes bya/_/sgra de rjes su 'jug 'gyur zhes/_/khyed la de ltar 'gal bar 'gyur/_/shes dang shes bya'i rang bzhin ni/_/de dag lu gu rgyud bzhin 'brel/_/gcig yod pa na gnyis pa'i ni/_/thob 'gyur ma 'khrul pa
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]yi phyir/_/legs byas rna bas bskyed pa yi/_/shes dang 'brel nyid yin na ni/_/rna ba legs par ma byas kyang /_/gsal bar shes pa 'phel bar [#]'gyur/_/gal te de yi shes bya yi/_/bdag nyid sgra ni min zhe na/_/de lta na ni rna ba'i shes/_/de rtog rang bzhin 'gyur min te/_/_
[\[91b.2\]]de dag [#]nyid min ro sogs bzhin/_/shes pa la ni sgra dang ni/_/'brel pa gang yod gang gis na/_/de ni sgra blo'i ngo bor 'dod/_/de dag [#]nyid ni dbye ldan min/_/de ni de las byung min te/_/sgra ni skyed byed nyid min phyir/_/de las byung ba'i nges pa'i phyir/_/de ni gtan du 'byung bar
[\[91b.3\]]'gyur/_/de lta na de'i yul can shes/_/rtag tu 'byung ba'am yang na min/_/de ltar nges par gnas pas [#]na/_/rna ba legs byas rtags don med/_/res 'ga' legs par byas pa ni/_/yod pa nyid na res 'ga' yang /_/shes pa 'byung 'gyur zhes bya ba/_/legs byas
[\[91b.4\]]brtags pa mdzes pa yin/_/legs byas nus pa'i mtshan nyid can/_/shes 'bras nges par byas she na/_/shes pa de yang rtag yod pa'am/_/yang na rtag tu med par 'gyur/_/rnam par shes pa res 'ga' ba[#]/_/de yi legs byas ji ltar ston/_/rna ba legs par byas
[\[91b.5\]]phyir lan/_/de phyir de [#]ni legs smras min/_/gal te tha mi dad pa yi[#]/_/nus pa rna ba la byed na/_/de tshe nam mkha' phyogs la ni/_/rtag nyid nyams 'gyur bskyed pa'i phyir/_/dngos dang tha mi dad nyid phyir/_/legs par byas pa'ang rtag nyid yin/_/dngos po bzhin du de yis
[\[91b.6\]]ni[#]/_/de bskyed rnam shes rtag tu na/_/tha dad na ni de'i zhe na/_/'brel pa 'thad par mi 'gyur ro/_/nus pa las zhes 'byung ba'i phyir/_/rna ba'i shes pa nyid kyang med/_/tha dad tha mi dad grol ba'i/_/phyogs ni spangs par byas zin to/_/des na rna ba legs byas phyir/_/lan ni
[\[91b.7\]]blo dman brjod pa yin/_/de nyid kyis ni yul dang ni/_/gnyis ka legs par byas pa bkag_/de phyir rtag la gsal ba ni/_/thams cad du yang rten med yin/_/des na gsal ba la brten nas/_/ring thung rim pa sogs rnams ni/_/'ga' zhig gang dag snang gyur pa/_/_
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]de dag kun kyang rten med 'gyur/_/ma phrad tsam du mtshungs na yang /_/thams cad gzung nyid mi 'gyur te/_/nus pa nges par gnas pa'i phyir/_/khab len gyis ni lcags la bzhin/_/gal te khab len 'od phrad [#]pas/_/de yang drangs par gyur ce na/_/_
[\[92a.2\]]'o na 'od 'di ma mthong bas/_/ji ltar yod par rtogs [#]par 'gyur/_/ci phyir 'od de shing sogs dang /_/phrad kyang 'dren par byed pa min/_/de nus nges nyid phyir zhe na/_/ma phrad pa la'ang de mtshungs yin/_/sbyor ba'i de ma thag tu ni/_/ring dang bar mar nyer gnas pas/_/rim
[\[92a.3\]]pa med pas rtogs par 'gyur/_/thams cad la der shes skyed phyir/_/ring dang nye sogs dbye ba yis/_/gzugs ni gsal dang mi gsal bar/_/ji ltar snang 'gyur de bzhin du/_/sgra yang myur dang dal sogs 'gyur/_/tha dad snang ba'i blo rnams ni/_/dmigs pa gcig
[\[92a.4\]]par ji ltar 'gyur/_/zhe na phyi rol don smra la/_/gzugs blo la de brgal brtag mtshungs/_/phrad nas 'dzin pa'i phyogs la yang /_/rna ba'i nang du sgra'i sgra bzhin/_/'brug sgra la sogs shes pa ni/_/tha dad par ni 'gyur ba min/_/des na skyed byed phyir shes pa/_/tha dad min
[\[92a.5\]]te yid bzhin no/_/gzhan du res byas [#]la sogs bzhin/_/rna dang ma phrad byed 'gyur min/_/yid kyang phrad par byed pa yin/_/gang brjod skad cig tsam gyis ni/_/shin tu ring ba'i don la ni/_/de dag gi sems 'jug mi 'thad/_/phyi rol dbang po nyid phyir sogs/_/_
[\[92a.6\]]phrad nas 'dzin byed nyid sgrub gang /_/bsgrub bya'i chos mi mthun pa la/_/'gal ba med phyir de 'khrul yin/_/ldan pa dang ni rnam dbye ba/_/tha dad pa can sngar spangs zin/_/de nyid kyis ni khyad med phyir/_/'di la rtogs pa mi 'thad do/_/de phyir shugs med pas de ni/_/ji srid shugs
[\[92a.7\]]ni gnas pa min/_/rna ba'i nam mkhar phyin pa yis/_/de ni rna nus byed ce na/_/ci phyir lcag gis bsnun pa bzhin/_/sgra rigs [#]pa na de shes min/_/gang tshe sgra'i [#]shes pas de yi/_/rig pa so sor bkag ce na/_/lcag gis bsnun dang rlung gzhan bar/_/de tshe rigs [#]pas
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]brjod rigs min/_/rim gyis 'byung yang mgyogs pa na/_/cig car du ni 'khrul zhe na/_/cung zad min rnam pa [#]kun du'ang /_/rlung 'di ma dmigs pa yi phyir/_/'on kyang dbang po las 'das rlung /_/gzegs zan sogs bzhin khyed cag kyang /_/brjod na bshad pa las de yis/_/_
[\[92b.2\]]reg bya thob 'gyur ci phyir byas/_/yang na rlung ni [#]dbang 'das bla/_/de dang de sbyor thob 'gyur la/_/dro dang gang [#]dang gnyis ka yis/_/reg bya rig 'gyur gzhan gyi bzhin/_/'on kyang rna mchog la de dang /_/mi [#]ldan pas na rtogs mi 'dod/_/rna ba'i nam mkhar ma phyin ces/_/_
[\[92b.3\]]de ni ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur/_/de phyir gtsang sbra can mthong ba'i/_/brtags pa rgyu mtshan med yin te/_/mkhas pa rnams ni tshim byed min/_/nam mkha' cha med rna gang brjod/_/de la skyon ni sngar bstan gang /_/de dag cha med phyogs rna bar/_/'dod pa nyid la'ang mtshungs rtogs
[\[92b.4\]]bya/_/nam mkha' gcig pu khyab phyogs la'ang /_/legs byas la brten dang gzhan gyi/_/rnam par dbye ba 'thad pa min/_/gang phyir nam mkha' de gcig yin/_/mkha' gcig bdag nyid rna ba ni/_/rna mchog legs par ma byas med/_/de phyir rten gyi dbye ba yis/_/_
[\[92b.5\]]legs par byas pa nges mi gnas/_/de bas na rten [#]gcig la ni/_/dbang po legs par byas thob na/_/dbang po gcig pur smra ba la/_/lus can kun gyis rtogs byed 'gyur/_/skyes bu [#]lus kyi phyogs rnams la/_/rnam par shes pa skyed 'dod kyi/_/'on kyang khyed la mkha'
[\[92b.6\]]gcig phyir/_/gtso bo tha dad par 'gyur min/_/de phyir bdag phyogs dang bral yang /_/ma lus par ni rtogs byed pa/_/lus nyid la gnas 'dzin pas na/_/de ltar smras kyang 'gal ba yin/_/de gnyis na ni rgyu yis ni/_/'on pa nyid sogs lta bur rtogs/_/gzugs ni me
[\[92b.7\]]long la mngon lta/_/gzugs brnyan de ltar ma yin no/_/chu sogs nang du zhugs pa 'di/_/gzugs ni ring du gnas pa yin/_/rten gyi rjes su byed pa yis/_/gzugs brnyan che chung dbye ba dang /_/ldan gyi gzugs ni ma yin te/_/des na gtan tshigs ma grub min/_/_
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]mi mthun par ni snang ba yang /_/don shes par ni 'gyur ba na[#]/_/gzugs dang sgra sogs sems thams cad/_/don kun gyi ni yul can 'gyur/_/sor mos cung zad mnan mig la/_/gcig kyang du mar snang ba gang /_/de yang de ltar 'khrul pa
[\[93a.2\]]ste/_/yul med nyid du 'dod pa yin/_/'dir ni gzugs brnyan 'byung ba ni/_/sngar ni gsal bar byas nyid yin/_/gcig la lhan cig gnyis mi rung /_/lus can thogs pa dang bcas phyir/_/yul rnams [#]du ma la gnas par/_/gzugs brnyan yod pa yin na yang /_/_
[\[93a.3\]]che chung sogs rigs [#]dbye ba yis/_/gcig nyid yod pa ma yin no/_/skyes bu rnams la nges pa yang /_/gang la 'di ltar 'jug par 'gyur/_/bdag gi steng na nyi gnas zhes/_/de ni nges par 'khrul pa yin/_/gang phyir srog chags thams cad ni/_/cig car du ni nyi gcig
[\[93a.4\]]nyid/_/mthong bar 'gyur ba yin pas de/_/gnyis pa nam yang ma yin no/_/des na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni/_/gnyis pa nam yang yod ma yin/_/snang ba mi dmigs pa yi phyir/_/des na nyi ma gcig tu nges/_/de ltar sgra ni gcig nyid du/_/ji ltar yang ni nges pa min/_/_
[\[93a.5\]]rim gyis sam ni cig car yang /_/de ni du ma nyid mtshon phyir/_/gang tshe rjod par byed mang po/_/ga sogs yi ge cig car du/_/sbyor bar byed pa de yi tshe/_/dbye bar gsal bar dmigs par 'gyur/_/rim gyis kyang ni sbyor ba la/_/dbye ba mngon sum 'ba' zhig gis/_/_
[\[93a.6\]]rtogs 'gyur ma yin 'on kyang ni/_/rtags las kyang blo'i rim snang phyir/_/sgra tsam gsal byed rag las pa/_/'di yi dmigs bar zad 'gyur mod/_/'on kyang ji ltar dngos gnas pa/_/'di ni 'dzin par 'gyur ba yin/_/de lta min na de 'dzin 'di/_/de dngos mi snang la nges
[\[93a.7\]]'gyur/_/nam mkha'i cha ni ma lus pa/_/sgras [#]ni khyab cing gsal 'gyur min/_/des na sgra tsam yul tha dad/_/thos pa de cis rjes su byed/_/rang bdag nyid ni gsal ba ru/_/gsal bar 'gyur te bum sogs bzhin/_/'di dag khyed gzhung khas blangs
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]na/_/rgyu mtshan med par brjod pa yin/_/gsal ba med phyir gsal byed rnams/_/nus pa med phyir bsgrubs zin to/_/de 'di yin zhes bshad [#]pa ni/_/mngon sum yin par bsal zin to/_/de'i phyir yul dbyes tha dad nyid/_/shes bya de ni gnod med [#]yin/_/'ga'
[\[93b.2\]]zhig yul ni tha dad par/_/rim gyis 'gro bar byed pa ste/_/skad cig 'jig phyir tha dad 'gyur/_/de min 'gro ba dang ldan min/_/snga ma'i yul dang ma bral ba'i/_/rang bzhin rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir/_/brtan [#]pas de ni yul gzhan du/_/phyin pas rig pa ma yin no/_/nam mkha'
[\[93b.3\]]la ni mngon gsal na[#]/_/rigs min nus pa med phyir dang /_/dbang 'das phyir ro sa khung [#]la/_/snang ba de ni de ltar snang /_/gzhan yang sgra ni nam mkha' la'ang /_/mngon par gsal ba tha dad min/_/blo ni gsal yin de yang ni/_/rtag 'byung rgyur ni nyer gnas phyir/_/gang
[\[93b.4\]]tshe sgra la gsal byed pa/_/ji ltar yang ni rigs pa min/_/de tshe gzhan gyi khyad par can/_/sgra blo la ni 'khrul pa med/_/de phyir ri sogs thams cad ni/_/sgra chos min zhes gnas par 'gyur/_/gang phyir sgra tsam gsal byed nyid/_/yod na der 'gyur de yang bstsal/_/_
[\[93b.5\]]shin tu tha dad can de dag_/mtshungs par gcig tu rtogs pa la/_/nus pa can yin sgra dang de'i/_/don ces mang du sngar dpyad zin/_/des na don dang 'brel mthong bas/_/kun rdzob tu ni sgra rjod byed/_/'gyur zhing yang dag pa ru ni/_/rjod byed de min zhes bsgrubs zin/_/sgra
[\[93b.6\]]las byung ba'i shes de dag_/log par snang bar 'gyur ba yin/_/rigs dang rang gi mtshan nyid sogs/_/brjod bya rjod [#]byed mi gnas phyir/_/des 'khrul tha snyad 'don pa po/_/yang dag par ni ba lang sgra/_/tha dad yin yang mtshungs blo can/_/gcig nyid yin pa snyam du zin/_/_
[\[93b.7\]]des na mang du ma 'brel bar/_/rjod [#]par byed pa bram ze yis[#]/_/sgra yi khyad par mdun byas pas/_/gang smras de kun gzhi med yin/_/'di ltar lag brda la sogs pa/_/gcig nyid min te myur bul sogs/_/dbye bas tha dad blo yod phyir/_/de yi gsal ba'ang bstsal
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]byas zin/_/de la spyi gcig rjes 'gro ba/_/nye bar mtshon par mi 'gyur ro/_/brda ni dgag pa la sogs pa'i/_/shes pa'i yan lag tu de [#]'gyur/_/sgra rnams dngos su phyi rol gyi/_/don rtogs min te 'brel med phyir/_/des na brjod par 'dod pa
[\[94a.2\]]ni/_/'di dag gis ni bstan par gsungs/_/de yi 'bras bu nyid du ni/_/'di dag mngon sum mi dmigs pas/_/des pa yin phyir des na 'dir/_/rgyu 'bras nyid du gsal bar 'gyur/_/brda yi rgyu dang 'bras ngo bo/_/gang gis nges par byas pa ni/_/de yis [#]brjod
[\[94a.3\]]'dod sgra dag gis/_/rtogs par 'gyur te lag bskyod bzhin/_/brjod 'dod la gnas don dang ni/_/sgra rnams la ni rgyu 'bras kyi/_/bdag nyid can gyi 'brel pa de/_/brda yod na ni skye bar 'gyur/_/de rnams kyis [#]ni 'brel pa ni/_/des na brda las byung zhes brjod/_/_
[\[94a.4\]]de yis [#]gsal bar byed pa 'di/_/brda yis [#]brjod ces dngos su min/_/rgyu dang 'bras bur 'gyur ba yi[#]/_/dngos po las ni de gzhan min/_/de dag nyid ni de ltar bshad/_/rgyu 'bras nyid kyi 'brel pa yin/_/de dag kyang ni re re yis[#]/_/bdag cag nyid du rmongs pas
[\[94a.5\]]rtogs/_/des [#]na brda yi tha dad kyi[#]/_/dus kyi [#]khyad par 'dod pa yin/_/yang dag par ni gcig pu nyid/_/'brel pa 'dir ni yod rigs min/_/tha dad don rnams ma 'dres phyir/_/'brel med tha mi dad la yang /_/gzhan gyi gzhung lugs ma [#]shes pas/_/mi re re la
[\[94a.6\]]brda re 'am/_/yang na bzlas nas brjod pa yin/_/zhes bya [#]la sogs gzhan gyis smras/_/mis [#]byas nyid phyir de dag la/_/brda 'brel yang dag par yod min/_/de ni de yis [#]gsal byas phyir/_/zhes bya 'brel pa nyid du 'gyur/_/'dir ni bzlas nas brjod pa ste/_/_
[\[94a.7\]]gzhan gyis so sor rtogs pa min[#]/_/dbang phyug la sogs bkag nyid phyir/_/'byin pa'i thog mar des byas min/_/re re la ni 'brel pa gang /_/de ni tha dad skad cig gis[#]/_/'jig phyir mtshungs pa'i rtogs pa ni/_/tha dad pa la'ang 'gal ba min/_/de yi yul can
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]blo rnams ni/_/rim gyis kyang ni skye 'gyur ba/_/de la'ang rim pa gsal bar smras/_/gzhan du de dag rim med 'gyur/_/mang po rnams la cig car du/_/brda byed par [#]ni yod pa na/_/brda ni tha dad par 'dod min/_/sngo sogs skad cig ma bzhin no/_/smra ba po yi blo mi [# ]
[\[94b.2\]]gnas/_/de nyid gzhan longs spyad bya yin[#]/_/khyad par med phyir mi 'thad do/_/snga ma'i dngos ni ma spangs shing /_/khyad par ma byung ba yod na'ang /_/khyed kyi gzhan gyi rna ba ni/_/longs mi spyod par ji ltar 'gyur/_/rtag nyid phyir dang ltos med phyir/_/chos dang chos min dbang byas
[\[94b.3\]]pa/_/gtan du nam mkha' rna ba ni[#]/_/thams cad longs spyod min par thal/_/nam mkha' la ni nam du yang /_/chos min chos kyis [#]phan mi 'dogs/_/rtag pa nyid phyir bya ba min/_/'di la dbang byas 'di ci zhig_/sngags dang sman sogs nus pa yin/_/yang longs
[\[94b.4\]]spyad byar ji ltar 'gyur/_/rtag [#]pa nyid phyir de dag las/_/de ni khyad par thob 'gyur min/_/gal te rten min [#]rtag yin na[#]/_/skad cig mi rtag yin zhe na/_/de tshe bdag la bogs med pas/_/'on pa la sogs mi 'thad do/_/de la bogs ni yod blo [#]ste/_/nam mkha' la ni de yod
[\[94b.5\]]min/_/rten dang 'brel pa yod min te/_/rtag nyid yin pas ltos med phyir/_/des na de yi sgo nas kyang /_/'dir ni 'on pa sogs mi 'thad/_/nam mkha' cha shas med yin la[#]/_/rtag pa nyid kyis 'di mtshungs yin/_/yul der gnas par 'gyur yang ni/_/gal
[\[94b.6\]]te de yang skad cig ma/_/nyid min na ni dbang las ni/_/bton par rigs [#]pa ma yin no/_/de la phyis kyang phul byung ni/_/ci zhig skye bar 'gyur ba yin/_/gang gis dbang las bton pa ni/_/des slar longs spyod thob 'gyur min/_/gang tshe rna ba dang sgra ni/_/legs byas de ltar 'thad
[\[94b.7\]]min te/_/tha dad tha mi dad rtogs [#]pas/_/legs par bya ba mi 'thad phyir/_/legs par byas pa tha dad na/_/rna ba sgra legs byas mi 'gyur/_/de dag dang ni legs byas la/_/'brel pa cung zad kyang yod min/_/tha dad pa la 'brel pa ni/_/rgyu 'bras nyid du 'gyur ba yin/_/de yod
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]na ni 'di rtag tu/_/'byung 'gyur rgyu rtag [#]gnas pa'i phyir/_/tha mi dad pa'i phyogs la yang /_/de 'drar 'di yang rtag par 'gyur/_/de yang bya bar 'dod pa min/_/de las shes pa rtag thal 'gyur/_/de phyir rlung la sogs pa la/_/nus pa nges pa
[\[95a.2\]]'thad min te/_/bya ba yi ni yul med pas/_/nus pa dang ni mi ldan phyir/_/des na mngon gsal sbyor med pas/_/bzung ba skyed [#]par mi 'khrul pa/_/sgra yi [#]shes pa 'di 'bras 'gyur/_/bum sogs gsal ba'i blo bzhin no/_/de phyir rtsol dang brjod 'dod pas/_/skyed dang
[\[95a.3\]]mngon par gsal ba ni/_/nus pa'i bye brag thams cad du/_/'bras bu'i don gyis [#]mtshungs nges 'gyur/_/nam mkha'i cha nyid sun dbyung bar/_/rig [#]pa 'ga' zhig ji snyed pa/_/phyogs cha la yang ma lus par/_/de ni mkhas pas [#]shes par bya/_/yul yang legs
[\[95a.4\]]par byed pa na/_/de yis gcig la legs byas min/_/spangs nyid phyir dang nus nges phyir/_/des na yul legs byas pa min/_/shes pa skyed rung nyid min na/_/kun gyis sgra 'di thams cad du/_/nam yang rtogs par mi 'gyur te/_/de shes pa la mi mkho'i phyir/_/shes
[\[95a.5\]]pa skyed par nus yin na/_/shes rgyu nyid du gnas pa'i phyir/_/kun gyis sgra 'di yul kun dang /_/dus kun du ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/de ni nus sam mi nus pa/_/rang bzhin gyis gcig bdag nyid gnas/_/'gal ba 'am ni lhan cig byed/_/su zhig gis don 'jig byed
[\[95a.6\]]nus/_/'ga' zhig la ni shes skyed par/_/rung ba nyid du 'di 'gyur te/_/de phyir skyed par 'gyur ba na/_/'di ni kun gyis rtogs 'gyur min/_/'on kyang ngag la nyer gnas pa/_/sgra tsam gyis gang legs byas 'gyur/_/de rnams nyid kyis sgra thos la/_/ring na gnas
[\[95a.7\]]pas ji ltar min/_/nye bar gnas pa'ang [#]legs byas ni/_/rgyu ru yongs su brtag [#]pa yin/_/ring du gnas na'ang de dag la/_/legs par byas la'ang mtshungs pa yin/_/gal te sgra tsam rnams la ni/_/khyad par legs byas skyes rtogs na/_/de tshe sgra ni skyed pa ru/_/sus
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]kyang spong bar [#]byed nus min/_/sgra las khyad par can legs byas/_/de tha mi dad can yin te/_/sgra shes bya nyid mi 'gyur phyir/_/des na sgra yang skye bar 'gyur/_/lan cig sgra ni legs byas nas[#]/_/bdag ni de ni nam du yang /_/spong bar byed min mi rtag par/_/thal 'gyur
[\[95b.2\]]phyir te rtag dmigs 'gyur/_/gnyis ka legs byas phyogs la yang /_/nyes pa gnyis tshig bden pa yin/_/gang phyir gang rung ma tshang med/_/snga ma'i rang bzhin rjes 'jug phyir/_/'di ltar sngar ni gsal byed kyis/_/rna ba'i yi ge legs byas gang /_/de dag 'jig min
[\[95b.3\]]'pho thob phyir/_/des na kun gyis kun thos 'gyur/_/skyes bu 'ga' la thos rung bar/_/rna ba yig legs byas she na/_/de tshe yig gzhan rtogs pa pos/_/rna ba las byung shes 'gyur min/_/de rig mi yi rnam shes ni/_/rung bar legs par byas she na/_/de dag nyid kyi [#]rjes 'jug
[\[95b.4\]]na/_/de dag kyang ni thos par 'gyur/_/ldog na khyed la yig rna ba/_/'di dag gzhan thob cis [#]mi 'gyur/_/des na de dag rnams la ni/_/rtag pa nyid 'dod rgyu mtshan med/_/gang phyir gzugs brnyan blo kun ni/_/dmigs pa med par gnas pas na/_/chu la sogs par
[\[95b.5\]]nyi ma 'od/_/gcig ni du mar snang ba min/_/ci phyir khyed kyi phyogs la yang /_/blo rnams rnam pa med par gnas/_/phyi rol don ni rnam pa dang /_/ldan pa zhes ni khas blangs yin/_/gzugs brnyan de yang chu yi ni/_/nang du snang bar 'gyur ba yin/_/nam mkha'i dkyil
[\[95b.6\]]na snang ba yi/_/nyi ma de ltar gnas min na/_/de ni ci phyir de ltar snang /_/'khrul pas she na de nyid kyis[#]/_/de ni gsal bar dmigs med de/_/de yi ngo bo'i don med phyir/_/de nyid gzhan du rtog ce na/_/'di ni legs par smras pa yin/_/'on kyang de nyid gzhan yin
[\[95b.7\]]na/_/des na kun gyis kun rig 'gyur/_/gal te ji ltar gnas snang [#]na/_/de ni rtogs par 'gyur ba yin/_/rnam pa gzhan du dmigs pa na/_/de ni mthong bar ji ltar 'gyur/_/gang phyir rnam [#]bcas shes la yang /_/de shes don dang mthun pa yi/_/rnam pa yod par snang ba
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]dang /_/shes pa de ni 'dzin par rigs/_/brgyud nas bkod par gyur pas na/_/'og na gnas pa rtogs su chud/_/gcig nyid yin pas steng gnas pa/_/ci ste 'og na gnas snyam sems/_/gal te ji ltar nyi ma gnas/_/de ltar de ni snang 'gyur [#]na/_/_
[\[96a.2\]]de rtogs [#]par ni brtag [#]bya yin/_/gzhan du min zhes bstan zin to/_/shar du song 'jug pa yis ni/_/nub phyogs song 'jug la bkod pas/_/gdong mthong ba na 'khrul pa yin/_/nub phyogs lta bar rtogs pa min[#]/_/gzugs brnyan yul can rnam par shes/_/_
[\[96a.3\]]de ni rang bzhin dmigs min [#]te/_/de dang mi mthun snang ba'i phyir/_/ro dang sgra sogs sems bzhin no/_/gang phyir me long chung ngu la/_/gdong ni chung ngur snang bar 'gyur/_/shing sogs thur du [#]bltas nas ni/_/chu gang zhugs pa 'brel gzhan min/_/nyan pa po yang gzhan
[\[96a.4\]]ma yin/_/ngo bo gcig tu nges pa ni/_/gnyis ka la yang rjes 'jug phyir/_/smra ba po [#]yi sngar med pa'i/_/'brel pa nyan pos ji ltar rtogs/_/de yis [#]sngon du gang dmigs pa/_/de nyid de yis byas pa yin/_/gang phyir rnam pa gcig rtogs pa'i/_/blo ni de la 'jug
[\[96a.5\]]pa min/_/de phyir sgra sogs tha dad kyang /_/gcig pu nyid du de [#]nges yin/_/bum pa sogs kyi spyi yang ni/_/sngar nyid gsal [#]bar byas zin to/_/'byung po'i mgul chings lta bu [#]ni/_/spyi 'ga' zhig ni snang mi 'gyur/_/'di la spyi yis chu 'dzin sogs/_/nus pa
[\[96a.6\]]grub pa ma yin no/_/gal te spyi dang dbyer med na/_/de dag kyang ni rtag nyid 'gyur/_/tha dad 'brel med skyon yin te/_/de las byung na mi rtag 'gyur/_/de phyir spyi las chu 'dzin sogs/_/nus pa yod par rigs pa min/_/bum sogs la nus tha dad na'ang /_/nyes pa
[\[96a.7\]]'di dag nyes par 'gyur/_/chu [#]'dzin la sogs de'i 'bras bu/_/rtag pa kho nar thal bar 'gyur/_/nus pa nyid ni 'brel yin pas/_/'di tha dad mi 'dod ce na/_/nus las dbye ba med pa'i phyir/_/sgra dang don dag gcig nyid 'gyur/_/tha dad na yang de la ni/_/de dag dang
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]'brel 'ga' yang med/_/de las byung na de nyid min/_/dngos las [#]gzhan du 'gro sa med/_/gang phyir 'brel pa ci 'dra ba/_/de 'dra yod par gsal byas pas/_/de phyir 'brel pa brjod dus su/_/ba lang sogs sgra brjod pa na/_/'ga' zhig gis ni 'brel pa'i blo[#]/_/don
[\[96b.2\]]rtogs gzhan gyis de bzhin min/_/dngos [#]kyi 'brel pa yod pa na/_/kun gyi don ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/rtag pa'i nus pa kho na yi/_/'brel pa ru ni khyed [#]kyis 'dod/_/de yang tshad med la nges par/_/don rtogs skyed dam yang na ni[#]/_/nges par tshad med pa skyed na/_/ci
[\[96b.3\]]phyir kun gyis don ma rtogs/_/tshad bcas skyed na'ang rgyu mtshan ci/_/ngo bo nyid kyis de lta bur/_/rang bzhin zhe na brda bzung ba'i/_/sngon du'am de ni brjod na yang /_/rtogs pa po ni gcig nyid la/_/ci phyir rnam shes 'jug pa min/_/de shes skyed pa'i nges pa can/_/de ni
[\[96b.4\]]nus pa gnas phyir ro/_/'on te nus pa rtogs byas nyid/_/de la skyed par nges brtags [#]na/_/rtogs par byas dang ma byas dang /_/tha dad ce na rtag [#]nyid nyams/_/gcig nyid na ni rgyu mtshan cis/_/rnam par dbye ba 'di brjod yin/_/gzhan yang thabs gang zhig gis ni/_/nus pa
[\[96b.5\]]shes par [#]'dod pa yin/_/don gyis go bas shes she na/_/gang phyir rigs pa 'di ltar gnas/_/mngon sum gyi ni sgra dang ni/_/rgan rabs brjod bya mthong ba yin/_/nyan pa po la rtogs pa nyid/_/bya bas rjes su dpag nas shes/_/de la brtan [#]pa'i nus pa ni/_/gzhan du mi
[\[96b.6\]]'thad pa yis rtogs/_/don gyis go bas rtogs 'gyur te/_/tshad ma gsum can 'brel pa'o/_/gzhan du 'thad pa kho na'i phyir/_/nus pa rtogs par mi nus te/_/gang phyir brda las byung sgra yis/_/don rtogs 'khrul pa med pa yin/_/nus pa rtag nyid phyogs la ni/_/brda
[\[96b.7\]]sogs cung zad la ltos med/_/des na sgra don gyis rtogs pa/_/rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin/_/brda ni gzhan ma'i ngo bo yis/_/ka li ma ri sogs sgra bzhin/_/sgra la nges pa'i nus yod phyir/_/don gzhan rtogs par mi 'gyur te/_/gal te sna tshogs don gsal
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]phyir/_/nus pa gcig tu 'dod pa na/_/tha dad ce na sgra gcig gis/_/cig car sna tshogs don rig [#]'gyur/_/don ni gsal bar byed nus pa/_/rtag pa kho nar gnas pa'i phyir/_/de rgyu don la rtogs pa yang /_/thams cad la ni gtan du 'gyur/_/_
[\[97a.2\]]de la brda la ltos pa can/_/nus par brtags pa [#]yin zhe na/_/de ni phan 'dogs la ltos min/_/mi g.yo bas de phan gdags med/_/don ni gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu/_/brda ni mi la brten pa'i phyir/_/mis ma byas pa'i nus pa yang /_/log pa [#]nyid ni srid pa yin/_/_
[\[97a.3\]]sna tshogs don ni gsal byed pa'i/_/nus pa sgra gcig la yod na/_/me la sbyin sreg la sogs don/_/thams cad kun la nyer mkho min/_/de 'dod phyin ci log don ni/_/gsal bar byed pa'ang srid pa'i phyir/_/des na sgra don 'brel brtag par/_/brtags [#]pa don med can
[\[97a.4\]]yin no/_/brda yang ltos par byed pa na/_/brtags par nus pa'i mtshan nyid can/_/rgyu mtshan med pa'i 'brel pa 'di/_/ci phyir yongs su gso [#]ba yin/_/grub pa nyer gzhag pa la ni/_/brda ni ma rtogs par bya gzhan/_/don rtogs pa ru byed pa ni/_/de la cung zad kyang
[\[97a.5\]]snang min/_/'di ltar brda ni med pa na/_/tha snyad 'di ni mthong ma yin/_/de las 'brel pa grub ce na/_/brgyud pa 'di ni don med 'gyur/_/skyes bu 'dod tsam las byung ba'i/_/brda ni 'ba' zhig las kyang ni/_/tha snyad kyang ni [#]rigs yin te/_/des na 'brel pa mi 'grub po/_/_
[\[97a.6\]]gzhan du yang ni 'thad par ni/_/tha snyad la ni dogs par 'gyur/_/dbang po las 'das 'brel pa ni/_/mi rnams kyis ni rtogs ma yin/_/thams cad kyis ni mi shes pas/_/snga ma snga ma ma grags phyir/_/'brel pa ma grub ces bya bas/_/de ltar de cis yongs su
[\[97a.7\]]brtags/_/des na ba lang rta sogs kyis/_/sgra ni rtag pa'i 'brel ldan min/_/brda la ltos bcas nyid kyi phyir/_/ga bi la sogs sgra bzhin no/_/rung ba'i ba lang sgra yod na/_/de [#]nus min skyes kyis btsud [#]byas/_/ga bi sogs las ba lang blo/_/rtsa ba'i sgra rjes
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]'brangs she na/_/de min nya [#]pa sogs rnams kyis/_/legs par sbyar ba mi rtogs phyir/_/rtsa ba [#]sgra yis rjes 'brangs pa'i[#]/_/ji ltar dor [#]gyi blo 'byung 'gyur/_/de ltar [#]sgra don gyis 'brel pa/_/rtag par khas blangs par ma byas/_/de ni brda las byung rigs yin/_
[\[97b.2\]]rnam pa kun du de srid phyir/_/yang na yul zhig [#]rigs rgyud ni/_/chad pa'i ngo bo thim pa yin/_/sangs rgyas pas 'dod 'dod med gang /_/tshangs la sogs la'ang yod par dogs/_/de yod na ni rig byed la/_/'jig rtsa'i blo ni srid pa yin/_/log pa'i gti mug
[\[97b.3\]]rgyags sogs pas[#]/_/phyin ci log rtog gzhan yang srid/_/de dang 'dra bar 'gyur ba yin[#]/_/rig byed gzhan nyid du ni 'gyur/_/ji srid gnod pa can ma bstan/_/de srid de ni dogs par 'gyur/_/gzhan du byed pa'i 'dod yod kyang /_/sgra ni 'jug par mi 'gyur na/_/de
[\[97b.4\]]bzhin gal te mi rnams la/_/gzhan du byed 'dod mi skye na/_/de tshe rig byed 'di gzhung dang /_/don ni gzhan bdag nyid mi rtogs/_/gzhan du byed pa'i don [#]'jug na/_/dogs pa ldog par mi 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu thams cad dag gis ni/_/sngar grub rim pa bzung ba [# ]
[\[97b.5\]]yin/_/tshig ngag yi ge'i rim pa yis/_/rang dbang gis kyang byed par 'gyur/_/gzhan du khyed la rig byed bzhin/_/gzhung 'ga' byas par mi 'gyur ro/_/des na de bzhin don med pa'i/_/gzhung tsam la yang byas med 'gyur[#]/_/ji ltar gzhan dag gis brjod pa/_/_
[\[97b.6\]]des na de ni brjod 'dod ces/_/des ni nges pa ma yin te/_/des na 'brel bzhin thog med yin/_/gzhan gyis brjod pa bdag gis brjod/_/brjod par 'dod pa de 'drar 'gyur/_/mtshungs pa'i rtogs pa'i 'khrul pa yis/_/las kyi bye brag ji bzhin no/_/dbyangs la sogs pa
[\[97b.7\]]mi mthun phyir/_/gzhan gyis brjod pa brjod bya min/_/yi ge'i bdag nyid du snang phyir/_/gsal byar byed pa'i chos 'di min/_/des na mi re yig tha dad/_/snang ba yin te bum sogs bzhin/_/de phyir tha dad gsal bas na/_/de yi mtshan ma ci ste dgag_/rigs kyis
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]bum pa la sogs la/_/tha snyad nye bar mtshon pa ni/_/de med pas na sngar bkag yin/_/gsal ba dang de mi ldan phyir/_/de phyir rkan [#]la sogs pa'i rigs/_/skyes bu thams cad la gnas min/_/des na smra po de rnams kyis/_/sgra tsam nyer mtshon
[\[98a.2\]]bskul ba min/_/de phyir ji srid yig yod pa/_/sgra tsam gyi rigs tha dad ni/_/sgra sngon [#]gsal ba'i rgyur 'jug pa'am/_/yang na gsal ba de ldan min/_/des na rkan sogs ldan pa dang /_/rnam dbye'i rim pa sngon 'gro can/_/khyed la sgra tsam go rims dang /_/rigs kyis gnyis
[\[98a.3\]]ka'i rtag nyid med/_/ji ltar skor ba sogs rnams kyi/_/cha rigs sogs kyis mtshon byas min/_/rim pa'i rjes 'jug 'gyur de ltar/_/rkan sogs sgra tsam yig rten min/_/phra ba nyid phyir gsal rnams la/_/rigs kyi chos ni nges bzung dang /_/yang de'i dbang gis don
[\[98a.4\]]rnams la/_/khyab nyid yin [#]yang rim mi 'dzin[#]/_/des na sgra tsam gyi [#]yon tan/_/thams cad rtag nyid du gnas pa/_/yi ge'i rjes su byed pa na/_/don gyis [#]dbye ba rtogs ma yin/_/gzhan yang ji srid yig [#]yod pa/_/sgra tsam rigs tha dad sgra la/_/mngon par gsal ba'i
[\[98a.5\]]rgyur 'jug pa'am/_/yang na gsal ba de ldan na/_/des na gsal byed yod pa'i phyir/_/sgra ni rtag tu dmigs par 'gyur/_/des na khyod [#]la gsal rim gyis/_/bdag nyid yi ge'i rim rigs min/_/gsal ba dang 'brel ngo bo ru/_/rigs rnams gnas par gyur pa na/_/_
[\[98a.6\]]gsal ba rnams la'ang rtag pa nyid/_/bzlog par dka' bar thal bar 'gyur/_/rigs dang 'brel pa'i ngo bo ru/_/gsal ba rnams kyang gnas yin na/_/rigs la'ang mi rtag nyid du ni/_/khyed mi 'dod kyang thal bar 'gyur/_/mngon par gsal bar mi 'thad par/_/sngar ni bstan
[\[98a.7\]]par byas zin pas/_/de ltar rtogs par byed pa ni/_/khyed kyi yi ge'i rtogs [#]byed min/_/dus gcig khyab cing rtag pa yang /_/sngar ni bkag pa kho na yin/_/dngos po kun la yi ge bzhin/_/'ga' zhig gis gsal byas ma yin/_/yi ge rnams ni gsal byas [#]na/_/'di ni rtogs
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]pa'i yan lag min/_/gzhan las khyad par med phyir dang /_/gzhan du med phyir de rtag min/_/des na yi ge'i go rims dang /_/thung dang ring dang ches ring dang [#]/_/de dag dus kyi rnam dbye bas/_/sgra tsam khyad par can dus kyi/_/rnam dbye de dag rigs ma yin/_/de phyir khyed la rtag
[\[98b.2\]]pa yi/_/de 'dra'i tshig gi chos yod min/_/des na yi ge mi rtag par/_/smra la tshig ni mi rtag grub/_/gal te gsal byed rkyen rnams kyis/_/'dir ni gsal bar rigs 'gyur na/_/gzhan gyi chos kyang yan lag nyid/_/rta yi shugs sogs bzhin du 'gyur/_/sgra kun rtag
[\[98b.3\]]pa nyid la ni/_/don gyis [#]go ba sun phyung zin/_/mi rtag kyang ni don rtogs [#]pa'i/_/rgyu nyid du ni bsgrub par byas/_/gang zhig gang gis brjod 'dod las/_/'byung bar brjod 'dod gzhan pa las/_/yi ge skye bar 'gyur ba ni/_/de yi rjes thogs la [#]de thos/_/snga ma'i yi ge rtogs byung
[\[98b.4\]]ba'i/_/yang dag rig pa myur thos min/_/myur du thos pa ma yin pa/_/de ni de dran la ltos nas/_/phyi nas rang nyid dran par byed/_/de dag skye dang 'dzin pa yi/_/shes pa dag la brten nas ni/_/skyes bus byas pa'i yig go rims/_/'di ni skyed dang rgyu [#]nyid yin/_/de phyir tshig [# ]
[\[98b.5\]]rnams so so la/_/yig rnams tha dad ces ni gsal/_/'dul bsnyon lcug ma shing ta la/_/zhes sogs rim pa'i bye brag phyir/_/de dag de 'dra'i rim pa yis/_/don tha dad pa ston byed yin/_/de nyid phyir na gsal ba yi/_/de ni don rtogs ched du ni/_/sgra pa rnams kyis [#]yongs
[\[98b.6\]]su brtags/_/yi ge kho nas rtogs nus pas/_/der ni brtags pa don med yin/_/snang ba ma mthong ba yi phyir/_/'di ni med par [#]nges par 'gyur/_/'di ni mi snang ba yin na/_/rtags [#]bzhin shes par byed par 'gyur/_/yod pa tsam gyis de shes la/_/rgyu yi ngo bor gnas pa'i
[\[98b.7\]]phyir/_/de ni shes byed 'dod ce na/_/mi bzhin rtag tu shes byed 'gyur/_/de bzhin brda ni ma gtogs [#]dang /_/yi ge rnams ni ma thos kyang /_/de las byung ba'i don shes ni/_/'byung 'gyur [#]nus rgyu nyer gnas phyir/_/'di ltar 'di ni rtag yod pa/_/'di la ltos pa cung zad med/_/_
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]sgra tsam brda yig rnams kyis kyang /_/de gsal ma yin ma mthong phyir/_/shes pa gsal ba yin zhes bshad/_/de yi shes pa rig ma yin/_/des na gsal bar byed 'di la/_/brtag [#]pa nyid kyang don med 'gyur/_/sgra tsam gyis ni legs byas can/_/_
[\[99a.2\]]yongs su smin pa skyed pa na/_/mtha' ma'i sgra dang lhan cig tu/_/sgra ni blo la snang bar 'gyur/_/de ltar de yang de yis 'dir/_/rgyu mtshan med par brtags pa yin/_/de la yang ni sgra gzhan la/_/snang bar 'gyur bar [#]mtshon ma yin/_/gang dag gis kyang gsal ba la/_/rim
[\[99a.3\]]gyis 'byung ba sgra tsam gyis/_/skye ba nyid dang gsal ba nyid/_/sems pa de dag la rim 'gal/_/cha shas med la rim gyis ni/_/skye ba dang gsal 'thad pa yin/_/ngo bo gcig las phyi med phyir[#]/_/de dag rtag tu 'gyur ba yin/_/cha shas bcas pa nyid yin pas/_/ji ltar
[\[99a.4\]]yig res don ston min/_/gsal cha'ang cis na de ltar min/_/ma mthong gsal cha ci phyir brtags/_/gal te sgra gcig gis lhan cig_/skyed dang gsal bar byas she na/_/shin tu gsal [#]grub pa yi phyir/_/yi ge gzhan ni sbyor ba yin/_/gang phyir 'dogs dka' 'di yi ni/_/_
[\[99a.5\]]rang bzhin de ni de ltar byas/_/mtshungs pa'i dus ldan yig gzhan gyis/_/slar yang mngon par gsal bar byed/_/de nyid dam ni gzhan gcig gis/_/ci phyir bzlas [#]nas yang dang yang /_/gsal ba bzlog [#]par mi byed de/_/de la khyed med phyir min nam/_/yul dang dbang po legs byas
[\[99a.6\]]pa'i/_/ngo bo gsal ba 'di la yang /_/yi ge bzhin du dgag bya ste/_/de snang sems ni yod na yang /_/de yi phyir na mngon sum gyi/_/rim gyis rtogs la phyi [#]nas gang /_/ma lus yi ge rnam shes pa/_/de yi don shes rgyu can yin/_/tha ma'i yi ge rnams rtogs nas[#]/_/legs
[\[99a.7\]]byas thams cad kyis byas pas/_/yi ge rnams la cig car du/_/dran pa thams cad skye bar 'gyur/_/rim gyis shes pa yod na yang /_/smra ba po ni thams cad kyis/_/don rnams thams cad dag la ni/_/de ni yid bsdus shes par 'dod/_/rim par snang ba de nyid ni[#]/_/khas
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]len byed pa min zhe na/_/brgya la sogs pa'i ngo bo ni/_/de bsdus shes pa skye mi 'gyur/_/gal te des na yig rim pa/_/rna [#]ba yid kyi sngar shes pa/_/skye 'gyur yang na phyi nas ni/_/cig car dran shes 'byung bar 'gyur/_/des na yi ge der gnas min/_/ring na gnas pa rtogs pa'i
[\[99b.2\]]phyir/_/des na sgra las don gyi [#]blo/_/'jig rten pa rnams kyis mchod 'gyur/_/rnam pa dang bcas shes pa ni/_/thams cad de ni rigs pa yin/_/de lta min na 'jig 'gyur ba/_/dran pa la ni ji ltar [#]snang /_/'on te yi ge mi snang ba'i/_/gsal ba can sngar rtogs 'gyur ba/_/_
[\[99b.3\]]gnas pa kho na dran zhe na/_/de min gsal snang thal 'gyur phyir/_/gnas pa sngar ni bsal [#]zin te/_/de ni gnas na'ang yi ge yi/_/nyams myong shes pa'i dus nyid du/_/dran pa skyes gyur [#]rgyu gcig phyir/_/ba lang zhes bya'i blo gcig nyid/_/kho bo cag gis bkag byas min/_/de
[\[99b.4\]]'dzin don gcig nyid dag gis/_/sgra la blo gcig 'gyur ba yin/_/ba lang sgra la de yod kyang /_/myur phyir bar mtshams chung ba'i phyir/_/lha sbyin la sogs sgra la ni/_/dbye ba gsal bar rtogs par 'gyur/_/yi ge las byung don blo de/_/de shes pa yi rjes las skyes/_/de
[\[99b.5\]]'dra de ni de las byung /_/du ba sogs las me blo bzhin/_/yig las tha dad sgra snang ba/_/shes pa rjes thogs 'byung ba can/_/don gyi blo ni rig pa min/_/des na sgra bzhin rjod byed med/_/'bras bu'i tha snyad kyi yan lag_/rjes su 'gro dang ldog pa dag_/thams cad du ni nges byas
[\[99b.6\]]pa/_/des na khyab pa 'dir nges yin/_/yi ge mi rtag nyid la ni/_/rjod byed nyid du bsgrubs zin to/_/rtag pa'i sgrub [#]pa ngo shes dang /_/rjes dpag dag kyang bsal zin to/_/mi shes pas rang tshig sogs dang /_/'gal bar rtsod par byas pa yin/_/gang phyir rtag pa'i phyogs la
[\[99b.7\]]ni/_/khyed la de kun 'grub par 'gyur/_/rtag pa'i ngag ni yod pa na/_/gsal byed rigs min dpyad zin te/_/go rims la sogs mi ldan dang /_/rtag tu ma dmigs pa yi phyir/_/chos can tha dad ma brtags par/_/gzhi ma grub par [#]gang brjod de/_/rjes dpag mtshan nyid mi shes
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]phyir/_/gang phyir snang 'gyur chos can yin/_/nya ba la sogs rnams la yang /_/ma dpyad rab tu grub don gang /_/shes pa la ni gang snang ba/_/de tsam chos can nyid du bshad/_/de nyid la ni rtsod pa 'di/_/smra po rnams la 'jug pa yin/_/'dod pas
[\[100a.2\]]bkod pa'i bye brag la/_/rtsod pa su la'ang [#]yod ma yin/_/des na khyad par med bstan pa/_/khyad par du ni rnam rtog pa/_/rjes su dpag pa thams cad kyi[#]/_/'jug pa kho na la gnod 'gyur/_/bskul ba'i las ni skyes pa'i blo/_/tshad ma yin te skyon bral ba'i/_/rgyu rnams kyis ni skyed nyid
[\[100a.3\]]phyir/_/zhes bya sogs kyang rnam dpyad bya/_/dag cing rtag pa'i don 'brel pa'i/_/bskul ba'i las ni skyes pa'i blo/_/phyogs yin zhe na gzhan brten nas/_/gzhi ma grub par thal bar 'gyur/_/de yi gnas skabs rtag pa nyid/_/de las gzhan pa mi rtag yin/_/de yi gnas
[\[100a.4\]]skabs nyid log na/_/ci zhig gnas par 'dod pa yin/_/dbang po 'ba' zhig gis bzung [#]nyid/_/gtan tshigs su ni 'dir rtog na/_/sngar gnod byas pa'i rigs kyis ni/_/'khrul par rtog [#]pa ma yin no/_/rang gi snang ba'i dbang shes la/_/rgyu yin dbang pos bzung bar 'dod/_/_
[\[100a.5\]]rtag pa rgyu nyid ma yin par/_/der [#]ni rab tu bsgrubs zin to/_/de 'dra'i don la rgyu nyid ni/_/thams cad la yang grub pa yin/_/de lta min [#]na du sogs la'ang /_/kun la rnam par brtag [#]'di mtshungs/_/kho bo cag la kun rdzob pa'i/_/so sor brtags 'gog [#]la sogs pa/_/_
[\[100a.6\]]brtsal [#]ma thag 'byung shes 'bras bu/_/rtsom byed nyid du'ang grub pa min/_/'gog pa dag ni 'jig bdag nyid/_/'dod min gang phyir zag bcas pas/_/so sor brtags pas 'gog pa gang /_/bral ba 'ang [#]so so so so yin/_/skye ba [#]gtan du gegs byed pa/_/'gog
[\[100a.7\]]gzhan so sor brtags min pas/_/de phyir grub mtha' mi shes pa/_/log pa'i nga rgyal gyis ni bslad[#]/_/rang bzhin med phyir 'gog dang mkhas/_/brtsal [#]ma thag las byung ba min/_/gyo mo snang ba'i tshogs sogs ni/_/de ltar shes pa'i rgyu mtshan yin/_/don gcig rang
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]gi rang bzhin la/_/ngo bo gnyis nyid gsal bar byas/_/de phyir rigs zhes bya ba'i sgra/_/rtag pa bum 'di la grub min/_/de yi gnas skabs nyid spong tsam/_/mi rtag bsgrub bya nyid du ni/_/'dod pa yin te mar me sogs/_/de la dpe ni gsal ba ni/_/'bar sogs skad cig
[\[100b.2\]]re rer yang /_/'jig nyid ma grub ma [#]yin nam/_/der ni cha shas phra mo ni/_/yul gzhan du ni song ba yin/_/sdong bu phyogs la mang [#]du ni/_/'bar ba bsdus nas gnas pa yin/_/de la ji srid gyen song ba/_/de srid 'bar ba zhes rtogs yin/_/de yang 'das
[\[100b.3\]]nas gang song ba/_/de ni 'od kyi bdag nyid yin/_/de rjes la ni gang song ba/_/de ni [#]phra phyir nges bzung [#]min/_/yan lag phyi [#]mas lam bkag pas/_/nang ma 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar phyi mas go phye ba/_/nang ma de lta [#]de ltar 'gro/_/des na 'gro ba yin yang
[\[100b.4\]]nges/_/rtswa sogs sreg par mi byed do/_/zhe na de ni brtags pa tsam/_/tshad ma ma smras pa yi phyir/_/gzhan yang nus ma nyams de dag_/rtswa dang ras bal sogs phrad na/_/sreg par byed par [#]thal 'gyur 'di/_/snga ma bzhin du ldog mi 'gyur/_/gzhan du nus dang mi nus
[\[100b.5\]]pa'i/_/gang tshe rang bzhin dbye yod na/_/de tshe rtag dngos de dag la/_/de ni ji ltar [#]yod par 'gyur/_/'brel pa la yang rtag pa nyid/_/sngar ni bkag pa byas pa yin/_/des ni 'brel byar mi 'dod pa'i/_/rigs pas ngag rtag rigs ma yin/_/ji lta bu [#]yi ngag la ni/_/rtag pa
[\[100b.6\]]nyid du khas blangs byas/_/yi ge tsam gyis [#]bdag nyid dam/_/yig rim yang na tha dad yin/_/rim med yi ge rnams la ni/_/brjod pa nyid med de yis ni/_/de dag de 'dra'i ngag ma yin/_/de dag la ni rim pa'ang med/_/khyab pa'i phyir dang rtag nyid phyir/_/de dag la ni yul dus
[\[100b.7\]]rim/_/me tog 'bras bu sogs dbye bzhin/_/yig bris bzhin du 'thad ma yin/_/de dag rang bzhin rim yod pa/_/mtsho ro [#]zhes bya nyid srid na/_/phyi nas ro mtsho sogs mi 'gyur/_/brtan pa'i rim pa dang 'gal phyir/_/gang phyir yi ge rnam rtag par/_/brjod par byas pa de yi
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]phyir/_/rim gzhan gnas pa'i ro mtsho sogs/_/rim pa gzhan la skye mi 'gyur/_/de ltar min khyod kyis smras pa'i/_/ngo shes pa ni rtag pa dang /_/gcig nyid sgrub par byed pa po/_/'khrul ba can du 'gyur ba yin/_/tha dad pa la'ang [#]'jug pa'i phyir/_/_
[\[101a.2\]]gsal ba'i rim pa'ang ngag min te/_/rtag pa'i [#]bkag pa bsal byas phyir[#]/_/ngag ni 'thad pa ma yin pas/_/de phyir rtag pa nyid mi rigs/_/ji ltar 'phel ba la sogs sgra/_/'dod pas bkod pa'i don can rnams/_/mtho ris mchod sbyin la sogs sgra/_/de bzhin du yang bsrings pa
[\[101a.3\]]yin/_/rang nyid kyis byas gtam ngo bo'i/_/zlos gar gtam rgyud la sogs pa/_/rtag pa'i sgra dang don 'brel pa/_/brjod 'dod yang dag par yod min/_/de la'ang nus rtag nyid yod de/_/nges sbyor mi rtag nyid yin pas/_/der gnas mi rtag nyid [#]kyi phyir/_/nus la [#]'khrul 'jug
[\[101a.4\]]'gyur zhe na/_/de la sun dbyung phyi rol don/_/med pa nyid ni ma yin nam/_/don gang la ni nus par brtags/_/rnam rtog gzugs brnyan la zhe na/_/de bzhin rig [#]byed la yang mtshungs/_/dbang po las 'das don 'brel pa'i/_/nus pa su zhig gis rtogs 'gyur/_/de phyir rig
[\[101a.5\]]byed la nges sbyor/_/mi la rag las pa'ang rigs [#]min/_/rgan po la yang de rtogs min/_/de dag mi shes rang bzhin gnas/_/skyes bu la brten bshad pa las/_/rtogs pa de ni srid pa yin/_/byas pa'i lung la brgal brtags [#]pa/_/'di ni mtshungs pa ma yin nam/_/_
[\[101a.6\]]der min de [#]ni dad pas sam/_/don la the tshom za bas 'jug_/mngon sum dang ni rjes dpag pas/_/yul ni rnam par brtags yod pas/_/rig byed sgra ni de lta min/_/gang phyir de ni rang las shes/_/byas pa'i don can gtam gyi [#]chos/_/ma mthong ngo bo thos las mtshungs/_/_
[\[101a.7\]]de ltar rig byed ma 'brel pa/_/gzhan dag gis 'dir smras pa yin/_/sgra don thog [#]med spang byas nas/_/'brel pa thob [#]med rgyu mtshan nyid/_/gzhan yod ma yin des na 'di/_/rig byed la ni 'brel sogs med/_/thabs dang bral ba nyid kyis na[#]/_/'brel pa byar med rjes su dpag_/_
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]bshad pa byar med rjes dpag ni/_/mthong ba nyid kyis 'gal bar 'gyur/_/rgan po rnams kyi rtogs pa ni/_/yang dang yang du snang 'gyur ba/_/thabs yin zhes par [#]rtogs brten nas/_/de nyams pa ni mi 'grub ci/_/gal te rig byed don la nges/_/rgan po rnams las mi slu bar/_/grub
[\[101b.2\]]par gyur na de dag kun/_/de ltar 'gyur gyi gzhan du nyams/_/thams cad bsdus pa'i khyab pa ni/_/grub phyir 'dus pa can nyid kyi/_/rtags la mi mthun sgrub pa ni/_/cung zad srid pa ma yin no/_/don bcas rnam dbye'i don can gyi/_/khyad par rim pa dang ldan pa/_/tshig dang ngag gi
[\[101b.3\]]tshogs zhes bya/_/yi ge kho na de ltar bshad/_/don bcas rnam dbye'i don can gyi/_/khyad par rim dang ldan nyid ni/_/skyes bus ma byas la bkag zin/_/des na khyab pa gnod med yin/_/rig byed 'don pa brjod nyid la/_/de ltar khyab pa nges pa med/_/des na sgrub pa 'di la ni/_/ldog la [#]the tshom bsal [# ]
[\[101b.4\]]bar yod/_/de ltar rim pa byed pa yi/_/mi ni nus med nges byas na/_/'dir ni khyab pa 'di 'grub ste/_/de ni nges par mi nus so/_/ma lus mi yi chos rnams ni/_/mngon sum du ni byas yin na/_/nges pa kho na skye ba yin/_/'di ni thams cad khyed la dad/_/rig byed skyes
[\[101b.5\]]bus byas nyid du/_/yod par gsal ba srid pa yin/_/'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang /_/srog chags 'tshe dang brdzun bshad pa/_/brjod dka' nyid dang thung brjod nyid/_/'brel med nyid dang mi snyan sogs/_/rig byed chos rnams tshad smra pa'i/_/tshig la yang ni yod par
[\[101b.6\]]snang /_/dug sel nus pa la sogs pa[#]/_/bden pa cung zad gang snang ba/_/de ni mkha' lding bya sogs snang /_/gzhan yang rnam pa 'di yis ni/_/skyes bus byas pa cung zad med/_/gang phyir bde gshegs kyis gsungs pa'i/_/gsung la'ang [#]de ltar rjes dpag nus/_/de yis
[\[101b.7\]]mngon gsal [#]byas dngos phyir/_/des byas pa zhes brjod par bya/_/byed pa dran pa de la yang /_/de ni don brjod rgyu mtshan nyid/_/de ltar gzhan mi 'dod ce na/_/rigs pa mtshungs phyir ces mi 'dod/_/de ltar gzhan mi 'dod par zad/_/rigs pas de bzhin dogs pa yin/_/thams
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]cad du ni skyes bu rnams/_/phal cher brdzun ni smra ba yin/_/ji ltar da [#]ltar yid mi ches/_/de bzhin 'das pa'i don bstan la/_/de ltar de yi khyed smras pa'i/_/rigs par gzhung lugs 'ga' la yang /_/byed po cung zad grub min te/_/rang nyid byas par brjod
[\[102a.2\]]na yang /_/des na skyes bus ma byas la/_/bden par re ba 'di dor cig_/gang phyir rig byed don 'gal ba'i/_/don ni de dag las bstan yin/_/gzhan yang thog med grub na yang /_/des kyang mis ma byas mi 'grub/_/de las ma byas par 'grub na/_/lung gzhan rnams kyang
[\[102a.3\]]ma byas 'gyur/_/'di ltar par sig la sogs pa'i/_/tha snyad rnams ni gzhan brten pa'i/_/chad par smra ba'i grub mtha' yang /_/gzhan gyis 'dus byas pa las byung /_/de 'dra'i ma byas nyid grub kyang /_/yod la nan tan ci zhig yod/_/khyed kyi 'bad pa ma lus ni/_/yang
[\[102a.4\]]dag don grub rgyur bcas yin/_/dus nyid skyes bu nyid sogs la/_/sngar bzhin ldog la the tshom za/_/skyes bu rnams la byed pa yi/_/nus pa med par ma bsgrubs phyir/_/gsal [#]ba bkag par byas nyid phyir/_/smra po byed por shes par gyis/_/de phyir sbyor ba gnyis po yang /_/_
[\[102a.5\]]dpe ni bsgrub byas stong par smras/_/mis bstan pa la ltos phyir dang /_/byas pa nyid du bsgrub [#]byas phyir/_/rang don smra po ma ltos nyid/_/chos can dpe dag la ni med/_/ngag la rtag [#]nyid spangs pas na/_/chos can dang ni dpe dag la'ang /_/rtag pa'i ngag las byung nyid ni/_/_
[\[102a.6\]]gsal bar ma grub par rtogs min/_/'di ltar bskul ba skyes bu yis/_/ma byas nyid du ma nges pas/_/gtan tshigs phyi ma rnams la yang /_/the tshom za bar [#]grub skyon 'gyur/_/skad cig mas 'jig gsal bsgrubs pas/_/re zhig thos pa brtag [#]pa yis/_/rang gi ngo bo la
[\[102a.7\]]gnod par/_/des na [#]blo ni gang las 'gyur/_/thos [#]pa las kyang skyes bu ni/_/'jig par mi 'gyur zhes bshad pa/_/sngar ni de la gnod bstan pas/_/de ni ma grub par gsal yin/_/lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhin du/_/yul dang dus dang skyes bu bzhin/_/gang gis mngon
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]sum du ni gyur/_/des der [#]gnod med 'di nges 'gyur/_/mi yis mi shes don ngo bo/_/des na [#]mun pa'i dngos gnas pa'i/_/rig byed la ni dman rnams chags/_/rang gi dpyod la par sig bzhin/_/de yi don ni mi shes pa'ang /_/sdig pa'i rgyu mthun dang ldan phyir/_/srog
[\[102b.2\]]chags 'tshe sogs sdig pa la/_/de bzhin 'di dag 'jug par 'gyur/_/de phyir chos la brten nas ni/_/bskul ba tshad ma nyid ma grub/_/sgra de dag la bdag gzhan gyis/_/de don nges par rtogs mi 'gyur/_/ye shes snang bas nang gi ni/_/mun pa'i tshogs ni 'joms byed la/_/_
[\[102b.3\]]thos don rnam dben ston byed pa/_/tshad mas [#]grub pa 'dod par gyis/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa las [#]thos pa brtag pa ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad [#]pa'o/_/rig byed skyes bus byas nyid du/_/de ltar bsgrub [#]par byas pas na/_/'bad mi dgos par de dag
[\[102b.4\]]la/_/rang las tshad ma nyid kyang btsal[#]/_/rang las tshad ma thams cad kyi/_/tshad ma nyid ni gzung bar gyis/_/de lta bu'i ngag de la ni/_/khyed kyi don ni ji ltar 'dod/_/de dag la ni rang bzhin gyis/_/gzhal bya rtogs sogs nus gnas yin/_/rang la med pa'i nus pa ni/_/gzhan
[\[102b.5\]]gyis byed par nus ma yin/_/ltos pa med nyid gcig kho na/_/tshad ma nyid kyi rgyu mtshan nyid[#]/_/ltos pa dang bcas nyid rten na/_/de ni 'jig pa kho nar 'gyur/_/rigs pa smra ba su zhig ni/_/rtsa ba la gnod phyogs nges med/_/gang gis [#]ngag gi rang tshig gis[#]/_/de grub thabs kyang
[\[102b.6\]]'jig par byed/_/ltos pa dang bcas tshad nyid ni/_/la lar yang ni gzhan [#]byas min/_/gtan tshigs thug pa med pa yis/_/bsgrub bya su zhig sgrub [#]par byed/_/de lta'i don ni 'dod ce na/_/dngos po thams cad dag la ni/_/nus pa tha mi dad pa can/_/sngar bsgrubs byas zin ma yin
[\[102b.7\]]nam/_/gang phyir 'dod 'bras nus pa can/_/rang bzhin nus pa med ces brjod/_/de dag dngos bdag nyid min na/_/dngos de byed pa por mi 'gyur/_/rang rgyu'i stobs las byung ba can/_/de yang mi rtag de 'dra ba'i/_/nus pa tshad ma dag la ni/_/rang bzhin gyis ni yod pa ru/_/_
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]khyed cag ji ltar 'dod pa yin/_/nus pa rang bzhin can yin na/_/rtag pa 'am ni rgyu med 'gyur/_/de bdag nyid phyir tshad ma yang /_/rtag pa nyid dang rgyu med yin/_/rgyu med gzhan la mi ltos phyir/_/rtag tu yod pa'am med par 'gyur/_/des na der rag
[\[103a.2\]]las 'bras bu/_/res 'ga' ba ni rigs pa min/_/tshad ma rnams kyi rang bzhin dang /_/'bras bu nyid ni res 'ga' bar/_/snang rung des na nus pa yis/_/rang bzhin can khyed la mi rigs/_/tshad ma rnams kyi rang dngos ni/_/gsal byed kyis gsal snang bas na[#]/_/skyon
[\[103a.3\]]gzhan la ni ltos nas ni/_/de 'bras rtsom par byed ce na/_/rtag dngos la ni gsal ba dang /_/rgyu gzhan la ni ltos pa spangs/_/de phyir de yi ngo bo dang /_/'bras bu rtag tu dmigs par 'gyur/_/dngos la nus pa tha dad dang /_/gnyis bdag nyid na'ang de lta na'ang /_/rtag pa'i
[\[103a.4\]]nus dang 'brel pa can/_/de shes rtag tu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de lta [#]min na rtag mi 'gyur/_/dngos gcig rjes 'gro med pa'i phyir/_/gang phyir de shes dang nus pa/_/res 'ga' 'brel zhing [#]gzhan du min/_/rang gi rgyu las skye 'gyur ba/_/tshad ma rnams kyi nus pa ni/_/rang gi rgyu
[\[103a.5\]]las skyes 'gyur te/_/phyis rkyen gzhan byas min zhe na/_/'dir ni bdag cag la rtsol [#]med/_/gang phyir rang rgyud [#]las skyes pa'i/_/cha shas med pa'i dngos po yi/_/nus pa phyi nas su zhig rtogs[#]/_/gzhan gyis phyis kyi dus su ni/_/ngo bo gang zhig byas pa ni/_/de ni dngos gzhan
[\[103a.6\]]nyid yin pas/_/de ni [#]bdag nyid du brjod min/_/gang phyir 'gal ba'i chos 'dre ba/_/dngos po'i tha dad nyid du bshad/_/de grub na de mi 'grub phyir/_/nus pa la yang de yod yin/_/dngos kun skad cig 'jig pa ru/_/bsgrub par byas pa [#]de dag gis[#]/_/nus pa 'ga' zhig rkyen
[\[103a.7\]]gzhan gyis/_/skyed par byed par mi nus so/_/gang phyir de dag gis gnas pa/_/dus gzhan du ni yod min te/_/gang gi dus na [#]rkyen gzhan gyis/_/'bras bu 'ga' zhig la nus thob/_/'di ni blo bzangs [#]sangs rgyas pa/_/de dag ji ltar brjod pa yin/_/shes pa 'ga'
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]la nus gnas kyang /_/de ni rang las rtogs nus min/_/ji ltar gnas pa'i shes bya yi/_/dngos po rtogs dang thob nus nyid/_/nyams myong bdag nyid gcig pu yis/_/su zhig nges par byed par [#]nus/_/gang phyir tshad ma ma yin yang /_/skra shad la sogs shes pa ni/_/rnam
[\[103b.2\]]pa gsal ba snang ba yi[#]/_/nyams myong bdag nyid de yod yin[#]/_/des na nges par bya nyid phyir/_/don byed shes pa'am gzhan ltos min/_/de byed phyir ni ma yin te/_/dug la sogs pa la bzhin no/_/ji ltar [#]dug dang myos 'gyur sogs/_/de las mtshungs gzhan snang phyir
[\[103b.3\]]dang /_/rjes thogs la ni 'bras med phyir/_/de'i bdag nyid nges gzhan ltos yin/_/brgyal dang dub [#]dang 'chol sogs pa'i/_/de yi 'bras bu nges bskyed na/_/de'i bdag nyid du rtogs 'gyur te/_/da ltar shes la de nus des/_/gzhan yang tshad ma'i nus mtshan nyid/_/_
