[\[103b.4\]]rtsod pa med pa nyid du 'dod/_/tshad ma gzhan gyis nges byas zhes/_/de ltar khyed kyis smras pa yin/_/dngos po rnams kyi [#]nus pa rnams/_/'bras bu'i don gyis sgrub par byed/_/des na don gyis go bas grub/_/gzhan las mi 'grub ji ltar yin/_/rang gi rgyu las tshad nyid
[\[103b.5\]]ni/_/cha shas med par grub yin na/_/de ltar yin dang rtsod med de/_/des bskyed gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir/_/rang gi ngo bo grub don du/_/tshad ma gzhan la ltos pa min/_/de yi ngo bo nges don du/_/rtogs po de la ltos pa yin/_/gzhan yang tshad ma nyid min yang /_/_
[\[103b.6\]]de ltar rang nyid las thal 'gyur/_/rang las tshad ma min med na/_/gzhan las kyang ni srid ma yin/_/ltos pa med pa gcig kho na/_/tshad min nyid kyi [#]rgyu mtshan yin/_/de lta bu sogs 'dir yang ni/_/ma lus brjod par nus ma yin/_/slu bar byed pa'i [#]nus pa ni/_/ji ltar gzhan
[\[103b.7\]]las nges pa yi/_/de ltar mi slu'i [#]nus pa nyid/_/des na rnam kun gyi gnyis mtshungs/_/bzlog pa de las tshad nyid la/_/phul du byung ba ci zhig snang /_/gang gis [#]rang las de [#]nyid dang /_/gzhan las tshad ma min pa 'dod/_/'on te rang las tshad ma kun/_/tshad ma nyid du brjod [# ]
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]pa'i phyir/_/skyes nas rang gi 'bras bu la/_/rang nyid kyis ni 'jug 'gyur min/_/bdag nyid thob phyir dngos po rnams/_/rgyu la ltos phyir byed pa ni/_/bdag nyid thob nas rang 'bras la/_/rang nyid kyis ni 'jug par 'gyur/_/des na skye tsam shes pa la/_/_
[\[104a.2\]]rang gi rgyu la ltos yod phyir/_/de dag rang gi yon tan la/_/nges pa bskyed phyir ltos pa min/_/gang phyir skyed la rang dbang can/_/tshad ma nyid dang don nges la/_/rang gi rgyu la ma ltos par/_/de dag 'gyur bum la sogs bzhin/_/'jim gong 'khor lo dbyug sogs la/_/bum
[\[104a.3\]]pa skyed [#]phyir ltos pa yin/_/'di yi chu 'chu [#]ba la ni/_/de dag la ni ltos pa med/_/de ltar rang las tshad ma nyid/_/tha mar gdon mi za de yin/_/gzhan la [#]rag las tshad nyid ni/_/thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur/_/rtsa ba yi ni tshad ma nyid/_/tshad ma gzhan gyis grub byas
[\[104a.4\]]na/_/de dang der ni der [#]'dod pas/_/mthar thug gnas rnyed mi 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar dang po'i shes pa de/_/don byed mi slu'i [#]shes la ltos/_/de ltar mi slu'i [#]shes pa yang /_/mi slu gzhan la ltos pa yin/_/gal te 'ga' zhig rang nyid las/_/tshad ma nyid du 'dod pa na/_/dang
[\[104a.5\]]po de ltar 'gyur ba la/_/rgyu mtshan gang gis sdang bar byed/_/gal te de ltar yon tan la/_/rag las mngon sum tshad ma [#]nyid/_/tshad ma med na yon tan yang /_/nam yang yod pa ma yin no/_/des na yon tan yongs gcod phyir/_/tshad ma gzhan ni 'dod pa na/_/de la'ang gzhan
[\[104a.6\]]gyis yongs bcad pa'i/_/yon tan rag las tshad ma nyid/_/dang po'i bzhin no des na yang /_/sngar bzhin thug pa med par 'gyur/_/da dang de [#]de ltar 'dod na/_/mthar thug rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/_/'o na te yon tan gyis shes pa/_/yon 'dzin rag las tshad ma nyid/_/mi 'dod
[\[104a.7\]]dang po'i don shes kyang /_/yon tan tshad ma la mi ltos/_/des na ring du dpyad byas kyang /_/'gal ba [#]rang la tshad nyid ni/_/gdon mi za bar khas len na/_/de bas thog mar gnas pa mchog_/don byed pa dang yon tan shes/_/gang gis khyad par can du 'dod/_/gang gi [# ]
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]stobs kyis dang po ni/_/de dag la ni rag las 'gyur/_/de phyir rag las tshad ma nyid/_/kun la spyir bstan pa can gnas/_/gnod dang rgyu skyon bcas nyid kyis/_/shes pa dag gis de bsal yin/_/de ni gzhan la rag las kyang /_/thug pa med par mi 'gyur ro/_/de yi
[\[104b.2\]]tshad ma la rag las/_/de yang rang la [#]gnas pa yin/_/gang phyir tshad ma tshad gzhan gyis/_/ji ltar sgrub par mi byed pa/_/de ltar tshad min nyid kyis ni/_/tshad min gzhan las grub pa min/_/rigs mthun la rten [#]nyid kyis ni/_/gnas pa 'thad pa ma yin te/_/rigs mi mthun
[\[104b.3\]]ni rgyu gzhan phyir/_/rtsa ba brtan [#]par gnas pa yin/_/re zhig gnod pa'i shes pa ni/_/don gzhan nyid du nges gzung yin/_/de ni ltos med tshad nyid phyir/_/snga ma shes pas sel bar byed/_/de la yang ni gnod pa brtsal[#]/_/slar yang ltos par 'gyur ba yin/_/_
[\[104b.4\]]la lar snga mar dogs skye na/_/de yang 'bad pa nyung dus ldog_/gal te 'di la gnod pa gzhan/_/tshol [#]bas skye bar 'gyur ba na/_/des na dbus mar gnod gyur pas[#]/_/snga ma kho na tshad ma yin/_/'on te rjes mthun 'bad pa yis/_/yang dag
[\[104b.5\]]tshol bar byed pa na/_/rtsa ba med phyir gnod can la[#]/_/gnod pa'i shes pas gnod mi 'gyur/_/des na dmigs gsal [#]med pa'i phyir/_/stobs bcas de yi dang po ni/_/gnod 'gyur de yis de nyid kyi/_/tshad ma nyid ni bsal [#]ba yin/_/de ltar rtog [#]ldan shes pa ni/_/_
[\[104b.6\]]gsum po spong bar mi byed do/_/des kyang gnod pa ma skyes na/_/gnod pa slar yang dogs mi bya/_/gang zhig rmongs pas ma skyes pa'ang /_/gnod pa can du nye bar rtog_/the tshom bdag nyid can de ni/_/tha snyad thams cad nyams par 'gyur/_/'di ltar nor lha'i bu yis ni/_/_
[\[104b.7\]]the tshom bdag nyid la smad yin/_/kun ta'i [#]bu skyes the tshom can/_/'jig rten 'di dang phyi ma med/_/la lar gang du ji snyed pa'i/_/mig [#]gsal rnams ni srid pa yin/_/de bdag nyid la de snyed ni/_/brtsal [#]yang ma skyes pas der med/_/'jal byed don du gnyer rnams
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]kyis/_/slar yang dngos po de dag ni/_/res 'ga' 'di [#]ltar srid pa yang /_/nye bar brtags [#]shing gnas mi bya/_/gang la yul dus mi'i gnas skabs/_/dbye ba tha dad kyis grub gang /_/gnod can don du gnyer ba ni/_/de dag la ni ltos pa yin/_/_
[\[105a.2\]]yul thag ring na gnas pa'i phyir/_/yang dag par ni ma mthong bas/_/la lar gzhan du dogs 'gyur ba/_/der ni nye bar phyin pa tsam/_/gnod pa'i mtha' ste dus dang ni/_/mi dang gnas skabs gzhan dag la/_/de la ltos pa yod min te/_/smig rgyu la sogs blo bzhin no/_/_
[\[105a.3\]]de ltar dmag dang bcas dus su/_/ba lang rta [#]sogs the tshom mam/_/'khrul pa gang yin de'i nges pa/_/gsal bar gyur pa mtha' can yin/_/de bzhin zla gnyis phyogs la 'khrul/_/rig [#]byed yi ge dbyangs sogs la'ang /_/skyes bu gzhan la dris pa na/_/rnam pa
[\[105a.4\]]gzhan du nges 'dzin skye/_/chags dang zhe sdang rgyags dang bsnyo[#]/_/bkres skom sogs kyis dbang nyams pas/_/shes bya'i don la log shes skye/_/de med yang dag shes pa skye/_/bu lon la sogs tha snyad la'ang /_/gnyis ka rtsod par byed pa na/_/gcig ni bu lon chags
[\[105a.5\]]pa'i tshig_/sngar gyi bu lon ded tshig gnyis/_/thug pa med pa'i 'jigs [#]pa yis/_/ngag lhag chad rgyar 'bri mi byed/_/des na gtso bo'i thad du ni/_/'dun sa ba sogs kyis nges brjod/_/de ltar shes pa gsum kho na/_/thams cad kyi ni dbang byas 'dod/_/de 'dod phyir ni
[\[105a.6\]]lha rnams la'ang /_/bden pa gnyis gsum yod par brjod/_/des na rang la tshad nyid na/_/gnyis ka la yang thug med med/_/tshad ma nyid dang tshad min nyid/_/des na ji ltar rigs par gnas/_/rtag pa'am yid ches pas smras pa/_/dag gang nges par bzung [#]ba yin/_/smra ba bo
[\[105a.7\]]dang nyan pa yis/_/de ni cung zad skyon bcas su/_/mi byed de la rig pa yis/_/bla ma gang dag yin pa 'am/_/rtag tu gnod par byed pa pos/_/de 'drar skyo bar nus pa'am[#]/_/'jig med de ni 'dzin par byed/_/des na yon tan gyis bkag pa'i/_/skyon gyis ngag sun 'byin mi
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]byed/_/yang na byed po med phyir te/_/skyon ni rten med mi 'gyur ro/_/der yid ches smras la skyon med/_/yon tan bdag nyid gnyis su snang /_/yon tan gyis kyang tshad ma nyid/_/ji ltar grub min de ltar bstan/_/des na yon tan ldan pa'i phyir/_/des bstsal [# ]
[\[105b.2\]]smra po la skyon med/_/skyon med pas ni nyer mtshon pas/_/dag ni rang las tshad ma yin/_/yid ches dag las skyon med par/_/yon tan dag gis rtogs she na/_/yon tan ldan nyid rjes 'gro la/_/de nyid thug pa med par 'gyur/_/de ni skyon med
[\[105b.3\]]shes 'gyur bas/_/yon tan gyi shes de yi tshe/_/ltos par byed pa ma yin te/_/de la yon tan phan 'dogs min/_/yod pa tsam gyis de kun gyi/_/skyon rnams ldog par byed nus yin/_/de dag yod na mi'i skyon gyi[#]/_/yul can shes pa skye mi 'gyur/_/mi shes nyid phyir
[\[105b.4\]]skyon rnams kyis/_/tshad ma nyid ni bsal ba yin/_/ma bsal bas ni grub pa yin/_/des na 'di yang rang la gnas/_/nyes pa yod dam med pa ni/_/skyes bu'i ngag la the tshom za/_/byed po med phyir thos pa la/_/skyon yod the tshom bdag la med/_/rig byed la yang tshad ma
[\[105b.5\]]nyid/_/ma ltos nyid phyir gang brjod pa/_/yid ches ma smras pa la yang /_/de ni rang las shin tu grub/_/rig byed don la tshad gzhan gyis/_/dus kun du ni ma 'brel gang /_/de nyid kyis ni tshad ma nyid/_/gzhan du rjes su zlos [#]nyid yin/_/gzhan la yang ni tshad nyid la/_/'brel
[\[105b.6\]]pa rgyu nyid ma yin te/_/don mtshungs rnams la rtogs [#]pa yis/_/mtshungs pa'i don gcig la rtogs [#]pas/_/gcig nyid tshad ma nyid du 'gyur/_/gang la yang ni yongs gcod pa/_/tshad ma phyi mas slar yang 'gyur/_/der yang nges par snga ma yis/_/don de gsal bar nges
[\[105b.7\]]bzung [#]min/_/lan cig skyes nas 'jig pa ni/_/don la tshad min nyid 'gyur min/_/mig la sogs dang 'brel med pa/_/rna blo'ang tshad mar 'gyur ba min/_/'di la rna ba'i shes gzhan dang /_/'brel phyir tshad nyid 'gyur zhe na/_/rig byed la yang de skyed pa'i/_/rnam shes
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]gzhan dang 'brel pa grub/_/sgrub pa gzhan las skyes pa ni/_/blo ni gnyis la'ang yang yod min/_/des na rgyu gzhan gyis byas pa'i/_/shes pa mi slu 'dod min te/_/ji ltar dbang po gcig dag las/_/rnam shes gzhan gyis 'brel pa ni/_/mngon
[\[106a.2\]]sum gyi rgyur brtags pa yin/_/de bzhin rig byed la brtag gis/_/ngag ni gcig pu kho na yis/_/yul dang dus dang mi sogs la/_/don gyi [#]mi slu rnyed pa ni/_/rgyu gzhan brtsal [#]bar mi bya'o/_/de phyir brtan [#]par gang skyes pa'i/_/rnam par shes pa [#]yul gzhan sogs/_/_
[\[106a.3\]]rnam shes rnams kyi slu med can/_/de ni tshad mar the tshom med/_/sgra rnams la ni tshad ma nyid/_/rjes su dpag pas bsgrub mi bya/_/mngon sum la yang nges bsgrub byas/_/tshad mar mi 'gyur khyad med phyir/_/tshad ma [#]rnams kyis tshad ma nyid/_/gzhan ma gang gis bsgrub par byas/_/_
[\[106a.4\]]de yang gzhan gyis bsgrubs [#]pa'i phyir/_/thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur/_/'on te sgrub par byed pa la/_/gzhan gyis ma bsgrubs tshad 'dod na/_/des na bsgrub bya la yang de[#]/_/ma bsgrubs pa yang de bzhin 'gyur/_/mngon sum la sogs tshad ma ru/_/de ltar gzung byas ma
[\[106a.5\]]yin nam/_/de ltar gzung bar ma byas pas/_/tha snyad rigs pa ma yin no/_/nges par 'dzin pa'i sngon rol du/_/tshad mar rang nyid ni gnas na/_/de ni ltos med rang gi don/_/'jal bar byed de rang gis des/_/ji ltar rtogs par ma byas nyid/_/mig sogs dbang po
[\[106a.6\]]rnams kyis ni/_/yul kun 'dzin par byed pa yin/_/de bzhin tshad ma rnams kyis kyang /_/des na tshad ma nyid de la/_/rigs [#]par 'gyur nyid mkho ba min/_/blo ni ma rtogs [#]'di las kyang /_/yul gyi nyams myong dmigs par 'gyur/_/rang gi don la tshad min pa/_/tshad
[\[106a.7\]]ma bzhin du rang las grub/_/de yi log nyid tshad ma gzhan/_/med na gzung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang phyir don ni log nyid du/_/snga ma 'dzin min de nyid bzhin/_/de yang don gzhan ngo bo blo/_/yang na rgyu ni skyon bcas pa/_/de tsam gyis kyang log nyid ni/_/'dzin 'gyur gzhan rgyu can
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]ma yin/_/skye ba'i gnas skabs kho na la/_/'di ni tshad ma nyid du nges/_/des na gang du'ang log nyid ni/_/gzhan dag gis ni rtogs 'gyur na/_/de'ang [#]de gnyis brjod bya ste/_/chos mthun tsam gyis brjod mi bya/_/tshad ma ma yin chos mthun tsam/_/gang cung zad tsam la
[\[106b.2\]]brten nas/_/mi mkhas pa yis tshad ma kun/_/log pa nyid du sgrub par byed/_/de dag bdag nyid la gnod phyir/_/de 'dra'i sgrub pa rtogs par byed/_/gzhan la yang ni de 'dra yis/_/gzugs brnyan skye bar 'gyur ba yin/_/de yis bkag par byas pa'i phyir/_/log pa
[\[106b.3\]]nyid du bsgrubs pas na/_/bskul la gnod pa byed mi nus/_/rang nyid tshad ma yin phyir ro/_/'di la brjod par bya ba min[#]/_/gang dag skyes nas gnas 'dod pas/_/de dag re zhig gnas skabs de'i/_/rgyu mtshan dang bcas yin du chug_/bdag nyid thob phyir bum sogs ni/_/rgyu
[\[106b.4\]]la ltos par byed pa yin/_/bdag nyid thob nas rang 'bras la/_/rang nyid kyis ni 'jug par 'gyur/_/skyes ma thag tu mi gnas pa/_/shes pa gang zhig khyed kyang 'dod/_/bdag nyid thob nas phyis med la/_/de la bya ba ci 'dra yod/_/gang phyir rgyu rnams kyi bya ba/_/skye ba las ni
[\[106b.5\]]gzhan du mthong /_/tshad ma la yang de bzhin du/_/mi 'gyur phyir na [#]skye bar brjod/_/skad cig kyang ni de gnas min/_/tshad ma'i bdag nyid kyang skye min/_/gang gis don bzung rjes la ni/_/bya ba byed 'gyur dbang sogs bzhin/_/'on te skad cig min shes la/_/yang na brtag [#]par khas
[\[106b.6\]]len na[#]/_/khas blangs pa dang 'di 'gal phyir/_/'di ltar rigs pas kyang gnod yin/_/gang phyir dngos kun khyab pa ni/_/skad cig 'jig par bsgrubs pa yin/_/rtag pa bskyed bya ma yin pas/_/rgyu la ltos pa gang zhig yin/_/des na brjod par nus yin te/_/phyi [#]nas tshad ma
[\[106b.7\]]rang 'bras la/_/rang nyid kyis 'jug ma yin te/_/dngos med phyir na mkha' pad bzhin/_/skad cig ma yin shes pa de/_/yin chug rang gi tshad ma nyid/_/nges phyir rang nyid 'jug ce na/_/the tshom la sogs ci phyir 'gyur/_/gang phyir tshad ma nyid nges pa/_/de tsam las ni byung ba
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]yin/_/de ni skyes par gyur pa [#]na/_/the tshom phyin log rten med 'gyur/_/nges pa dang ni sgro 'dogs yid/_/gnod bya gnod byed ngo bo'i phyir/_/'di ni sgro 'dogs dben pa la/_/'jug ces bya bar shes par bya/_/des kyang bskul pa las [#]byung blo/_/tshad
[\[107a.2\]]ma nyid sgrub don du ni/_/skyon bral rgyu las byung ba'i phyir/_/rigs pa de ni don med 'gyur/_/rang las tshad ma nyid grub kyang /_/de ni gnod pa sel ba can/_/gal te 'dod na de la ni/_/ma yin the tshom mi srid phyir/_/ji srid nges pa ma skyes pa/_/de srid kho na the tshom yod/_/de
[\[107a.3\]]la nges pa skyes gyur na/_/tshad ma min blo ga las 'gyur/_/gang gis de ni ldog don du/_/'bad pa don dang bcas par 'gyur/_/mtho yor de bdag nyid nges pas/_/gzhan nyid snyam du sems pa med/_/gang phyir dngos po gang la ni/_/ngo bo gang las [#]nges skyes na/_/de las bzlog pa'i
[\[107a.4\]]dgos pa ni/_/rang nyid kyis ni ldog par 'gyur/_/ji ltar du sogs rtags dag gi_/me sogs yod par nges pa na/_/de med the tshom rnams [#]gcod pa/_/de nyid kyis [#]ni 'thad ma [#]yin/_/tshad ma ma yin rnam gcod kyang /_/rang nyid kyis ni 'dod par gyis/_/de phyir tshad ma ma yin
[\[107a.5\]]nyid/_/ldog phyir sgrub pa rigs ma yin/_/gal te der ni tshad min gnyis/_/dogs pa 'jug par 'gyur ba na/_/'khrul pas [#]de yi yul byas pas/_/tshad ma nyid du nges mi 'gyur/_/gang zhig phyin ci log the tshom/_/shes pa rnams kyis yul du byas/_/mtho yor bzhin du de la
[\[107a.6\]]ni/_/de tshe de dngos nges pa med/_/ji ltar gtor zan [#]du ba dang /_/rgyu las byung skyon sogs shes pas/_/yul dang me dang tshad min sogs/_/gzhan las nges par 'gyur ba yin/_/gang gis phyin ci log the tshom/_/yul nyid du rtogs de bzhin no/_/tshad ma nyid la de la ni/_/gzhan
[\[107a.7\]]la nges par rtogs par gyis/_/khyed cag gi phyogs 'di yin te/_/gang dag la ni [#]dgag thos pa/_/de nyid la ni rnams [#]gcod du/_/gzhan du rang gi bdag nyid rtogs/_/bskul ba las byung ba yi blo/_/tshad ma yin zhes [#]de la yang /_/dgag pa'i sbyor ba yod min te/_/des na tshad min
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]ldog mi 'gyur/_/gzhan yang gal te tshad kun la/_/tshad ma nyid ni nges gyur na/_/de nyid kyis na smra po la/_/de tshe 'dod pa tha dad cing /_/gang zhig 'ga' zhig rang nyid kyis/_/nges par gsal bar [#]smras pa yin/_/cung zad rang las cung zad gzhan/_/gzhan dag gis nges
[\[107b.2\]]med par 'dod/_/gang gis 'khrul pa las byung rtsod/_/de yang nges pas gnod par 'gyur/_/des na de nyid nges byas la/_/rtsod pa po rnams rtsod mi bya/_/tshad ma rnams la [#]rang las ni/_/tshad ma nyid du nges pas na/_/slu ba'i don ni cung zad med/_/nges par byas pas 'jug
[\[107b.3\]]phyir ro/_/tshad ma min la tshad nyid kyi[#]/_/blo yis 'jug na slu bar 'gyur/_/rang las tshad ma nyid rtog [#]pas/_/phyin ci log pa cung zad med/_/tshad ma ma yin las [#]'jug na/_/slu bar thob 'gyur ma yin nam/_/nges pa de las gzhan na ni/_/gnod pa shes pa las 'dod
[\[107b.4\]]yin/_/tshad ma nyid kyis 'jug pas na/_/slu ba thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/kho bo cag gis 'di nyid las/_/rang la de bdag nyid nges brjod/_/de min dgongs pa ma shes phyir/_/'dir ni 'di [#]brjod 'dod ma [#]yin/_/tshad ma thams cad rag las yin/_/tshad ma yin na nges yin
[\[107b.5\]]na/_/gang las rang gi tshad nyid kyis[#]/_/nges pa med par 'gyur ba na/_/shugs kyis nges par de la ni/_/tshad ma nyid nges [#]par rtogs 'gyur/_/don gzhan rgyu skyon bcas pa yi/_/shes pa la ni ma ltos phyir/_/de yi tshad min nyid nges phyir/_/tshad ma la ni tshad ma nyid/_/_
[\[107b.6\]]phyin ci log par rigs [#]pa min/_/slu ba de las 'ga' [#]zhig kyang /_/'jug par mi 'gyur de rtogs phyir/_/skye ba las ni gzhan pa yi/_/bya ba la ni dus med yin/_/bum sogs skad cig min [#]nyid phyir/_/des na dpe ni ma grub bo/_/de dag rnams ni dus phyi mar/_/rdza mkhan
[\[107b.7\]]sogs la ma ltos pas/_/rang gi nyer len sogs ltos phyir/_/rang las 'jug pa yod pa min/_/gzhan las tshad ma gnas pa na/_/thug pa med par mi 'gyur te/_/gang phyir don med shes pa ni/_/rang las tshad ma nyid du nges/_/snga ma'i shes la 'di la ni/_/phul du byung ba ci zhig
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]yod/_/gang gis sngar shes bzhin de yang /_/gzhan las khas mi len ce na/_/smra ba'i dngos po'i mi slu bas/_/tshad ma nyid du brjod pa yin/_/de yang don byed par snang ba'i/_/shes las gzhan mtshan nyid can min/_/don byed par yang snang ba yi/_/shes pa [# ]
[\[108a.2\]]gsal ba rigs [#]pa yin/_/de tsam las ni byung ba yi/_/bsre ba'i shes pas nges par 'gyur/_/des na de yi tshad ma nyid/_/rang las nges par byas pa'i phyir/_/phyis kyi don byed thob pa yi/_/shes pa la ni ltos pa min/_/'bras bu snang ba'i shes pa ni/_/tshad ma'i ngo
[\[108a.3\]]bo [#]nges byas pa/_/rgyu 'dis dang po'i shes pa yang /_/tshad ma nyid du nges pa yin/_/dang po'i [#]dngos med yul can na/_/dngos po mi slu'i [#]mtshan nyid can/_/gnyis pa 'jug par mi 'gyur te/_/de yi rgyu ni mi srid phyir/_/a sho ka yi [#]me tog tshogs/_/me yi [#]ngo bor nges byas
[\[108a.4\]]kyang /_/sreg dang btso bar snang ba can/_/shes pa nam yang skye mi 'gyur/_/skyes [#]na me la rigs mthun par/_/de ni thal bar mi 'gyur te/_/me ni bya ba btso sreg gi_/rgyu tsam mtshan nyid can yin phyir/_/des na don byed snang ba yi/_/shes pa ji srid mi skye bar/_/de srid 'khrul
[\[108a.5\]]pa'i rgyu yis ni/_/dang po tshad min dogs pa skye/_/rjes thogs 'bras bu ma mthong dang /_/'dra ba nyid ni dmigs pa ni/_/blo yi [#]mi gsal nyid la sogs/_/'dir ni 'khrul pa'i rgyu yin no/_/'bras bu snang ba'i shes pa ni/_/skyes par gyur na de yod min/_/dngos su dngos po dang
[\[108a.6\]]'brel pa'i/_/'bras bu so sor rig [#]pa'i phyir/_/'khrul med yul ni rtogs pa'i phyir/_/mi mthun par ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/de yi 'bras bu ma myong yang /_/dang po'i shes la goms can [#]'jug_/mi mthun 'jug pa med na yang /_/rigs mi mthun dogs rtogs [#]pa yis/_/_
[\[108a.7\]]'bras bu snang ba'i shes pa ni/_/med na tshad ma nges mi 'gyur/_/de la tshad ma nyid yod kyang /_/nges par byed par [#]nus pa min/_/phyis don byed shes 'ga' [#]zhig gis/_/de ni rtogs par 'gyur ba yin/_/des na dang po'i shes pa ni/_/de ni mi slu ba la ltos/_/mi slu ba [# ]
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]yang mi slu ba/_/de bzhin btsal bar mi bya ste/_/'khrul pa'i rgyu ni med pa'i phyir/_/rang las de [#]ni tshad ma yin/_/dang po'i rang las tshad dngos la/_/zhe sdang 'khrul pa srid pa'i phyir/_/rnam par shes pa de la ni/_/tshad nyid nges byas ma yin nam/_/'dod pa'i don ni ma rtogs phyir/_/_
[\[108b.2\]]de las rtog ldan ji ltar 'jug_/smras pa rtog pa dang ldan de/_/the tshom las ni 'jug pa yin/_/de lta yin yang de la ni/_/rtog ldan ngo bo nyams mi 'gyur/_/gang gis [#]tshad ma la the tshom/_/yod kyang the tshom gyis 'jug na/_/de yang tshad ma nyid nges pa'i/_/thabs nyid du ni nges pa ni/_/the tshom gyis ni 'jug
[\[108b.3\]]pa na[#]/_/gal te bdag gis don thob 'gyur/_/de lta yin na shes de yi[#]/_/tshad ma nyid du nges par 'gyur/_/gzhan du min te 'di ltar yang /_/'di ni rtsod pa rigs bcas min/_/ci phyir [#]thabs la 'jug ce na/_/gang phyir gzhan du nges pa med/_/thabs med na ni 'ga'
[\[108b.4\]]zhig gis/_/thabs las byung ba rtogs mi 'gyur/_/de ltar the tshom gyis 'jug kyang /_/rtog pa dang mi [#]nyid min/_/don byed snang ba'i shes pa ni/_/rmi lam na yang yod min nam/_/de ni tshad ma nyid min te/_/de rgyu dang po cis tshad min/_/de min 'khrul bcas gnas skabs
[\[108b.5\]]kun/_/de ni phyi rol rgyu mtshan yin/_/phyi rol dngos po'i mi slu ba/_/gnas skabs de dag la yod min/_/rang rigs [#]ngo bo sems dang ni/_/sems byung mi mthun mtshan nyid yod/_/de yis gnas skabs gnyis bye brag_/gsal bar rtogs par 'gyur ba yin/_/brgya la de yis
[\[108b.6\]]tshad ma nyid/_/gzhan nas nges par byed yin na/_/gzhal bya nyid thal 'gyur zhe na/_/de ni 'gal [#]med ma yin nam/_/de ni gzung bya'i dngos ltos nas/_/tshad ma nyid du de ni brjod/_/gzhan las de ni rtogs pa'i phyir/_/gzhal bya nyid du rnam par gnas/_/ltos pa dbye bas de
[\[108b.7\]]ltar yin/_/rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid sogs yin/_/tshad ma nyid dang gzhal bya nyid/_/rnam par gzhag pa 'gal ba min/_/de ltar don byed shes pa las/_/tshad ma nyid du nges pas na/_/thug med ma yin gzhan la ni/_/'dod pa ldog phyir zhes byar gnas/_/rnam par shes pa
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]skyed pa na'ang /_/ji srid rgyu yi dag pa nyid/_/tshad ma gzhan gyis ma rtogs na/_/de srid don ni nges gzung min/_/'dir yang blo bzangs [#]smra ba ste/_/thug med ma yin gang gis na/_/ltos med mi slu'i [#]shes pa las/_/dag pa de ni rtogs par 'gyur/_/_
[\[109a.2\]]'bras bu mi slu ba mthong bas/_/yul ni nye bar gnas nges na/_/rgyu rnams kyis ni dag pa nyid/_/'bad mi dgos par rtogs par 'gyur/_/bskal pa yi ni yul la yang [#]/_/de la byung blo tshad ma yin/_/des skyed nyid phyir dper na ni/_/nyer [#]gnas spyod yul can de bzhin/_/ji ltar
[\[109a.3\]]mdun gnas dung la ni/_/dkar po bsgrub pa'i byed thob nas/_/mig ser gyis btab dbang po las/_/byung ba'i rnam shes min [#]par rtogs/_/de la rgyu yi dag pa ni/_/rtogs par 'gyur na de'i dus su/_/gser las byas pa'i dung la ni/_/ser po'i rnam pa'i blo 'byung gang /_/_
[\[109a.4\]]rnam par dag pa'i rgyus bskyed [#]phyir/_/de ni tshad ma nyid du nges/_/don gyi byed pa rdzogs gyur pa'i[#]/_/dung la dkar po'i blo bzhin no/_/bkres sogs kyis ni nyen sogs pa'i/_/tshig gis 'dir ni smras min [#]na/_/des na bshad pa byed pa po/_/rmongs pas thug med 'dir rtsod byas/_/_
[\[109a.5\]]skyon byas rgyu yis bskyed byas pa'i/_/dogs pas dang po tshad nyid du/_/rtogs par mi 'gyur de bzhin [#]pa'i/_/shes pa khyad par can du 'dod/_/de ltar don byed shes pa yis/_/rgyu yi dag pa nges byas nas/_/don byed ma byas pa'i yul la/_/'jug pa'i skyon mi brjod rigs yin/_/gal
[\[109a.6\]]te rang las tshad ma nyid/_/kun la spyir bstan can du gnas/_/gnod dang rgyu skyon bcas nyid kyi[#]/_/shes pa dag gis de bsal [#]yin/_/gnod dang rgyu skyon bcas pa yi/_/shes pa med phyir tshad ma nyid/_/thob 'gyur de ni gzhan las ni/_/tshad ma nyid nges de ltar 'gyur/_/'di ltar de med
[\[109a.7\]]pa 'di ni/_/khyed phyogs dngos med ces bya ba'i/_/tshad ma gzhan yin bdag gzhung la/_/mi dmigs zhes bya'i rjes dpag yin/_/rigs pa 'di nyid kho na yin/_/tshad min pa yang rang las yin/_/gang phyir der yang 'di 'dra ba'i/_/rigs pa 'di ni brjod par nus/_/de phyir rang las
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]tshad min nyid/_/kun la spyir bstan can du gnas/_/gnod dang rgyu skyon bcas nyid kyi/_/shes pa med phyir de bstsal [#]yin/_/de ltar rtogs pa'i bdag nyid kyi/_/blo ni tshad ma nyid thob 'gyur/_/ji ltar don shes rgyu las byung /_/yon tan shes pa dag gis sel/_/tshad min gzhan
[\[109b.2\]]la rag las na/_/thug pa med pa kho nar 'gyur/_/de ni tshad ma la rag las/_/de yang rang las [#]gnas pa min/_/'di ltar gnod pa med pa'i phyir/_/tshad ma nyid du khyed kyis smras/_/de bzhin dngos med la yang ni/_/dngos med ces bya tshad gzhan 'dod/_/de yang gnod pa med pa'i
[\[109b.3\]]phyir/_/tshad ma nyid du 'dod pa yin/_/de dang de de ltar 'dod na/_/des na mthar thug rnyed mi 'gyur/_/des na gnod can shes pa la/_/ltos med tshad ma nyid mi 'grub/_/de phyir snga ma'i shes pa ni/_/'di yis bsal [#]bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'on te gnod med ma ltos par/_/gang zhig
[\[109b.4\]]tshad ma nyid 'dod na/_/dang po de ltar 'gyur ba la/_/rgyu mtshan gang gis sdang ba yin/_/ma ltos tshad ma nyid yin phyir/_/gnod pa can gyi shes pa 'di/_/gal te gnod can shes pa 'dis/_/snga ma'i shes pa sel byed na/_/de las gang gis dogs par 'gyur/_/ltos med tshad
[\[109b.5\]]ma nyid yin te/_/'di ni gnod pa can dogs 'gyur/_/gang phyir de 'gal nges byas na/_/dogs pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro/_/rang las tshad ma nyid phyogs la'ang /_/rang nyid kyis ni nges pa skye/_/gnod pa yod par sgrub pa yis[#]/_/'bad pa ci phyir byed pa yin/_/'di ltar rang nyid
[\[109b.6\]]gang la yang /_/tshad ma nyid du nges pa mad/_/'bad pa med par shugs kyis ni/_/de la gnod pa med [#]pa yin/_/des na rtogs [#]byed shes pa gsum/_/ci phyir 'di ni brjod pa yin/_/de las de ni nges byas pas/_/gcig gi yang ni go skabs med/_/gal te ma dmigs pa la
[\[109b.7\]]yang /_/the tshom gyis ni dogs skye na/_/gang phyir gnod pa med pa dang /_/med na mi 'byung mi [#]dmigs yin/_/de ltar yin na shes gsum la/_/ci phyir khyod ni mgu bar byed/_/gnod pa ma mthong na yang ni/_/'dir ni snga ma bzhin gnod dogs/_/ji srid 'bras bu'i mi slu med/_/_
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]de srid gnod pa'i dogs pa ni/_/gang phyir ldog par mi 'gyur te/_/de phyir shes gsum nges don med/_/des na gnod ma skyes pas kyang /_/slar yang gnod par dogs pa yin/_/gang phyir dngos po'i de nyid ni/_/nam yang tshig dor gyis gnas min/_/ji srid 'tsho yi [# ]
[\[110a.2\]]bar du ni/_/dung la ser por snang shes pa/_/gnod pa'i shes pa dang bral zhing /_/ji srid 'tsho yi [#]bar du skyes/_/gang phyir tshad mar skye mi 'gyur/_/rnam par dag pa'i rgyu med phyir/_/yang [#]na rgyu mtshan gzhan gyis ni/_/gnod pa can du mi skye ste/_/des na dogs pa ldog [#]mi 'gyur/_/des na rgyu mtshan dang
[\[110a.3\]]bcas pa/_/dogs pa 'di yin rmongs pas min/_/dag pa mi slu mthong bas na/_/blo bzang dogs pa med par 'gyur/_/de ni tha snyad thams cad la/_/the tshom bdag nyid skye mi 'gyur/_/ngag dang mi slu ba mthong bas/_/de blo [#]the tshom med pa yin/_/'dir yang rmongs pa 'ga' zhig
[\[110a.4\]]gang /_/slar yang dogs par byed pa na/_/de la brten nas khyab 'jug gis/_/the tshom bdag nyid la smang byas/_/yul dus mi yi gnas skabs kyi/_/dbye ba la ni ltos nas su/_/tshad ma nyid nges rtogs na yang /_/gsal bar gzhan las tshad nyid nges/_/'di ltar yul dang dus
[\[110a.5\]]sogs la'ang /_/tshad ma gzhan las gnod pa ni/_/med par nges phyir snga ma yi/_/shes la tshad ma nyid ni nges/_/bu lo na la sogs tha snyad ni/_/ngag gsum sbyor ldan gang de ni/_/de 'dra'i tshig dor bdag nyid can/_/tshad ma'i skabs su brjod bya min/_/gang phyir bu lon de [#]dang chags/_/_
[\[110a.6\]]de [#]ni gsal por dran dran nas/_/dngos po de la shin [#]tu ni/_/dpyad par bya ba 'dod pa min/_/dngos po'i gnas pa'i tshad ma ni/_/gzhag bya tshig dor gyis ma yin/_/des [#]na skabs dang mi mthun pa'i/_/tha snyad 'di ni dper byas yin/_/lha rnams kyi yang bden pa gsum/_/nges par byed
[\[110a.7\]]pa'i rgyu ma yin/_/dang pos nges pa med pas na/_/gzhan las kyang ni de 'gyur min/_/gang phyir de nyid kho na yi/_/phyi ma'i tshig gnyis kyang yin te/_/des na dang pos nges med na/_/de las gzhan na khyad ci yod/_/de phyir sngar bshad rigs pa yis/_/khyed kyi phyogs la thug med
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]'gyur/_/tshad ma dang ni tshad min nyid/_/des na ji ltar rigs par gnas/_/kho bo cag gis rtogs pa'i ngag_/sngar ni rgyas par gsal [#]bar byas/_/khyed kyis [#]'dod pas yid ches pa'i/_/gang zag ma lus skyon bral med/_/sgrib pa'i phung po ma spangs pa/_/ji ltar yid ches gang zag
[\[110b.2\]]'gyur/_/gang phyir de la skyon yod phyir/_/rnam pa gzhan du tshig srid yin/_/yid ches skyes kyang de yi ni/_/yon tan tshogs de sus rtogs [#]nus/_/gang la yid ches pas smras pa'i/_/ngag ni nges par bzung ba yin/_/de yi yon tan phun tshogs ni/_/gang gis [#]dbang 'das
[\[110b.3\]]mthong bas mthong /_/de la yang ni yid ches pas/_/smras pa'i tshig gis dogs [#]pa med/_/de ni gang la'ang mi [#]ltos par/_/rang nyid kyis ni don rtogs 'gyur/_/gzhan ni yid ches phyir mi shes[#]/_/de las don rtogs ma yin no/_/rang las tshad ma nyid smra bas/_/rang nyid kyis
[\[110b.4\]]ni nges skye'i phyir/_/'jigs pa srid pa mi rung bas/_/ci phyir skyon ni sel bar byed/_/yon tan gyis bstsal [#]skyon rnams kyis/_/ngag sun 'byin byed ma yin bden/_/'on kyang yon tan ma nges par/_/de nges byed nus ma yin no/_/ngag la ma byas pa nyid ni/_/sngar nyid
[\[110b.5\]]bkag par byas zin te/_/des na byed po med na skyon/_/de dag rten med mi 'gyur min/_/yon tan rnams kyi tshad ma nyid/_/ji ltar rigs pa de ltar bshad/_/yon tan rnams ni ma shes par/_/skyon med par ni mtshon mi 'gyur/_/skyon med par mtshon dag de ni/_/rang las tshad
[\[110b.6\]]ma nyid rigs min/_/yongs su ma shes pa yi phyir/_/skyon med nye bar mtshon ma yin/_/gang phyir dbyug pa ma shes par/_/skyes bu dbyug pa can mtshon min/_/des mtshon rang las tshad ma ni/_/zhes bya de ni phan tshun 'gal/_/dngos med tshad mas skyon med ni/_/tshad ma nyid
[\[110b.7\]]nges bdag nyid can/_/ngag [#]gi mtshan nyid rigs yin te/_/des na gzhan las tshad mar gnas/_/de dag yod na mi'i [#]skyon gyi/_/yul can shes skye mi 'gyur min/_/yon tan rnams ni ma shes par/_/skyon med nges par ji ltar 'dod/_/zhe sdang gti mug brtse med skyon/_/brtse dang
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]shes rab sogs kyis gnod/_/brtse sogs nges par ma byas par/_/de dag med par ji ltar 'dod/_/yon tan shes 'gyur nyid kyis ni/_/de tshe bya bcas 'jug min na/_/skyon med la ni yod pa tsam/_/phan 'dogs byed par shes par bya/_/gal te de ltar the
[\[111a.2\]]tshom dang /_/de bzhin phyin log blo med 'gyur/_/yid ches 'dod pa yod pa na/_/skyon rnams yod dam med par 'gyur/_/des na 'dir ni 'ga' zhig la/_/the tshom phyin ci log yod na/_/ji srid yon tan tshogs [#]rten shes/_/de ni rtogs par ma byas dang /_/'on te skyon med ma shes
[\[111a.3\]]na/_/ji ltar rang las tshad nyid med/_/de bzhin smra po de la ni/_/log pa'i blo ni skye mi 'gyur/_/skyon med par ni ma shes phyir/_/tshad ma gnyis po med pa ru/_/ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba yin/_/gang gis tshad ma nyid nges 'gyur/_/'on te tshad min gnyis med par/_/ma rtogs
[\[111a.4\]]na yang rang nyid kyis/_/tshad ma nyid ni rtogs pas na/_/sngar bzhin log pa'i blo mi 'byung /_/de'i tshig tshad ma yin nam ci/_/yang na tshad ma min te yin/_/tshad ma nyid du nges pa'i phyir/_/kun la tshad ma nyid du 'gyur/_/skyon med dang ni tshad min med/_/yon tan yong dang gsum la na'ang /_/_
[\[111a.5\]]des na nges par rtogs pa ni/_/gdon mi za bar khas blang dgos/_/de yang tshad ma yin nam min/_/de ltar de yang brtag par bya/_/ji bzhin don ni nges pa yis[#]/_/yan lag tshad min ji ltar 'gyur/_/tshad ma yin na gzhan las ni/_/de yis tshad ma nyid nges thob/_/rtog [#]pa de yi
[\[111a.6\]]tshad ma nyid/_/ji ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba yin/_/gnod shes med pa'i phyir zhe na/_/de yang tshad ma [#]yin nam ci/_/'on te min zhes slar yang 'dir/_/skyon ni thams cad kyang 'jug 'gyur/_/tshad ma yin na gzhan las ni/_/de ni tshad ma nyid du 'gyur/_/ji bzhin don shes rgyu
[\[111a.7\]]nyid du/_/tshad ma yin [#]pa gang las 'gyur/_/'di la yang ni tshad ma nyid/_/gang gis rtogs zhes dpyad par bya/_/gnod can shes med phyir zhe na/_/des na thug pa med thal 'gyur/_/de phyir yon tan gyis skyon rnams/_/med par [#]nges te med pas na/_/tshad min gnyis ni med pa
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]yis/_/des na spyir bstan ma bsal [#]yin/_/thams cad la ni de bzhin du/_/tshad ma nyid du nges she [#]na/_/'dir yang sngar bstan skyon tshogs dang /_/thug pa med par thal bar 'gyur/_/skyon med tshad min med pa nyid/_/skyon med tshad min med nyid ces/_/de ni dgag [#]pa 'ba' zhig
[\[111b.2\]]gi[#]/_ngo bo gal te rtogs [#]byed na/_/de ni 'grub par mi 'gyur te/_/dngos med phyir ro dmigs pa yis/_/de grub rigs min dngos med phyir/_/thug pa med pa'i skyon yod pas/_/ma dmigs pas kyang de rig min/_/skyon dang tshad min gnyis med par/_/ma dmigs pa yis rtogs byed na/_/_
[\[111b.3\]]ma dmigs pa la med pa nyid/_/gzhan gyis rtogs pas thug med 'gyur/_/de yang ma yin dgag bdag nyid/_/de yis bden pa gzhan mthong phyir/_/skyon med yongs su shes pa ni/_/yon tan shes pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur/_/tshad min gnyis po med pa yi/_/shes pa de 'dra dben pa
[\[111b.4\]]ni/_/brjod 'dod tshad ma'i shes pa yi/_/rang bzhin du yang thal bar 'gyur/_/yang na rang gi rgyud kyis ni/_/tshad min gnyis med shes grub na/_/khyed la lhag pa'i tshad nyid kyis/_/nges pa gang las gyur pa yin/_/gzhan du mi 'thad pas she [#]na/_/don gyis go bar 'gyur min
[\[111b.5\]]nam/_/rjes su dpag pa'am gzhan las kyang /_/des na gzhan las nges par 'gyur/_/khyed la rigs pa 'di nyid kyis/_/tshad ma ma yin pa yang ni/_/rang las thal bar 'gyur ba ru/_/gang yang rung ba bsal [#]brjod nus/_/des na skyon phyis yon tan ni/_/med pa [#]'gyur te de med
[\[111b.6\]]pas/_/tshad ma ma yin dngos nyid ni/_/des na spyir bstan bsal ba min/_/gang phyir spyir bstan ngo bo 'di/_/brjod par 'dod pa tsam gyis sbrul/_/tshad ma bzhin du tshad min la'ang /_/gsal bar brjod par [#]nus pa yin/_/gang phyir rtog [#]pa'i bdag nyid kyis/_/blo ni tshad ma nyid
[\[111b.7\]]thob 'gyur/_/ji ltar don shes rgyu las byung /_/yon tan shes pa dag gis bsal/_/mi shes nyid phyir [#]yon tan gyis/_/tshad min nyid ni bstsal [#]ba min/_/ma bstsal [#]bar ni grub min te/_/de ni rang las gnas pa yin/_/nyes pa yod dam med par ni/_/skyes bu'i ngag la
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]the tshom za/_/byed po grub phyir rig byed la'ang /_/bdag la skyon gyi dogs med min/_/des na ma ltos nyid kyi phyir/_/rig byed tshad mar gang brjod pa/_/de grub min te gang gis ni/_/de yang byed pa ma ltos yin/_/gal te the tshom skye ba'i phyir/_/mi slu ba yi shes
[\[112a.2\]]pa'am/_/rgyu yi dag pa ma nges na/_/de tshe rig byed tshad ma min/_/gzhan las yang ni tshad nyid la/_/de ltar gyur pa 'brel pa nyid/_/gang phyir rgyu ru brtags pa des/_/de rgyu mtshon du nges pa skye/_/de yi tshad nyid yod pa ni/_/de yis nges par byas pa yin/_/snga na med pa'i tshad
[\[112a.3\]]ma nyid/_/de la 'di yis bskyed byas min/_/lan cig skyes nas 'jig pa yi/_/don ni tshad ma nyid du 'gyur/_/nges ma byas kyang de yod nyid/_/sngar bshad rim pas nges par 'gyur/_/[#]gal te rgyu yi dag pa nyid/_/shes na de la nges par 'gyur/_/yang na btso sreg la
[\[112a.4\]]sogs pa'i/_/mtshan nyid don byed thob pa yis/_/gal te 'bras 'byung la ma ltos/_/goms bcas 'jug pa yod na nges/_/thabs thams cad dang bral ba na/_/tshad ma nyid ni nges 'gyur min/_/des na tshad ma nyid de ni/_/yod kyang nges par ma byas na/_/med pa
[\[112a.5\]]dang ni 'dra ba yin/_/yod ces bya bar brjod mi bya/_/rna ba'i blo la'ang gsal ba ru/_/mig sogs blo dang 'brel pa yod/_/gang phyir tshogs gcig rag las nas/_/gzugs dang sgra sogs zhugs par [#]'gyur/_/phan tshun tha mi dad rgyun gyis/_/gcig la gcig ni
[\[112a.6\]]rgyu ru 'gyur/_/de lta yin na de dag las/_/des na 'brel pa gsal bar yod/_/de yi sgo nas de blo yang /_/du bas bud shing 'gyur ba bzhin/_/de'i phyir blo ni tshad mar 'gyur/_/de las gzhan blo dang 'brel phyir/_/'di ni bsgrub gzhan las skyes pa'i/_/blo ni nges par byas pa
[\[112a.7\]]yin/_/des na rgyu gzhan gyis byas pa'i/_/shes pa'i mi slu 'dod pa yin/_/de ltar dbang po du ma la/_/rag las shes pa dang 'brel pa/_/mngon sum gyi rgyur brtags pa yin/_/rig byed la de mi snang ngo /_/'di ltar chu la dang po'i shes/_/mig las byung ba skye bar
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]'gyur/_/'thung dang reg sogs snang ba can/_/lce dang lung [#]rten shes pa bzhin/_/ngag ni gcig pu kho na yis/_/yul dang dus dang mig sogs la/_/don gyi mi slu rnyed min te/_/kun la the tshom 'byung ba'i phyir/_/nges pa'i yan lag dang bral ba/_/sgra rnams dgod pa tsam
[\[112b.2\]]du ni/_/me'i sbyin sreg gis mtho ris 'gyur/_/de ltar mtshungs par thos pa yin/_/bram ze rnams la mtho ris sogs/_/'dod pa tha dad du ni snang /_/de phyir 'dir ni mi rnams la/_/don gyi mi slu 'thob [#]pa yin/_/bskul ba las byung shes pa la/_/brtan pa nyid ni sngar bsal
[\[112b.3\]]zin/_/de 'dzin gzhan dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/_/de ni [#]dngos la the tshom za/_/thams cad ma mthong bram ze yis/_/bskul ba las ni 'byung ba'i blo/_/kun la mi slu can yin par/_/de ni gang las nges par byas/_/mngon sum tshad ma nyid du yang /_/rjes su dpag pas nges par
[\[112b.4\]]bshad/_/dag pa'i rgyu yis bskyed pa'i phyir/_/de ni tshad [#]yin de gzhan min[#]/_/thams cad la ni de nyid 'di/_/tshad ma gzhan gyis bsgrub bya min/_/de phyir don byed shes pa la/_/'khrul pa med par sgrub [#]zin to/_/bdag nyid 'bras brtags [#]ming can ni/_/ma 'khrul par ni nges pa yi[#]/_/_
[\[112b.5\]]rjes su dpag pa skyes pas [#]kyang /_/'khrul pa cung zad yod pa min/_/la lar sna tshogs 'khrul pa yi/_/rgyu mtshan stobs kyis [#]'byung ba can/_/'khrul pa gzhan gyis spong [#]'gyur te/_/gang phyir de la nges pa med/_/mi gsal gsal ba nyid yin pas/_/gsal ba don grub [#]mi 'gyur
[\[112b.6\]]te/_/gzhan gyi mngon sum bzhin des na/_/shes pa rig par [#]'dod par gyis/_/rang nyid bems po'i dngos yin phyir/_/mig sogs dbang po rnams kyis ni/_/yul rnams 'dzin pa ma yin te/_/de dag shes pa'i rgyu nyid yin/_/des na tshad ma nyid 'di la/_/rig par byed par [#]nyer
[\[112b.7\]]mkho yin/_/gang phyir rig par ma byas 'dis/_/yul gyi rnam pa nyams myong min/_/rang rig pas ni gzung byas kyang /_/'di ni 'di ltar 'gyur ba yin/_/'khrul pa'i rgyu ni yod pa'i phyir/_/de dngos nyid kyang nges med 'gyur/_/de tshe don gyi de dngos kyang /_/'di nyid kyis ni
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]nges 'gyur min/_/'dra ba nyid sogs dmigs pa yis/_/de las gzhan sgro btags srid phyir/_/goms [#]pa las byung shes pa ni/_/ji ltar rang las tshad mar rtogs/_/de bzhin log shes 'ga' zhig ni/_/rang las tshad min nyid du [#]gnas/_/gnod dang rgyu
[\[113a.2\]]skyon bcas shes pa'am[#]/_/thug pa med par bshad pa yin/_/des na the tshom gyis log nyid/_/'dzin par nus pa ma yin no/_/skye ba'i [#]gnas skabs kho na ni/_/'di ni tshad ma nyid du nges/_/'di ni tshad ma nyid du ni/_/rang rig pa yis nges min te/_/mi 'dod pa dang rtog [#]med phyir/_/_
[\[113a.3\]]shes pa gzhan gyis kyang min te/_/dus der nye bar mi gnas phyir/_/de yang mi gsal dngos phyir ram/_/thug med thal bar 'gyur phyir yang /_/rig byed la yang gnod can gyi/_/tshad ma rjes dpag med [#]nyid bstan/_/der bshad bdag sogs gsal [#]byas bas/_/des na tshad [#]mar
[\[113a.4\]]mi 'thad do/_/skyes bus byas nyid grub zin pas/_/rgyu mtshan skyon dang bcas par dogs[#]/_/me bzhin rang las nus pa ni/_/log pa'i shes pa la yod 'gyur/_/de [#]ni bskul byung shes pa yi[#]/_/rgyu mtshan skyon dang bcas par dogs/_/skyon mthong ba la skyon dogs pa/_/bye brag yod
[\[113a.5\]]par mi 'gyur ro/_/de phyir rig byed la yang ni/_/rang las tshad ma nyid rigs [#]min/_/des na nges par skyon med pas/_/byas dang bshad pa nyid 'dod kyi[#]/_/ji lta [#]ji ltar smra ba po/_/gang phyir chags sdang la sogs ldan/_/de lta de ltar rang 'don pa/_/shin tu srung byed ma yin nam/_/_
[\[113a.6\]]gang las gang zhig stobs chung ba/_/gang las 'dod pa sngar bslabs yin/_/su yis dbyangs ni nyams byas te/_/mtshams min mtshams bcad gang gis byas/_/de ltar gang zhig brtson 'grus ldan/_/skyon ni tshol bar byed pa yin/_/de ni mdzes bcas rig byed ni/_/skyon med
[\[113a.7\]]ji ltar 'dod mi byed/_/gzhan gyis rig byed nyams byas nas/_/blo gtsang rig byed 'don skyes bus/_/yal bar dor nas gnas byed cing [#]/_/de dag gnod par mi byed na/_/de tshe dus mang btang snyoms kyis/_/rig byed nyams par gyur nas ni/_/gzugs brnyan dang ni 'dra gyur nas/_/_
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]rig byed gzhan nyid du ni 'gyur/_/'dod chags zhe sdang rnams bral bas/_/rig byed nyams pas sel byed pa/_/rtag tu rig byed bsrungs [#]ba yis/_/rang gi [#]ngo bor 'dor mi byed/_/'gro ba thams cad nang du yang /_/'di 'dra ma yin par 'dod [#]min/_/don dam rab thim chen po ni/_/_
[\[113b.2\]]shes par 'gyur ba min zhe na/_/de ltar de min gang gi phyir/_/de ltas 'don pa mtshungs nyid 'gyur/_/dbang po las 'das mthong med na/_/de don de nyid kyis rtogs med/_/skyes bu thams cad dag dang ni/_/de bzhin yul dus ma lus pa/_/lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhin
[\[113b.3\]]gsal/_/nang gi sems la dngos su snang /_/de ni 'dod pa'ang mtshungs nyid du/_/rtogs par nus te gzhan du na/_/yul dus mi yi gnas skabs kyi/_/dbye bas phyin log blo cis 'gyur/_/rtag tu 'gro ba 'di 'dra yin/_/'di yang khyed la tshad ma med/_/ma mthong tsam
[\[113b.4\]]gyis 'jig pa yang /_/byed pa nyid du rigs pa min[#]/_/rang las tshad ma nyid phyogs la/_/rig byed rang gi don la ni/_/rang las nges par byed des na/_/rang dngos la rmongs sogs mi srid/_/de ni mi shes dang the tshom/_/phyin ci log med go 'phang gnas/_/gnyis skyes phru
[\[113b.5\]]gu 'ga' zhig kyang /_/bshad pa la ltos mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin mi shes rtsa ba ni/_/'di la 'jig pa mi srid do/_/rdo rje bas lhag rtag [#]pa la/_/'jig pa ci 'dra ba zhig yod/_/mngon gsal gzhan nyid yin zhe na/_/de ni rtag pa [#]spangs min nam/_/de phyir 'di la bsrung ba ni/_/_
[\[113b.6\]]bram ze rnams ni don med byed[#]/_/des na dbang 'das don mthong ba/_/nang gi mun pa'i tshogs 'joms pa/_/rig byed don gyis [#]dbye shes dang /_/byed pa po yang khas blang gyis[#]/_/de kho na nyid bsdus pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa las/_rang las tshad ma brtag pa ste nyi shu rtsa dgu [#]pa'o//_//_
[\[113b.7\]]de ltar tshad ma thams cad ni/_/rang las tshad ma nyid mi gnas/_/dbang po las 'das don rig pa'i/_/skyes bu grub phyir 'bad mi dgos/_/gang phyir skyes bu las kyang ni/_/rig byed tshad ma nyid du gnas/_/de ni dbang 'das shes nyid ni/_/de las de ni [#]tshad nyid gyur[#]/_/gzhan du mi
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]shes the tshom dag_/phyin ci log dang rjes 'brel can/_/skyes bu byed po yin na 'di/_/gzhan bzhin tshad mar mi 'gyur ro/_/mtho ris mchod sbyin sogs 'brel ba/_/shes nas gang gis de bshad yin/_/gsal bar dbang 'das shes pa can/_/gzhan gyis
[\[114a.2\]]de yang khas blang dgos/_/'dir ni chos shes nyid dgag pa/_/'ba' zhig nye bar mkho ba yin/_/gzhan ni thams cad shes na yang /_/skyes bu gang gis gnod par 'gyur/_/thams cad kyis sgra [#]thams cad du/_/gnas skabs la ltos 'dod pa yin/_/des na skabs kyis
[\[114a.3\]]thams cad mkhyen/_/med na kho bo ci zhig nyams/_/don la mi srid pa'i 'bras bu/_/cung zad sgra la'ang brtags pa yin/_/der gang thams cad sgrar rtog na/_/ming tsam kun mkhyen de yin bla/_/'on te skabs kyi cung zad ni/_/til mar chu dang mar sogs gang /_/thams
[\[114a.4\]]cad des ni kun mkhyen na/_/de ltar yin chug dgag mi bya/_/yang na dngos med dngos rang bzhin/_/'gro kun brjod par byas pa gang /_/de mdor bsdus pas [#]kun mkhyen pa'i/_/skyes bu su zhig gis ni bkag_/de ltar shes bya gzhal bya nyid/_/mdor bsdus nas kyang thams
[\[114a.5\]]cad nyid/_/brten nas gal te kun mkhyen na[#]/_/de spong su zhig nus pa yin/_/ji snyed dngos po gang dag gis/_/thams cad nyid du nges bzung yin/_/de shes pas kyang kun mkhyen na/_/de gzhung shes kun kun mkhyen 'gyur/_/de bzhin tshad ma drug gis gang /_/gzhal bya
[\[114a.6\]]drug ni rtogs par byed/_/de yang mdor bsdus par kun mkhyen/_/'ga' ni su zhig 'dod pa min/_/khyad par gyis ni don thams cad/_/yongs su mngon sum gyis mthong ba/_/gang zhig rtogs [#]par byed pa de/_/rtog de don med log pa yin/_/lus ni gcig pu kho na yin[#]/_/rdul phran
[\[114a.7\]]ji snyed yod rnams sam/_/skra dang ba spu gang dag yod/_/de dag shes par sus nus 'os/_/ma lus yan lag dang gsal ba'i/_/rgyas par shes pa sgrub [#]byed na/_/bya rog so ni [#]rtog pa bzhin/_/byas kyang don med pa ru 'gyur/_/ji ltar mig gis dngos po ni/_/kun gyis rtogs pa
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]'bras [#]med yin/_/thams cad mngon sum gyis mthong nyid/_/dam bca' de bzhin 'bras med 'gyur/_/rang chos chos min tsam shes pa/_/sgrub dang dgag [#]byed yod pa na/_/des bstan lung ni blang bya dang /_/dor bya nyid ni rab bsgrub [#]phyir/_/de la 'gro kun pra [#]ba yi/_/dbye ba
[\[114b.2\]]mkhyen pa nyid sgrub na/_/gzhung rtsod dag la rtsod pa yin/_/gnas min 'jig rten nyon mongs 'gyur/_/'jal bar byed po kun 'brel pa'i/_/mngon sum sogs ni dgag byas phyir/_/sdig pa dang ni bsod nams dag_/lung nyid 'ba' zhig gis rtogs 'gyur/_/dpyod [#]pa pa
[\[114b.3\]]rnams kyi phyogs ni/_/de tsam nyid kyis grub na'ang slar/_/kun mkhyen spong ba'i 'bad pa gang /_/de ni shi ba gsod par zad/_/rtsa ba med pa nyid kyi phyir/_/chos nyid shes pa nyams 'gyur na/_/kun mkhyen skyes bur gang smras pa/_/de ni phub ma rdung byed 'dra/_/dngos su mngon
[\[114b.4\]]sum gyis mthong phyir/_/gang la mi gtsang khu ba sogs/_/rang rig par ni thal bar 'gyur/_/de ni su zhig sgrub [#]par byed/_/sangs rgyas pa sogs dag gi ni/_/rig byed nye rig byed yan lag_/nying lag sogs don rtogs [#]snang min/_/de la kun mkhyen ji ltar yod/_/_
[\[114b.5\]]gal te rang gzhung ma bstan kyang /_/rang nyid kyis don shes 'dod na/_/rang gis [#]snyan ngag rtsom pa yin/_/snyan ngag mkhas kun kun mkhyen 'gyur/_/'gal ba'i don ni ston byed can/_/kun mkhyen mang po yod pa na/_/kun gyi [#]rgyu mtshan mtshungs pa yis/_/gcig pur su zhig
[\[114b.6\]]nges par 'gyur/_/gal te bde gshegs kun mkhyen na/_/ser skya min zhes tshad ma ci/_/'on te gnyis ka'ang kun mkhyen na/_/de gzhung mi mthun ji ltar 'gyur/_/rgyal ba sangs rgyas sogs sems can/_/bden par smra ba thams cad kyi/_/rtsi sogs phyogs re shes pa la/_/_
[\[114b.7\]]khyad par nges par gzung du med/_/rang phyogs dga' ba tsam gyis ni/_/gtan tshigs gang gis gcig la ni/_/kun mkhyen nyid ni sgrub byed pa/_/de ni gzhan la'ang yod pa min[#]/_/rgyal ba kun mkhyen bsgrub pa la/_/shAkya'i [#]slob ma khros nas ni/_/sun dbyung gang dag bstan pa
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]ste/_/de dag rgyal ba pa yis sbyor[#]/_/de la de rnams kyis sgrub dang /_/sun dbyung tha dad mi gnas pa/_/gzugs brnyan 'byung bas zin pa yis/_/ji ltar nges par byed par 'gyur/_/de ltar kun mkhyen 'dra ba dag_/phan tshun 'joms par byed pa na/_/kun
[\[115a.2\]]mkhyen kun gyi [#]cung zad lhag_/rig byed smra ba pos 'joms byed/_/ji ltar ne'u le'i so rtse [#]yis/_/reg pa'i sman ni 'ga' zhig gang /_/rtsed mo'i phyir ni sbyar byas kyang /_/sbrul gdug [#]thams cad sel bar byed/_/de bzhin rig byed smra ba'i khar/_/rig byed 'jig rten rigs pa 'ga'[#]/_/_
[\[115a.3\]]gnas pas ngag kyang shAkya yi/_/slob sogs sbrul gdug shes pa sel/_/gang la shes bya gzhal bya nyid/_/dngos nyid yod nyid sogs mtshan can/_/gtan tshigs 'joms byed nus yod na/_/de ni su zhig sgrub par byed/_/tshad ma gcig gis kun mkhyen ni/_/gang gis
[\[115a.4\]]yod par brtags pa ni/_/de ni nges par mig gis ni/_/ro sogs thams cad rtogs par 'gyur/_/ji lta'i rigs can tshad ma yin[#]/_/ji ltar rigs pa'i don snang ba/_/da ltar 'jig rten na ni mthong /_/de bzhin dus gzhan na yang 'gyur/_/shes rab yid gzhungs stobs rnams
[\[115a.5\]]kyis/_/cung zad cung zad khyad par gyis/_/phul byung can mi gang dag mthong /_/de dag dbang 'das mthong bas min/_/skyes bu shes rab can yang ni/_/phra pa'i don mthong nus yin yang /_/rang rig mthun pa ma spangs pas/_/skyes bu gzhan las phul byung 'gyur/_/rna bas rtogs
[\[115a.6\]]bya'i sgra rnams la/_/ring dang phra sogs dmigs pa yis/_/skyes bu phul byung mthong ba yin/_/gzugs sogs dmigs pa ma yin no/_/phul byung mig ni thob pas kyang /_/ring la [#]gnas par gyur pa yi/_/phra ba'i gzugs sogs gsal bar byed/_/sgra rtogs thos par mi
[\[115a.7\]]'gyur ro/_/de ltar bstan bcos spyod pa la/_/phul byung chen po snang bar 'gyur/_/bstan bcos gzhan gyi [#]shes pa ni/_/de tsam gyis ni dmigs mi 'gyur/_/byA ka ra Na'i sgra shes pas[#]/_/legs sbyar ma sbyar sgra dag la/_/blo ni phul du byung gyur kyang /_/rgyu skar tshes grangs
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]gza' shes min/_/skar dpyad [#]shes pa nyi zla yi/_/gza' 'dzin sogs la mkhas gyur kyang /_/b+ha [#]wa de sogs sgra rnams kyi[#]/_/legs par sbyar nyid shes 'gyur min/_/rig byed de ltar byung brjod sogs/_/shes pa phul byung ldan na yang /_/mtho ris lha mo sngar med na/_/dngos
[\[115b.2\]]su byed par nus pa min/_/khru [#]bcu'i bar du nam mkha' la/_/gang zhig mchongs nas 'gro byed gang [#]/_/de ni brgyar [#]ni goms byas kyang /_/dpag tshad tsam mchongs 'gro nus med/_/de'i [#]phyir phul du byung shes pa/_/shin tu goms par gyur pas kyang /_/cung zad kho na lhag pa ru/_/shes
[\[115b.3\]]nus dbang 'das shes pa min/_/khang dmig gcig la gnas pa yi/_/mngon sum gang zhig 'jug par 'gyur/_/de nyid du ni de mthong nus/_/khang dmig gzhan la ma yin no/_/don ni gang zhig thag ring gnas/_/yun ring rgya mtsho rnams dang ni/_/gling dang 'jig rten bar bcad gang /_/_
[\[115b.4\]]'dir gnas de dag su yis mthong /_/na la'i rgyal dang dus 'dab rgyal/_/rta mchog cho lo'i dor shes sngon/_/shing rta zhon nas 'gro ba na/_/dus kyi 'dab mas tshig 'di smras/_/kun gyis thams cad mi shes te/_/skyes bu [#]gcig 'ga' zhig kyang ni/_/mthar thug shes pa yod pa
[\[115b.5\]]min/_/ma 'ongs pa la mngon sum gyis/_/nus pa cung zad kyang ma mthong /_/rtags sogs rnams ni med pas ni/_/rjes dpag la sogs skyes mi 'gyur/_/de phyir dbang 'das don rnams la/_/dngos su lta ba po yod min/_/gang zhig rtag pa'i tshig gis ni/_/mthong bar byed
[\[115b.6\]]pa des [#]mthong 'gyur/_/de ltar mi bzod gang zhig ni/_/skyes bus byas pa'i gzhung gzhan las/_/dbang 'das don gyi [#]shes pa ni/_/sangs rgyas sogs la mnga' snyam na/_/de yang de nyid dang mtshungs phyir/_/de'i ngag tshad ma ma yin zhing /_/skyes bu la yang brjod bya ste/_/sngar
[\[115b.7\]]bshad gtan tshigs rnams kyis so/_/byed po bcos ma'i ngag la ni/_/khyed kyis thog med nyid gang brjod/_/tshad min gnyis kyi rten gyur pas/_/de ni tshad nyid sgrub byed min/_/gzhan ltos nyid kyis zas gtsang gi_/sras kyi ngag rnams tshad ma min/_/rang nyid kyis chos [#]ma mthong
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]bas/_/zas gtsang sras min yang de bzhin/_/de 'dra'i gang zag rnams la ni/_/thog ma med nyid rtog [#]na yang /_/tshad min go 'phang [#]gnas nyid phyir/_/de las khyad par can mi 'gyur/_/des na dpyod pa pa 'drar 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas sogs la thog med pa'i/_/spyi
[\[116a.2\]]gang rjod par byed pa na/_/de ni khyad par mi shas phyir/_/de dag la mtshungs 'gyur ba min/_/de ltar [#]yin na thog med can/_/tshad nyid dang ni tshad min 'gyur/_/tshad ma dang ni de'i snang ba/_/yon tan skyon gang thog ma med/_/thog ma med pa nyid tsam gyis/_/de kun mtshungs par mi 'gyur
[\[116a.3\]]ro/_/ji ltar thog mtha' med pa'i gser/_/tha snyad yan lag gnas pa yin/_/de bzhin sgyu ma'i gser yin yang /_/khyed la de dag cis mtshungs min/_/sangs rgyas sogs la kun mkhyen dang /_/rig byed la brtag [#]nyid yod gang /_/gang dag gis ni mtshungs brjod pa/_/da ni de
[\[116a.4\]]dag la khyad brjod/_/mig sogs rnams kyis kun mkhyen ni/_/da ltar re shig [#]mthong mi 'gyur/_/phyogs gcig rtags te yod mthong min/_/gang gis na ni rjes su dpog_/lung gis sgrub pa 'ga' zhig kyang /_/rtag pa'i kun mkhyen rtogs byed min/_/bcos ma yin zhing brdzun pa
[\[116a.5\]]yis/_/de ni ji ltar rtogs [#]par 'gyur/_/'on te de yi [#]tshig nyid kyis/_/gzhan gyis kun mkhyen rtogs 'gyur na/_/de dag phan tshun rten yin pas/_/ji ltar grub par rigs pa yin/_/kun mkhyen gyis bstan nyid kyis ngag_/bden yin de yis bde yod nyid/_/grub pa'i
[\[116a.6\]]rtsa ba gzhan med pas/_/de gnyis ji ltar grub par 'gyur/_/kun mkhyen ma yin pas bstan pa'i/_/rtsa ba dang bral tshig gis ni/_/kun mkhyen rtogs par byed pa na/_/rang gi [#]tshig gis cis byed min/_/kun mkhyen gcig ni bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/kun mkhyen mang po brtags [#]dngos
[\[116a.7\]]po/_/gang zhig gcig ni kun mkhyen min/_/de ni kun mkhyen brtags pa yin/_/de tshe rtogs [#]byed rnams kyis kyang /_/de shes shes bya shes stong [#]pas/_/kun mkhyen 'di yis [#]zhes de ltar/_/shes par nus pa ma yin no/_/gang gis thams cad mkhyen pa ni/_/rtogs par
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]ma gyur pa de la/_/de'i ngag tshad ma nyid ma yin/_/rtsa ba mi shes gzhan dag bzhin/_/slob ma kun gyis kyang rtogs pa'i/_/don rnams mi slur [#]byed na yang /_/thams cad mkhyen par mi 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gzhan shes don stong phyir/_/skyes bu kun shes shes bya la/_/mi slu
[\[116b.2\]]srid pa ma yin te/_/dus gsum 'jig rten gsum gnas pa'i/_/mi rnams dang ni phrad pa med/_/cung zad shes pa pos kyang ni/_/mi 'ga' zhig ni 'khrul byed min[#]/_/gang gis mos par [#]'khrul gyis ni/_/kun mkhyen yin par 'dzin par byed/_/zos dang bsam pa tshang ba dang /_/_
[\[116b.3\]]yod pa'i rdzas ni shes nus pa'i/_/chos sogs shes dang bral ba can/_/'ga' zhig gzhan gyis shes rnams kyis/_/de ltar sgyu ma mig 'phrul [#]sogs/_/mkhas 'ga' zhig gis rmongs pa ni/_/'khrul pa skyed par nus yin te/_/gang gis de dag kun mkhyen snang /_/de ltar
[\[116b.4\]]byung brjod [#]gna'i rabs las/_/gang yang tshangs [#]sogs kun mkhyen yin/_/gang la shes pa thogs med dang /_/chags bral yin par ston pa yin/_/sngags kyi gab pa'i tshig bzhin du/_/de yang phal pa nyid du brjod/_/yang na skabs kyi chos sogs pa'i/_/shes pa thogs [# ]
[\[116b.5\]]pa med par brjod/_/chos nor 'dod dang thar pa las/_/skabs la bab pa'i bzhi po la'ang /_/de yi [#]shes pa thogs med gang /_/de ni don kun yul can min/_/gang phyir thogs pa med tsam gyis/_/don kun spyod yul brjod mi 'gyur/_/rang don la thogs med pas kyang /_/de ni thogs med
[\[116b.6\]]'gyur ba yin/_/ji srid chos sogs spyod yul can/_/de yang 'bras bcas shes pa yin/_/shing la sogs pa thams cad ni/_/shes kyang cung zad dgos pa med/_/ji snyed thabs dang bcas shes pa/_/gal te de ni thogs med na/_/de yis 'di la thogs med pa'i/_/shes
[\[116b.7\]]pa'i tha snyad rnyed 'gyur ba'i/_/bdag kho na yi rnam shes ni/_/bsam gtan goms pas 'jug pa gang /_/da nyid la thogs med yin na/_/de yi [#]shes pa thogs med brjod/_/ye shes chags bral dbang phyug ni/_/mi zad bcu dang ldan pa can/_/bde byed ces ni gang grags pa/_/_
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]de yang bdag bsam pa yis shes/_/rnam par dag pa'i mtha' mthong gang /_/de nyid shes pa de yin no/_/de yi rgyu mtshan ma dag pas/_/gang byung de ni mi shes brjod/_/'on kyang rig lus nyid kyi phyir/_/tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug rnams/_/kun shes
[\[117a.2\]]ngo bor rig byed las/_/kun mkhyen mi nus ga la yod/_/gang na gnas pa'i lha mchog gsum/_/gang na mi ni sangs rgyas sogs/_/gang gis mtshungs pa de dag kyang /_/kun mkhyen zhes bya rmongs pas mthong /_/rig byed rtag pa'i lung las ni/_/tshangs pa la sogs gsum
[\[117a.3\]]bstan yin/_/de rtag nyid phyir rig byed kyi/_/rtag [#]pa nyid ni nyams mi 'gyur/_/de dag rtag pa'i yon tan dang /_/rtag tu las dang ldan pa can/_/rtag pa'i rig byed brjod bya nyid/_/srid phyir de dag 'gal ba yin/_/mi rtag pa yi [#]sangs rgyas sogs/_/rtag pa'i lung las rtogs
[\[117a.4\]]mi 'gyur/_/lung ni rtag nyid du 'dod na/_/kun mkhyen brtags pa don med yin/_/de la kun mkhyen shes byed pas/_/rig byed pas [#]rtogs de mchog yin/_/rig byed kyis rtogs kun mkhyen gyis/_/bar chod chos ni rtogs pa bas/_/bar du ma bsgribs chos sogs kyi[#]/_/shes
[\[117a.5\]]pa kho na khyad bcas kyi[#]/_/de ltar lung gis[#] rtogs bya nyid/_/kun mkhyen la ni yod pa min/_/gal te kun mkhyen 'dra gang zhig_/da ltar snang bar 'gyur ba na/_/de tshe nye bar 'jal stobs kyis/_/kun mkhyen yod par rtogs par 'gyur/_/mi rnams kun mkhyen mi mthong nas/_/de ltar
[\[117a.6\]]kun mkhyen yod ma gyur[#]/_/de dang 'dra ba'i nyer 'jal bas/_/lhag ma kun mkhyen min par nges/_/chos dang chos min sogs yul can/_/sangs rgyas la sogs kyis bstan pa/_/gal te kun mkhyen med pa na/_/gzhan du mi 'thad par 'gyur ro/_/kun mkhyen ston par byed pa can/_
[\[117a.7\]]mngon sum sogs ni bkag na yang /_/don gyis [#]go bas kun mkhyen ni/_/'di ltar rtogs par 'gyur ba yin/_/yang na spyir mthong ba can gyi[#]/_/'dir ni sgrub pa 'jug ba ru/_/kun mkhyen la ni brjod pa ru[#]/_/gzhan du shes sngon song mthong phyir/_/nyer bstan 'ga' zhig gang yin
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]te/_/brjod pa shes pa sngon song nyid[#]/_/a ru ra sogs nus rnams kyi[#]/_/nyer bstan de lta'i rnams [#]can bzhin/_/chos dang chos min nyer bstan 'di/_/des byas bstan pa yang yin te/_/de yi [#]shes pa sngon song nyid/_/de phyir de la rjes dpog 'gyur/_/gzhan du yang ni 'bad
[\[117b.2\]]nyid phyir/_/chos kyi [#]go bas rtogs mi nus/_/de nyid phyir na rjes dpag kyang /_/de ni legs par gnas pa yin[#]/_/rig byed rtogs shing thos phyir dang /_/rmongs nas rmi lam sogs mthong phyir/_/gang phyir yid sogs kyis bstan pa/_/gzhan du 'thad par 'gyur ba yin/_/rig
[\[117b.3\]]byed mi shes gang zhig ni/_/de dag rig byed las byung min/_/des na rmongs ba 'ba' zhig gis/_/de dag gis ni bstan par byas/_/yang na slob ma rmongs don du/_/de la mi brten pa'i rmongs pas/_/ngan par ston par byed rnams kyi/_/nyer bsten [#]'jig rten na 'jug 'gyur/_/gal
[\[117b.4\]]te de ni rig byed kyi/_/rtsa can yin na yid sogs bzhin/_/rig byed smra po kho na la/_/de dag de ltar ston par 'gyur/_/gang phyir dmangs rigs rmongs pa la/_/de rnams kyis ni nyer bstan byas/_/des na skyon brjod kun rdzob par/_/sgyu [#]las bzhin du de shes byas/_/gsum rig yid la
[\[117b.5\]]sogs rnams gang /_/tshad ma nyid du grub par nges/_/gsum rig [#]pas bsten bstan bcos can/_/de dag rig byed byung tshig ltar/_/rig byed ngag rnams ma mthong ba'am/_/tshad ma rnams la ma brten cing /_/de bzhin bstan bcos rtsom pa'am/_/ston par 'thad ba ma yin no/_/_
[\[117b.6\]]mi sdug zhig cig [#]kun mkhyen srid/_/yang na la lar kun mkhyen nyid/_/yod kyang sgrub gang rab sbyar byas/_/de ni dam bca' ma tshang nyid/_/sgrub par 'dod pa'i don gang yin/_/de ni 'di yis mngon brjod min/_/gang brjod de ni grub na yang /_/dgos pa cung zad yod ma yin/_/_
[\[117b.7\]]gang gi [#]lung ni bden nyid du/_/grub phyir kun mkhyen nyid brjod yin/_/de ni thams cad mkhyen pa yi/_/spyi sgrub tsam gyis mi rnyed do/_/ji srid sangs rgyas kun mkhyen min/_/de srid de tshig log pa yin/_/gang yang rung ba kun mkhyen nyid/_/grub kyang de bden gang la 'gyur/_/gang
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]phyir kun mkhyen gzhan grub na/_/gzhan gyis [#]tshig ni bden nyid med/_/gzhi mthun pa yis de dag ni/_/yan lag yan lag can nyid 'gyur/_/'jig rten na ni thams cad gang /_/de 'ga' zhig gi mngon sum yin/_/gzhal bya shes bya dngos nyid phyir/_/zho
[\[118a.2\]]yi gzugs dang ro sogs bzhin/_/shes byed 'dir ni ma bstan pas/_/phyogs ni ma tshang nyid du 'gyur/_/gang zhig kun mkhyen 'dod pa yin/_/'di ltar de ni bstan byas min/_/gal te sangs rgyas las gzhan pa/_/'ga' zhig kun mkhyen nyid 'gyur na/_/sangs rgyas
[\[118a.3\]]kyi gsung [#]tshad ma ru/_/de yi [#]shes pas ci zhig dgos/_/sa bcu la bzhugs pa yang ni/_/'dod chags sogs kun zad pa na/_/dag cing shel dang mtshungs pa yi/_/ye shes kyis kun mkhyen pa yin/_/bsam gtan la bzhugs don kun gyi/_/yul can sems brtse [# ]
[\[118a.4\]]gcig 'dzin pas/_/de bzhin don rnams kyis khyab par/_/nye bar bstan par nus ma yin/_/gang tshe spyi brjod byed po bzhin/_/su zhig cung zad ston byed na/_/phyogs gcig shes pas de smras yin/_/kun mkhyen gyis gsung [#]mi 'gyur ro/_/de ni bsam gtan la bzhugs na/_/_
[\[118a.5\]]yid bzhin rin chen bzhin bzhugs pas/_/rtsig sogs las kyang bstan ba rnams/_/ji ltar bsams [#]bzhin 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mi rnams shes par 'dod don kun/_/de rnams kyis ni shes par 'gyur/_/ji ltar rigs [#]pa phan pa rnams/_/de dag myur bar thob par 'gyur/_/_
[\[118a.6\]]de lta bu sogs brjod pa ni[#]/_/dad dang ldan la mdzes pa yin/_/kho bo rig pa don gnyer gang /_/dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba min/_/rtsig sogs las byung tshig [#]rnams ni/_/yid ches pas bstan mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag su yis [#]smras byas pas/_/de dag la yid ches mi 'gyur/_/sangs
[\[118a.7\]]rgyas kyis gsungs yin nam ci/_/bram ze slu bar byed pa yis/_/ring na gnas pas sgra brnyan bzhin/_/rtsed mo byed par smras sam ci/_/yang na gnod byed sha za sogs/_/ma mthong bas ni smras sam ci/_/des na shes rab nga rgyal can/_/de la yid ches mi bya'o/_/'di
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]ltar skyes bu'i kun mkhyen nyid/_/rang dbang nyid kyis gzhi med yin/_/slar yang 'di ltar dpyad bya ste/_/kun mkhyen ji ltar 'dod pa yin/_/rim gyis sam ni cig car ram/_/dngos kun rang bzhin gcig gis sam/_/gtso bo ci zhig nam nus las/_/byung dang 'byung
[\[118b.2\]]dang da ltar gyi/_/dngos po mtha' yas re re nas/_/rim gyis lo ni brgya yis kyang /_/su zhig gis ni shes par nus/_/cig car gtsang dang mi gtsang sogs/_/rang bzhin rnams ni 'gal ba can/_/blo gcig gis rtogs ma mthong ste/_/tha dang blo rnams la lar bcas/_/_
[\[118b.3\]]rnam dbye ma byas pa'i ngo bos/_/dngos po kun ni gang gis rtogs/_/dngos po kun gyi rang mtshan nyid/_/de yis rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/spyi yi ngo bo rtogs byed po/_/kun mkhyen yin pa des ci dgos/_/rnam pa gzhan ni rtogs pa yis/_/dngos po rtogs par mi 'gyur
[\[118b.4\]]te/_/rnam pa gcig bcas rnam shes de/_/yang dag ma yin log ma yin/_/yang dag yin na mthong gnod 'di/_/thams cad gnyis med thal bar 'gyur/_/des kyang kun mkhyen slob ma dang /_/chos dang chos min des bstan par/_/mi mthun tha dad dngos nyid kyi/_/rang
[\[118b.5\]]bzhin nges bzung ma byas phyir/_/gcig rtogs log nyid yin pa na/_/kun mkhyen 'khrul pa thob par 'gyur/_/de tshe de yi tshig dad pa/_/rigs min nyon sogs dag bzhin no/_/gal te 'jig rten las 'das pa/_/ting 'dzin las byung ye shes kyis[#]/_/rgyu bcas las bcas
[\[118b.6\]]'bras gang mkhyen/_/de ni thams cad mkhyen 'dod na/_/mngon sum rjes dpag sgra las byung /_/don gyis [#]go dang dngos med pa'i/_/tshad ma [#]'di ni sgrub byed na/_/med pas de 'dra yod ma yin/_/rim gyis sam ni cig car gyis/_/ji ltar 'bras med rjes dpag yin/_/nus
[\[118b.7\]]pa yang ni yod min te/_/yang na thams cad nus ldan nyid/_/kun gyis thams cad rtog [#]pa na/_/zhing zhes nus dang ldan pa rnams/_/thabs dang bral ba nyid kyi phyir/_/de dag gis ni kun shes min/_/thun mong ma yin thabs rnyed [#]pa/_/skyes kun ma lus mtshan nyid can/_/_
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]de la kun mkhyen gcig 'ga' zhig_/zhes bya de ni tshad med can/_/gang tshe 'di ltar kun mkhyen ni/_/'ga' zhig 'thad pa ma yin te/_/de tshe chos rtogs pa yi rgyu/_/skyes bus byas pa'i tshig ma yin/_/de ltar thos pa la sogs pa'i/_/[#]dpyod ba pa rnams rang rang [# ]
[\[119a.2\]]gis/_/thos pa 'dod pas 'di ltar gnas/_/rig byed rnams la rgyas pa ru/_/skyes bus byas pa bsgrubs zin to/_/de phyir dbang 'das don rnams ni/_/dngos su gzigs pa kho na yin/_/rtag [#]pa'i tshig ni 'ga' zhig gis/_/mthong min mi srid pa yi phyir/_/rtag pa'i
[\[119a.3\]]tshig gi [#]nus pa ni/_/rang dang gzhan las kyang med de/_/rang gi don shes skyed pa la/_/rim dang cig car 'gal phyir ro/_/de phyir mtho ris mchod sbyin sogs/_/rang nyid kyis shes nas bsal [#]byas/_/khyed la rig byed byed po yang /_/de
[\[119a.4\]]'dra dbang 'das don mthong yod/_/skyes bu'i don gyis [#]gtso mkhyen ba'am/_/chos thams [#]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/_/de ni khas len ma yin na/_/gzhan du rig byed tshad mi 'gyur/_/des na don gyis [#]grub pa yi[#]/_/khyod kyis chos mkhyen khas blangs pas/_/_
[\[119a.5\]]khyed kyis rgyas par byas pa yi/_/dgag pa de la gnod par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang skra dang ba [#]spu gang /_/de dag shes pa sus nus 'os/_/de ni rgyu med kho na ru/_/rgyal po'i bkag [#]dang 'dra bar smras/_/gang phyir 'ga' yi mi g.yo ba'i/_/dri med ye shes mar me yis[#]/_/dngos po ma
[\[119a.6\]]lus gsal byed pa/_/de la gnod can smras ma yin/_/mi snang ba tsam gyis kyang ni/_/de med par ni 'byung min te/_/dngos po rnams kyi dmigs pa ni/_/rgyu dang khyab byed med pa na/_/rgyu ldan khyab par bya ba dag_/'dir ni ldog par rigs [#]pa yin/_/de las byung de [#]bdag nyid
[\[119a.7\]]phyir/_/me dang shing ni med pa na[#]/_/du ba a mra la sogs bzhin/_/de lta min na rgyu med dang /_/tha dad nyid du thal bar 'gyur/_/gal te don rnams ma lus la/_/rang gi dmigs pa'i rgyu dang ni/_/khyab byed nyid du khyod [#]kyis ni/_/tshad ma 'ga' las nges byas na/_/de yi tshe khyed
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]'bad med par/_/don kun shes par grub pa yin/_/des na khyed rang kun mkhyen pas/_/bdag nyid rang la ci phyir sdang /_/de nyid kyi phyir khyed la ni/_/kun mkhyen 'di ni snang mi 'gyur/_/des snang gyur na khyod rang ni/_/'bad pa med par kun mkhyen 'gyur/_/gal te khyod la'ang don
[\[119b.2\]]kun gyi/_/yul can shes pa yod pa na/_/de tshe don kun yul can gyi/_/shes pa khyed la snang bar 'gyur/_/gang khyod [#]don kun yul shes med/_/de la de ni ji ltar snang /_/des rgyu khyab byed bdag nyid kyi/_/rang bzhin mi snang ngo bo'i phyir/_/khyed kyis [#]ma mthong khyad par 'di/_/kun
[\[119b.3\]]mkhyen pa [#]ni mi grub [#]po/_/mi mthong rnam gsum can 'di yang /_/sna tshogs ngo bor 'jug 'gyur te/_/de dang de 'gal la sogs pa/_/mi rtogs rtogs dbye'i sbyor sgo nas/_/kun mkhyen med par bsgrubs pa la/_/rtsa ba'i dbye [#]bas ngo bo can/_/mi dmigs 'di ni nus bral bar[#]/_/_
[\[119b.4\]]bsgrubs na gzhan dga' 'bad byed sel/_/rgyu dang 'bras nyid khyab bya dang /_/khyab byed nyid dang 'gal ba nyid/_/snang nyid yin na grub [#]'gyur te/_/gang yang bdag nyid khyab pa can/_/khyed la kun mkhyen mi snang bas/_/des na mi dmigs de dag rnams/_/de spong bar ni byed nus min/_/_
[\[119b.5\]]dgag pa'i yan lag gzhan yang med/_/gal te ma mthong tsam gyis ni/_/kun mkhyen 'gog par byed yin na/_/de tshe khyed kyis mar me bskor/_/byas la sogs kyang bkag par 'gyur/_/bu zhes bya ba'i 'bras mthong phyir/_/de rgyu yod par rtogs she [#]na/_/de med kyang ni
[\[119b.6\]]'bras bu de/_/'ga' zhig la snang ma yin nam/_/gal te gzhan gyis dmigs pas na/_/de ni med par rtogs pa min/_/khyed la gzhan gyi [#]dmigs de ni/_/yul can ji ltar grub min nam/_/nyer bstan phyir na de bzhin du/_/'di la kun mkhyen la cis med/_/rang gis smras
[\[119b.7\]]pa 'di yang ni/_/'dir ni ci yi phyir ma mthong /_/skyes bu rnams kyang rtag tu ni/_/phal cher brdzun ni smra ba yin/_/ji ltar da ltar yid ches med/_/de ltar 'das don smras la'ang yin/_/nyer bstan pa'am 'dir tshad ma/_/nyid min yin [#]mod de lta na'ang /_/khyed kyis kun mkhyen ma
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]dmigs zhes/_/nges pa 'di ni gang las skyes/_/sems can bdag nyid ma mthong na/_/de lta bu yi nges 'byung 'gyur/_/de dag mthong na khyod [#]dang ni/_/kun mkhyen 'gyur bar bstan zin to/_/de lta min na the tshom ni/_/dmigs pa la yang yod bzhin rigs/_/'ga' zhig
[\[120a.2\]]kun mkhyen yin pas na/_/rang bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid ni/_/rig [#]par 'gyur gyi [#]dogs yin te/_/de ni bdag gsal mthong ba yin/_/de yang de ltar dogs pa na/_/kun gyis ma mthong nges pa med/_/'di ltar thams cad sgra yis ni[#]/_/srog chags thams cad 'dod pa
[\[120a.3\]]yin/_/de yang kun la phyi nang med/_/des na ma mthong nges pa med/_/de gcig yongs su spong bas na/_/'dir ni 'brel pa 'ga' [#]zhig yod/_/gzhan gyis yongs su mi shes phyir/_/rang gi chags sogs ldog mi 'gyur/_/tshu rol mthong ba 'ga' zhig kyang /_/rjes su dpag
[\[120a.4\]]pas rtogs par 'gyur/_/res 'ga' kho na 'ga' [#]zhig gi_/blo rnams la lar khyad bcas yin/_/'di ltar rig byed la sogs la/_/skad cig nyid sogs sgrub pa ni/_/sngar ni gsal bar bstan zin kyang /_/rmongs pa rnams kyis nyer mtshon min/_/de ltar dgos pa 'di
[\[120a.5\]]la ni/_/tshad ma med pa'ang des mi 'gyur/_/gang la gnyis skyes dgos med par/_/kun mkhyen med nyid du rtogs yin/_/rjes su dpag pa med na yang /_/de yis kun mkhyen med des min[#]/_/du sogs 'bras bu mi rtsol ba'i/_/me sogs yod nyid la bzhin no/_/res 'ga' dmigs
[\[120a.6\]]pa'i don la ni/_/the tshom rigs pa ma yin nam/_/mtho yor bzhin du 'di ltar ni/_/de ni gnyis ka'i char brten [#]yin/_/gang phyir res 'ga' mtho yor min/_/mthong na de la brten pa yi/_/the tshom der ni rigs pa yin/_/kun mkhyen de ltar mthong ma [#]yin/_/rnam pa 'di
[\[120a.7\]]nyid kho na yis/_/ma yi me skor la sogs pa/_/the tshom med pas med pa ru/_/blo ldan khyed la thal min nam/_/dngos po rnams ni yod med du/_/tshad ma nges par ldog pa'i phyir/_/kho bos tshad ma med na yang /_/'dir ni the tshom yod par smras/_/mig sogs rnams
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]ni nyams pa ni/_/dngos yod kyang ni tshad mi 'jug_/de rnams ma nyams pa nyid kyang /_/dngos po med phyir bum sogs bzhin/_/des na mi dmigs 'ba' zhig ni/_/rnam pa gnyis su snang ba'i phyir/_/des na tshad ma med na yang /_/kun mkhyen the tshom 'gyur ba'i mchog_/de ni
[\[120b.2\]]yod kyang gzhan rtog bzhin/_/rmongs pas dngos su mthong ma yin/_/lcags gong dang ni mdag ma yi/_/me bzhin 'bras bu mi skyed do/_/gzhan rtog [#]las byung chags pa bzhin/_/de yi 'bras bu la ltos min/_/'bras bu snang yang de dang ni/_/'di la rjes 'gro rtogs pa
[\[120b.3\]]min/_/gang phyir rmongs pa'i blo mthong la/_/rtag tu mkhyen kun snang mi 'gyur/_/de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa des/_/med par 'grub par mi 'gyur ro/_/tshad ma'i dngos po'i rgyu dang ni/_/khyab byed nyid ni min par bshad/_/de log na ni de yod par/_/mthong yin des na the tshom
[\[120b.4\]]bshad/_/de phyir kun mkhyen yod pa ru[#]/_/gnod pa can gyi tshad ma ni/_/cung zad yod min 'di'i [#]sgrub byed/_/rgyas par mngon par 'chad par 'gyur/_/ma lus don ni yongs shes pas/_/sgrub pa 'bras bu med yin yang /_/blo bzangs [#]bde gshegs pa rnams ni/_/sems
[\[120b.5\]]'dis 'bad par byed pa yin/_/mtho ris thar pa thob byed pa'i/_/rgyu ni dngos su khyed 'ba' zhig_/yod par rtogs te 'on kyang ni/_/thams cad mkhyen pa rtogs par 'gyur/_/des kyang gnod pa med pas na/_/sgrub pa gsal bar yod pa ni/_/ci [#]phyir thams cad mkhyen
[\[120b.6\]]pa la/_/rmongs pa'i blo can log rtogs byed/_/'di la sgrub byed med na yang /_/gnod byed nges par ma byas par/_/the tshom 'gyur te de dag la/_/des 'di'i rgyu mtshan ga las byung /_/bskul ba kho nas byung ba [#]sogs/_/rtogs par nus te gzhan gyis min/_/gzhan ni med
[\[120b.7\]]par nges pa na/_/de ltar nges 'di rigs [#]pa yin/_/skyes bu'i don kun mkhyen pa yi/_/don kun mkhyen pa rab bsgrub [#]phyir/_/tshad ma de la sngar bstan zin/_/phyi nas gzhan ni 'chad par 'gyur/_/des na 'gro kun phra ba yi[#]/_/dbye ba mkhyen pa nyid sgrub na/_/gzhung rtsod dag la
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]brtson pa yis[#]/_/gnas min 'jig rten nyon mongs min/_/'jal bar byed pa kun 'brel ba'i/_/mngon sum sogs ni ma bkag phyir/_/sdig pa dang ni bsod nams dag_/lung tsam 'ba' zhig gis rtogs min/_/dpyod [#]pa pa rnams kyi [#]phyogs ni/_/de tsam
[\[121a.2\]]gyis mi grub [#]kyang bla/_/kun mkhyen spong ba'i [#]'bad pa gang /_/de ni gzhan dag rmongs pas byas/_/rtsa ba ma chad ba nyid phyir/_/chos nyid mkhyen pa nyams pa min/_/kun mkhyen skyes bur gang gis smras/_/de dag gis blo'i khyad par bstan/_/lce yi dbang po dang 'brel pa'i/_/_
[\[121a.3\]]chang sogs mi gtsang ro sogs rnams/_/gal te de dag de bstar [#]na/_/de lta na de smad par 'gyur/_/yang dag don bsgoms las byung ba/_/yid kyi [#]rnam par shes pa yis/_/smad par gyur kyang kun rdzob tu/_/ma phrad nyid dang rig par 'gyur/_/gang phyir skyob pa yi ni gsung /_/rig
[\[121a.4\]]byed sogs kyis bstan [#]pa'i don/_/ston par byed phyir snang min te/_/des na de nyid kun mkhyen du/_/srid yin mu stegs ma lus dang /_/thun mong ma yin gnas pa na/_/tshad mas gnod pa'i bdag sogs ni/_/rig byed brdzun [#]par bstan pa yin/_/gzhan gyis [#]shes min zhi ba'i sgo/_/_
[\[121a.5\]]lta ba ngan pa 'jig byed pa/_/gdul bya rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/bdag med de yis gsal bar gsungs/_/'khor ba pas ni ma goms pa/_/shes na phung khrol kun ldog [#]med/_/de goms pa dang ldan rnams la/_/yon tan rin chen 'byung gnas mchog_/de 'dra mchog gyur de nyid
[\[121a.6\]]ni/_/gal te snyan ngag mkhan shes na/_/skyes bu'i don gyi [#]gtso shes pas/_/su zhig kun mkhyen du 'dod min/_/bstod ris la sogs rnams la ni/_/bdag med ye shes de 'dra ba/_/yod min mu [#]stegs thams cad ni/_/bdag tu lta ba la 'jug phyir/_/'gyur smra skad cig nyid min
[\[121a.7\]]sogs/_/mngon sum sogs kyis [#]gnod pa can/_/rig bral mang du de dag gis/_/smras yin de dag kun mkhyen nyid[#]/_/khu ba tshwa [#]sogs mngon sum gyis/_/don sgrub pa la'ang 'khrul pa gang /_/de dag la ni dbang 'das pa'i/_/rigs [#]pa gsal ba ji ltar srid/_/de ltar yin na kun mkhyen
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]nyid/_/ma yin nyid du gsal bar rtogs/_/log pa'i shes pa dang 'brel phyir/_/phyin ci log don gsal byed phyir/_/rtogs pa po gzhan mtho yor la/_/mi zhes bya bar 'khrul pa bzhin/_/rtag pa thams cad rnams kyis ni/_/gtan tshigs grub pa nyid shes bya/_/dngos
[\[121b.2\]]kun rnams kyi de nyid ni/_/yang dag mkhyen pas kun mkhyen yin/_/des na ldog [#]na the tshom can/_/gtan tshigs nyid du brjod mi bya/_/gal te de dag 'gyur smra sogs/_/tshig ni dgos pa'i don yin na/_/dngos po rnams kyi de nyid kyi/_/ngo bo de dag ji ltar 'dod/_/gal te bdag med
[\[121b.3\]]skad cig sogs/_/de lta na de kun mkhyen 'gyur/_/dngos po ma lus pa de nyid/_/ngo bo dngos su mthong ba'i phyir/_/de dag ma lus pa rnams ni/_/'dod pa gcig la gnas pa'i phyir/_/phan tshun 'gal ba'i don rnams ni/_/nges pa'i don du smra ba min/_/bstan par bya ba'i ngo bo can/_/_
[\[121b.4\]]dngos po kun la gnas pa ni/_/de nyid [#]dngos su ma khyed pas na/_/bde bar gshegs rnams kun mkhyen yin/_/de dag de lta'i rnams can gyis[#]/_/ye shes bde gshegs nyid 'gyur yod/_/sngags dngos ye shes ldan pa'i phyir/_/de yi [#]mtshan nyid de tsam yin/_/des na spyis [#]kyang kun
[\[121b.5\]]mkhyen ni/_/srid par sgrub par byas pa na/_/de mtshan nyid med mi 'byung phyir/_/bde bar gshegs pa nyid la gnas/_/gang zhig 'gro kun ji bzhin du/_/bdag med sogs dngos rigs pa yis/_/khyad par ma bstan pa na yang /_/su zhig kun mkhyen srid pa yin/_/bdag med mngon
[\[121b.6\]]sum du byas na/_/skyon 'di gnas pa rnyed [#]mi 'gyur/_/de dang 'gal ba nyid kyi phyir/_/mar mes mun pa lta bu'o/_/dngos su byas pa'i khyad bcas phyir/_/bag chags dang [#]bcas skyon med 'gyur[#]/_/des na thams cad mkhyen nyid grub/_/sgrib pa thams cad las grol phyir/_/de yang bde bar
[\[121b.7\]]gshegs la grub/_/thog mar bdag med nyid gsungs [#]phyir/_/de phyir mu stegs thams cad kyi/_/de bzhin gshegs pa lta na bzhugs/_/tshad ma yis ni mi slu ba'i/_/de nyid mthong ldan de dang ni/_/'gal ba'i don ni ston byed pa/_/gzhan dag dang ni rgyu mtshungs min/_/gang dag
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]tshad ma'i spyod yul la'ang /_/tshad ma'i gnod dkrugs tshig brjod na/_/de dag dbang po [#]las 'das pa'i/_/shes pa'i nus ldan ring bar 'gyur/_/'brel pa dang ni rjes mthun thabs/_/skyes bu'i don ni rjod byed ngag_/mthong ldan tshad ma gnyis kyis ni/_/_
[\[122a.2\]]cung zad kyang ni gnod pa med/_/sreg [#]dang bcad dang bdar ba yis[#]/_/dri ma med pa'i gser bzhin du/_/rtogs par byed na gang zhig ni/_/'gyur bar 'jug pa ma yin no/_/sno dang nam lus mun pa ni/_/spangs pas [#]rjes mthun 'byung ba can/_/sdig can rnams kyis ma rnyed pa/_/de
[\[122a.3\]]bzhin gshegs gsungs rin chen yin/_/des na bde bar gshegs pa nyid/_/blo gros rgyas pas kun mkhyen bshad/_/skyes bu don gtso mkhyen pas na/_/de nyid sman [#]pa mchog tu gsungs/_/des na bde gshegs kun mkhyen yin/_/ser skya min zhes tshad ma ni/_/'das ma
[\[122a.4\]]thag tu gsal bar bshad/_/de ni rmongs pas mtshan byas min/_/mu stegs ngan khyu [#]mchog sogs pas/_/'dod lha 'jig par mdzad pa ni/_/ji skad bshad pa'i khyad par gyis/_/khyad par bcas kyang nges par 'gyur/_/yi ge phyi mo rig tsam gyis/_/zos pa la sogs bde ba
[\[122a.5\]]dang /_/bstan bcos kun don de nyid mkhyen/_/mtshungs snyam rmongs pa su zhig sems/_/des na gtan tshigs gyis kyang ni/_/gcig la kun mkhyen nyid grub na[#]/_/de yi gtan tshigs dngos med phyir/_/de ni gzhan la yod ma yin/_/des na rgyal ba kun mkhyen du/_/bsgrub la
[\[122a.6\]]shAkya'i slob ma ni/_/khros min sun dbyung gang bstan de/_/phyogs gos sbyor nus can gyis min/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i grub mtha' la/_/gal te 'brel grub tshad ma yis/_/de nyid gang zhig bstan byas pa/_/de bzhin gzhan 'dod la grub min/_/des na de rnams kyis grub
[\[122a.7\]]dang /_/sun dbyung tha dad gnas pa can/_/gzugs brnyan 'byung bas ma bzung bas/_/nges par byed par nus pa yin/_/rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid dang /_/lhan cig shes bya nyid sogs dag_/dngos su'am brgyud pas 'gal ba ni/_/cung zad tsam yang yod ma yin/_/shes
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]bya min nyid sogs ldan par/_/shes bya nyid sogs gnas pa yin/_/kun mkhyen ma yin las ldog pa/_/de yang gnas par 'dod pa yin/_/kun mkhyen nyid de rgyu chang bar/_/sngar 'jug 'gyur ba la lar ni/_/ma mthong ba ni gang gis ni[#]/_/yong sogs srid na phyis ldog [#]'gyur/_/_
[\[122b.2\]]rang bzhin rang rig med pas na/_/de ni skye bar mi 'gyur te/_/sngar 'jug yod na 'di ltar ni/_/kun mkhyen 'di [#]nyid grub par 'gyur/_/'gal ba bsgrub par ma byas par/_/gzhan ni ldog par rigs ma yin/_/de lta min na gzugs yod pas/_/ro yang med par rtogs par 'gyur/_/_
[\[122b.3\]]des 'dir [#]sogs pa'i sgras bsdus pa/_/phan tshun 'gal ba nyid kyi phyir/_/smras pa [#]nyid la'ang ldog pa ni/_/nges pa yin snyam 'ga' sems na/_/rnam rtog yod pas smra ba yod/_/rtog med las ni kun mkhyen yin/_/brjod rtog bcas kyi shes dang bcas/_/dngos po
[\[122b.4\]]rtogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/'dir yang yang dag kun mkhyen la'ang /_/smra ba nyid ni rtog [#]pa yi/_/rjes su byed pa yin snyam sems/_/de dag gis ni smras [#]yod na/_/skyob pa kun mkhyen 'dod min te/_/rtog bcas shes pa 'jug phyir ro/_/rtog med skad cig de la ni/_/smra ba nyid ni
[\[122b.5\]]ma grub bo/_/de lta yin na'ang de la ni/_/kun mkhyen min [#]nyid 'thad smras [#]min/_/thams cad mkhyen pa la ltos phyir/_/de ni mi slu ba ru 'gyur/_/gang zhig dro ba nyams myong nas/_/phyis ni smra bar byed pa bzhin/_/de phyir de don nyams myong las/_/byung phyir dngos la mi slu yin/_/_
[\[122b.6\]]dngos po ma lus rnam shes pa'i/_/nus pa spong bar byed na yang /_/khyed la ldog pa the tshom nyid/_/gnas skabs de bzhin thal bar 'gyur/_/smra bar 'jug pa'i nus pa ni/_/gtan tshigs nyid du 'dod na yang /_/ldog la [#]the tshom za ba yi/_/skyon nyid rjes su 'jug par 'gyur/_/'khor
[\[122b.7\]]lo bskor ba'i sbyor ba bzhin/_/rtog pa med kyang skyob pa ni/_/tshogs kyi shugs kyis nus pa yis/_/bstan pa gzhan dag 'jug par 'gyur/_/da ltar blo bzang gang dag smras/_/de dag la yang grub 'gyur min/_/'jig rten pa ni zhen pa can/_/smra nyid gang zhig 'dod pa yin/_/_
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]de la de 'dra'i gtan tshigs te/_/ldog la the tshom za ba yin/_/rigs pa dang bral gzhung gis ni/_/ji ltar 'dir ni ma grub 'gyur/_/smras pa gal te smra nyid ni/_/rang rgyud kyis sgrub [#]'dod pa na/_/de tshe rten ni grub pa min/_/yang na the tshom za ma grub/_/don
[\[123a.2\]]'dir the tshom za ba'i phyir/_/the tshom ma grub pa nyid gnas/_/de phyir thal bar bsgrub [#]pa ni/_/khyod [#]kyis de 'dra ba brjod dgos/_/de la yang ni lung tsam gyis/_/grub pa'i chos ni gsal byed yin/_/yod par sgrub pa'i don du ni/_/shes byed gzhan ni tshol ba min/_/gang la de ltar
[\[123a.3\]]gzhal bya dang /_/dngos po yod sogs mtshan nyid can/_/gtan tshigs 'joms pa'i nus med pas/_/de ni su zhig sgrub [#]mi byed/_/de bzhin rig byed smra ba'i khar/_/rig byed 'jig rten rigs pa 'ga'/_/gnas pas shAkya'i slob ma yi/_/mi zad [#]sbrul dug shes mi
[\[123a.4\]]sel/_/nus chung bram ze rmongs pa 'dir/_/mthong ba'i dug gis zin pas na/_/dbugs 'byin par yang mi nus na/_/smra bar byed par ji ltar nus/_/rig byed smra ba'i khar gnas pa'i/_/rigs pa bzang yang ngan pa nyid/_/smad pa'i rten la gnas pa'i phyir/_/mgul rgyan
[\[123a.5\]]rkang pa la btags bzhin/_/de yis [#]me la ma 'khrul nyid/_/du ba la yang brjod pa ru/_/nus pa min te gang gi phyir/_/de gzhung du ba gzhan du gnas/_/dngos gcig ngo bo nyid kyi phyir/_/chu la yang ni 'jug par 'gyur/_/de la yang ni me [#]yod na/_/log pa ci yang brten pa yin/_/_
[\[123a.6\]]yang de yi dngos 'bras bu yi/_/rnam rig der cis dmigs 'gyur min/_/mi mthun mtshan nyid dngos yin pa'am/_/dngos dbye de nyid can yin chug_/kun mkhyen la ni ma lus pa'i/_/dngos po dang 'brel de nyid kyi/_/goms pa'i stobs las byung ba can/_/yid ches tshad ma gcig tu [#]btags/_/mig sogs
[\[123a.7\]]rnam par shes pa min/_/des na nges par mig gis ni/_/ro sogs thams cad rtogs par 'gyur/_/ci phyir de ltar brjod pa yin/_/gzugs sogs nyams myong bdag nyid can/_/yid kyi [#]shes pa'ang grub pa yin/_/gzhan la yang ni rtsod med de/_/dngos po nyid ni gsal ba ru/_/_
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]gang phyir de yi [#]dngos nyid la/_/gzugs sgra sogs pa'i spyod yul can/_/dran pa gsal bar brjod pa yin/_/rmi lam ngan [#]yang yid shes na/_/de kun nyams myong bdag nyid can/_/des na thams cad mkhyen pa la/_/nges byed don can yin rtog na/_/gang gi phyir na mig gis ni/_/_
[\[123b.2\]]ro sogs rtogs par 'gyur ba yin/_/mig las byung nyid de rtog na/_/skyon ni 'di ltar 'gyur ba yin/_/yid las byung ba'i sems kyis ni/_/de ni ro sogs mkhyen pa yin/_/gang la yang ni phul byung mthong /_/de yang rang don ma spangs phyir/_/ring dang phra sogs mthong ba yin/_/_
[\[123b.3\]]gzugs la rna ba 'jug pa min/_/des na de lta bu sogs tshig_/gzhan gyis rigs pa dang bral smras/_/gang phyir drang don ma spangs pas/_/yid la phul byung 'dod pa yin/_/ji ltar rigs can tshad ma yis/_/ji ltar rigs pa'i don snang bar/_/da ltar 'jig rten na ni mthong /_
[\[123b.4\]]de bzhin dus gzhan dag [#]la'ang yin/_/rnam par dag pa'i shes kun nam/_/don kun spyod yul can yin te/_/'bras bu 'ga' zhig rgyu yis ni/_/byas pa'i phul byung cung zad srid/_/mya ngam [#]na ni skyu ru'i shing /_/'bras bu chung dang bcas mthong bas/_/de dag thams cad de nyid kyi/_/_
[\[123b.5\]]de dngos gzhan du yang 'dug [#]min/_/sbrul rnams mig gis nyan pa yin/_/de yang de ltar grags pa yin/_/des na sems can las nus rnams/_/sna tshogs don bcas srid pa yin/_/gang las dus gsum gnas pa yi/_/dngos po thams cad de bzhin du/_/nus pa ngas pa
[\[123b.6\]]can du snang /_/des ni de ltar brjod na mdzes/_/ji lta'i rigs can tshad ma yis/_/ji ltar rigs pa'i don snang yang /_/de [#]ltar 'jig rten na ni mthong /_/de bzhin dus gzhan na yang 'gyur/_/khyod ni skye bo tsam yin pas/_/nus kun nges par ma byas phyir/_/'jig rten rnams
[\[123b.7\]]kyis nus pa ni/_/da ltar dus [#]na'ang shes nus min/_/nus pa ma lus thams cad ni/_/shes na khyod rang kun mkhyen 'gyur/_/rnam pa gzhan du yod dogs pas/_/rjes su dpag pas kyang grub min/_/dbang 'das don shes dang ldan pas/_/skyes bu rnams la shes rab
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]sogs/_/yon tan ldan nyid dmigs 'gyur te/_/rigs la sogs pa'i [#]nus yod phyir/_/lta ba can sogs zhes bya ba'i/_/rigs [#]pa yod pa legs bsgoms gang /_/tshe 'di nyid la gzhan gyis sems/_/yongs su shes par byed pa dang /_/tshe 'di la
